links_reviews_text: Loved the tie at the waists to cinch it in a bit. Beautiful construction
This top was very comfortable to wear with the adjustable waist tie. The style is perfectly retro preppy. You could probably size down if you're in between sizes and want it to be more fitted.
...but it was not available until just after. This is a flowy, comfortable dress that is very easy to wear. I actually wore it over pants for a more work-friendly look.

Very cute and comfortable. Even comes with a black slip to help cover up cleavage in the front. The dress runs a little large, I'm usually between a 2 and a 4 but rented the 4, would size down next time.

The dress is oversized on me but the slip is tight. There's elastic at the wrists which is a nice detail. Hook-and-eye closure at the neckline (that was near impossible for me to close!). A good quality dress but I felt like I was swimming in it so I doubt I'll rent it again.
Such a cute pattern to wear and such a easy silhouette for anyone to pull off. One con- the slip at times would peak out from under the dress. Other then that no complaints,
This garment comes in two pieces-- a slip and the top piece. While I could I have done the top piece in a smaller size, the slip fit just right.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous silk dress for any occasion
links_reviews_text: This beautiful red patterned dress goes over slip. It's light, flows and probably very flattering for all body types. I'm straight and narrow and I loved how it accentuated my long legs. I definitely recommend this to anyone for any occasion.
Well made, lightweight silk, pretty fabric still nothing special.
A big surprise! Lovely silk and a quality garment- the print was fun. Wore with black tights and funky black mary janes- punky in a good way. A favorite rental!

This sweater is soft, warm and cozy. Its pretty cropped (I actually wore it with high waist leggings) but you can see just how cropped it is in this photo for reference. A large would normally be too big for me but it works for this sweater. I don't usually like sweaters but I liked this one enough to buy!

links_reviews_title: Cute and cozy but runs small
links_reviews_text: Loved the sweater and all the subtle colors. I only draw back was that the sleeves were really short on me. But I'm on the tall side so everyone won't have that problem.
Honestly not something I would usually wear, but it was perfect for cool Florida nights downtown. I got compliments on it all day and night!

This sweater runs extremely small. I knew it was suppose to show a little stomach, but when I put it on even with high waisted jeans my entire stomach was exposed. I loved the style but I would definitely size up to a Medium if you typically wear small or XS.

I really loved this sweater. It was so much fun to wear with some high-waisted skinny jeans and booties. It was also really warm so you can wear it in the winter and be comfortable. I felt so great wearing it. It accentuates all the right curves but keeps everything covered without showing any cleavage (34dd-which is saying something) so I never felt like it was inappropriate. My son is home from college and I wore it around him and he never made a comment which proves that. I love clothing that can make you feel sexy while remaining modest and this sweater does that! I was considering buying but I really only have the one outfit it would work for so I decided against it. Also, it is showing its wear. There are quite a few errant threads hanging about. It's knitted so you can easily shove them inside or, because of the almost fuzzy design of it, just smooth down and they become unnoticeable.

links_reviews_title: Multi-colored twist front sweater! This sweater ran small but it was extremely comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The sweater ran small, it was extremely comfortable and light. It's something you can pair with a cute pair of jeans or workout pants. It's an everyday wear sweater if you want to throw something on quick. I wore it for a date night with some high wasted skinny jeans. This is definitely a must have sweater for fall and winter nights out.

links_reviews_title: New with tags...and a hole in the shoulder
links_reviews_text: I received this piece and it seemed brand new, tag on and all. I wore it out and had a friend embarrassingly point out that there was a large hole in the shoulder of the sweater. Unacceptable and disappointing because the top itself is SO CUTE and feels good on. Had there been no quality issue this would have been another successful RTR pick.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy but size up!
links_reviews_text: Based on reviews, I ordered a size up. Glad I did. The medium was still plenty cropped with high-waisted jeans. Super cute and comfortable sweater that I wore for a girls' dinner and out!

I was obsessed with the soft material and color, but it's a crop top that runs even smaller than you would expect. I wore high waisted jeans and still had to wear a cami underneath during a winter date night to keep warm/not expose too much stomach. I'd likely rent again, but not during freezing months.

I usually wear a small in tops but this top I feel i could have actually gone with a large. It didn't stay in place (which could have been due to the fact that it was too small) and it has no stretch. I would order again in a size large.

I only say runs small because of the length. The arms and sweater actually fit my body but this is the length of a bra on me. To be clear, I love the cropped look with high waisted jeans. I'm 5'3" with a C cup. I got my usual size medium. It was very soft and a cute idea but wayyy too cropped if all you're looking for is a casual sweater.
Too small- definitely size up. Cute though- if you don't want your stomach showing it looks good with tank top underneath
This is super cute but like most red Valentino it's not for long waisted women.
Loved this dress. The fit was perfect. The top is a lighter, ribbed knit, while the bottom was a little thicker. The waist hit at just the right place. Got tons of compliments.
This dress is incredible and I felt like a model. Heavy material. It not itchy and very forgiving. If I win the lottery this will be my first purchase

links_reviews_title: Always say yes to a Valentino dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was everything!! It wasn't available in a large so I took the XL. It was roomy for sure but still structured enough to look great. The pattern mix is so fun and I got a ton of compliments all day! I'll be renting this over and over again.
Favorite sweater dress Not thick or very warm but so stylish No itch Short and the ruffle is a little high waisted The collar is extra and cute Fits true to size

links_reviews_title: Sassy and Fun, So Original. Loved this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: Comfy and cute dress to wear. True to size, I could have worn the small or the medium. The fabric is high quality. It felt so good on my skin. Valentino Dresses like this one help me feel the value of renting. Will rent again!!! Because it's way too pricey to own.
Love the fit, the cut, the contrasting patterns. Another Valentino winner! If only it had pockets. Perfect for pear shaped gals.

links_reviews_title: Such a great idea but not flattering on me
links_reviews_text: Love Red Valentino and always so excited to see new items on RTR. I loved the whole idea of this dress but it was not flattering on me. I am a 0/2 and probably need an XS but only the S was available. It fit pretty well but the way the waist hit and the horizontal stripes made me look so wide. Maybe in a smaller size or maybe you need to be narrower up top (I have a pretty wide rib cage). Sadly sent it back without wearing.

One of my favorite rentals ever! Would purchase but just too expensive! It rubs a bit small, so size up. Comes with a hood. I wore this jacket countless times, it's very comfy and super fashionable. Dress up or down. Had various zippers and is just the best jacket ever!
Arrived NWT and loved this windbreaker so much. Played golf, ran errands, went to lunch. Probably will rent again.

I wish I had a good picture to show how amazing this is! The fit is slightly smaller than i'd hope... medium was fine but anyone with bigger sized boobs would definitely need a size up. The sides have zippers which you can open and it creates this awesome unique look. The sleeves have a thumb hole but can be used without. The colors are vibrant and pattern is pretty. It's a very light jacket, not ideal for winter outside wear. I wish I could've kept it!

normally wear a small in tops, M when I want things to fit more loosely - this jack is so small I couldn't even pull it closed in front to zip with a T-shirt under! I would probably order a L next time. Cute and lightweight, but super small!
Super cute, but it runs small. It was super exact and doesn't allow for layering.
I received tons of compliments.
Typically a medium/large and M was way too small to fit. I'd probably size up to an XL to get this to fit properly. Great material though!

Really cute light jacket. It is cut on the smaller side. I am returning the small for the medium. For reference, I am a size 4/6 in tops. It is cut smaller At the bottom though and I have a bigger bootie area.
Usually I wear a medium/large size 10 tops - but the large in this jacket was almost too small to even zip! Sad to return, its very pretty.
Loved the cut and design- very flattering. Runs short so keep that in mind if you're tall (I'm 5-9). Unfortunately the fabric was stiff and felt very low quality
Nothing to see here. A very ordinary sweater which runs a tad small. The material I guess is nice enough but the sweater was a little short, square and tight in my chest.
Not itchy at all! Runs short. Loved it.
I love this so much, I bought it, lol. Adorable, flattering cut. Super cute, great texture, warm but not too warm. Will definitely be a staple in my work wardrobe.
This resembles a sweater I've owned in the past. I received compliments on this. It's great for work or a casual look!
Nice little top for the fall season, slight shoulder poof. Durable fabric, doesn't pile and more of a fitted sweater.

I loved this sweater, it was perfect to go with jeans, skirts and work pants. The only issue was that the sleeves immediately stretched out to be several itches too long, but I just rolled up the cuffs.

links_reviews_title: Loves it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I can never find sweaters I like because everything I always so big and bulky. This sweater is cropped and the fit was perfect. Very slimming.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, size up if you're curvy.
links_reviews_text: This knot doesn't have much stretch to it. I found the sweater a bit stiff. The collar didn't lay flat and it looked a bit uneven.
cute button detailing means this sweater stands out from the rest. cropped fit pairs easily with high-waisted pants and skirts. balloon sleeves for extra flair.
Very cute a bit too cropped, could have gone with a larger size
Wore this on vacation to Paris in the fall and it was incredibly comfy and a gorgeous color! I like larger sweaters so I ordered as large as possible and it looked great.
I wore this with high waisted jeans and the crop fit worked perfectly! Very warm and comfortable!
In order to wear this sweater normally and not cropped, size up. Wore this for a fun outing with friends and it was cozy, cute, and I'd totally rent again

I loved this sweater so much. The color and the detailing was perfect. I was able to pair it with a different skirt and wear it to work for a business casual look as well as a casual look and received plenty of compliments.

The fit of the sweater was great, sleeves were not too long nor too short. The material wasn't itchy. I loved the color, and the buttons; they actually can un botton which was necessary since I didn't want to mess up my curls while putting my head through the sweater. Super fun and cute sweater. I went bowling with friends as a late birthday outing so still looked cute, fun, casual but fashionable.

Great sweater that's true to size. I'm 5ft 1" and felt it was cropped, but not overly so. It's a great shade of blue. The knit is also nice, although the material doesn't drape as well as I'd like. All in all a solid piece.

This is super cute on and surprisingly warm. It's a heavy knit, so I wasn't worried about my bra showing through the material. It feels a bit bulky under a fitted jacket, the sweater itself kept me warm enough in 60 degree weather without a jacket. It's a crop top, hitting right above my bellybutton.
Nothing special - would have liked it to be a little longer. Runs small so I didn't wear it and wouldn't consider renting a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: Loved this so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this sweater! It's a great, cropped length hitting the top of my jeans and the sleeves were the perfect length for someone on the short side
Loved the thick material and cute buttons. Wish the item was sized accurately! I dislike having to get a 2XL when I'm normally a M/L. Anyhow I would order this again.
really cute..... a bit bulky, but fun to wear...

links_reviews_title: Light blue color is bright and an eye catcher
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and stylish

links_reviews_title: Very cute color and fit but not super warm
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and fit of this sweater even though I got a way larger size than I normally would due to it being the only available one but bc of the knit material I did get a little chilly a few times while wearing it! Still recommend renting to add some color to the winter wardrobe
Cute sweater that kept me warm. The color is beautiful. It was a little on the shorter side so I would definitely size up if I rent again.

links_reviews_title: Awesome sweater! Got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The sweater had a more boxy shape to it. It was a little cropped and showed some skin. Still very cute.

links_reviews_title: Got many comments on the color and the style of the buttons
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. The sleeves for a bit long for me but I'm petite so the sleeves on the clothes all tend to be that way.
Fit was great, I could have worn a small but the medium fit comfortably. Felt heavy but it a great transition piece from summer to fall
I love the color and it is cute but I thought it was going to be a little more cropped, just OK. I didn't end up wearing it.

Loved this comfortable linen jumpsuit. It's lined with a silkier fabric so it is not itchy like some linen can be. More cozy, than fitted through the waist. There is a clamp to keep the v-neck closed, but it's positioned awkwardly and makes the fabric fold inward. The pockets are nice and deep.
Soo comfortable and definitely felt like I was wearing sweats at work. Cute and comfy!
Good pants for work! Super comfy and although they can be casual were dressed up easily. I usually wear a large but glad I sized up

links_reviews_title: Wore them too many times to count
links_reviews_text: Comfort without being sweats or leggings. Wore them to a Super Bowl party, with heels to work, and on vacation. Pictures don't do them justice. These are great to wear when traveling.
Comfy on a plane, meetings and all night! My only complaint is the tie in front - the metal pieces make it knot really easy... otherwise highly recommend
Love love love. So comfy and fit great. I'm normally a medium/ large on bottom so I went with the large and they fit fine. I probably could've gotten away with the medium

links_reviews_title: I loved them! So comfortable and easy to dress up!
links_reviews_text: These were amazing. I wore them in New York and wore leggings underneath because it was freezing! They were so comfortable and i received many compliments on them! Dressed them up with black boots an a rent the runway white sweater! Love love !!!

Waist was tight and wish the ankles would have been a littler tighter, but overall I liked the look and got lots of complements. I liked them best with heels because they were a little too long and baggy to look good with sneakers. On a taller person sneakers would probably look good.
I did not wear these. They were on the small side and given how thin the material is I didn't feel comfortable in them. Would be great for someone without curves.

links_reviews_title: Night out to casual great pant
links_reviews_text: So comfortable and high quality. Wore out with booties and in casual settings.

links_reviews_title: These pants are so universal!! They can be casual or dressy and make your butt look really good!
links_reviews_text: I run between a medium and large. I'm glad I went smaller on these!

links_reviews_title: Totally surprised at the flattering and comfortable fit.
links_reviews_text: I love these pants and I usually can't wear pants due to height, weight and thigh factor. they stretch and look different and expensive.

links_reviews_title: They looked good enough, but I'm not in love with the fit or fabric.
links_reviews_text: I was surprised based on the other reviews to find the waistband and ankle elastic a bit too tight. A little more give would have made these pants a lot more comfortable. The fabric also caught on any part of my hands that was remotely dry. Definitely a problem for me in the fall/winter.
Love these! Agree with other posters, the waste is tighter than I'd like. More like a tight 2 or a 0. I will live in these!

links_reviews_title: I wore these to work with white sneakers and a cropped sweater.
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed these pants. They are very comfy and give a relaxed look. Unfortunately I just didn't have the perfect top to go with it. The warmer months would be easier to style these. Still love!
Fit great comfy and perfect for the weekend.
Really comfortable and a great way to have a casual pant that looked a little more put together!

links_reviews_title: These were very stylish as well as comfortable
links_reviews_text: They came up slightly higher on the ankles than I thought they were going to, but I still loved the fit of them.
Love this brand

links_reviews_title: Cute, but I'm a bit hippy so felt a little cupcakish, but fine for work!

links_reviews_text: Such a flattered dress. It's fairly stretchy material, so feel free to size down if in doubt. Great fit with tights for work. Love love love it
I rented this dress for work, but also worn it out one day to wine bar. Fits true to size, very comfortable dress. I love Ted Baker dresses.

links_reviews_title: Fits great and warm for the fall/winter!
links_reviews_text: It's a little short for work but I wore this with booties and tights and it was great!

links_reviews_title: Nice, though skirt bigger than expected
links_reviews_text: Nice dress. Work appropriate and relatively warm. Skirt was a bit flouncy.
Stretchy fabric and flattering! A little bit on the short side. Really liked this one!
Snug, but not tight. Fabric was heavier than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy and flattering to a pear shaped figure.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy, great color good quality material.
Good quality. Shorter than I thought it would be. Great for a pear shape. Fitted it the top, room on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy dress good for a bunch of occasions!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a family Christmas party where I wanted to be a bit more conservative. This was perfect! Plus it's comfy and warm for the cold months.
This dress was really cute. The thick fabric was warm and perfect to wear to work in the winter time with some tights and books. Stitching around the waist was very flattering

links_reviews_title: Great for work or play. Travels well. Figure flattering.

links_reviews_text: This is a very short-waisted and short dress. I am 5'10, but this still seems to be poorly proportioned. Beautiful color, great fabric.
Beautiful fabric and fit, runs big should have ordered size 3. Runs a little short.

I wore this to a 4th job interview that was meant to be more informal. It was professional, fun, and hugged the right curves. It is a thicker cloth so even though it has give, it made me feel covered up. I got compliments from strangers on my outfit.
It fit perfectly! Made my waist look super small and the flare of the skirt was adorable. Also love the thick material. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
Nice dress with great details. I wore this to work and would rent again.
Thick and warm but also form fitting with a little stretch. Wish I would have remembered to take a photo. If your petite, it's a great option.
Nice everyday dress for a business casual office. Due to the knit aspect, it is body hugging on top but is flattering to the tummy area with its diamond shaped design and flared skirt.
Super cute!
So comfy and warm. I should have ordered the one, there was loose fabric around my waist.
I liked this dress! Very simple but high quality

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my dad's retirement party
links_reviews_text: Great color, comfy fit and cute style. Looks great with black tights/leggings
Thick material, fantastic cut, will rent over and over again
The fit was great but the material was quite heavy. Zipper is long in the back and cold.

Gave me an hourglass figure when I don't have one. I have a large bust, broad shoulders and straight narrow hips. This accentuated my hips and bust in a modest, feminine way and was slightly forgiving to my shoulders (that's hard to do). Received compliments, would wear again. Paired with black honeycomb tights and a smaller gold statement necklace, looked great and was super comfy.
Great dress for fall or winter, the color is really pretty and the fabric is great.
I felt like I was wearing a teacup- there's just too much hip flare. Very high quality thick material though! Wore this during late fall cold weather and was very warm.

links_reviews_title: It was extremely well made, and it fit me perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted with little stretch, but was a very polished look. I would definitely wear again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for a casual holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I paired it with black tights and boots. Very thin black trim at the neck and end of sleeves. Material is heavier (in a good way!), and length is to the knee. I felt this was really cute and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress worn with stockings and boots
links_reviews_text: Comfortable- wore it to a dinner meeting
LOVED this dress! Fabric is usual Ted Baker high quality, and the shape is perfect for short, curvy gals. Very comfortable!

Wonderful for an hourglass or pear figure. The sweater material clings to all the right places and the full skirt makes your waist look small. This came new with tags, and I was able to wear to two events. Couldn't be happier.
Fits true to size, very comfortable for the office, recommend.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering fit - perfect for work!
links_reviews_text: Good length, good fit, good quality.

links_reviews_title: Not for girls with large busts
links_reviews_text: This is not flattering for curvy girls, especially if you have a large bust. Tried to pair it with a jacket and boots. Way to full skirt and thick to work well. Ended up not wearing.
Skirt is cute but not for the office; high slits and very flimsy. Better for a beach day or vacation. Maybe will rent it when weather is much warmer for weekend wear!

links_reviews_title: Wore this almost every day the whole month
links_reviews_text: Was such a great style piece and you can get so much wear out of a coat for the month
This coat is so soft and comfortable. I wish that the S was available, it would have fit me better, but it still worked. It was very warm and I got compliments on it.

Loved this coat! It's oversized, so plenty of room without feeling like you're being swallowed up by the material. The fabric is lovely and provides enough warmth for a cold day/night. The silk lining on the inside makes the coat super comfortable. Received tons of compliments. Gonna be hard to let this one go!

I find that most of the Cupcake line runs a little large. This jacket still looked oversized in an XS but maybe that is purposeful. It was a nice layering piece - not super warm for winter, but a classic pattern easy to throw on to dress up an every day ensemble. I felt very classy wearing it :)

Would not recommend for cold weather, as the jacket itself is made of a thin material and doesn't have additional lining. The pattern is super fun and has a 70s vibe, the fabric is super soft and comfortable.

This coat definitely helps standout from the sea of regular black puffy coats. However, I wish it was a little warmer or had a thicker lining. Was great for gal but wouldn't last through winter with this.

I rented this coat for Army Navy weekend (Go Army, beat Navy!) but I wish I would have sized down. Besides the size, it was beautiful fabric and the single button in front allowed me to show off the cute turtleneck I had on!
Fun lightweight coat. A little longer than I typically like for my height but I still liked it
Constant compliments! Coat is warm, good pocket situation. My only beef was it was a bit big on my frame and there was only one button, so not super windproof.

I love this coat. I rented it in my first month of RTR and I still haven't given it back, 3 months later! It's so versatile and I get constant compliments on it. Matches everything too! It's warm but not too warm, and roomy enough to add layers underneath.
Perfect for fall. Not too heavy. Definitely great for everyday (work, weekends)
Great length and fit

I rented this for a work trip and didn't end up wearing it. The patten looked like the pics, but it was very flimsy and cheap feeling. It also only has one button to close it which seemed strange to me. I would not recommend this for cold weather.
Wore to work and out. Fun jacket, not super warm but would recommend for 40-50ish weather.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for both work and weekends.
links_reviews_text: Love the coat, you can dress it up or down.

Loved this coat in pictures, and it does fit oversized as others said but not really as expected. The sleeves are short while the midsection is loose. There is only the single button so it doesn't keep you very warm, then the neck is a little itchy. Cute for a few wears but didn't like it enough to own it.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and such a cute jacket. I would rent again for sure
links_reviews_text: Great fit and such a cute jacket. I would rent again for sure
Loved this and could be dressed up or down. Just wish there were more buttons to close it more.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to the Purdue vs. IU game...got TONS of compliments! Boiler Up!
links_reviews_text: True to size, fits on the the looser side...not form fitting. Super easy and comfortable to wear!
I kid you not when I say anywhere I wore this jacket I got like 10+ compliments, it's so cute. Only thing is it's not superrrrr warm, so more for fashion vs cold weather.

I ordered this jacket after eyeing it for a little bit and am so happy I decided to rent it! It feels very nice and fits well, but is a bit long. I ordered my regular size since I am somewhat petite and it fits very well with a little bit of roominess

links_reviews_title: Great plaid everyday coat, goes with a lot!
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments. Super trendy! It does run a little large but looks great oversized so I didn't mind. It's not very warm, though I was very comfortable in late fall Seattle weather 40s- 50s.
Very big on me so I never ended up wearing it. It needs two buttons, looks very odd looking without it.
I love this coat!!! So easy to wear with brown or black tones. Not super warm but perfectly fine for 50's temps.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved it and asked where it was from
links_reviews_text: Warm, great looking. Husband thought it was too flashy but friends loved it.
I just love this coat...so much that I purchased it! It's great for fall, and can be dressed up or dressed down. Great quality, nicely lined so that it can stretch into winter.

links_reviews_title: I love the colors, it's a great plaid! Not a super heavy jacket - great for everyday!
links_reviews_text: The fit is great, a pretty standard over-sized jacket. I have really enjoyed the colors of the plaid and it's very soft. It's fairly light-weight, I would consider it more of a blazer than a jacket. Perfect for a quick commute but wouldn't rent if you are hoping for a warm winter jacket. I would consider buying but.. that would defeat the purpose of RTRW!
I felt very put together -- elegant and professional -- and warm in 50 degree weather. Perfect with a beige scarf and long leather boots.
Sophisticated enough for work, cute for the weekend, looks great with everything. Super Soft, good for cool-but-not-cold weather. The Medium was a bit too big but it still looked great.
Very cute with white jeans and boots. A little oversized, but it makes the look better
Its a little boxy but it's cute! And soft and great for a fall night!

links_reviews_title: Looked like I was wearing my dad's coat
links_reviews_text: Alas this was way too big and unflattering. I have big shoulders and this was too big in the shoulders, way too big in the waist and longer than expected. Material and pattern are cute . Warmer than expected. Sent back immediately so I am bummed in this selection
I love this jacket and got many compliments while wearing it. I thought about buying it, but decided against it because the fabric is a bit scratchy on my neck.
Love this skirt! Jazzing up my work attire!

This skirt is chic, comfortable, an amazing luxe color and perfect for dressing up or down. I paired it with my trusty double buckle belt and a bodysuit for work and it was a hit! I have been trying more skirts lately and this has been my favorite yet!
Super cute!! Loved the color and the fit and the pleating!
Fit well, well made and good quality skirt. Color and material is really nice
I wore this too work and received so many compliments! Wish i sized down so it would sit higher on my waist.
Wore this skirt for NYE at work, cute but not outrageous was appropriate to wear to work. Velvet should be worn more than around the holidays but alas, here I am, wearing it for a holiday...

links_reviews_title: Cute, looks exactly like the picture
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, I think this may be a little long for anyone who is on the shorter side (I'm 5'6 and it was pretty long). Great fabric and all around cute skirt.
This skirt felt great on because the velvet was so soft and the color was gorgeous. I wore it to a fall rehearsal dinner and to thanksgiving. I found this a bit roomy in the waist.

I rented this to wear for a few nights out and a holiday party. I got so many compliments on it! The orange color is perfect for fall, it fit nicely around the waist and wasn't too long on my very short height, it actually hit around the ankles. I would definitely wear this again.
Color and fabric are nice. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Such a rich stand out color!
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt! I want to own it! It really popped in our family photos!
Loved this skirt for fall! Would recommend sizing down if you want it to sit higher on your waist. If I rented again I would order M.

This skirt is a nice material and not thin. I normally wear between and 8/10 and this skirt fit me perfectly in the waist in a medium. I'm a bit shorter so the skirt was long on me. I wore it with heeled boots to counteract the skirt length

All I can say is wow!! This skirt was beautiful - the color + velvet texture made it seem so expensive! I got soooo many compliments. Definitely a great way to spruce up your wardrobe for fall. Would say it ran a little large - I had some room at the waist that would have been easily fixed by sizing down. Otherwise fantastic - I'm petite and this skirt wasn't too long or overwhelming!

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, nice flow, no need to size up
links_reviews_text: RTR recommended I size up in the skirt, and that was unnecessary. I wear a 12 and got the XL, but definitely could have worn a large. Fun skirt to wear!
Love this velvety delight. So pretty and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful soft fabric- it felt like wearing skirt pajamas
links_reviews_text: This is one of those pieces that I wanted to buy immediately. The fabric has enough weight so there is beautiful movement. It does run a little large but it is comfy.

links_reviews_title: It's a great piece for transitional seasons! Runs large.
links_reviews_text: This skirt was absolutely beautiful. The only thing I didn't love about it on me was that I should have gotten an 8 vs. 10. I normally run between the two, but I have a rather small waist and wider hips, so the smaller size would have worked better for me. I'm also on the shorter side (5' 5"), so this skirt was a bit longer than I'd usually go for. The model is much tall er and it appears the skirt hits below the knee. It was hitting me at my ankles! I still got a ton of compliments and enjoyed wearing it.
I love this skirt. Fabric is really nice and soft. Waist was just right for me.

links_reviews_title: Loved the feel and look of the skirt. Very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore the skirt at the smallest part of my waist (27in) and the XS fit great.

It was nice to fit into an extra small rather than a small :-) I am glad I read the reviews and decided my backup to be an XS. It fits so well above the hips and it came down right at the middle of my shins. I wore these with booties and a white shirt tucked in. Honestly it felt conservative yet powerful- I loved the velvet.
This skirt was so much fun to wear and very comfortable. The full skirt is fantastic, without being too heavy or bulky for a petite frame. Loved it, would rent again

True to size/ runs slightly large. I wore the XS and there was still some space in the waist. I loved the color and the fabric. Very cute and comfortable. I originally reserved it for work, but it felt too dressy, so I decided to re-order it for a holiday event. Loved it though.
I really love this skirt! Received a ton of compliments! I'm 5'3" and it didn't fall too long. A definite rent!

links_reviews_title: I loved this gorgeous fall colored skirt.
links_reviews_text: The material was beautiful, and I got lots of compliments. I'm usually a medium, and did wear the medium in this skirt although the waist was a tad big. I wonder if the small would fit or if I'd be somewhere in between with it. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fall accent piece! Guest will gobble it up.
links_reviews_text: Loved this pleated velvet skirt. Would rent again, received so many compliments paired with a simple black top and black booties. Perfect for fall or thanksgiving... think meeting the significant others parents for the first time or eating thanksgiving dinner together. The fit was perfect, falls on the waist and depending on how much turkey you eat just slide it up!
Received new with tags, but unfortunately it was too large in the waist. Size down.
Gorgeous velvet skirt... received many compliments.

Lululemon + RTR makes my life complete! Loved the structured yet flexible fit on these high waisted leggings (I'm 5'2 for reference). There's faux leather on the bottom but they are still very light/breathable and don't get too hot. Highly recommend!
Been searching for a not too athletic, not too leathery / night club style legging for daytime and this is it!
Never tried Lululemon leggings before and these have me totally convinced of the hype! They were so cute and fit perfectly.

Rented these thinking they'd just be regular black leggings and I'm obsessed to the point that I'm planning on buying. I love Lululemon leggings and I'm typically a 6 so this fit TTS. The black combo just adds such a nice element to these making them good for going out and the gym

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit, cool panels, but size up
links_reviews_text: These looked really good, but I found the 2R to be a little too compression-y for me. I would recommend sizing up. The faux-leather-look panels are subtle but give some interest. These are really flattering! Even being a little more snug than I'd like, these did a good amount of shaping, and everything looked a little lifted! The length was perfect for me, just past my ankles (5'2"). I would recommend this and I would rent again, just a 4R instead.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to try this brand, just could not believe people would pay this much for leggings.
links_reviews_text: LOVED so much I bought them....I am completely hooked on this brand. The most comfortable and perfect material for working out in!
Loved these!
Perfect Fit. Not too tight in the waist but stays up and does not require constant adjustment.
Rented these to take on holiday and I am amazed at how flattering they are. Really great compression in the front I couldn't believe how flat my stomach looked.

links_reviews_title: The perfect pant for everyday running around.
links_reviews_text: They fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dressy and casual everyday leggings!
links_reviews_text: Pretty much goes with everything. Less stretchy for Lululemon brand, and shorter. I'm 5'1 and a size 6 went just above my ankles.

The A line fit on this dress is excellent. Makes your waist look small and then flowy skirt. The sleeves may have been a little short but it wasn't noticeable. Wore to work but plan on dressing it up to wear out/on vacation

links_reviews_title: Break away from basic black and go for this!
links_reviews_text: After a winter for of dark solids, this was a refreshing break with its lively floral that can carry across seasons. Lovely cut to the dress makes for a flattering shape. Can be dressed up or down.

I really loved the pattern and design of this dress. I did feel it was a bit large for me overall but nothing that was so noticeable. Overall, the dress was very soft and flowy which was perfect for a work day.

links_reviews_title: Wore to Kennedy Center "Come From Away"
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly from head to toe. I'm not sure I am crazy about the smocked look - reminds me of Polly Flinders dresses I wore when I was 5 - vs. other Draper James features such as nipped sleeves so they pucker. But I loved the floral print.

I need a longer dress for work and this hit the mark. BEST PART: the inside has a finish that is satin-y so it doesn't stick to tights, get staticy, or bunch up! SO SMART! The large floral print was fun, versus a smaller print. I easily paired it with black but it would look good on its own too. I also have a large rib cage so empire waists can be tight but I sized up and it was comfortable. Would rent again
What a fun and lovely, feminine dress! Life every detail, including the ladylike length (goes truly to the knee). I want to buy it!
I gave this four stars because there wasn't a "wow" factor. Just a nice, pretty dress good for work.
No complains. It's a good work dress. The only downside, the bottom is not lined. Nothing that a slip can't fix. Pretty pattern, good construction Flattering fit.
Love how this fit. It was so flattering and I love the pattern.
I ordered a 6 but am usually a 4. Waist very loose and plenty of room in arms and chest. Can't wait to try in a 4. Very comfortable fabric and attractive dress.
Needed a no-fuss dress for a meeting and this fit the bill. Maybe runs a little big on top but I would stick with your regular size.
I loved this dress. Got a bunch of compliments and it was extremely comfy and true to fit.

First try with this brand, and I sized up since I'm pregnant. Loved the print, cut and feel. It looked great, and i would wear it again post-baby for sure. I can see this working for a number of occasions but I wore it to the office.

This dress was an unexpected hit. I normally don't do super flowery patterns but this dress is awesome and I got so may compliments. Wore it to work with black tights and got non-stop compliments throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Cute work dress! Size up for bigger busts
links_reviews_text: The bust just about fit me (38D) when I sized up. Overall flattering cut and cute pattern. The material doesn't have a lot of give and you may be initially surprised that there is no lining underneath (but it wasn't see through). The dress is also relatively lightweight and work appropriate. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Classic dress with a great pattern.
links_reviews_text: So many complements from colleagues and friends!
Wore to a full day conference, then on a flight & long walk home. Fabric held up, didn't get wrinkly. Great for work travel
Great dress for work day and after work meetings with clients or date night. Not clingy. Paired with tights. I am petite and needed to wear heels to fully appreciate the flow of the dress.

This dress is perfect for work. If you are looking for a suitable neckline and length for work, this is the dress. It isn't lined, but I was able to wear in Ohio winter with tights and boots. The print was beautiful and was very comfortable. I received many compliments. This dress worked well for my pear shape body. I could have sized down.

This skirt from Club Monaco was beautiful, flowy, and right on trend. It paired perfectly with the matching Club Monaco sweater. The 6 felt very true to size. The skirt sits right at your natural waist, if you have a pear shape or larger hips it may not be the best option as the skirt has very little give. The skirt was at my ankles and I am 5ft 4in. Definitely would rent again.

I love the color and fabric, but the seam made my thighs look all saddle-bag-y, which they just aren't. I was bummed! Had hoped to wear with riding boots and a sweater but would have needed something to go mid-thigh to cover the part where the seam bends. I don't feel that it was a fit issue, so I don't think this would be solved in another size. Oh well!
Could be dressed up or down. I got SO many compliments on this! Really soft and made well.

Loved this silky, brass colored skirt. Dress it up or dress it down! I'm typically between a 6-8 and the 8 fit great. Skirt is full length. At 5'9" the length was perfect for showing a little ankle with sneakers. But with booties, no ankle shows. Might be too long for shorter girls. The material is medium weight but I wore spanx underneath for a smooth fit and to avoid underwear lines. Waist hits high at belly button.

links_reviews_title: Loved this on trend slip skirt
links_reviews_text: Rented with my unlimited and wore it multiple times. I am a 0/2 with a straight figure so went up a size to ensure enough room in the waist - fit perfectly. It's a maxi skirt on me because I'm only 5'2" but loved the color, cut and fabric. Got tons of compliments. Only slightly annoying thing was the waistband did not lie flat - I wore a sweater over so you couldn't tell but I did have to adjust a fair amount.
So many compliments! I would've purchased this, but I need a size smaller. Hoping to get a 6 so I can add it to my wardrobe.
So lovely very flattering fit like a glove and was a great color for fall very versatile

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, a bit longer than I would have liked
links_reviews_text: amazing color and fabric. would have loved for it to either be shorter of have a slit
Received more compliments on this skirt that any other rental I think! Perfect for Thanksgiving!

So I didn't actually wear this skirt, because it came with a couple deep creases that I never had time to iron out. But it was very nice, with a luxurious hand feel and a gorgeous cappuccino color. Definitely roomy, especially for Club Monaco - I'm between a 2 and a 4 and had a bit of extra room in the 2!
I loved it so much and almost kept it. I wore with an cream adidas sweater and black mules. I will rent it again.
Midi skirts are so in right now and this one is so cute. It does wrinkle pretty easily but its such a pretty color for fall and the satin looks cute with a sweater.

I paired the skirt with a burgandy cashmere sweater. The skirt color is gorgeous and glides side to side as you walk. Very gorgeous. The skirt for me was a little big but I actually liked it that way because if it was tight you would be able to see panty lines. Received lots of compliments!

I wore this with a black button front shirt and snakeskin booties to work on casual Friday and happy hour afterwards. The next night I wore it to a dinner date with a black dolman sleeve top and a denim jacket and leopard flats. Many compliments. The only thing is that if you drop a single drop of anything it leaves a mark. Super cute, though.

Seriously, this sweater is great if you happen to be locked down due to a global pandemic or just an introvert. Super warm, super cozy. Not itchy at all. I would've probably been fine in a small (arms in a M are definitely a bit too big) but it is a little short so preferred having the length in the M. The print is great too!
super cute. trendy and over sized but cute . It's heavy!

I loved the slightly ballooned arms and overall shape. The weight of this sweater made it feel very expensive. I rented it for our Fall trip into the mountains when the weather was unpredictable. The sweater looked great loosely tied around my waist, in my arm, or on my body when the temp dropped! Loved it!
This is a thick sweater in a fun print. Perfect for WFH. The sleeves are very oversized. I typically wear a 4, sometimes a 6 and got the S, which fit perfectly.
This sweater is what it is. It's heavy, itchy, and the sleeves are really long. Wore a tank top under to minimize the itchiness. Looks cute, but only wore once.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves were a little puffier than I realized but still cute
Fantastic sweater with yards of depth and style. Say Yes to comfort and chic style in one go!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous sweater with lot of room and style. The print is epic. The extra touches in the collar and cuff are really pretty and classy. Enjoy!
Super cute and fuzzy looking sweater, but itchy on the inside especially around the collar.
But be worked the sleeves are really long and have to be folded.
Super warm and stylish
This was cute enough, but the sleeves were insanely long and big. I'm petite, but don't usually have an issue with sleeves being this big. It was also a little itchy.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! So comfortable and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: A little bit cropped but perfect with high wasted jeans. Excited to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great oversized option for animal print
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater! Nice long sleeves with a slight crop. Worked well with black jeans and boots.

links_reviews_title: it was so warm and cozy but unfortunately way too big for me
links_reviews_text: i wish i had sized down!
sleeves were long even rolled. not the most flattering but an ok sweater. would rent again but size down.
The sleeves were too long. It is a really warm sweater great for cold winter days.
Arm length is really long and fit runs big.

Love it. Fun leopard print + colorful stripes (with maybe a bit of Bob Marley inspo. Made a really basic black outfit much more fun to lounge and work at home. Easy, comfortable fit. Very warm... probably too warm for springtime.
This was great and didn't even need a shirt underneath it. It was soft and easy to wear. The bright colors really make it stand out.

Kind of love this sweater. Wore it with orange trousers for work and distressed denim for around town...Iâll probably rock it a few more times before I send it back. If you tend to get hot, you may want to pass because this is a very heavy sweater. I gave it ð ð ð ð because even the XS could stand to be a little smaller. A good solid rental!
Cute sweater! I wore it to work but it was a little too boxy/unstructured. I liked it much better worn casually with a t-shirt and denim.

links_reviews_title: On trend with a bit of rasta!
links_reviews_text: This sweater was super cute, comfy and well made. Loved the detailed striping. I wore it a few times and can def escalate a casz outfit :-)
Fit great with a little camisole underneath. I loved the color stripes, it make this all the more fun.

This sweater was nice. I'm not sure it really did anything for my figure or that I would rent it again. It was a warm sweater and the best part about it was the bright colors down the buttons. Interesting and unique. Maybe not repeatable.
Love the fit (finally sweater with normal vs super long sleeve length) and great print, the colored accent makes it modern and fun. Can dress up or down, button or unbuttoned.

This is a super cute, fun and warm sweater. I wore it on a casual day at work and felt like I could pull off an element of self expression in my otherwise stiff agency. I would honestly buy it if it wasn't $200! But it's super comfy, not itchy and could pair well with leggings, jeans, or a skirt. I normally wear a S but it wasn't available- M worked fine if not a little loose but I didn't mind

links_reviews_title: Fun print and perfect for winter.
links_reviews_text: It was thicker and bulkier than I expected. I loved the print. On my petite frame it was less of a cardigan and more of a sweater for warmth. Still, I really liked it.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work but great for casual hanging also - love it! Super trendy with the animal pront
links_reviews_text: And love the bright contrast colors. I wore it with jeans and heels and looked great. Comfortable and fits true to size. I'm normally a 4 and got a S and it was perfect

links_reviews_title: Fun & funky sweater that isn't TOO wild
links_reviews_text: Loved the stripe detail and print of the sweater. It is a bit on the bulky side, but worn buttoned up the right bra and skinny jeans/leggings and it won't add too much bulk. I did find that it hit my waist shorter than it did on the model; when paired with jeans that hit right below the waist, the sweater hit about 2 inches below the jeans' button. It still worked but just might want to keep in mind it would be tough to pair with cotton leggings. I'd wear again on a winter weekend. The color and pattern looked great with chunky gold jewelry.
Wore with jeans during a travel day and kept me warm on the plan but also with black pants for a day in the office. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Mad at myself for not getting a photo
links_reviews_text: I think that for the length I would have liked it to be tighter, or for the looseness I would have liked it to be oversized in length, cut wise it was a little here-nor-there BUT pattern and color choice made this a super fun sweater to wear and so hard to return! Awesome rental! Best vibes.

I loved this sweater and got tons of compliments, even from my male coworkers. I ended up wearing it twice - over the weekend and again to work. I'm usually a medium/8 in tops but got the large because it was the only available but glad I did. I think the medium could have been snug in the shoulders. Considered buying it but will probably just rent again in a month or two. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color and pattern
links_reviews_text: This was great to have. Could be worn to work or for a more casual look. Loved the pattern and pop of color on the lining.
Very cute. Fit true to size. Received several compliments and wore many times before returning.

links_reviews_title: Fun way to spice up work wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: Rented for a work trip. Very cute and funky. Material is a heavy wool so best if it is a little chilly out. Would definitely rent again!

Nice thick fabric. I sized up after reading review that it ran small but found that it was too big. The shoulders are a bit misshapen from the hanger. The fabric is not scratchy at all and very comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Adorable print & stripes make for a fun sweater
links_reviews_text: This is not a form fitting sweater. The large was pretty loose fitting bit the arms may have been short it sized down.
Didn't wear it as it was small, however I liked the colors and thickness of the sweater.
This sweater is so cute and fun but I found it hard to style (its brown, orange, blue..) and. Or the softest. Still, warm for winter and a statement piece

This is a nearly perfect fall sweater. Great print that somehow goes with everything, loose, boxy fit, and warm material. I kept this for many weeks and wore it many times, dressed down and up. If it were cheaper I would buy it.
Everything looks and feels nice, comfortable
Received brand new with tag... really cute pattern, nice fit. Would rent again
great sweater, thick material, great quality - love it.
It's a thick nice sweater but a little more Steford wives than I thought
The fabric of this sweater jacket is beautiful and the colors are so vibrant. The body does run a big large but still was a great look fits more like a blazer then a sweater.

I loved this piece! The colors are vibrate and makes for a very unique sweater. I wore it to work with black pants and heels. I initially wore it over my shoulders. It's comfortable and thick - perfect for a cold office. I recommend & would rent again!
This sweater is boxy but with the right bottoms it looks great. I love the colors. It really makes a statement.
Great fit. Thick material so ideal for cold office

RTR recommended I size up to an XL (I'm normally a 12 or L in tops) and the XL was way too huge. The colors and material are lovely. Fit is boxy. Wish I had gone with my gut and rented an L! Lesson learned.

Honestly loved this so much I bought it! It's beautiful, the quality is amazing and it's fun and different! Purposely ordered a size or two up so it's oversized and great with leggings or leather pants! Love love love!

links_reviews_title: Bold! But loved it for work.
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments. Feels vintage and modern all at once. And the color is loud, but if you pair it right, it doesn't look crazy.
Love the bold colors and gold buttons! But the sweater is super thick and heavy and looks boxy when I put it on so I didn't wear it.
The style of this cardigan is a little boxy, but this cardigan is amazing. I received so many compliments and the colors are so vibrant and fun.

I loved the color combination. It was heavier material than I expected, also a boxy shape with tight sleeves. Wore it once to a holiday party. Wanted to wear it to work but it wasn't something I wanted to be in all day so I returned it.
This is a VERY boxy sweater. It's lovely and the colors are vibrant but the medium was absolutely huge in the shoulders and chest area. I still wore, but do not size up.
The colors are nice and vibrant. The material is a thick knit. Was heavy on the hanger.
Material is thick and really nice! colors and details are beautiful! wanted to keep forever! will rent again
Rich feeling and looking - such a gorgeous piece. tons of compliments.
I wanted to love this sweater. Quality is awesome, the colors are fantastic. I will rent it again but probably in a size medium
Cool print and cozy for a winter day at work.

links_reviews_title: I loved this and got so many compliments I love the cut and fit. I will definitely rent again!!!

links_reviews_text: Being curvy, sweaters are warm but rarely flattering. This sweater drapes beautifully and I loved the fact that is was warm but not sloppy or shapeless - was so tempted to buy this but am losing weight and it was slightly large so will re-rent in a smaller size.
Really enjoyed this piece. When I pulled out of bag wasn't wowed, but the shape and the length and thickness really made me like this a lot. So much so that I wore it twice. Hardly ever do that!
Cute sweater. It was a little big, but I don't mind the oversized sweater look. Very warm!!!
I loved this sweater. The fit was great, it was comfortable and I got so many compliments! Thinking about buying.

This sweater runs true to size. My regular size was not available so I rented one size up (I don't mind big sweaters). I loved the fun print of the sweater - my kids enjoyed picking out all of the pictures embedded in the design. The details made this sweater unique- the cuffs of the sleeves were pleated and there was pleating one the hips to give the sweater shape. Will definitely rent again in a smaller size.
Love, love, love this sweater. I sized up but should have sized down because it is quite roomy. Wore it anyway but will definitely rent again 2 sizes smaller. Wore this for work and dinner.
Usually wear an 18. 20 was too big for going out in the world but for WFH it was fine. Lovely craftsmenship.
Runs oversized. Keeping the look edgy yet easy to wear. This was one I might want to keep forever!
Great fit, very warm and comfortable. I received many compliments and I will rent this again
very cute and comfortable!
I got at least one compliment. Definitely different.

links_reviews_title: Fun basic, but a little scratchy
links_reviews_text: Loved the design and the cut, but really wished the material was softer. In the cold weather, I want to feel snuggled, and this was just a smidge on the scratchy side.
Feels rich, love this sweater
Very comfortable. Different neckline adds flare. Lots of compliments. Even more detailed in person.
This was cozy and comfy! Loved it for a fall weekend in seattle

links_reviews_title: Amazingly beautiful design and pattern! Fabulous for everyday or a upscale casual evening!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a bit large but the cut was fabulous and helped to mask the larger size. The pattern is fun and stylish! I felt totally confident and sassy in this!
Very well made and fun to wear! Would buy it's so awesome. Very fun fit!!
Comfy and stylish.
Loved this unique sweater. I usually wear medium and the 8 fit perfectly. Didn't want to send it back!
Doesn't pill, nice design, getting lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, great for working in the office or hanging out on a weekend
links_reviews_text: This is a fabulously comfortable sweater and I got a handful of compliments from my coworkers on the design (London). I'm going to wear it for a potluck at my friends house this Saturday

Very comfortable and effortless. Perfect for work then out to dinner. Wore with a coat in 50 degree weather (too thin alone). I would stick to your true size. It has pleats at the waist that can fall weird on the body if you sized up.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater for nights out in the fall
links_reviews_text: Beautifully made, beautiful pattern, wore this twice and got loads of compliments both times. Really hard to find quality pieces like this in a size 22.
I love this sweater. I don't want to give it back. It's oversized and I could go a size down but it's kind of fun to wear it oversized over skinny jeans.

I rent things, my family says, "Oh that's a nice [x]" but this one they were all gobsmacked. They love it. I love it. I didn't send it back with the other items. I might not send it back, ever. Up close it looks like a random assortment of cream-colored lines on black but you step away and the mural emerges. It's cool and I love it.
Great to wear with high waisted leggings. Gives you some effortless fashion. It is elastic at the waist and sleeves so if that isn't your jam, then this isn't for you. But I loved it!
I thought this would be a bit boring, but on, it was unique. The v neck collar and slight crop were very flattering. It's not too heavy, and not too warm. It's a great everyday, black piece.
I liked the cropped aspect of this sweatshirt, it was cute. In addition...it's a sweatshirt, so also ultra comfortable.
liked the sweatshirt overall but the elastic band around the waist was tighter than I wanted it to be

links_reviews_title: Getting them on was a fun challenge for the morning
links_reviews_text: Taking advantage of work from home going on indefinitely and trying jeans from RTR, which I was hesitant in the past to do. These were very tight when getting dressed, but some lunges around the apartment helped : ) they don't have a ton of stretch compared to other brands, but I'm sure they'd still loosen up over time. My legs are on the shorter side so the "ankle" length on me is borderline full length. All in all not bad, but be aware of the spanx-like initial fit!
These run really small. Especially in the legs. The fabric is tight and not very comfortable. I didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: Loved the style and fit of these jeans
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable everyday jeans

links_reviews_title: Very small, impossible to fit into.
links_reviews_text: The jeans have almost no stretch. I couldn't get the jeans on therefore didn't wear it. They were my size but there was no way I could fit into it. Would need at least 2 sizes larger. This is a better fit for someone who is slender and not a pear shape like me.

I'm usually a 32 in Hudson & I find they're sizes usually run big. I cldnt even get these zipped. I had to look at the tag to make sure I ordered right size ugh. The denim was also really heavy with little stretch.

links_reviews_title: Super cute. Can't wear because of the corona virus
links_reviews_text: I can't go to work because of this health scare but this dress is so cute. I will re-rent when things calm down. I could have definitely done a medium. It was lose on the chest

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous print but the fit is off
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my winter wedding shower. It's a great print and a really pretty dress but the fit is off. I'm normally a size 6 and am between a medium and a small. The medium in this fit across the waist but the chest was gaping open. The small fit better up top but was a little tight across the buttons. When ordering just keep in mind the dress is silk so there's no real give.

links_reviews_title: This might be the perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: I love Equipment blouses and this dress exceeded my expectations! Since it's a slight A-line and hits at my knee, it's a perfect length for work and for a party. I wore this to a small fundraising party and then again for work. It was great for both. I had to pin it but other than that, it was perfect. I would buy it if it weren't so expensive.
Great feel and material, comfortable, flattering. I did wear a bralette underNeath because the top could be a little revealing. And the arms are a little long too
One of the nicest things I've rented! Quality is superb and feels fantastic on! Top gaps so had to pin it. The sleeves are long as well, but would definitely rent again and potentially buy it!

I loved this pattern and the style is unique. It was conservative enough for my formal workplace without sacrificing sass. If you're between sizes, size down, because while it fits TTS, the arms and skirt length can be too much for shorter women.

I rented this dress for spring but it seems more appropriate for fall with the colors. This feels like PJS! It's a high maintenance dress - there isn't a zipper. You have to unbutton a bunch of buttons in the front to get it on. Then you have to pin the front or wear a cami under. I tucked the sleeves under because they are super long- but that's the look. This dress is adorable and comfy.
Too big to wear
Loved it, and received many compliments

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautifully put together Hong really nicely. Beautiful material.
links_reviews_text: I did not require any pain nor any camisole. Sleeves were slightly long but not a problem at all! Beautiful dress. One-time wear I'm an extra small in this dress but a size 2 regularly.

links_reviews_title: Made for tall people with long arms.
links_reviews_text: Runs small except sleeves sleeve super long.

I was so excited to receive this dress! The fabric is beautiful but it has ZERO stretch. I was surprised that RTR suggested I get a Medium but went with is anyway. Big mistake! Should have went with the large! If you have a large chest DO NOT size down even if RTR tells you to. So sad I cant wear it to an event I have in a few days :(
fit me perfect! I got a lot of compliments
received plenty of compliments on this little number. will consider ordering again. very comfortable and suitable for work or play.
Very comfortable, but fashionable.

links_reviews_title: Looks great in picture, awkward fit
links_reviews_text: I really liked the pattern but the fit was awkward. The dress was big except for the waist. I didn't realize from the picture that it buttons across the body. Just not right for me.
Liked this a lot. Got many compliments
The reviews said this dress ran large but it was entirely too small. It's totally gorgeous but I couldn't wear it. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Must find a way to own this!
links_reviews_text: I would keep this 100% if I could afford to spend this much on one item. This dress is such a beautiful shiny fabric and a gorgeous fit. I typically wear a small, but the xsmall was perfection. So cute with heels or nice booties.

This is a beautiful dress, I think the fabric is silk. It has no stretch, so be aware of that. But it fits absolutely beautifully, is very flowy and feminine. The color is a dark, dark blue that is almost black. It's a perfect fall dress! #daytonight
Great fabric, colors and style. Perfect fit. Will def. rent it again.

This was a great, easy to wear dress that had a really flattering cut and made my waist look tiny! The fabric is a deep navy and has a bit of sheen to it, but still work-appropriate for business casual. Fit was true to size, maybe a tiny bit large. I normally wear a 4/6 and the small fit well.
Super cute transitional piece. It's double lined so it's not see-thru, but doesn't feel heavy. It hit right above the knee for me, which made it appropriate for work, and cute enough for happy hour.

links_reviews_title: Perfect colors for fall- beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work with a cardigan and to an awards luncheon - got tons of compliments! It fits TTS and is beautiful! I plan to get this back during colder weather to wear my boots and chunky sweater...love it!

links_reviews_title: Not quite conservative enough for a work dinner. Bit too sexy for colleagues.
links_reviews_text: This dress buttons beautifully, but wasn't quite right for a work dinner. Would have been great for a date.

links_reviews_title: It was a bit big on top and couldn't wear it to work

links_reviews_text: ORDER THIS NOW - it's so good. Silky and dreamy and the cutest thing you could wear to work. Definately made for y'all girls - really long sleeves and to my knee at 5'11"
This comfy and ultra gorgeous dress was perfect for work.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and so comfy
links_reviews_text: So cozy yet polished. Wore to work.

Not sure why I have a pixie ear in this pic but we'll focus on the top. Def was a work favorite and great update to a staple blouse. The pattern is conservative enough for most offices but can easily be paired more casually for a trend vibe. Love the brand love the top will def rent again.
Super cute top! Loved this
Just fine. Didn't wow me, maybe as it was outside my usual palette.

links_reviews_title: Great relaxed fit. Fun pop pattern.
links_reviews_text: Many compliments on this blouse. Great with jeans or under a jacket or suit.
I'm always nervous about renting jeans but these were perfect! Comfy and stretchy for perfect fit. Rented with a Solace London top which I loved. Perfect for an afternoon with the girls!!

links_reviews_title: I rented these jeans for all occasions. I absolutely love the style and esp the fit around my curves
links_reviews_text: All pros! No cons.

I wear a size 25 in Paige jeans, so that's where I usually start when trying a new brand. Well this brand I needed a larger size. Wish I had tried a size 26. The waist was a tad too tight and only comfortable for one wear:( will try this brand again because the color and fit in the legs was super soft and smooth.

I'm zero percent embarrassed to say that I wore these jeans 900 times before I returned them. I dressed them up, stayed casual, the works! They have just the right amount of stretch and fell at that perfect spot right above my ankle bone. Will definitely rent again!

Seriously. DL 1961 jeans. I'm obsessed. Every pair I've rented have been fire and these are no exception. The wash is super dark back and so versatile, I wore jeans to work on a Tuesday and didn't have to wait until casual Friday. I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Soft and fits like a legging
links_reviews_text: A bit snug. Maybe size up. Soft and feels like a legging but very substantial like jeans. Feel really good on but look pretty basic

Iâm not usually one to wear black jeans, but I decided to try them and Iâm so glad I did. They were a little bit snug in the thighs, but very cute and flattering. Great look with a large variety of tops.

These jeans fit perfectly and the material was suitable to wear as dress pants for work. I didn't get to wear these due to the Coronavirus quarantine but would definitely rent again in the future. Would consider purchasing them if they had not been so expensive.

I never wanted to send these back. They were the perfect fit and didn't get misshapen after multiple wears. The color is SUPERBLACK. One thing I noticed is that when I wore them, I kept getting "dirt" under my fingernails. Then I realized it was actually the black dye coming off the jeans. That was a little weird but I kept wearing them because they looked so good!
Denim feels great but barely came to ankle
I sized up because the app suggested it but these jeans were then slipping down the whole time. Would get my normal size or smaller in the future.

links_reviews_title: Stretch and sleek, good fit, but was baggy after wear.
links_reviews_text: Nice black jeans to dress up or down, good fit, baggy after wear.

links_reviews_title: These are cute but so tinyâ¦ I think it's meâ¦ I've gained some weightâ¦ Harsh reality but cute jeans
links_reviews_text: Cute jeans but they do run very smallâ¦ Or maybe I've gained some weightâ¦ Anywaysâ¦ I could not pull them over my thigh

Very nice jeans, excellent quality! Perfect length for me. I wore size 27, but probably should have choose a size 28. These jeans are SUPER tight! I was hoping they would stretch as I wore them, but no such luck, which I suppose shows how high-quality these jeans really are. I would definitely rent again, just in a bigger size
My size is usually 31 and I was surprised RTR suggested a size down but took it. Wrong, couldn't get them buttoned. But they seemed fine otherwise.
I usually prefer to wear leggings for comfort reasons, but these jeans feel like leggings, but look like jeans, and give more structure like jeans.

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans but a slight bit tight even after wearing them all day.

links_reviews_text: These are fitted black jeans that look great on. I sized up to a 28 and they worked perfectly for me. I'm normally a 27, and I feel sometime with RTR jeans run smaller due to the constant dry cleaning.

links_reviews_title: These seemed to run very small as I have a lot of jeans in size 29 but these in 30 were so tiny.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't even imaging getting these on...run small.
Definitely runs small but I was still able to wear my normal size. Next time I would size up but I do plan on renting again as this is a great basic for work or the weekend
Super duper tight. I am also postpartum so went up a size and these pants were so far from fitting me

links_reviews_title: Literally couldnt get the ankle part over my foot
links_reviews_text: Was recommended as a "best fit" for my size. Fit was no where close. Returned immediately.
Great quality as always from this brand. This one just ran smaller than usual for me - I'm usually 28R but had to size up 1 despite it being stretchy for some reason. Very comfy.

I sized down based on recommendations and was bit concerned but these fit great. They were so comfortable it felt like I was wearing leggings. The material has just the right amount of stretch, enough so it's comfy but not so much that it's falling down after you wear it for an hour or two. Mine came brand new with tags so that was great too. They were fine on me at m 5'1 height in flats as far as length but may be a little short on you if you are taller.

These jeans were a little tight on me due to the extra pounds I gained over the holidays but otherwise they were great! I thought the waist had just the right amount of stretch that I was able to squeeze into them with minimal muffin top. haha I will definitely be renting them again!
I am usually an 8/10 and received the size 30 (10). I couldn't fit the jeans over my foot initially and then struggled to get them over my legs. Needless to say, not for curvy girls OR size up.

Fits well in the shoulders but the length and overall fit is large. Seemed to be pretty roomy for A small (when I usually go between a small and medium, I'm pretty muscular in my arms, chest and back). But it is beautiful and the fabric quality makes it hang lovely. Gorgeous shirt but size down for sure.

links_reviews_title: Very Pirates of Penzance as a stand-alone. Cute for work.
links_reviews_text: The fit of this piece is very large. You can see in the photos how much material exists when I extend my arms. Also, the fit was quite long in both the torso and arms. Since the shirt was so wide on me, I tucked the top which helped with the torso length but not width. I preferred wearing for work tucked and with a cardigan or blazer over top. The tie feature is very cute and spiced up the blazer I wore. The color is true to photos. Overall, large fit but paired well with other items.

Very classic red and perfect for work or a date. I wore this under a grey blazer. Sleeves are a little long and the blouse is way too big untucked. There is a button at the neck to make it more conservative but I wore it unbuttoned.

This fit a little loose for me but still workable. Beautiful deep red color. I did not make a bow with the ties, instead I wrapped them around my neck like a choker. Very fun! Got 1 compliment which is not bad for a fairly straightforward work blouse. I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: Color was fun, but neck was tight and sleeves were awkward.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were too loose. I didn't wear it as intended.
I wore this with cropped black pants and black heels for work. It definitely runs large and is loosely fitted. I wore a small and I think I could've gone down a size. Received compliments!
This shirt is beautiful but I ordered the wrong size. I probably could have ordered a M. May try again but get a smaller size.

I rented this shirt to go with some skinny black cropped pants for a casual work Christmas party. The shirt wasn't quite as "Christmas" red as it looks in the photos. It's a little more on the burgundy-ish side. Due to the nature of the fabric, be prepared to de-wrinkle after shipping. Easily done, wasn't a problem. For the price, it's a cute shirt, not a "wow" color though. I was pleased that it wasn't sheer and I didn't need to wear a tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt. It is very flattering on and perfect red for the Holiday season. Great for work
links_reviews_text: Fit is nice. Sits nicely, looks great tucked in or worn normal.

links_reviews_title: Super long sleeves, but great color.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were about 4" too long, so they covered my entire hand. I tried to hike the sleeves up or cuff the sleeves, but they never stayed. The color of this is the most perfect red though, so it will match all skin tones. I got a few compliments on the shirt throughout my work day, but the sleeves are more bothersome than I'd like to wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this blouse...but it ran large
links_reviews_text: ran large. Great color
Love this top. Would like to buy it! XL perfect fit for size 14

I wore this to work with floral print pants. I normally wear a L in tops but this ran huge and long. The sleeves are meant to be long but I had to cuff them. It was also large in the shoulders so the cut out in the front kept falling below where I would have liked it. Luckily the neck tie is bulky enough to hide what was probably my bra sticking out. I liked the design but should have sized down.

This Sherpa screams snuggle me! Such a cute pullover for a chilly Florida night at the bar! Kept me so warm in 50 degree temps. The hood is oversized and amazing. Definitely not something I need year round in FL but will def rent again next winter!

links_reviews_title: Lived in this for a month
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect piece for Southern California winters. I loved it for just throwing on in the cold mornings and when evening turned chilly. It's casual but still cute.

links_reviews_title: Slightly over dry cleaned but warm and soft
links_reviews_text: The Sherpa is not as soft as expected. Probably over dry cleaned. But it's a cozy design. Normally a S but M fits well so probably running small.

True to size but more of a crop style. Doesn't cover your butt so this would be great with high waist jeans or leggings if that look is your style. It's not oversized and actually fits fairly slim. Very warm and cozy with just a tank underneath. Matches everything.
Wore this sweater throughout my camping trip. It's so comfy. Felt very chic in it.
I rented this for my trip to Iceland and wore it almost every day. It's so warm and can be worn on top of layers. I was so warm in this and felt so comfortable.

Loveee this hoodie. I'm very sensitive to itchy stuff, but this is lined with super soft cotton. It's a great weight. I sized up because I like baggier sweatshirts. The sleeves would probably be long on a not 6'1" person- but they are perfect for me! Hits me at my high hip- a little longer than a crop, but I dig it!

This is an amazing and unique alternative to the teddy trend going on now. I wore this as a crop and preferred the fit as such. I tightened the drawstrings a bunch and folded it up so it cropped. This is too warm for spring, so I will definitely revisit in fall/california winter,

Boxy, but flattering with jeans. Beautiful color, and I adore all things Vince! Wish I had rented this earlier in the winter season -- this piece was very over-worn and fraying, with paint-chipped toggles. Follow me at @instatherunway for styling tips!

I loved loved loved this hoodie. Not only is it warm and soft but you can easily dress it up or down. Looks great with a skirt and also cute with jeans. The arms are wider cut and don't cinch at the wrist making the sweatshirt dressier.

This Sherpa hoodie was just right for Christmas vacation. Cozy and soft and so warm! It's definitely on the big side, but I think it's supposed to be, and it's not TOO big... just oversized without being too bulky. My only criticism is that I wish it were a bit longer. It hit just above the hips for me.

Very comfortable and chic. The type of sweatshirt that would make me feel put together even if I'm just wearing leggings and running errands. Only con is that it isn't as soft as it looks. Very so-so on the softness.
Pro: goes with everything - jeans or leggings and even sweats, soft fabric, great cream color, stretch cord at the waist for a different fit Cons: arms are so short! And thick- tight fit in my coats
fits great, lots of complements

links_reviews_title: Cozy weekend piece, nothing super special
