links_reviews_text: I liked it!! It's cozy and trendy but ultimately nothing too interesting. The one I got was def well-worn before it got to me, but I'd rent again for a cold weekend running errands
Love the interior t-shirt material. Option to as loose or fitting was a nice touch. Eliminated the need for a coat and cozy for lounging by the fire.

What I loved about this sweater was that it was silky on the inside! It was so soft and really quite heavy so great for winter break. I wore it a few times with both jeans and leggings. I loved taht you could dress it up or dress it down.
Wore this cute, cozy hoodie for everyday hangs with friends and got many compliments! Cropped in length. Love the neckline!
Liked this! Was comfortable to hang out in, but you could definitely tell it was used.

links_reviews_title: Don't want to send it back
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this sweatshirt so so much. I want to keep it so badly but don't want to spend that much on a sweatshirt. It's thick, cozy, comfy, casual but cute, and very on trend.
Very bulky

links_reviews_title: great everyday comfy (but bulky) sweatshirt. good loungewear
links_reviews_text: Super cozy. very bulky so not for doing chores around the house :) but very comfy and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: love the hood, gets hot fast so good for the cold
links_reviews_text: soft, very warm, has a hood
Ran a bit large in the arms for me
Cozy and warm, runs a bit small - it was shorter than I expected and barely hit my jeans - but overall I would have kept it if it weren't for the price.
I love the style of this top, but it was made of much thicker material than I needed. Would be great for a cold evening, but not a good summer purchase.
Loved this as an upgraded fleece, but even the XS was oversized, so I would definitely advise renting on the smaller side.

links_reviews_title: This was a comfortable and cute hoody option.
links_reviews_text: Loved this hoody. The band at the bottom is adjustable so I wore it cropped with high waisted jeans. It was super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a casual day in LA!
links_reviews_text: Wore with light wash ripped jeans...this is a SUPER casual and comfy piece

links_reviews_title: This sherpa is SO COMFY to lounge around in. It is lined and pretty warm.
links_reviews_text: It's a little bit shorter than I would've liked. Not quite a crop but short enough that it looked better with high wasted pants. (I'm 5'8" and somewhat long wasted.)
Not as fuzzy or soft as expected - the Sherpa fur is super short and matted. Still got tons of compliments and was very comfy. It is short, barely met my jeans at the top.
The sweater seems a bit worn, but it was really comfortable and warm. Good for running errands in or lounging around the house.
A bit large fitting. Would grab a small over a medium next time (I'm a medium).

links_reviews_title: Only wore it once - it's cute but bulky.
links_reviews_text: Wouldn't rent again

links_reviews_title: Super cozy and great for lounging, but also super easy to dress it up!
links_reviews_text: Fit so well, not too bulky, but also had some shape built into it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this so many times!! I love it
links_reviews_text: This big sweatshirt is so cute for the colder winter. Love the drawstring around the waist to give you a more fitted look. Fit was perfect. The hardware is a little bit beaten up, but not bad. Wore this a lot around the house, to and from the gym, and on a ski weekend.

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket to throw on in the cold
links_reviews_text: Boxy fit. Didn't love it.
I did like the material but it did not look right on my body type. I feel like it made me look bulky so I probably would not buy this.
A little bulky but still cute

Boxy fit and cropped fit- the material was warm, but it didn't matter as cold just flew right in from under. The Sherpa was rough and bulkier than others and fit was unflattering in neckline and throughout the body. This piece has never seen a runway
This isn't the type of dress I think one would rent. I feel like it's something I could've bought at TJ Maxx. The material is super thin, and the dress just looks and feels cheap.
Easy, breezy dress. Perfect casual dress with a loose fit, great for throwing on and running errands.

I was a little underwhelmed when this arrived, the color is definitely muted. However, I've really enjoyed wearing it....it is super comfortable and also professional looking and I think looks great with Jeans. I often work on the weekends, so it's a nice weekend casual, comfortable, but still polished look.

This jacket is soft to the touch. I really liked the material however lint did stick to it quite easily. The jacket is very slimming and extremely warm. I chose to wear it closed, I wore it like that all day long. It has a little stretch and it's really comfortable. I recommend it.
Loved this, thought about keeping!
I find sleeves to fit right on me a lot- these sleeves were fine for me. Wore it open because it didn't pulled when closed-should have ordered up.

I took the 10 because the 6 and the 8 were both out. It worked pretty well even in the larger size. It's lightweight and really soft. A perfect nice-ification over my jeans and sweater on an unexpectedly chilly day. It has that formal-uniform look that leveled-up my super-casual look when I needed to dash to meet a fancy family member I'd not seen in some time. Well played, cool jacket. Well played.
Great jacket for casual or work. So soft and comfortable looks very expensive (cause it is! Lol)
Absolutely love this jacket and would buy, if not so expensive.
This soft, tailored jacket is a true wardrobe upgrade. Wore it to work, concert, out to lunch-it goes everywhere. TTS with a nice classic line with a bit of an equestrian flair. Good for larger bust.
Simple and practical. Looks sharp. It's unlined though so gets a bit static-ey in the cold.

I am normally a 6-8 but they didn't have my size. So I went with the 10. Glad I did. The fit is amazing. I'm tall so I needed the length in the arms. It isn't lined so it feels soft like flannel. Great structure. Keeping this one a while!
Fit true to size. Comfortable. Easy to dress up or down.
So easy to dress up or down. I was so tempted to buy it! One of my favorite pieces I've rented!

links_reviews_title: Great cut. Very flattering. Would buy it if the worn/cost was more inline.

links_reviews_text: This is a great deep green color, super soft, and amazing fit. Love this for work. Sophisticated and simple, but a great staple! I would buy in a heartbeat if it were a bit less expensive! I am bustier - normally an 8/10 - and got a 12 in this and it fits great.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, soft wool, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: This is a fabulous jacket - the wool is so soft and the cut is so flattering. I received many compliments. It is great worn over a tee with jeans and also more dressed up. It does seem to run a bit small - I tried a 12, which usually is slightly big on me, and it was a little tight. The 14 was perfect.

This blazer had a really nice, trim cut. I thought it was the most flattering blazer I've ever worn. However, I do not think it is meant to be or should be worn buttoned because it strains quite a bit to do so (and I'm very petite in build and small chested). The material of it makes it wearable for work and casual. It can pill a bit, but nothing too noticeable.
got tons of compliments and wore it a ton. fits perfectly. material is wool like, so it's warm
This blazer is true to fit. The dark green pairs really well with black pants. I have long arms, and it fit me perfectly. I may need to rethink renting and just buy it.

Probably my favorite rental item to date, this jacket is perfectly styled, fits me like a glove (love that stretch), and so versatile. It was a splurge for me to buy but I wear it several times a week. Professional looking but completely appropriate with jeans or cords. Most reviewers are saying it runs true to size but I wear a 12 almost all the time and the 14 fits me perfectly so from my perspective it runs small.
Very comfy, flattering and great for work. It has a nice color and was able to wear it with a few different styles. If it wasn't so expensive I would buy.

links_reviews_title: Great Light Weight and Warm Piece
links_reviews_text: Wore it twice - to work and to a baby shower. Liked the tailoring and the material. Felt versatile.

links_reviews_title: Soft, muted, lightweight blazer with great details
links_reviews_text: I thought hard about buying this for work. It's very very soft, lightweight, and slightly stretchy. It was a great choice for work in fall in NYC. The extra pocket is a fun detail. I loved the collar. I'm a 34D, 6-8 in dresses, and the 6 buttoned but was snug.
Soft green, cross between a traditional wool and a knit feel. It's moderately structured, and looks great with jeans or dress pants. Lots of compliments!

Great pants! I received in January, maybe better for spring or summer, but paired with Navy blazer. Really loved the color, maybe a little looser fit than I am used to, but I wouldn't size up or down.
This suit (rented jacket too) was professional and eye-catching. Many compliments! So happy with this selection.

links_reviews_title: First TTS pants I've gotten on RTR
links_reviews_text: These are legit true to size. Stretchy but doesn't sag during the day. Color is meh on this particular style (red and black) but the sizing and fit is worth it.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT fit! Slight stretch, comfortable, and cute color
links_reviews_text: Perfect work pants! They sit at the low waist, slight stretch so very comfortable to sit in. I wore this with the matching blazer and got many compliments. Perfect work outfit!
Great fit. True to size. Love it.
Loved the style and color of these pants. Wore to work holiday party. Runs large.
Fit great, lots of options for tops, loved these.

I'm usually a solid 10 to a large 10 - when I first put these on they fit perfectly (except the length). However, they stretched out quickly and were soon too big. Order a size down unless you like them baggy, two sizes if you like them tight. Pros: The material was comfortable. The material is thick enough to avoid creases or panty lines etc but not so thick as to feel bulky. The pattern is a tight checker white and deep red to burgundy. Looked very cute paired with either for a top. Cons: The length on my 5'8" frame was in the no man's land of too short to be pants, too long to be cropped. They looked ridiculous with flats so I was forced to wear heels. Something to consider if you're 5'6"-5'9". If you're really tall, they are definitely crop pants and if you're really short they could easily be pants. Also, they stretch out quickly, so order down and let them be tight while you're still at home and they will be perfect by the time you get where you're going.
Very festive pants, perfect for casual wear during the holidays. Fit nicely
These pants are comfortable, fit like a glove and just preppy classic. I always have a good experience with Theory. Looked good with gray, white, red and black.
Pants were a nice design, the quality that Theory delivers, but too large in the waist.

I love Theory pants, but these were so itchy because they lacked a liner. It's unfortunate because the fit is great (though I am 5'4" and these hit me right at the ankle, not like the model in the picture). Easy to pair with boots for a nice silhouette, I just wish they were a little more comfortable to wear.
Very sweet sweater. Light material.
It fit true to size and i really liked the puffed shoulders because it made the sweater very feminine. Overall loved it!

links_reviews_title: Cute, flattering, plain everyday and casual sweater. Thin, more like a dressed up tee shirt.
links_reviews_text: fabric is a little worn.

Really cute, lightweight sweater. The sleeves are definitely puffier than pictured. I think this is exacerbated by the fact that RTR insists on shipping sweaters on shirt hangers, so they all have the annoying hanger bumps.

links_reviews_title: Adorable t-neck for everyday or work
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a night out with a fun leather jacket and also wore to work with ankle pants - can work either way! Lovely feminine details make this a keeper for sure!
This item was true to size and very soft and comfortable. Would definitely rent again.
For such a simple top... I got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Wore a few times - super comfortable and flattering. Prettier than in pic.
links_reviews_text: Loved this - flattering fit, cozy and looks polished.

links_reviews_title: I loved the slight puff in the shoulders and comfortable, trim fit. Received a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Slightly itchy so I wore a tank under.
Ran a bit small. The sleeves were too puffy for me and not my style. Sweater was soft and lightweight. Would have liked it if not for the sleeves.
Super comfortable and chic
Cute shirt but a little short for a tall girl like me.
beautiful

links_reviews_title: Pretty lightweight feminine sweater, prefect for end of summer/early fall
links_reviews_text: I loved the puffed sleeves and the delicate details on this sweater. It is also very soft and lightweight, making it perfect for early fall. I wore this with camo print skinny jeans and thought it really balanced the look with the feminine details. I did find the arms a bit short and it was a bit tight in the chest. I think the small would have fit better.

I never ever thought I would wear camo anything. But it's hard to coordinate an outfit involving a bandana around your face. These were comfortable and cute. I agree with the other reviewer I wanted to keep them forever but the price was prohibitive for me. Can't recommend them enough.
Loved these pants - loose fit relaxed and very good quality. Easy to wear Paired with a black sweater and denim jacket for walk to town for take out

I think I may have found the perfect camo pant that fits well for a curved frame. Really want to buy because I've worn them multiple days in a week but idk if it's worth the price. I still believe I could find a comparable pair at a thrift shop.

It's hard to utilize RTR unlimited when I never get to leave my house. It was really nice that they opened up two extra spots for my unlimited membership, but there is truly not much that I would want to wear around the house all day. This sweatshirt was great for this. I wore it with a long tank, and some grey leggings. Threw on my slippers and you've got an elevated work from home outfit. At least I'm not wearing PJs all day? :-)
Very warm sweatshirt but overall just okay, nothing special

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a ten hour road trip in chilly dreary weather
links_reviews_text: I would love to own this but (1) price (WOW) and (2) dry clean only. The fleece is super silky and not scratchy - think petting the head of a miniature poodle. Also it is lined in satin which was an awesome surprise. Another level of cozy.
Cool fabric and comfy. Pretty bulky (fit and fabric) so not especially flattering. Very soft and warm though.

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday! you can dress it up or down. very versatile!
links_reviews_text: the fit is true to size
Super cute, cozy sweatshirt...perfect w leather leggings and chunky boots
cool vibe

I love the look, but I gave it 4 starts because it's a bit warm to wear indoors as a sweatshirt, it's more of an outerwear piece. The lining is poly like a winter coat would be. This would be perfect for a cold weather outdoor activity.
Love this sweater, so comfy for just relaxing around.

I've been wearing it around the house and it's the coziest sweatshirt/sherpa/teddy bear thing I've ever put on. The satin lining feels so nice on and it's a plush. thick pile. Really great for casual wear and athleisure looks!
Received multiple compliments and people wanted to touch it.
This fit well, was warm and looked good with black jeans and leggings. Slightly cropped however

The waist was fine, but there was definitely too much fabric in the top for me. I think this would look great on fuller/curvier figures. The button closure also made it cumbersome to use the restroom throughout the day.
Great jumpsuit - transitioned from day to night. Wore in vacation in France and was perfect
I selected this one piece jumper for a travel/work day. Super comfortable. Threw on a sweater as needed throughout the day. True to size.

I loved the color and silky material. It was flattering and fancy, but more laid back cocktail attire. I'm glad I got the medium and not the small because I had to wiggle in it a little since there are no zippers. The only con would be that it takes some time to go the bathroom, but that's with any jumpsuit. I would definitely buy this !
Loved it. Very light and comfortable
Super cute for work or weekend- lots of compliments. A little short waisted for me, but I'm still in love with it. RTR perfection, since i almost bought this jumpsuit at Vince!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not so flattering on my legs
links_reviews_text: I love the print and material of this jumpsuit. It perfectly covered my DD bust and didn't pull like some others might. I didn't love the super wide-leg pant. It didn't flatter my legs... but still enjoyed wearing this!

links_reviews_title: Great for a fancy work party with a blazer
links_reviews_text: It was super comfy, and the material has a little sheen which made it feel fancy. It was a little hard to get in and out of for bathroom breaks.

I got so many compliments when I wore this to work! It's very versatile - can wear to work or around town. I'm between an XS and a S and wish I would've gotten the XS - although then the pants might have been too short. The hidden draw string in the waist does a good job of cinching the waist for those with hour glass figures, but it is still a little boxy overall - but I think that's on purpose.

True to size. Pockets! Buttons down the front (note: allow extra time for the ladies room). Dress up with heels, jewelry; dress down with a little jacket/sweater and flats. Comfortable fit, elastic waist, silky fabric. Not as billowy as I was concerned it would be. Nice jumpsuit, versatile.

Love love love! So luxurious and comfy. A fun way to mix up my work wear. I'm a bigger girl so I don't always love the wide leg look but the fitted waist made for a flattering fit! Dressed up with heeled boots for work but also wore with sneakers and a denim jacket for a casual weekend look. Will for sure rent again!
I am definitely a romper girl, in every season. I loved the pattern and the silky material. It was comfortable and could be dressed up or dressed down. You need this in your life!

links_reviews_title: Might buy these -- so cute and wearable
links_reviews_text: To is not super flattering for legs but all in all it is a good look
Could be dressed up or dressed down

This was a really cute jumpsuit. Pretty floral pattern. Office appropriate. A little short on the inseam. But I made the mistake of renting it during February in New England. Sadly I never wore it, but will give it another chance this summer.
This is a great throw on outfit when you need to be a little dressed up. I wore it with a jean jacket and black ankle booties and it was adorable. Fit true to size also.

The waist hit in a place that just emphasized my belly curves, If you are very thin this would probably look very cute. Or if you are larger, and wear this very roomy, all may be cute, but a small curvy person, at least for me, I wanted to like it but it seemed a bit like a communist jumpsuit. Lovely silk material, best thing about it.

I love the material! It runs true to size. I didn't know whether to get the xs or the xxs, but the xs fits size zero perfectly. The length is perfect for us petite ladies...it's cropped. Can dress up or down. Very versatile!

links_reviews_title: Cute to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this jumpsuit! Wore with a blazer and high heeled booties to work and definitely felt dressy. Material is nicer so easy to dress up or down. I'm 5'10 and was able to wear a small without being uncomfortable

Comfortable, dressy and stylish. I loved this jumpsuit! Great fit especially for someone that is short. I wore with heels to complete the look. It was a cold and rainy night so pants were perfect. LOVED the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Cute jumpsuit but waist runs small
links_reviews_text: Really liked this jumpsuit. It can be warn casual with some crisp white sneakers or dressed up with some heels. The stretch waist ran very small. Size up if you are in between sizes.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and a perfect fit

links_reviews_text: I'm on the short side and was worried about the length, but it was good, and the elasticized waist gave the illusion of a figure. I appreciated that I could wear it with flats for a casual work look, heels or suede boots to dress it up, and an edgy jacket and chunky boots for a third option. I'll revisit it again in the summer for sure!

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but a little tight in the crotch
links_reviews_text: I may rent this again and size to a medium instead. Really liked it, felt like I was wearing PJs
I was excited to wear this, but it just didn't fit right. The elastic waist hit at the wrong place.
Fits slightly big around the waist, could have sized down, or worn a belt.
Great print and fabric. I'm always an xs in Vince because the brand tends a little large but this was a bit tight for me. Would recommend your regular size

links_reviews_title: Fun jumper for day or night
links_reviews_text: This can be styled for day or night. Nice fabric. The waist is a bit snug, but doable.
It's really cute but because the buttons don't go below the waist, it was kinda a hassle to get on and off for me. Really pretty, though.

I was very pleasantly surprised to find a jumpsuit that would work for me - I am 4' 11'' and it hits my lower calf. Blousy on top, and flowy legs, but without overwhelming my petite frame. I do think it needs a belt, otherwise the waist looks a bit unfinished and cheap. But otherwise the silky fabric can look quite dressy. Wore with open-toe, kitten heels. Could imagine wearing with tall boots in the fall.
while this is a bit low cut I absolutely love it. Fits perfect on my body and I intend to wear it more than once.

Cute and comfy, the fabric is super lightweight and is good for summer in the south. The elastic waistband was a little annoying, but not so much that I would suggest not renting it. Cute for the office!

links_reviews_title: Amazing piece to wear from office to drinks with friends. Very comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: One piece with no zipper, so going to bathroom isn't as easy! Love the material (has a little shine), so very versatile--can dress up or down.
I felt great in this jumpsuit, wore it multiple times. Can be dressed up for dinner or dressed down for lounging. Awesome for travel.
Perfect outfit for summer Friday. Beautiful material, can be dressed up or down

I have worn this countless times! It's comfortable, can be worn to work or dinner or just hanging out. Don't know if I'll purchase it (never purchase anything through rent the runway) but this will be in my closet for as long as they'll let me keep it!
So soft! Blousy top, could have use one more button. Loved this look and it was so easy to wear to work and a party.
Super cute and comfortable. I used a small safety pin since the top button was either missing or nonexistent. Would rent again!

I wore this twice - once to church and once to a rehearsal dinner. It was extremely comfortable and unique! Especially great to have a jumpsuit at the rehearsal dinner since I was with my toddler. I am 5'7", and I probably should've gotten a S instead of XS since I wished for just a touch more length in the torso, but it was still a great fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric, great cut. But as a 6 ft tall person, this was WAY too short in the crutch.
Good fit. Comfortable. Good for work dress.
Super cute, soft and cozy, very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Fit great, hides figure flaws well.
Dress is a snug fit, but stretchy enough to not show every curve. Sleeves and length were perfect. So many compliments and will rent again for a cool day.
Great color combo. More items should be both black and navy. Comfortable and flattering. Warm and interesting. What's not to like?

This dress was in heavy rotation for me over the holidays as I wore it to multiple events. I am always freezing and it was great to have an chic look that also warm! It was easy to style with tights and booties. The sleeves are fluted with navy lace contrast. 10 /10 !

Rented for hubbys promotion on police depart. I thought it represented the "thin blue line" perfectly. We had an ice/snow storm and the lux sweater fabric was perfect. The large was a little bit roomier in the waste...that's why I chose that size instead of medium. Not much difference between the two. Loved the ruffle. Dress fabric is dark navy. Edge ruffles are black. Love it.

Didn't wear because i didn't like the style, but can't knock the dress for that. Heavy navy sweater fabric that doesnt show every bump. I rented a small and am a 6/8, and I would have been more comfortable in a medium.

I wasn't digging the ruffles on the sleeves. They were a bit overwhelming and long. Plus, the dress was just a touch too snug everywhere and totally accentuated my backside in a not-so-great way. Skipped wearing this one, but it could look great on someone super tall, straight and thin. The fabric is a nice winter weight.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with subtle lace details around the sleeves and bottom of dress.
links_reviews_text: Fits snugly around the bum. Loved this rental

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and very cozy
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress, I wore it to work and got multiple compliments within my first hour at the office (all from women for whatever it's worth). The dress is stretchy, except at the lace parts, and warm but still light and breathable. I'll be holding onto this one a while. I'm currently 24 weeks pregnant and it fits my bump with room to grow. However, because there is no zipper and the lace doesn't stretch I wouldn't be surprised if I eventually can't get the lower lacey bit over my stomach.
So flattering, so comfy. I would have kept it if it weren't $450. Size down.

links_reviews_title: Belted with booties!! Runs a little big....
links_reviews_text: I thought I would like this dress when it came in -- but I ended up LOVING it. The sleeves are so fun and it just feels good on. It was a little baggy and frumpy in the middle, so I belted it and broke out of my box and went with patterned booties with black tights. The cuffs and bottom are black and the dress is a dark navy with the brighter blue lace.

Very comfortable lightweight sweater material. It fit me well without being too clingy in my stomach area. The flounce sleeves and hem line gave it some interest and shape. I think this dress is a combination of black and navy which I like because I never know what type of shoes to wear.
This was a great rental for early fall. I was comfortable all day.

I'm not sure what possessed me to rent a sweater dress in August! (Actually I do...I sort by newest and am always excited to get something new with tags lol) My timing aside, I think this is a cute sweater dress with feminine details (lace + ruffles), but I didn't think it was too flattering. It was very straight through the body so it clung to my hips but not my waist. For reference, I'm usually a 2 or 4 and I ordered the XS.
too baggy but good material

links_reviews_title: warm, comfortable work dress with a little flair
links_reviews_text: This modest, work appropriate dress is made of a substantial navy knit and has an easygoing fit. The see-through navy lace details on the skirt and flouncey sleeves elevated what might have been a little dull otherwise.
Beautiful cut

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks! Great quality, super comfortable, perfect for 3 occasions in one week!
Not quite a winner for me...
links_reviews_text: It was a strange fit thru the hips and thighs. The fabric was a little heavy... and I so wanted to love this dress like everything else Tory does...
very comfortable
Amazing dress and details. Everyone loved it!!!

links_reviews_title: Family pictures..... Nice to be in similar colors
links_reviews_text: Very soft and comfortable! Perfect for family pictures.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately I did not wear this dress as it was way too long for my petite frame

links_reviews_text: I love Tory and this does not disappoint. One of my favorites.
Wore this dress 20 weeks pregnant. SO PRETTY but sleeves were WAY to long. I had to roll the bell sleeve so I could wear it.

links_reviews_title: This is an amazing dress with wonderful details
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed the details of this dress the sleeves and the lace details
Dress was a perfect fit. Great quality.
Sleeve and hem details are cute. The length of the dress is perfect for work.

links_reviews_title: It's a very clean, slimming look and the sweater material keeps me warm.
links_reviews_text: Love the fit, hides bulges and just the right length.

links_reviews_title: Small details; simplistic dress perfect for work
links_reviews_text: fit is flattering, not hugging in all the wrong places - appropriate length for conservative work environment
While is ran a little big and the sleeves were a bit long, I still felt great in this dress. Super comfortable and classy.
Sleeves were way too long. Seams on the side of dress stuck out so did not have a clean line -- looked bumpy,
The dress is form fitting without being too snug. It was super comfortable all day and be use it is sweater material, didn't wrinkle.
classy

links_reviews_title: Classic work dress with a twist
links_reviews_text: nice fabric, the lace details on the bottom hem and sleeve make it subtly stand out.
Loved the style of this dress and super comfortable. Perfect size!
Fun dress for finding balance of causal but a get together.

I wore this for a dinner party. I loved the warmth of the dress, it's a sweater dress with frills. The lace, body, and frills are different materials and colors. I thought the mismatch in colors was a bit weird, dark navy for the body, black for the frills, and light navy for the lace.

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress. It was comfortable and looked great.
links_reviews_text: The fit was accurate. For me, it was a little too large but it still looked great.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't sure about this one but LOVED it!
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure about this top but decided to get it anyway. I ended up loving it! Very comfortable and perfect for a day at work. I usually wear a medium but I probably could have went with a small. Does wrinkle easily but still a great top.

links_reviews_title: Versatile top in a luxe fabric
links_reviews_text: I loved this top - good for work or weekend wear. Blousy fit was very flattering. I will rent again.

I saw all the negative reviews about this shirt, and I would probably agree if I had planned to wear it with jeans, but with a tighter high waisted skirt it was awesome. Will definitely be renting again.

Got this for a wedding weekend welcome dinner and loved it so much I wore it to work the following week, too! Love the pindots, and the special sleeves. Got lots of compliments -- including from my difficult-to-please mom!
Loved it. Light fabric, very cool sleeve detail. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute sleeves but a little boxy.

links_reviews_text: loved this top. it was slouchy, I totally could've sized down, but the sleeves went to my elbows which was a dream bc who over 30 wants our upper arms showing right?! LOLz. found it on sale elsewhere online for WAY cheaper than the RTR discount and bought it! RTR needs to step up their game big time with the for sale stuff---always google it and 9/10 you'll find it so much cheaper!

It's a totally fine top, nothing wrong with it, just nothing special about it. Fabric, cut, details did not feel special. Having said that, it's totally suitable for work and you probably won't go wrong with it. Was extremely comfy. Probably too casual for an important meeting.
Lovely balance of formality for work while being ultra comfy. I have a wide chest/shoulders and this was very flattering.
Very comfortable. Sleek, arms are a lot of fun.
Loved this top! The sleeves hangs and hits at all the right places. It fits well and is comfy!
Paired this top with a pair of jeans and boots for a day at the office. True to size. There is a sleeve cutout that you can't see in the pictures.

Wore this a bunch and absolutely loved it. Easy to wear and so much style, really elevated my everyday work wardrobe. Great with pants, boots and a long necklace. Other reviews had me wary about the fit but I like the oversize look of it. Even with the Unlimited discount it's a little out of my budget, otherwise would buy it!

This a loose fitting top that is comfortable. For everyday. I paired it with skinny jeans and for work a pencil skirt. The material is lightweight and soft. This top is basic and has a boxy shape to it.
I didn't wear it, only tried it on- the cuffs on the sleeves are annoying when you wear it.

You can always trust a Tibi fabric - so soft, exceptionally breathable, effortless drape. Feels casual, looks expensive, very wearable. I'm usually a small but the xs was still oversized enough to look cool. Recommend for a casual office or versatile, conservative travel piece.
Cute top for relaxed work day. Sleeves are very unique.
so comfy
easy fit, unique shape tucked in or out. only thing was wrinkled easily so hard to wear twice unless you want to iron in between.

links_reviews_title: Sadly, couldn't wear it at all.. just too big.
links_reviews_text: The width was just too boxy - needed another size down.
It's whatever
Basic top...comfortable

links_reviews_title: I ordered this in the wrong size. It is cute, but runs very large.
links_reviews_text: Will rent again in a smaller size. I loved the sleeves, but my husband thought it looked as though I had torn the cuffs. Wish I had ordered my size or smaller.
style didn't suit, large, wide, billowy
Underwhelming. And the elbow cuffs make this looks sloppy not boxy cute.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but runs very big. An XS would have worked better for me.
links_reviews_text: Runs big.

I've never worn a long skirt to work before, but I liked this. Looked good with nude heels and a white blouse. I felt a bit like a nun with the navy blazer on, so wouldn't recommend when you need to wear a jacket.
Great fit and length - perfect for work.

I rented this for work and wore it a few different times. It is so flattering and comfortable and helped me feel really confident! I loved the midi-length and the weight of this skirt. Perfect for winter. I wish I could justify buying it. I would also wear this style/fabric in any pattern/color!

What's not to love about this skirt, the simple design, the gorgeous pleats, comfy waistband, perfect length. This skirt can be worn year round, I paired it with booties, but you could do a cute wedge in the summer, a pump, boots, the possibilities are endless. I love this skirt and will be renting it again. I am a 10 and pear shaped, the size large fit me well and didn't create bulges. Very flattering. Got so many compliments today.

I never thought I could pull this skirt off because I am short and have an hourglass figure. The vertical stripes make this very flattering. The skirt is heavy but very comfortable. I wore it twice. Once with a burgundy moto jacket and with a cotton long sleeve tee. I was so comfortable in both outfits. I also had lots of fun making other casual outfits, but in the end I couldn't make this work with runners or flats. The skirt was just too long for that.
The skirt is a heavy knit material. It's absolutely gorgeous!

Nice thick fabric that falls well (not surprising from Tory Burch). Super professional, can be paired with a jacket for work and with a fun top for dinner/date night. Would definitely rent again. MD or LG would fit fine on me.

I paired this with a Tory Birch Navy Striped sweater, and it made a terrific pattern mixing combo! Great heavy material keeps the structure of the skirt all day, and the waist band is comfy and forgiving without feeling like it's working it's way down all day. Terrific skirt!

links_reviews_title: Nice heavy material but stretchy waist
links_reviews_text: I was worried this style would make me look wider but it was actually quite flattering, and the stretchy waist was really comfortable
This skirt is a wonderful, heavy material. It falls beautifully and is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Cute alternative to the classic pencil skirt
links_reviews_text: Loved this option for work, super comfortable and got lots of compliments. My only complaint is the length, it's pretty long compared to the pictures.

links_reviews_title: didn't get a chance to wear
links_reviews_text: very well made...it's fits true to size. It would be great to mix with other patterns if you go there.
Runs a bit on the large size at the waist. It's very pretty though

Loved, loved, loved this skirt. Its beautiful and fit very nicely. I'm a bigger gal and normally wear a large but that size was not available so I ordered a medium and it fit just fine. I wore three inch black heels with it which made my 5'2" frame not look so stodgy. Highly recommend for a work event or even a nightime event.
Such a great fit, I felt beautiful in this skirt and received a ton of compliments!
Wore the skirt at the office with boots. Nice material and very comfortable
The weight of this fabric can transition from season to season.

Got so many compliments on this skirt. Styled with boots and a button down for the office. Comfortable, thick, almost sweater material with elastic waist that doesn't look like elastic (didn't need to hide it w a belt or anything). Length was mid calf on me (5'4)

Pleated skirts can make my hips look wide, but not this one. The long length and high waist were super flattering on my tall frame. I also loved the weight of the fabric - nice and warm for a chilly winter day.
Super comfortable, great fit. Loved it!
Comfortable
Runs a little large, so I'd recommend sizing down.

Maybe it's just my eyes, but the photos online really made me think that this skirt was black! It is actually a medium navy color, but still pairs well with a white sweater for work. Fit was flattering and comfortable and was true to size.

Really nice fabric, a little on the heavier side so perfect for those early fall/early spring days. Great for traveling as it doesn't wrinkle easily. Versatile in terms of what you could wear on top. Would rent again!
Easy fit and stretchy, not the most flattering in the waistline but good every day piece and good for work.
I received so many compliments on this skirt! Can't wait to rent it again
I loved the way it moved, more substantial material than I expected and didn't realize it was navy. But I had a perfect top to match and it was cute with heels and flats. Enjoyed it

links_reviews_title: Great fitting skirt. Heavy material which helps with the drape of the skirt.
links_reviews_text: Like the fit and feel of this skirt. Wore it to work with chunky silver sweater. May try it again at some point, but there are so many more things I am looking forward to trying and perhaps buying.

links_reviews_title: Great, Easy Skirt. Good for work & everyday.
links_reviews_text: This skirt was comfortable and easy to dress up for work with a white button-up or dress down for every day with a t-shirt. Fit my larger hips very well.

links_reviews_title: Lovely skirt to pair with sharp blazer and white shirt
links_reviews_text: This is a long midi skirt. At 5'9 I wore 3" heels for the right balance. Loved the skirt!!

links_reviews_title: Really lovely skirt, looks super professional for work
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit large/long; I'm 5'4" and it hit about 4 inches above my ankles and was a bit loose in the waist.
I loved this skirt for work. It was super comfortable and i got lots of compliments on it. Would definitely rent again
Awesome skirt- will rent again in the winter. Its still too hot in Texas for this heavy of a skirt.

This was a great fit, wonderful knit, and really worked for the office. I thought it gave me a professional polish and I loved that I did not have to worry about it wrinkling as the day wore on (I sit at a computer half the day and the other half I teach). I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun skirt to add to boring work wardrobe
links_reviews_text: Great fit, nice print, perfect midi length, waistband fits well
Great fall skirt for work!

links_reviews_title: This skirt made me feel so extra!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a quick vacay to Philly with our 7 week old babe. I love this skirt, because you can MOVE in it! I paired it with a nursing tank one day and then a t-shirt the next (yes, I wore it two days in a row.) I wore my adidas. It runs a little big. I rented the large but could have worn the medium.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric but runs very large
links_reviews_text: It is a beautifully made skirt and very comfortable to wear. I wish I would have ordered a couple sizes down. It made me look bigger than I was due to the fit.
Slightly opaque so that might bother some. It's hot wear I live so everybody wears sheer clothing lol. Im 33-26-33 100 lbs and thought it fit really well.
Comfortable skirt and versatile color
It's a cute skirt... maybe I could've gotten a smaller size, the ruching would keep bunching up and was winging out at the hem.

links_reviews_title: Favorite rental! Amazing fit and style.

links_reviews_text: I wore this for work and on thanksgiving. It's pretty but it's a bit of a strange fit. Loose around the hips and really tight around the calves. Good material and overall a good rental.
This felt sleek and pulled together. It nicely hid my little tummy. Material is a little stretchy, which is necessary to walk.

This skirt is gorgeous. The fit is pretty true to size -- the waistband is fitted, but the fabric has just a hint of stretch, making it forgiving around the middle. I loved the zipper, the contrasting listing, and the ruching. It looks as expensive as it is, and wears beautifully!

links_reviews_title: Sexy form fitting skirt that hides your woman pooch
links_reviews_text: This skirt is fantastic. The ruched fabric on the midsection perfectly hides any imperfections on your stomach area. I loved the exposed double zipper, and unzipped the bottom portion to give me more flexibility around the calves.

Was large on me, but I figured that might be the case. Ordered the 14 but I'm really a 12, which wasn't available. It still looked nice- it's a well made, perfect work skirt. Just order your true size

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and flattering, but tight waist
links_reviews_text: This is beautiful. The color is rich, the ruching is really flattering. That said, the 38R felt just a little too snug for me in the waist - not something I wanted to wear for an 8+ hour work day. It's beautiful, though! On the long side (about mid-calf on me at 5'2"), but very elegant. I'd try this again in the next size up.
The gathering at the hips can make you look wider. Also, the bottom is SUPER tight so you're gonna have to unzip it to be able to walk
Great details and flattering fit.

Fit was spot on but not much give in waist. Once on, the skirt is very forgiving in front and very form fitting in back. I wore a longer sweater to make it more work appropriate. The skirt is gorgeous and high quality.

links_reviews_title: Brown, not red. Waist is tight!
links_reviews_text: This ended up being much more brown than red, and I found the material scratchy and cheap looking. The ruching had a lot more volume than I anticipated, which wasn't flattering on my curves. Back in the bag immediately!
I loved this blouse both tucked and untucked, but it does wrinkle easily - I steamed between wears. It fits loosely and I loved the ruffled neckline. I would absolutely rent again!
No cons with this top! Loved the relaxed fit and easy to pair with pants!
Super easy to wear, feels a little large and has elastic at elbows and neck. But the fabric is more like linen and wrinkles very easily.
Super cute. Runs true to size. I'm either a L or an XL depending on the brand. I could have done the L, but the xL is really flowy, which makes me want to pear it with leather leggings or something.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear, but seemed soft and comfortable when I tried it on.
links_reviews_text: Nice high neck, good coverage for professional image, flattering colors.

links_reviews_title: Really needs to be tucked in.
links_reviews_text: This top was cute, but it really is best worn tucked in (as styled in the photo). I rented it thinking I could NOT tuck it in, since I'm never trying to highlight my mid-section. I was wrong. I think it'd be great for more petite women who like high-waisted pants, but for "apple" ladies, it may not work.
Nice cotton fabric. Pretty print. Comfy.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt to dress up jeans
links_reviews_text: Cute blouse - lightweight, comfy and forgiving. Looked cute not tucked in and with jeans for nice dinner.
Way more fabric and tented than expected. Would probably be great for pregnancy!
LOVED IT. The detailing, print, color, sleeves and collar were so relevant. Looked great tucked in or left out. Could wear to work or out. Got so many compliments. Wanted to buy it!

Love the print. Looks like a beautiful ink swirl of purple beige and a touch of rose. Too bad I could not make this work for me. Runs big. Material is a thin cotton. Neckline would need an extra ironing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print and fit (but elastic on sleeve. But right!)
links_reviews_text: Classy, sophisticated. Beautiful print and great quality. Looks great tucked in to high-waist jeans. Only complaint is that the elastic at arm opening (hits right below elbow or above elbow when sleeves are pushed up) are super tight. I have really skinny arms and the elastic felt like it was cutting my circulation. Other than that, I loved this!
I could've worn the L. I still wore it, and the colors are so beautiful

links_reviews_title: SO cute!! Fall with a pop of color
links_reviews_text: Fun way to wear this season's trend of a frilly collar.
Overall loved this for a work dinner. It's quite blousy so couldn't figure out the best way to tuck into my jeans. I ended up just leaving it untucked and was still cute.

I love this skirt!!! I originally rented it to wear in London on spring break but the trip was canceled due to coronavirus restrictions. I decided to wear this cute outfit around my house while in isolation to have a little fun. It was so cute and flattering. The 10 was a great fit and not too tight around my booty. Would definitely have loved to wear this around town for a day. Hopefully I'll have another reason to rent again in the future.
Wore to work it was a great length and was so comfortable. The waist was larger on the 4 than expected, but fit fine with a sweater tucked.
Usually a 4 or 6, 6 was loose on my waist so I was able to pull down some as it was short for my conservative work place, but ok with tights. So cute though and goes with lots of different colors.

links_reviews_title: Adorable skirt for a night out
links_reviews_text: I wore this with a bodysuit and OTK boots for a night out at dinner and Broadway in nyc. Loved it! As other reviews say it is true to size. The 6 fit me perfectly and I am almost always a 6. Definitely a great rental!

I rented this to wear for work and LOVED it! I felt so confident and chic, and got so many compliments throughout the day! I'm glad I went with a slightly larger size based on reviews, because it fit perfectly. Very comfortable skirt, that I never want to return.
Super cute skirt, paired with black tights and knee high boots. Got lots of compliments and the fit was super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Unique and work appropriate
links_reviews_text: I was worried about the length of this skirt, but in a size 6 (I'm between a 4 and a 6, so went with the larger size), it is a great length and not too tight. The fabric is really nice and very soft. It's heavy enough to wear with tights in the winter, but would work without the rest of the year. The skirt is more pink than it looks in the photos, but in a good way. Would go with white, black, pink, turquoise, or navy -- super versatile and really unique! I ended up buying it.
I rented this Parker skirt with only 1 review. I'm glad I went up a size because there is no stretch to it. Received compliments all day long! In love with this skirt! ð
Rented for work, super cute, fit appropriately
It's a cute skirt but it was a little tight and I didn't expect it to be quite so short!

I rented this to wear to work and loved it! I received compliments throughout the day. I l wear a S in Parker dresses and can wear a 4 or 6 depending on the occasion. I ordered a 6 because I wanted to wear this to work and was glad I did. It was super flattering. I'm 5'2 so I'm not sure how the length would do on someone taller for work. This piece can definitely be worn on the weekends with the right sweater (I would have ordered the 4 though for a more fitted look). Definitely rent this!

links_reviews_title: Fun, versatile skirt. Feminine & professional. Front twist adds nice character. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Wish it was a touch smaller in the waist...this sat lower on my waist, and with a tucked shirt or bodysuit, I'd prefer it to sit a tiny bit higher. But otherwise perfect.

Forgot to take a photo, but this looked so cute! Wore with a black turtleneck and black booties for a Saturday night housewarming party, and felt very cute. I was worried this would emphasize my hips too much, but it looked great! The colors are pretty and not too loud. This is a fun, unique piece and it fit perfectly.
Usually 0/2 but I got a 2 because of reviews. It wasn't too big or too tight and was so comfy to wear to work all day
This was such a fun little piece to spice up the work day. Cute and fun vibe for a Monday with tights and a warm seater. Would rent again

This is a cute skirt with an interesting plaid color combination. It was a little bit of a challenge to style and didn't look quite right to be with black tights, but it's cold. I said it's true to size, but I did size up to a 6 since that was available when I generally wear a 4. There's a little bit of room, but not too big.
True to size and accommodated my pear shaped body. The only thing I didn't like was that it came wrinkled. Otherwise the fit was perfect!
Fit well for work and for a work party. Easy to pair with different kinds of tops.

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt, tight for the big bum!
links_reviews_text: I have the tiny waist big booty problems, but I wore this once for a party and it was super cute! If it wasn't for the price tag I would've kept it with me!

links_reviews_title: A skirt to wear every day!
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt! I paired it with a black sweater and tall boots.
Fits in the right places not too short especially with tights. Ageless

links_reviews_title: The Asymmetrical Plaid Skirt You Want
links_reviews_text: Fit large on me - I'm between a 2/4 and opted for the 4 in order to tuck in sweaters. It was too big. That aside, fabric is thick but not uncomfortable or itchy. Skirt has versatile styling, but was a true mini on me (5'8), so would recommend for weekend wear over work wear for taller wearers.

links_reviews_title: Great skirt for work or just fun!
links_reviews_text: The skirt was so cute- perfect for work with tights. I wore it with a black long sleeved bodysuit, tights and boots and then again with a cream sweater and brown boots. So versatile!

links_reviews_title: Amazing skirt, ran too small and short for work
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt! It fit well as a tight skirt but I wish that I had sized up so it may have been better to wear for work (in a casual office). The colors were beautiful and it was really good quality. Would definitely recommend this skirt!
The jacket is soft and very wearable. The style is subtle but stands out.
I very rarely keep an unlimited item for multiple uses but I love this jacket so much I've had it for a month!

links_reviews_title: Love, love this jacket! Perfect for autumn, been using it almost every day!
links_reviews_text: The jacket is not thick, but you can layer it with sweater if needed. It's a smooth leather and easy to wear. I'm actually size 18-20 so this jacket can't be zipped / buttoned on me but it still looks cool!

links_reviews_title: "Workhorse" leather jacket that can be paired with jeans or worn over a dress. Great fit and style.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, so cannot be worn over anything bulky.
I've been on the hunt for a leather jacket, and this one is perfect. Great for curvier gals, but be sure to size up.
Loved this so much I purchased it! Soft leather and the quilting gives it a feminine touch.
This is a timeless jacket that easily transitions from day to night. Paired perfectly with jeans and heels for a night out. I love, love, love everything about this jacket.
Sleek piece of chic!

links_reviews_title: I felt like 10 years older. I should have got the smaller size
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" so this made me look boxy and older.
Beautiful leather jacket that I was very tempted to buy but will just have to rent again. Lots of compliments and people asking me where I got it from!

links_reviews_title: Previously rented, loved it! The second time it was more worn.
links_reviews_text: The first time I rented this piece I was smitten!! I wore it all the time and was on the fence in regards to buying it. It was my early days in my membership and this would have been my first purchase. So I sent it back to try new items and resolved if I rented it again and loved it like I remember I would for sure buy it. This time I received the piece and the collar was noticeably more worn (you know when it creases because it's been folded too much?). It didn't "hang" like it used too.
Nice classic jacket. Could have sized down. Just a little sparkle and detail but not too much.

links_reviews_title: Wanted something cozy yet professional to wear while I work from home.
links_reviews_text: Loved the texture of this top. Looks cute with jeans. Wish it were longer in the front so that I could also wear it with leggings.
See title. No joke -- I might buy it. It's so cozy and easy to look good in.
Just fine for working from home. My cuffed sleeves didn't lay right and I felt frumpy since it was so big.
Love this! Wore with a pair of black leggings and got tons of compliments at work! Would definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Ideal for a work day that began in the dark and ended fifteen hours later...
links_reviews_text: This piece did it all. Dropped a friend's pup at day care. Spoke with kiddos' family members. Met with a principal, an assistant principal, and a site supervisor. Had lunch with my best friend. FaceTimed my grown daughter. Graded essays. Chatted with friends. Breakfast for dinner with my partner. Perfect for all of it and crisp, pretty, easy. Gorgeous hand to the wool cotton blend. I even found a way to ignore the buttons.
Perfect sweater for a casual day at work. Fit great and looked polished. Short enough in the front to not overwhelm my shorter frame but the length in the back added some style.
It fits but it's very large. I am bigger up top and thought it would fit me perfectly but it was still huge. I wore it twice but wouldn't rent again.
I was excited about trying this as I usually like things that are long in the back. However, I found this one to be awkwardly long in comparison with the front. Didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Love the cut of this, and the material. I've rented it more than once!
This is a really fun, comfortable sweater. Cute with leggings or jeans. It is boxy and drapy so definitely a casual vibe.
It was too sweater like but with really short arms. I wore it over a black susana Monaco dress and it did the job but I wasn't in love. Didn't dislike but didn't really like it either.
I wore this sweater to work with skinny jeans and booties. It was really cute. I did wear a cami underneath because the material can be a little scratchy. Fun and easy to wear.

Was a little nervous that this would look like a big box based on the one size fits all sizing but really liked it! The details on the sleeves and the length in the back gave it a really cool shape. Wore it with long sleeves underneath and faux leather leggings.
I expected this to be very cool and trendy looking- I felt awkward in it- though, I got compliments wearing it. I thought the back was a tad too long.

links_reviews_title: Interesting take on a poncho- boxy but comfy
links_reviews_text: Looks great with jeans and boots. It hangs like a sack so there's nothing flattering about it, but the asymmetrical cut at the bottom makes it interesting enough to look ok. Good for weekends.
I really loved this top. The fit was great and its a statement piece that looks good with almost anything. I got tons of compliments on this one and will definitely rent it again.
I wore this with a fitted long sleeve shirt underneath. I was afraid it would be too big since it's all one size but it was great. Big but not overwhelming.

I was skeptical of one size fits most, but this time it worked! I wore this a few times and multiple ways. With jeans, with a long sleeve black top beneath and black leggings, etc. I will say the fabric was not soft but not too uncomfortable.

A simple poncho sweater that was easy to wear over a skirt or wide legged pants. It is a nice classic look. The pattern is a leaf like knit. Some can call it a little grandma-ish. But I don't mind that vibe. The cut makes it a little more edgy while the neckline and sleeve shape make it very modest and work appropriate. This sweater hides a lot of flaws but isn't super warm. Looks nice with the front tucked too.
great fit
Nothings wrong with it. Just realized I don't love ponchos.

I rented this for fun, just running around. Material is nice, heavy, and gray color is as pictured. I loved the buttons on the sleeves and lower hem in back. I paired it with turquoise necklace for a splash of color. Would definately recommend. I usually wear an 18 so the poncho was more fitted on me, closer to a sweater.

links_reviews_title: I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS! Will probably buy it even though it is a bit pricey...
links_reviews_text: this is so versatile - it is cute with jeans, leggings, boots - with a long-sleeve tee or without! I wore it to work - to date night - and to Sunday brunch! I think that the price is a little high because the quality is nothing special - but I love it so much that I will probably buy it anyway!!
The cut of the garment was flattering
Wore it with faux leather pants & sheer arm tshirt. Lots of compliments
Comfy, soft, stylish

So cute and comfortable. Actually considered buying! Wore with jeans and booties. For those of us in colder climes, could have easily worked with a longsleeve underneath - collared or plain layering tee. The pattern is visible and gorgeous, the sleeves add a nice detail. Would also work super well with leggings.
Love the drape of this piece. Would look great over jeans or leggings.
I loved this jumpsuit! Edgy but professional. It runs a tiny bit large though and the V is a bit deep, so wear fabric tape or a bralette under

links_reviews_title: The great outfit of the day shot that I was able to get with this outfit
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is actually super comfy but if you are small and petite it might be a little bit on the oversize fit but either way it still looks super adorable and I loved it
The only con is that you have to safety pin the top. It's an adorable piece.

I am not usually very optimistic about the fit of jumpsuits but..... WOW. I loved this one! It felt perfectly tailored and miraculously comfortable. After a long day at work I was surprised it didn't look like a wrinkled mess -- wore it straight out to dinner and still felt amazing! Do yourself a favor and rent this.

links_reviews_title: POWER SUIT IN NEUTRAL I'LL TAKE IT
links_reviews_text: TTS and is very fitted! A little low cut but I made it work with a safety pin. Really love the silhouette
I'm 5"8 and have a long torso so the XS was a stretch, but I made it work for the one day I wore it. Next time would rent a S. Perfect piece to look polished, but be comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Revealing so better for date night than work!
links_reviews_text: My husband loved this outfit and he doesn't usually like jumpsuits! I originally rented this for work, but it's a little revealing and I definitely needed a bit of fashion tape on the chest. It's super comfortable and loosens up as you wear it. Really cute for both short girls and folks with hips! It actually works well if you have a small waist and big hips.
You can dress it up or down. Feel great! Got lots of compliments!
Pros: Super cute and different. Cons: Butt wasn't fitted something I would have liked more, wrinkles easily.
Loved this jumpsuit, I should have gotten a medium - large was a more relaxed fit but I still wore it a bunch of times.
Rented this jumpsuit for a fun, fall, every day piece. I wore it to work and it was super comfortable, professional and stylish. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute Jumpsuit! Love the pale yellow color.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Absolutely no give in the fabric. Recommend sizing up to have a more comfortable fit. One of the buttons came loose but I was still able to wear it. Will rent again.
Not my favorite. My chest was reaaallly out on this one. Not the best fit
LOVE this one. May even purchase it. So many compliments. The only uncomfortable factor is that the neckline loosens and bulges forward when you sit down, sort of exposing your bra/chest.

links_reviews_title: Love this jumpsuit. Simple and comfy.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size S or XS, but loved the more baggy fit of the MR.
This is just beautiful but the fit was not flattering for me. Wish I could have worn it. Pretty, fresh and tickets still attached.

Wore to brighten up my quarantine days. I wear an XXS in Athleta pants and Fabletics, but I should have gotten a small in this brand. Ran a bit tight on me. Thicker fabric than usual worn out pants. These were strictly Athleisure for me though. Liked the change.
hugs in tightly at the waist
I didn't wear these because they were a bit tighter than I expected around my pregnant belly.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but small in the waist!
links_reviews_text: Great leggings, very comfortable. Thicker than I imagined they would be, so may be too hot for warmer weather or high intensity workouts. The waist ran very small, almost could not fit into my regular size of XS. But overall, super cute leggings!

Comfortable at the waist and hips. I have a short inseam and these didn't hit as high on my leg as they did on the model, but still worked well enough as an ankle pant. They were also slighly wider in the leg than shown on the model, at least in my size. Very very slightly itchy, but comfortable overall. I only wore them once but that was more because it's warming up where I am, and I realized I was more interested in wearing slightly springier things.

links_reviews_title: Nice pattern and fits petite frames
links_reviews_text: I liked the pattern and texture of these pants. And the cropped length meant they fit me right at the ankles. But while the length was good they do sag a bit in the crotch. Wasn't an issue here because it was covered by blazer. But they aren't a perfect fit for petite frames. Also could have gone with 10. I'm in between but the 12 was a big too loose for my taste.
Really liked these pants. They looked great throughout the day and were really comfortable.

I hate wearing pants to work, however, sometimes I'm sick of wearing dresses. These pants were so comfortable, yet looked so nice and professional. My office is pretty low key (most people wear jeans) but I still like to add some more business into the look. These pants were a perfect add I to the mix.
These are like sweat pants in disguise. I absolutely love them. I've gotten so many compliments on them, they are the perfect work pant
These pants are so comfy. The material is soft and stretchy, but thick too so they don't feel like leggings. Plus they have pockets!

I found the fit to be a bit large so you may want to consider sizing down. The fabric has a bit of stretch also, which makes it very comfortable. I really liked the speckled-type print. I paired with a light blue cardigan and camel colored flats. Would also pair well with tan, black or white sweater/top/blazer. Since the size I ordered was a little too big for me I needed a belt to cinch it, but still felt great in them. I'll rent again but will get a smaller size.
Loved these so much. The waist was a little big that kept me from buying. They're SO comfortable!
I usually wore a 4/6 and the 6 was HUGE on my waist and tight on my athletic thighs. Thankfully they are very stretchy so I think I will rent again in a smaller size and they will be great!

links_reviews_title: Unique pattern, were a little baggy.
Did not wear as was too large.

links_reviews_text: It's a bit long on me because I'm only 5'0" but the fit otherwise was just perfect. Even though it was textured, it didn't feel scratchy. It would have been perfect if it were lined but really no complaints.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, casual work pants. RUNS LARGE
links_reviews_text: These had been unavailable in my normal size (2R) all month, so I threw caution to the wind and ordered them in the 4R. They were gigantic and I could not wear them - much bigger than other Theory pants I've previously rented. Very cute pants overall - just make sure you size down.
Loved the style but ran a bit large.
Very comfortable fit. Just ran large for me in a size 2. Would rent in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Quality pant, but gives slightly over time.
links_reviews_text: Loved these pants visually. The fit was great - mid-waisted and mild crop. Definitely a good staple rental. Docked a star because the tweed felt slightly rough on the inside (not scratchy, but you could definitely tell you were wearing tweed) and because they were starting to lose shape by the end of the work day. Not saggy, but certainly not as firm as they started.
These are structured, well lined, and thick. They definitely feel "quality". They were ankle length on my VERY petite frame, and do things for the derriere that can only be described as "Magic".
The waist is very large but they hang beautifully thanks to fabulous fabric.
Had plenty of room in my normal size but wore with a belt and looked fine. The shorter leg was cute with pumps for work
These were super flattering and comfortable for work. They can also easily be dressed up or down depending on what look you're going for.
These pants ran quite short - more like a capri length on me. Comfortable to wear and looked nice, other than the length.
Love love loved these! As a petite girl, this fit just right! Cute on the behind and just the right length. Will rent again!
They seem super comfy and have a lot of stretch to them but the material was very itchy. I could not wear them.
I did not wear these because they were too big. I thought these ran small so I ordered one size up.
Gorgeous quality and fit. Slightly stretchy (good for those of us who are larger on the bottom). A great, versatile, and classy-looking pair of pants.

These were really cute pants and perfect for work. They run pretty big through so size down. I'm normally a 4 or 6 and the 6 was huge. I couldn't wear them without a belt. They are also a little itchy, but it didn't bother me too much. If they had got better, I would have bought them.

These pants are super warm and perfect to dress up a business casual outfit in the colder weather. The color and pattern is cute and goes with anything and the fit is classy and comfortable. I love these pants and have worn them multiple times with heels and flats.

links_reviews_title: Nice tweedy fabric look, nice fit
links_reviews_text: It was a little scratchy, but very little. I liked the way it looked and fit. Didn't have to iron it after packing it. Big deal for me.

links_reviews_title: These are fine....but just that, fine
links_reviews_text: I wore these with a black shirt and heels, similar to the model and they are pretty basic. Wore them one-time to work and didn't feel a need to keep them longer. They don't have a lining, so they don't feel that luxurious. Cut and pattern are pretty basic too. Not unflattering, but not flattering either.

links_reviews_title: The most comfy pants for work!
links_reviews_text: I sit at a desk all day and these pants felt like I was wearing sweat pants! They are soft, stretchy and all around so comfortable. They look black on the model but they are actually a dark navy. Wore my normal size and they fit perfectly. Will definitely be renting these again.

links_reviews_title: These pants were very comfortable for work. I paired them with a beautiful red blouse.
links_reviews_text: They were true to size. Being 5'1", they were ankle length, not cropped.
On my 5'5 self, the pant leg hit at a weird spot on me. Had to wear heels to not look stumpy
Love these, but wish I had gotten a smaller size (I'm a 4-6 normal and I would wear a 2.)

Deeply rich speckled navy pants are quintessentially preppy chic. Fabric is soft, supple and exceedingly comfortable. These trousers move effortlessly from casual days to dressy evenings. They're great.
Fit well, true to size.

I dressed in dim lighting and didnât realize until I was at work that these are Navy not black. I probably would have put together a different outfit if I knew. Super comfortable but looked very polished. Iâm short so these hit at my ankle which was fine.

links_reviews_title: Channel Shiv Roy (without like, the sociopathy)
links_reviews_text: These pants are great. I probably could have made a 0 work (I'm a 2ish at J. Crew and a 25 or 26 at Madewell, fwiw) -- they're a little looser than I anticipated, especially in the waist -- but they look great on. Very season 2 of Succession, sans all the backstabbing of your siblings and husband and father etc. Paired it with a tucked in black silk button down. Compliments for days. If the waist fit a little better I'd honestly consider just buying them.
These pants are perfect for work. Easily pair-able with anything. I am usually a 4 and the 4 fit was true to size. Highly recommend and would definitely rent again.

I love the fabric and print of the pants. They are super comfortable and perfect for short girls! They tend to run a bit big. I'm between a 4 and 6 and got the 6. Because they have some stretch to them, I may try a 4 next time. Definitely worth the rent!
I love this brand, would buy!

links_reviews_title: Just the best and oh so cheerful!
links_reviews_text: Cozy, soft, fun sleeves and the pop of color that will brighten anyone's day.
This sweater was a lot of fun, the colors, the sleeves, it was also warm. I loved it and will rent it again.
Loved this cozy piece! Pairs well with skirt and pants. Great quality and comfy
Very comfortable. Great for night out or even casual work day.
I received a lot of compliments on this one and it was hard to send back! Super cozy and fits true to size. Love love loved it.

Cozy, well structured sweater. Excellent color and thick threads. Love brightening cold days with this. Sleeves a great length, and perfectly billowy at the wrist. Perfect rental bc once ppl see you in it, they won't forget it!

Great stand-out, warm sweater. It runs tts, with a bit of an oversized fit, and is warm and soft enough to wear without a T-shirt/tank underneath. I wore it a bunch of times and keeping it in my favorites to rent again. It's great!
This is the most beautiful and fun sweater. It's so soft and bright. I would wear it everyday if I could. Highly recommend!!!

I LOVE THIS SWEATER! I haven't even returned it, and I would buy it if it wasn't hundreds of dollars!!! I wore it in London and got so many compliments and people asking where I bought my "jumper" (new vocab for me). On top of the amazing look, it was SO snuggly and soft and warm it was like wearing a hug! Really great sweater!
Love this!! So soft and cozy. Not itchy at all.

I wish I had a better picture..... rented this for my Nieces 5th birthday party-themed Rainbow and and unicorns.... perfect!!! The sleeves are very fun and stylish with a bell like flare, the sweater is a little oversized but still fits well and is flattering.... a little itchy, but very wearable!! Loved it and would buy if is wasn't so expensive!!

I absolutely love this sweater. I wore it for weeks and received compliments every time. I'd definitely buy if it weren't so expensive. It does have puff sleeves, so if you're not a fan of a baggier arm beware.
So comfortable and cool

Very soft, comfortable sweater. Loved the colors at the neckline and that the sweater body yarn had some colors speckled into the fabric, giving it a cozy look. I am an 8 JCrew, normally would order a medium but the truefit suggested large and it was loose but not baggy or slouchy. Wish I bought it.

This is so cute and soft. This fit perfectly for me, not too snug, not too loose. This is soft and cozy, and the rainbow pattern is beautiful and not too loud. The sleeves are voluminous at the end, which adds a fun element! I did find the structure a little odd at the neck/top of the sleeve - it's like a deep raglan, so I did notice it when I moved my arms in certain ways, but it wasn't really restrictive. Overall, great sweater. Definitely recommend this - so sweet and cheery!
lots of compliments! Loved the sleeves

links_reviews_title: Fun Fairisle for some dreary times.
links_reviews_text: This sweater just made me smile. I love the rainbow colors, and the sweater was cozy and comfortable. Not scratchy at all, which is key since I hate layers. I am short, so the sweater was a little longer on me than the model. It's cut very generously - I probably could have sized down, but I liked the loose look. The sleeves are pretty voluminous, so be prepared for feeling a little like a stuffed sausage in your coat sleeves.

links_reviews_title: LOVE, condition and quality of material is great. Fit well and fun colors
links_reviews_text: LOVE, condition and quality of material is great. Fit well and fun colors
for a sweater, flattering fit!
So cute and warm! New favorite winter rental
Unique, soft, perfect for looking semi interesting on a weekend. Got compliments from everyone. Very warm.
Super cute sweater for ski trip! Darling neck detail

links_reviews_title: Love the colors and knit of the sweater. Went with the suggested size (L) but it was too big.
links_reviews_text: Went with the suggested size (L) but it was too big. The sleeves do have a flare at the cuff, which is OK, but with it being too big, it enhanced that feature too much.
Loved this cozy comfortable sweater. True to size and made a dreary winter day feel bright
Loved this sweater! The fit, pattern, and warmth made it easy to throw on with jeans and call it a day. Wish I could own it.
Fun sweater with lots of color. The sleeves are very large/wide, which is my only complaint.

links_reviews_title: Warm sweater with beautiful bright colors!
links_reviews_text: The rainbow is not too much as the rest of the sweater is white. I got lots of compliments on this one! It is warm and cozy and not itchy at all. I love the balloon sleeves! The sweater I got was just stretched out in the collar area so it wasn't too flattering but would definitely rent again.
I loved this sweater. Itâs soft and on trend with its oversized cut and bishop sleeves. I got a ton of compliments on it. I loved the rainbow colors.
This was the exact mood I wanted for this winter, colorful cozy, hot chocolate w babe in front of the fire at the ski lodge energy.
The colors are bright and pretty and the sweater fits great. Just not quite what I was looking for but quality item for sure
Very warm and cozy for holiday festivities. Arms are VERY poofy, keep that in mind with the fit. Overall festive print and warm for colder months/climates.
True to size
This was really cute with jeans or navy pants for work!
it's great!
LOVE this sweater. Rented M, probably could have gone with S. Extremely comfy and cute. Wish I could buy it.
Fit well and very soft.

links_reviews_title: wanted to love it but sleeves too puffy for me
links_reviews_text: not my fav. the sleeves a bit too baggy all the way down to wrists..
The sweater was warm and comfortable and cozy. I got many compliments on the pretty design.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a casual gathering. I lost count of the compliments I received!
links_reviews_text: I got the xl for a baggy and comfortable fit. The sweater is so soft and lovely!

links_reviews_title: Cozy, comfortable.. wanted to keep it!
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater, kept it longer than any other rental. Tons of compliments!
I love this dress. It is stretchy, yet cool. Worked very well for the office and out and about. I don't want to give it back!

links_reviews_title: Loved it, so I bought it
links_reviews_text: Perfect weight and material for spring / summer. Love the colours and length. I think this dress runs slightly large. Will be a staple dress for me this year.
Fits well! Looks expensive but not in a flashy way. Surprisingly comfortable. No cons.
These are a standard pair of denim jeans. They are mid-rise and straight leg. I enjoyed that they are cropped. These are true to size. I enjoyed wearing them.

links_reviews_title: Really nice pair of black crop jeans. Fit great. Can be dressed up or dressed down

links_reviews_text: I wished these pants would fit me but they were too low waisted. I have big hips and rear so no luck there! The length was perfection though!

Like the cut, though they are definitely not high rise. I'm pretty short and for once these actually did hit me at the ankle versus being full length. Did stretch out after uses unfortunately which is my pet peeve with jeans

Great black jeans, I rented them to try the brand as I'm looking for black jeans. They were very comfortable, good length for 5'2" me. Fit wasnt perfect, I have a small waist and bigger bum/thighs so the waist gapped. I sized up from 28 to 29 and they fit great but gapped in the back.
I have large calves so this jean was tricky bc there is little stretch. I'm usually a 26 but wore a 27 to accommodate my calves, but then the waist was too big. Still liked them and will rent a 26.

links_reviews_title: Great pant, runs a bit small
links_reviews_text: These are great pants but don't have a ton of give/flexibility - think about that when you're renting and maybe size up!
Comfortable and cute
They were too tight around the waist.
I wore these once to work and thought they were comfortable and great for business casual.
