links_reviews_title: Nice stretch and came new with tags!
links_reviews_text: It ran small, and the rise was a bit lower than I liked. Overall a good fit.
These immediately looked small when taken out of package. Couldn't even get past thighs comfortably. However, the color and fabric looked great.

These jeans were really nice and new with tags and all! I really wish I could have worn them, but they were VERY snug. I should have gone with a 34R instead of a 32R, as I think they run small. I wear a 14, but these fit like a 12 maybe. Very nice jeans otherwise!

This is a super easy summer dress! Definitely too low cut for work so I threw a white tank top underneath but otherwise really easy to wear and extremely comfortable. The material is thin but substantial and the pattern is almost polka dot like. Definitely recommend!

This dress was better than I thought it would be! The fit is super flattering - forgiving but still sexy. There's a class that is supposed to hold the bust up top but I left it open for a little more oomph:) but still felt classy. Wore it so much in Italy I want to buy it!

I LOVE this dress! Definitely not for work :) but it was great for a day out with the girls. It is super low cut, so bustier girls just beware. I'm a 34C and made it work with a sticky liner, but it was definitely a gamble :)

Usually wear a large and this dress was very roomy. I could see this being a great maternity dress! Wore it anyway because I loved the print and how the fabric felt against my skin. Sorry, no full length pic, but at least you can see the print in natural light.

I wore this dress to my friends summer outdoor bridal shower and it was perfect for the occasion. Light, stretchy fabric was comfortable for all day wear. The midi length was good on me at 5'1", not too long plus there's a slit. The dress has a front clasp but I decided to wear it full deep plunge and it wasn't too much/revealing and stayed in place with some double sided tape. I really was very happy with the dress!

I'm a true 6 and a medium would have been slightly more comfortable, but the small still fit well. I needed to pin the neckline slightly so my bra wouldn't show. This was a fun dress to wear on vacation while being active during the day. My boyfriend really liked it.
Loved this dress! Super easy to wear, and perfect for a nice summer day. Wore it to a picnic in a park and it was great. Also the waist / sleeves had some sketch so it was a good fit overall.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorites- searching to buy it!
links_reviews_text: this was fun, flirty and perfect for a date night with my husband. I'm typically a size 4/6 in dresses, 34B and I wore the SR. Plunging neckline was gorgeous. This is not for work, only for play :-)
Comfy all day dress didn't need bra or tape
Super soft, stretchy at the waist, perfect little dress for everyday use. Low cut'

I love this dress. I mean, seriously love it. I wore it on a beach vacation and never wanted to return it. I love just about any piece that manages to incorporate a super plunge v without being too scandalous, and this fit the bill perfectly. The v was super low but well-tailored, so it didn't gape or make me worry about a peekaboo moment. The sleeves have a little poof to them, but it wasn't over-the-top in real life. One of my favorite things is that the buttons down the front didn't go all they way down to the hem, so the low v was mirrored at the bottom -- kept the skirt very light and airy as well. The waist is super stretchy and flattering, too, so I'd say don't get too bogged down on sizing. So good, highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Liked it so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: This fit really well and has a hook and eye at the top so that those of us who are more busty don't have to show everything if you don't want. I figured I would get a lot of wear from this and so decided I'd buy it. It is very versatile - I imagine wearing it day and night with sneakers, sandals etc. Great dress for a capsule warmer weather closet.
I'm short, so usually can't pull of long dresses. Everything about this dress is stunning. It fits so well and is incredibly flattering.
I love this dress. Considering renting it again and buying it.
Such a great fit! And modest too. The dress has a hook and eye on the neckline so it isn't as low cut as most of the reviews show. Such a comfortable material - I would buy this!
Super cute summer dress! Low cut top but it was flattering and comfortable
Sleeve and neckline detail, breezy slit at the bottom made this dress casual enough for a happy hour but dressy enough for a birthday dinner that followed. Easy to dress up or down.
Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: The pattern is amazing! I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is incredible! It's very versatile - I wore it on the weekend, to a bridal shower, and to work. It fits true to size. Note that there is an opening at the chest area so you may need to wear a cami or high coverage bra underneath.
Dress felt great on, felt flowy and light in the summer heat. Had to wear a tank top under so my chest wouldn't be in your face.
It was low cut, but I am a 38D, 175 and 5'9". It fit the right spots and was very comfortable.

Soooo cozy and dreamy to wear on a more casual day. The wool is cozy and warm. The shall collar adds enough interest to make this sweater feel anything but basic. I should have bought it because I can see wearing it everywhere. The L was just perfect for this size 14 gal, but I wouldn't try it if you're above that because it was a little snug in the arms.

I rented it despite it having no reviews and I'm so happy I did! It arrived with tags on which is always a bonus. It's super soft and cozy and I love the dark grey color. Even though it's long and has the draped aspect it didn't swallow me up. Great for work and you could maybe even dress it up with heels for a winter date night!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and love the pockets!
links_reviews_text: Almost bought this sweater. It's so soft and cozy and easy to dress up or down.
This is a great layering piece. I wore it several times with different outfits.
Arms are snug ( but flattering) so I wore it with a sleeveless blouse. Warm but not overly so. Great piece with jeans or slacks
Versatile cardigan. Arms were a little short for me but overall fit was nice.

Mostly comfortable (the tag on the back of the neck was a little annoying when wearing just a tank underneath. I'm normally a S and wore an XS and it fit perfect. Really great for lounging around the house in. But neither the cut nor the material was anything special.

As much as I wanted to love it even just wear this sweater, the sleeves were tight and short, and the material was a little stiff. It fell nicely otherwise, but not comfortable enough in the arms to wear.
As soon as I tried this on, I wore it out. Love it. Soft, cozy, perfect fit. It could be worn casually or dressed up for work. I'll be hanging on to this for a little while.
Great cut

links_reviews_title: Comfy, cozy, and oh so versatile
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a recent work trip combined with some play time. Worked great with jeans and slacks. Warm, cozy, and comfortable. Great for a casual work environment, weekends, and everyday use. A little snug in the arms with a thicker shirt underneath, otherwise fits true to size. Nice quality

links_reviews_title: So soft and cozy. I also like that it has pockets.
links_reviews_text: Fits well with a little extra wiggle room. I probably could have also worn a small.

links_reviews_title: Perfect staple piece for mild winters. It arrived NWT and I had to keep!
links_reviews_text: Not too thick, very flattering cut, lovely drape and pockets! It looks great over a pencil skirt with tall boots, or over jeans or joggers. Total keeper.
Great duster. Been great for travel and everyday casual. Has pockets.
This warm and comfy sweater was perfect for work, and happy hour! FUN FACT: It has pockets!!

links_reviews_title: A little boxy but winter and fall cute!
links_reviews_text: So I should of gotten the 12 but it wasn't available so I got the 14. Because the waist was big -- it ended up being a boxy shape on me and not a flattering a line. The material is gorgeous and well made. Just didn't hit my waist to give me any shape ? Maybe I will try a smaller size ?

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - runs a little large in waist and length
links_reviews_text: Or maybe I just like my mini skirts to be mini :) was a fun skirt though! I'd love to rent again & pair with a sweater or with the matching blazer -- more on @thanksitsrtr
I'm 5'2 190lbs. This was flattering for my current weight.

This skirt is cute, but definitely runs on the shorter side. I'm 5'6" and the skirt hit me a few inches above the end of my arms. The material is nice and thick, so would be great for fall/winter. The pockets are fake, but a cute detail. I paired it with a white t-shirt, denim jacket and white platform sneakers for a daytime look on the weekend, and with black boots and a turtleneck for a night out.
Loved this gem. Only thing is I am usually a size 10/12 and got a 14. No stretch in the fabric so I suggest maybe sizing up. Great rental!!
Tight

links_reviews_title: Cute concept but the fit wasn't very flattering :(
links_reviews_text: I was so excited for this skirt because it looks so cute on the model and on other reviews but it was too big in the waist for me and ended up making me look larger in the middle. The only way I was able to wear it was with an oversized turtleneck that I slightly tucked in in the front. Next time I would rent me actually size rather than sizing up to maybe avoid the waist problem.
The material feels nice and comfortable. Can run short if you have a butt, I could've ordered an 8 but it still fit since the material stretches slightly.
Very cute. A little too short even for me (5'1")!
Absolutely loved this skirt it was super flattering and well made
Cute colors and was looking forward to wearing this with tights but it's about as short as a tennis skirt and just didn't feel comfortable wearing.
Cute skirt made from nice material, but I couldn't wear it. I'm bigger in the hips and found that this barely covered me in the back. I don't think sizing up would have helped either.
I'm curvy and couldn't fit in the skirt. Should have sizes up.
So cute. I wore it to work and it was completely appropriate and didn't need adjusting with standing and sitting. One of my favorite rentals.
I didn't end up wearing this because I have sorta wider hips and this was short and tight.
super cute... might run a little small i ususally wear 2 or 4 and the 4 fit well. Its a little itchy i had to tuck my blouse in!

I love this dress and am thinking about purchasing it. I do wish it came with the matching belt but it wasn't included in my shipment. I added my own and was happy with the look. I'm 5'0" and with a belt it was a good length! Love the material and print!

links_reviews_title: The stuff WFH dreams are made of
links_reviews_text: This dress is stunning in person. Beautiful pleating, fully lined, and the fabric drape and pattern are so elegant. I wore this twice while working from home- once for all day meetings, and another evening for back to back virtual happy hours. It read beautifully on camera, and looked great in person. If I don't buy it, I'll definitely rent again! FYI it did buckle a little at the bust for me. Nothing bad but something I had to be aware of. The rest draped perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Drop waist line is great for pregos!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this. The pattern is delicate and the colors are so lovely. Received lots of compliments.

Wearing white in the California winter is a stretch for me. I liked this dress a lot. I preferred the weekend version of the look. The work look was a bit much with the dark tights. ( however I like the picture of the work look better). I needed clothing tape to prevent gaps at the chest. When I sat down there were gaps in the skirt near the ruffle on the bottom. I was happy I had a white dress for international women's day.
I loved this dress; I wanted to buy it! The print on the fabric is divine, and the details on the cuffs and the pleating make the piece look expensive. Will definitely rent again.
I loved this!!!
I rented this dress for an engagement party. I got lots of compliments. It fit well, I chose to wear it without a belt. Would rent again!

Incredibly unique and perfect for everyday wear or work, I love this look. Runs a little big, but that's the look. After one wear, it did have some wrinkles so I ironed between wears. I think it could work for travel if folded right, but it's not naturally a "wrinkle resistant" fabric. I've received quite a few compliments and asked where I bought it (not telling- ha!).
Obsessed
I was pleasantly surprised to find that this was lined! Yay not see-through. Very pretty print and easy to wear all year round with boots or flats.

links_reviews_title: Super fun easy and comfy dress
links_reviews_text: I loved this whimsical loose fitting dress! So easy to throw on and look like an outfit.

links_reviews_title: Super preppy but was fun to dress up with some edgy details

links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - received so many compliments. Wore to work, paired with tights and booties. Super soft and comfortable. Usually a 2 or 4 in dresses, depending on brand/fit. Probably could have sized down but the 4 was a great fit for work. Loved the print and the ruffle details. Will be renting again!
I absolutely love this dress. The material is lovely and it is so comfortable to wear. I received many compliments !!

links_reviews_title: Great. Fun print. Comfortable. Good length.

links_reviews_text: Fit was straight and still roomy so was very comfortable. Worn to work and had tons of compliments.
This is just a fabulous dress - beautiful soft detailing on the print, dress fits comfortably, perfect for work.

This is a gorgeous floaty dress that is professional enough for work but remains completely unstuffy. It is roomy, so probably best to go down a size. The dress is fully lined with a beautiful, unique print.
Obsessed with this dress. I ended up belting it because that was best on my body shape. So many compliments, so comfortable, so chic

links_reviews_title: Someone asked if I was a model lol. So flattering and fun
links_reviews_text: Flattering and unique

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Lots of comments at work. Very comfortable but chic.
links_reviews_text: Great pattern, style and fabric.

I got sooo many compliments on this dress, I even had strangers stop me to comment on the print or the cut. Very comfortable and flows and super versatile. Wore it to work during the day and a baseball game after. It does hang very loosely on the body so I added a roped belt for shape.

I'm not a big pattern person, so this was a great way to branch out! Fits beautifully and is a really gorgeous silk fabric. I could've gone down a size, but I liked the oversized/drapey fit. Got so many compliments at work! Highly recommend!
I LOVED this dress so much! It was so easy to wear & unique. Professional enough to wear on work but also great for a weekend bridal shower.

links_reviews_title: Take me to a cafe in Paris. I'm dressed for it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is oddly wonderful. The shape isn't particularly flattering, but it's so fun and COMFORTABLE! I would have Sizes down, but feared the buttons would pull. The fabric is so charming, with lovely colors. It's lightweight that even with the long sleeves, you can still wear it for summer. It also has a nice lining to give the dress structure. A fun workday rental, or even fun for travel if you have access to an iron.
Overall fits large though smaller through the bust. I thought it really needed a belt, so I added one. Love this print! Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Incredibly unique and a little loose
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress and received a ridiculous amount of compliments on it. It's super easy to wear and so interesting. The fabric is light and silky without worrying about it being see through. The only issue is it does run a bit big, but it was fine for one day.

Love this dress! Wore a slip underneath bc the buttons gap a little when sitting down. Maybe a size up would have prevented this. I'm 7 months pregnant and was surprised a size 4 fit, so this must run large. Lovely pattern, details and colors.
Conservative but fun for work. Flattering silhouette

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work or fun
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this cute dress. I wore it with black tights in winter but it would be very cute with nude sandals in spring.

links_reviews_title: Wore the dress multiple times before returning!
links_reviews_text: Loved it - perfectly tailored (it's a more spacious look) still very flattering, and SO very comfortable.
Not the cutest cut. Would size up.
Loved this dress and had my eyes on it for a long time!
So comfortable and easy to wear!

Such a fun dress to wear! The boxy cut was comfortable, with space to spare for a mid sized bump at 5 months. Even with a light fabric color, it also wasn't sheer which I loved. I went up one size to make sure it fit.
Loved this dress. Great material. Runs large. I could have worn a smaller size. Wore a few different times with a belt and received tons of compliments.

I ordered this for a beach trip dinner. Several review said it ran large which was fine since it was for the beach. I thought because I am so broad in the shoulders the 8 would actually fit but it was indeed a little big. Would rent again and just size down.
Great print. I belted it and got a lot of comments

links_reviews_title: Loved it for a work event and beach vacation! Very lightweight and high end material.
links_reviews_text: Fits a little large, but fit my 2nd trimester bump!
Exactly what it says on the tin. Super easy to throw on and run to work. The print was very fun and the skirt bottom had great movement

links_reviews_title: Cute look but really wish I had sizes down
links_reviews_text: Super baggy piece, make sure to order a size down. Had to tie this belt about as tight as it would go to give it any shape

links_reviews_title: Can you ever just be whelmed?
links_reviews_text: Pros: comfortable, easy to get on and off, rich navy color, pockets Cons: runs large, a bit plain, long arms and legs- not petite friendly Takeaway: Can be a great backdrop for a statement accessory, but otherwise uninteresting.

links_reviews_title: Dress down or dress it up!
links_reviews_text: Looked super cute with sneakers and heels! Awesome jumper for a casual day at work to a party at night.
Me and my friend rented and she got the small- wish I had too because the medium was too big. V comfy!

links_reviews_title: Cute but was missing button on sleeve
links_reviews_text: I didn't realize until a couple of weeks in that the one sleeve was missing a button. I wore it once for a baby shower with nude heels and it was very cute and comfy. Got a lot of compliments

I ordered the M and was very loose fitting, in fact, too loose fitting. Would have preferred a S. Didn't wear it because it was too loose and looked sloppy. The color and quality of this jumpsuit were so good I was disappointed I couldn't wear it. Might order again in a smaller size. Versatile piece that could easily be dressed up or down.

You can wear this ANYWHERE. Wore it around Italy while we were exploring day to day. Wore with white adidas sneakers, but it's an incredibly versatile piece. I rented a LR because they didn't have a medium. I'm a size 8/10 and the LR fit (I tied the drawstring tight) but there was definitely extra fabric. I could have gone with a Medium if it was available, and it would have fit perfectly.
Thankfully it had a center tie so I could really cinch the middle! Love this brand, nice heavy sill silky material. Will rent again in a smaller size
This jumpsuit was so comfortable to wear. I wore it to work and it wasn't too casual.
Ran very large, just totally overwhelmed my 5'4 body. Not wearable. Material was heavy.
Has potential, but you should size way down! I am usually a 6 and ordered a M but could have gotten an XS.

I guess I'm somewhere between a medium and a small, but I usually size up when ordering. A medium was big on me. It fit me bigger than the model. If/when I order this again I'd get a small. I loved this jumpsuit. I work in a casual start up, so it was perfect level of formality for my work. I got numerous compliments from all types of people. I plan on hanging on to it to wear out this weekend. It drapes beautifully. The fabric does wrinkle so I wouldn't pack it to bring on a trip.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, did not wrinkle. I will reorder in size Large.
links_reviews_text: This blouse had amply room for my chest, but very low neck. I had to use accessory tape to make it office appropriate. Sleeves were too long, overall I'd order a size down next time.

links_reviews_title: Love the print but runs large
links_reviews_text: The fit is loose and flowy if you wear it untucked. I tucked it into jeans and wore with a nude cami (otherwise the top is sheer) for a casual office look. I love the hearts and balloon sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Great to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Great blouse to dress up or down, wear tucked in or loose. So much versatility. Hearts are maroon and navy. Very pretty.

links_reviews_title: Great Everyday Blouse for My Athletic Build!!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely adore this blouse!! It's roomy in the arms and busy area. I was able to wear a size medium and had plenty of room to move. It complemented my curvy, busty figure very well. I'll be keeping this blouse!!
I could wear this in work or not- cute top. Loose fit but looks stylish.... I like the sleeves on it - they are a nice touch. Would rent again

I really liked this top with pants I also rented! I didn't have to wear a cami under it with a nude bra! The shirt runs large, I have wide shoulders and the medium was big on me. The hearts are black and burgundy. Very cute and feminine!!
good fit, a little low cut on me

Sized down on the advice of other reviews. The sleeves were still huge and the main part of the shirt was too small. If you're busty like me (36G), stick with your normal size. The material of the shirt did feel nice though
It was nice in person but it was a little low cut for work for me and the tightness around the sleeves would have bothered me all day. I didn't end up wearing it

I am 34DD And a solid medium up top and this was big - it was embarrassing as a work shirt. Didn't need a camisole as the weight was right and the sleeves were cute but it was way too loose and Boxy even though tips are basically never large on me bc of my bust. Disappointed.
Shirt was large and felt frumpy. V neck was too low to be worn. If I rented again, would get a size smaller.
I considered buying this, it's so versatile with nice details. It was lower cut than I expected. Way too low for work for me, so, cami was required.

links_reviews_title: Totally fine blouse, just nothing special.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Fabric kind of see through so keep that in mind.
I rented this for work and a vacation. It was cute with skinny jeans and black pants but nothing special.
Super cute print and neckline, but was really oversized for a medium.
A little large but not oversized and looks cute with skinny jeans or tucked into a bottom
Fits great. Material is very nice.

Thought this was a really cute top. Loved the fact that the dots were actually small hearts, felt like it gave it a nice touch. My only issue was that the slit in the front was a little too revealing for my larger bust size. I think it would be fine for smaller chested women. I also didn't love that the shirt was more on the sheer side. I had a beige bra on with a little lace and I felt like you could see the lace outline a little too clearly.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but shorter than I expected
links_reviews_text: If I wasn't wearing high waisted jeans when I lifted my arms my mid section would show, so the only down side was that it wasn't as long as I expected. But I got a lot of compliments and really liked the top.

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt!!!!! It's super trendy!
links_reviews_text: This shirt was a hit! Got many compliments and looks amazing, specially during the sunny days!

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit! Can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: I own the matching skirt so rented it to wear them together. Super cute. I'm normally a size small / 4 in DVF.
Lightweight, fitting, unique - this top was my favorite to wear on my trip to Japan and Vietnam in early October.
The pattern play on this shirt was very fun. Great quality material.

links_reviews_title: Magnum PI, but make it fashion
links_reviews_text: Loves the float, pajama fit--I'm busty and so often these tops never fit my body type as intended. The pattern clashing made this top really special and noteworthy. Will def rent again!
Rented this for my company's summer picnic. It's light and easy to wear, but doesn't wrinkle like a lot of silk. Recommended!

This shirt fits true-to-size for the style, which is to say that it's oversized. For my body type I prefer to tuck it in, otherwise you can't see where my waistline is. Very silky comfortable material, though could be tough to pair with outfits because of the uniqueness.
Love this! It's a bit loose which makes it elegant feeling. Great pattern and so many compliments.

Fun pattern and high quality fabric. Perfect for work or dress down with other fun patterns for weekend hang with friends. Tons of compliments! Size fit well, it's slight an oversized fit but works well tucked in or untucked.

This shirt is nice because it's versatile. On the other hand, it can look frumpy if you don't wear it right (and I, arguably, did not wear it right). I wore it for a date night to a cooking class. The pattern is unique and eye-catching and it's SO comfy, but I felt like I swam in it a little. If you put a little more effort than I did into creating an outfit of it (and maybe size down?), it could be awesome.
Very light summer top. Good for work. Had skits up the sides.
Loved this tucked in with high waisted jeans. Looks a little frumpy when it isn't tucked in.

This top is great. The colors are wonderful and the nod to sleepwear is not over the top. The skits on the side are high, so I could not wear to work. Instead, I wore just out to dinner. I'm tall and the small still fit well.

I'm usually a large but the medium was perfect, so I think it runs a bit big. Lightweight and perfect for warmer temps. Worn on a day I worked from home, I loved the print mix so much I kept it so I could wear it to the office, too! The description says green and white, but it's actually green and the softest lilac color... with small white stripes. Gorgeous!
Print and material are amazing. Felt a bit too "beachy" for a casual office day, but I'll rent it again for like a picnic or a beach day :)
Definitely fits baggy. I loved the print and material. Did a half tuck so it didn't swallow me up.

links_reviews_title: Very cool in person, quirky in a stylish way
links_reviews_text: I was worried this would look too much like pajamas, but the cut helps avoid the pajama look. It's very comfortable and the pattern mixing is unique and pretty. I would probably size down next time, but I wore this for multiple doctors appointments for easy access and liked the slightly oversized fit. The neckline was lower than expected but I was able to wear a regular, full coverage bra.

I'm obsessed with this DVF shirt. I've rented it a couple times. The silk is so soft and high quality. It feels luxurious. It looks equally as good at work with dress pants as it does on the weekend with jeans. Love the pajama style and the v is a very flattering cut.

links_reviews_title: Love the pattern on this shirt and how different it is from anything I own.
links_reviews_text: Slightly difficult to make it look polished, wrinkles easily.
Love this top. Really well made and comfy, fit true to size but with an oversized look.

links_reviews_title: Love this pajama style! Great fabric, funky print.
links_reviews_text: I wore this with black joggers and flip flops for casual day in Brooklyn, and it felt casual yet chic. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable everyday shirt that garners lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I chose XL because that's what I need in this designer's wrap shirts, but I should have definitely sized down one size. However, it was a light and breezy shirt to wear on a hot summer day. I liked that some of the stripes were white while other stripes were pale lavender. It's my favorite shirt from this designer.
One part blouse, one part bowling shirt. I was seriously into it. Will probably buy if the price goes down (mine was pretty new).
Easy to wear
It is a very light weight shirt, perfect for summer. If you want it more fitted then you should size down. It looked a little too much like a pajama top for me though.

links_reviews_title: My kids said I looked like a cleaner
links_reviews_text: Nice fabric and pattern but the shape and cut makes it look like a cleaners uniform shirt. My kids made fun of me saying I looked like wearing a pajama top or a uniform shirt!
I was pleasantly surprised by how much I loved this coat. It fits so well, true to size, looks great dressed up or casual. Going to be sad to return this one!
I loved this sweater coat! It stretched out a bit after wearing it awhile, so I recommend ordering a size smaller. They only had a 20 when i normally wear 16/18, so that could've just been that.
This is cute, cozy. I felt like it ran a little big. Honestly, nothing that special. More of a house coat.
Liked this more than expected. Wore it casually with jeans and will also dress up with a black dress and tights. It's itchy, otherwise would've gotten 5 stars!

links_reviews_title: Such a great transition piece. Wish I owned this.
links_reviews_text: The perfect transition piece. Not too thin and not too thick. Loved it. My only reason for not handing out a five star is how much the sweater coat had already pilled just in the few times I wore it. Get it early.
Great quality and so many compliments! Runs large in the arms. Very warm as well.

I really liked this piece! It was comfy and flattering. It does feel like the comfy material may get more easily worn over time but overall I've been obsessed with this. Super warm and looks nice but feels casual. It's been perfect for date night & work!
A nice fall sweater. I wish the arms were longer.
na

So cozy and soft! The size I received was VERY pilled and the shoulders were puckered (ughhhh hangers) but I still enjoyed the feel/ look of it. Ended up not wearing because the condition made it inappropriate for work.

links_reviews_title: Just wore it for a work meeting.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and very stylish for work. Was a little itchy, but not too bad. Would rent again.
Little itchy. Better with a long sleeved undershirt.

Can't believe how many compliments I received on this little sweater! It was so easy to wear with jeans or leggings or even dressed up a little more for church with black pants. The 6 was tight on me and I am a true 8 so I would say that this runs very true to size. Really nice length, love the pattern. I got lots of use out of this would rent again!

I branched out with this Jacket. The color is not one I typically go for. It was a great choice for traveling from New York to Chicago in the winter. Big pockets. Comfortable on the plane. Felt like a sweater but looked more like a blazer.
This jacket was an awesome jacket! It was perfect with jeans and leggings. Very versatile and will definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous piece that livened up other basic pieces.
links_reviews_text: I just loved this piece! It was warm but not bulky and elevates a basic jeans and t-shirt look. Every time I wore it (four times) I received compliments.
loved this sweater. Thick enough to wear like a jacket in fall weather. Looked great with dresses and casual jeans. I would have purchased if it was less worn.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater, but showing some wear
links_reviews_text: I'd probably like this sweater coat to the point of loving jt if I was one of the first few people who borrowed it.
So many compliments, amazing sweater. Wore a ton--dressed up and down

Underwhelmed with this one. It fit ok, but after trying it with a number of foundational staples (all black and flats for errands, black dress and tall boots for casual Monday at office, denim button up and white jeans for son's weekend sports game) I just keep taking it off and putting it back on the hanger.
Sweater material but smooth (not chunky at all) knit.

links_reviews_title: Great addition to a casual outfit
links_reviews_text: This coat was fun to wear - added it to a black sweater and jeans and my outfit was instantly updated. It was warm (almost like wearing a robe to work!) but chic!

I thought this sweater would be more green than it actually is. It's more of an olive/brown tinge. The collar wouldn't stay down, and the fabric underneath is black, so it looked a little strange all day. I wore a scarf most of the day to cover the upturned collar. Overall, not my favorite rental.

links_reviews_title: Love the cut and the design of material
links_reviews_text: Thought it would be cozy but material is very itchy.
slightly oversized

links_reviews_title: Size down, slightly oversized especially because these are older and more worn/stretched out
links_reviews_text: Love this jacket but it is huge! Will be calling RTR and have them send me a soze or 2 smaller and will definately wear and love! Nice heavyish thick sweater material for cozy cold 40 degree Fall AMs
The "jacket sweater" fit and looked great, but I would have listed this in knits or sweaters. It does not provide enough warmth to be consider a jacket; at least not in Chicago during the fall.
Nice, heavy material to keep you warm. Perfect for fall!
Very comfortable, warm, and chic sweater jacket that can be dressed up or down. Love it!
This sweater is so cute and really warm. I really might keep this one!

Sweater is soft, good sizing and a fun print. The fabric is very heavy, so it is easy to wear as a Jacket in the cool fall days. I ordered this a size up so that I could easily layer, and enjoyed the larger fit. This is a great sweater.
The shoulders were a little tight, but the jacket still looked great on. I received a number of compliments.
It is long, and a very attractive looking fabric. The sweater I received seemed well worn.

links_reviews_title: Soft, comfy, feminine, flattering -- love it!
links_reviews_text: Super happy with this sweater. It drapes beautifully, and it's comfortable and soft. My only complaint is that the hanger it came on was too wide for the sweater, and it had deformed the sweater. It looked like I had pokey little shoulder pads. I was able to smooth them out by getting it damp and drying with a hairdryer. (I wouldn't recommend this technique on wool, but it worked fine since this sweater is mostly synthetic.)
Basic sweater, would rent again!
shorter but also roomy fit. softest knit with the right amount of stretch. pants, skirts, or even over a maxi dress, this sweater pairs with practically anything.
The reviews said that this one runs big or true to size. Definitely a bummer because it was pretty small and way tighter than anticipated.
This sweater was so cute! The sleeves made this piece really fun, and it was definitely warm and cozy. Went with tons of things and added a chic element even to just jeans.
It was ok.. I kept pulling down as it felt really short. I guess I am not used to the crop sweater craze. Color was nice and the sleeves were fun.

links_reviews_title: Cute silhouette, lots of fabric in the front
links_reviews_text: Perfect color and silhouette for everyday wear! I'm a fan of high-waisted jeans, so doing a French tuck (any queer eye fans??) with this was a little tough due to the excess fabric in the front. But still cute!! I would totally rent this again for a ski weekend, very warm!
This sweater was super soft and fit great!
I liked the look of this sweater but it was a little cropped for my style. I found that I kept having to pull it down. It was also slightly itchy.

Great sweater that totally hits all the treads. Mini mock turtle neck and balloon sleeves paired with this super soft sweater are a huge win! I paired this with the BB Dakota All Night Sequin Skirt for a festive Christmas Eve outfit
Such a cute sweater! True to size & super soft. Would rent again.
This sweater was so comfortable! It had a great shape and structure so it didn't look boxy or frumpy! It was hard sending this one back.
Runs fairly short
This fits true to size, however, I wish I'd gotten a medium for a slouchier fit. It was perfect to dress up jeans but a little more cropped than it looks in the photo.

It is soft, beautiful and feels great on. It just runs small. I wear a small in sweaters and it was tight on me. Size up if you like to have room in a sweater with skinny jeans. I will return for a medium. I just like roomy on top with skinny jeans
Nice quality and would rent again.

This fit so small for me that I couldn't even wear it. Very short in the arms and cropped. If it had come in an XL it probably would have been cute. If you have a long torso and a large bust I'd pass or definitely size up.
Cute everyday sweater! Paired with black Jean's for daytime and leather skirt for night

links_reviews_title: Adorable sweater. Wore it multiple times
links_reviews_text: Dress up or down
cute
slightly itchy, but tolerable.

links_reviews_title: Very cute for every day, but the fabric was not the best.
links_reviews_text: This fabric was very itchy to me, which is why I only wore it once. That was the only downside to it
Runs small. I got a medium, but would have sizes up. I wore with all high waisted jeans so it worked out fine. 5'10". Wore it in California where it tends to get cold

links_reviews_title: Fun night out with friends at a brewery
links_reviews_text: Sorry cropped. Great neckline. Soft fabric
Fits great and looks so cute with high waisted denim! I got a ton of compliments at work!

links_reviews_title: The moment I put this sweater on it fit like a dream
links_reviews_text: This Joie sweater was simply beautiful! I loved it so much I needed to buy it. With one click to my RTR app I was able to purchase this beauty. I foresee wearing many days in the coming fall season. The shape of this is timeless and the knot is perfect.

links_reviews_title: wore it to work and got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very soft, great quality, warm!

links_reviews_title: Chic and Comfy - not too hot!
links_reviews_text: I wore this sweater to work with silk pants on a 74 degree day in New York. This sweater is warm but not too warm, and INSANELY comfortable. I honestly need a blanket in this material. You could definitely dress this up with a skirt.

This neutral sweater is cozy and could really be paired with anything to be worn at work, out to dinner/drinks, on a date, or just hanging around. The balloon sleeves make it feminine - I found the sweater to be slightly short (not cropped by any means) and the waistband hit me at an odd place. However, doing a half tuck solved this, and I found the fit to be true to size overall. I probably wouldn't rent again because this is more of a closet staple but was nice to try it out.

links_reviews_title: cute work sweater, not super heavy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater, i wore an xs, but i am usually a small, it fit, but i would be more comfortable in a small bc the arms and the length were kind of small.

This was a very cute sweater, but much shorter in the torso and the sleeves than it looks in the photos. The sleeves didn't reach my wrists, so I hitched them up to mid-forearm to get the balloon-sleeve look. The torso hit right at the top of my high-waisted jeans. With those adjustments, the sweater still worked and it was a nice casual look.
Pros: Soft material, super cute sleeves. Cons: Sleeves are shorter than normal.

links_reviews_title: Too short and cropped. Weird fit.
links_reviews_text: Im short and this was too cropped. Never ended up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Felt cute and put together but casual
links_reviews_text: Fit great but felt a bit short in the torso
Fits perfect. I needed the right type of pants for this bc the style was shorter than I'm used to..
The sleeves didnât make it all the way down to my wrist so I had the pushed up look.

links_reviews_title: Color was awesome and sleeves unique - itchy wool
links_reviews_text: Loved the look and the color. But the wool was definitely itchy and it was short in length - for both the sleeves and waist area.
Wore this sweater a ton because it's a great layering piece over dresses when it's just a little too cold or perfect with jeans.
Love the fit and color of the dress. Dressed it down with jeans and dressed it up with a long maxi underneath.
Decent fit but the arms are quite short and more cropped than I would have liked. Color and overall fit was cute though!

links_reviews_title: Love love love!! Wanted to buy
links_reviews_text: Love this jacket! Perfect for everyday wear and adds a bit of flare to your outfit. Matches perfectly with a white doodle pup!

This cropped jacket is cute and sporty. I ended up wearing it all over town on a walking food and history tour and it looked great with my black athletic leggings. Great for those transitional seasons
Amazing sporty jacket! Not super warm but good for layering, can dress up or down! Was a bit cropped too
Did not want to send this back! You won't regret it highly recommend renting
It's cropped but has an elastic so you can decide where you want it to hit on your stomach
Cute, trendy jacket. Very flattering (note that it's cropped!) worn everyday, to and from gym, out on weekends etc. Will definitely rent again!
This is the cutest little jacket I'm so happy I rented it! It's shockingly warm and I got so many compliments

This is a great coat to throw on to head to workout or to wear on a casual day. It really elevates a pair of plain jeans or leggings and sneakers. The jacket was warm and fit well. Casual and very cool.

links_reviews_title: This jacket was so warm and cute! I loooooved it!!
links_reviews_text: So cute and perfectly cropped! Definitely recommend if you want to wear out at night too, wore it with a bodysuit underneath!
The fabric is thick and warm - I got a ton of compliments! But just note it's kind of hard to move around bc the fabric is so thick and the shoulders are so large.

I found the fit really boxy and made my shoulders look gigantic. It's a really cute coat, but something about the stiffness of the fabric made it unappealing to me and I didn't end up wearing it. I'll try again in a smaller size and see if it's better.

links_reviews_title: So chic for this thicc girl
links_reviews_text: I am a bigger girl but This item was so flattering. It was big on purpose but fit so well. Only negative was my own hair would get stuck on the sweater. Very warm and cozy for the La 50 degree weather we have going on here

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket, so practical and cute. Wore to gym, to class, and to work.
links_reviews_text: More cropped than you may expect but draw-string at bottom allows for easy adjustment.

Fit: Ran true to size. Hit right at my hip bone, but you can use the ties on the bottom to tighten and make even more cropped. Pros: Sherling/teddy material is on trend - got so many compliments on it! My boyfriend loved it so much he offered to buy it for me. You can pair with jeans and booties or leggings and sneakers. Cons: None. I'm obsessed!
This sweater is bulkier than I expected and looks bad unzipped, didnt end up wearing it.

I only tried it on a couple times. I didn't love what it looked like on so never wore it out. It was pretty cool looking just never quite right. I also wanted to return right away for a replacement garment so I didn't give it much opportunity for a better situation.

links_reviews_title: Cute but really uncomfortable. Doesn't look expensive.
links_reviews_text: Which is shocking because of the look. The inner sleeves were itchy.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing as it was too big across the shoulders. Cute though.
links_reviews_text: I got the size small. I normally wear an extra small or small however this was so broad across the shoulders that I looked comical. Definitely size down, especially if you are narrow across the shoulders. The fabric is stiff just FYI.

I really can't describe this any better than saying you absolutely have to try it. It's the most and the least and I may never return it. Style it with skinny black jeans and everyone will be jealous of how on trend you look.
Oversized, lovely! Soft and cozy!
This is an oversized style sweater, the fit is large and I would have preferred a medium to be more fitted. The print is really cute, I recommend it.
This sweater is everything! It's so cozy and comfy! I did not want to send it back ever!!! It's so fun and fits beautifully. I got tons of compliments!!!
Everyone loves snoopy! Soft, not itchy!
Such a fun and comfortable sweater. Smiles and compliments all day! I wished I could keep it but too many work events coming up and I need my spots. Will probably rent again.
So cute and comfy! I received so many compliments.

I'm such a big Peanuts fan, so when I saw this sweater I was so excited! It runs large and is clearly intended to be a slouchy fit, so I was able to get a small size and still have it feel appropriately roomy. My favorite styling for this sweater was with printed leggings to balance out my proportions; this combo was perfect for the winter "chill" of LA.

links_reviews_title: Joe Cool for the win B-)
links_reviews_text: Wore at 22 weeks pregnant. Very warm. Got compliments everywhere I went.

This dressed caused a woman to feel the need to scream at me across four lanes of traffic, "OH MY GOD I LOVE YOUR SWEATER!" I don't usually rent sweaters this bold but this one just called out to me and I'm so glad I got it. The small was definitely big on me so I paired it with leggings. I want to get an XS next time so it won't be quite as baggy and pair it with jeans. This is an extremely comfortably, high quality sweater that I wore on multiple occasions and got compliments every time.

I loved this sweater. I wore it to work with black jeans and heels, then I wore it with leggings and tennis shoes. It was so versatile and a little whimsical. Everyone loved it too - moms, kids, fashionistas. It was crazy soft and very warm and cozy. It's meant to be oversized, so while I rented the M, I think you can size up and still be safe. You can't really tuck it in, though, even a French tuck, because Joe Cool is so big.

links_reviews_title: It's a hard one not to notice!
links_reviews_text: Everyone noticed this shirt and complimented it! It's super comfortable, warm but it doesn't have much shape. It matches a lot and was very fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is adorable and I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: soft and warm this is a great autumn sweater.
Who doesn't love Snoopy in Cashmere and Wool! So many compliments! Absolutely loved the nostalgic feel!!

links_reviews_title: So cute and soft, my daughters loved too. Wore to a family gathering and another time just at home.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect, nice turtleneck, butt covering

links_reviews_title: Super cute sweater - I got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: It's such a cute, playful sweater. It's warm and cozy without being thick and heavy. I typically wear an S so I didn't love the fit of an M, but it wasn't too bad. I'd definitely rent again.

I absolutely love this fun, warm, snuggly sweater. I'm currently rocking it while working from home, but it's so versatile. You can wear it with a skirt, leggings or jeans; looks great with everything! Made of wool and cashmere.
Fit loose, but as expected for a big sweater. Dressed it up for work, traveled and wore at home. Always happy in this one!
It is adorable, perfect for everyday! The neck is a little itchy given that it's made of wool, but for the cute look I can ignore the itchy part lol

links_reviews_title: A great sweater for any casual event. I received a ton of compliments and everyone wanted it.
links_reviews_text: This sweater runs big so size down. I wore this but ended up returning it for the smaller size. The L fits much better.
Cute and fun sweater. A little on the itchy side for me though.

links_reviews_title: It was a little itchy but cute ended up being to warm for the weekend
links_reviews_text: Long itchy
I rented this because it's just a bit crazy. It is the softest, most, comfortable sweater ever. The fact that my kids find it a bit embarrassing, is just icing on the cake.
I love this sweater. It's so cute and cozy. I wish I could buy it. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: So cool in my Joe Cool!
links_reviews_text: It's a cute sweater. It's nice thick wool sweater so I layered underneath it with a cotton t-shirt to avoid the itch.
Loved this sweater but I was sent one that was way too large. Normally I take a medium in the brand, a large if I want it slouchy but I was sent a LL. I swam in it! I am a pretty traditional size 10.

links_reviews_title: I get so many compliments! It's really cute for every day. Going to keep a while longer!!!

links_reviews_text: This was too huge and too shapeless to look good on me. However, I think this would be adorable on a younger (20ish) woman with skinny jeans for a weekend outfit.
For me, this was a perfect rental. Super cute and fun but not something you'd wear often enough to justify the price Tag.

This sweater was so much fun and I got compliments everywhere I wore it. Who doesn't love Snoopy?! It seemed like the sweater was fairly new, but after I wore it a few times, it started pilling on the sleeves, so that might be an issue later down the road. However, I will likely rent this again!
What can I say? Everyone adored this crazy sweater- compliments from total strangers. Super soft, very warm, but not itchy. I was so close to buying this one. Totally loved it.
This sweater is really warm but not itchy. The design makes you and others smile (be prepared to get compliments from random strangers). I enjoyed wearing this piece.

I absolutely love this sweater and would 100% buy it (if it weren't so crazy expensive!) I wore this to work and then out to a bar with friends, and received a ton of compliments. It's a drapey, oversized, "boyfriend"-esque fit, and very soft material. I ordered a Small and it was predictably huge on me, but again, it's not meant to be form-fitting. I paired mine with wide-leg black Madewell jeans and a chunky heel, with a small hoop earring. I want to keep this sweater forever and live in it.
Loved this sweater and will probably rent again. not scratchy, not boxy.
Soft, warm, adorable and huge. Very stretchy so if you are not goin for an oversized look size down two sizes.
Such a fun cute oversized sweater!
Such a cute sweater. Came new with the tags
Loved he oversized fit of the sweater. Very nice material, kept me nice and warm on a cool fall day. Super cute design! Paired it with some black skinny pants and heels.
I want to rent this at least once a month. Comfort and such amazing tailoring work. Loved this blazer.

links_reviews_title: Huge pockets for all your treasures!
links_reviews_text: This is cute but needs some color to bring it to life.

Love the combo of the jacket and skirt. Pretty typical body cut, so I wouldn't rent the jacket on its own. With the skirt--fire. Nice staple jacket if that's what you're looking for. Great quality and true to size.

At 5'4" I rarely find a blazer that fits well overall. This one checked al the boxes for me. I absolutely adore this jacket. It's easy to wear. It's got both navy and black in it. It's a pretty soft jacket too, not too stiff. It's a mid weight jacket. I wore it on a day that varied from 45-60 degrees and felt comfortable in it, though I wasn't outside for extended periods. It was comfortable for all day wear. I highly recommend this and would rent again and again!

I LOVED this blazer, didn't want to send it back! The fit was great and very comfortable. I'm usually a medium or 8 in tops and the 8 was true to size. After loving this, I will definitely rent this and other Club Monaco blazers for work this fall. Highly recommend!
Can be dressed up or down. Serious or relaxed. Great blazer, size up if you are fuller on top
The perfect blazer! Great cut and pattern. Super flattering. Very comfortable and chic. Would definitely rent again
I loved the plaid on this. It made by white shirt and black jeans into something more interesting and professional. It didn't breathe super well throughout the day but I still loved it.
Great blazer for work or everyday. It is navy but goes well with black. Tailored just right.

Pros: Beautifully made, fitted (but not tight anywhere) blazer that is TTS and really comfortable to wear. Wore this work and loved how easy it was to accessorize and dress up a basic pair of slacks or jeans. Great for conservative environments. Cons: None. Would definitely rent again!

Great blazer but ran a little small in my opinion. I'm 5'8 with a long torso and long arms. I had to roll the sleeves up so it wouldn't look so silly since they hit me too short. Wished there would have been the ability to rent a long. I'll size up next time to see if that fits better although I'm usually a 0 in designer brands.

Nice, professional fabric that held its shape well and wasn't very wrinkled when I pulled it out of my suitcase on a business trip. Paired very nice with navy dress pants. I'm 5' 3" and the length of the sleeves and the body were good (not too long).

links_reviews_title: Felt like a cool French girl
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket. It was perfectly oversized. Kicking myself for not getting a picture in it, because I wore it several times: to work; date night; church. Looked great with skinny jeans. Will rent again.

I loved this plaid pattern when I saw it online, but when it arrived I was very disappointed in the fabric and a little with the collar which look led a bit frumpy. I wanted to wear with the skirt but the fabric would continuously stick when I moved so unless I was standing perfectly still the outfit didn't look piled together. Such a shame.

links_reviews_title: Good work option, runs a bit big
links_reviews_text: Wore for a meeting, and the jacket was a nice heavy material and a nice cut. I felt it ran a bit big and could have sized down.
Gorgeous colors, perfect fit, absolutely loved this jacket!

This blazer strikes a nice balance between professional and fashionable. I wore it dressed down with light jeans, boots, and a dark shirt for work, but it could easily be dressed up for a more formal business affair. The blue, black, and gray pattern also means it matches with almost anything!
Good weight for the office, plan to wear with grey pants to job interview. Almost royal blue in pattern with black, on cream background.

I absolutely love this blazer!!!! I love that the jacket is very comfortable and soft. True to it's size. High recommend this jacket. You can wear it to work or dress is down. Will definitely be renting this one over and over again.
True to size, good cut.
Very rarely can I find a blazer that doesn't accentuate my hips, but this is incredibly flattering and cut professionally. Would buy if I could!
Wore this with jeans and a silk blouse, to go wine tasting. The jacket was long enough to slightly cover my bum, which I liked. Very cute. Would rent again!
Fit great, I chose to go up a size in between a 6 and 8 and loved the 8. It was comfortable and flattering and well-tailored.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an interview with some black pants.
links_reviews_text: Little snug in the arms and very warm (then again, I was in an interview, so maybe that was just me!). I thought it looked great on though.
I loved the pattern, but I ended up pairing the matching skirt with a navy blazer instead. The length of the arms were a little too long. It was super comfortable and not too heavy.
Great blazer for work and amazing quality- rent it!
I got many compliments and it fit well. You could wear this on a night out or work.
Great work blazer - stylish cut. Some padding in the shoulders. Interesting but conservative pattern. Almost kept it
Friday wear with jeans but could also go over a dress
Professional but not stuffy.

links_reviews_title: I've worn the jacket to work and out for cocktails a few times and it makes me feel powerful
links_reviews_text: beautiful, modern, sharp fit. feel like a million bucks when I'm wearing this jacket

links_reviews_title: It was a very chic and easy addition to my work outfits.
links_reviews_text: Tailored fit A great neutral pattern

links_reviews_title: Love it. Can dress it up or wear with jeans
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly

links_reviews_title: Very flattering fit and nice structure.
links_reviews_text: Fit is perfect, not too form fitting but slim enough to look very polished.
Fun, but not as work appropriate as I thought.

This was high quality. The extra design effort to line up the pattern on the body with the arms is particularly impressive. The arm length was perfect for me, and I typically get my blazers in tall sizes. Fits like pictured on model.
Ran a little big and sleeves too long for me. A little boxy but nice.
True to size. For my petite frame but arms were a tad long. Looks more like a sweatshirt than sweater. I probably wouldn't have gotten it if JW weren't my initials.

links_reviews_title: I didnât wesr this because it was soo small for a Large
links_reviews_text: Great material- thick and soft but so small
Wore this on a 16 hour plane ride, was both warm and breathable without being too stuffy, and even stayed fresh after!
I actually received this as an error (had ordered a grey JW sweater) but was very pleased with this sweatshirt. It was so comfortable and I wore it a ton.
I got a way smaller size thank I should've worn. So my fit was "just right" and not loose as it should've been. I stilled loved it though and that was completely intentional.

links_reviews_title: Worn for a change from my regular sweaters
links_reviews_text: super cute grey cashmere sweater. the sleeve detail is so soft!!
Great fit. Comfy.
Very soft and cozy. Perfect amount of crop to wear with high waisted jeans. Lightweight sweater

links_reviews_title: Great sweater but getting pilled- maybe time to retire.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size but was slightly short but not cropped. Loved the sleeves!

links_reviews_title: Super soft, cozy cold weather sweater
links_reviews_text: SUPER duper soft and comfy. Fits very TTS.
I really liked this sweater. I wore it three times! It fit perfectly, was comfortable, and had a nice little sparkle on the sleeve.

links_reviews_title: loved it, great fit, great material, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: super soft, fit well (not too tight) and just cute!
Was soft and warm. I couldn't get past the puffy bulky sleeves. Didn't work on my small frame. Didn't wear.
Warm, and chic winter sweater. Loved the sparkly and fun arms.
Fit well, a bit on the thinner side but aside from that I loved the fuzzy sleeve detail. Also there is some gold shimmer in the fuzzy part that doesn't come through in the photo on RTR- v cute.
I loved this soft, warm little sweater so much I bought it. I have worn it numerous times this winter. I love the fun, faux fur color blocked sleeves.
This sweater is great for every day wear, runs true to size
Loved this sweater
Soooo comfy and perfect!!! Highly considering purchasing!! Love this sweater!!

I rented this to wear to for all occasions just as Fall was turning into Winter. I wore it with jeans and boots and once with sneakers - it was super cozy and I loved the detail at the sleeves. Got lots of compliments and would rent again!
Perfect for layering and everyday. I wore it several times before returning.

The sleeves make it look modern. Great for work or play. You can dress it up or down. I wore it once with tailored pants and again with jeans. Love the cashmere. Not itchy. Great for fall. I said true to size but it is boxy and meant to fit boxy if you like more form fitting size down.

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly, very fun, and SO soft!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is so soft and comfortable it's unbelievable. The sleeves are such a fun touch - I got so many compliments in this sweater!

links_reviews_title: LOVED this! Especially loved the fuzzy sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Great sweater for a casual Friday! The fuzzy sleeves were great, made for an overall cozy and cuddly look!

links_reviews_title: Good quality leather, but smaller than expected
links_reviews_text: Fit personal phone + work phone + keys + lipstick, but not much else. Not large enough to be an everyday bag, so went back pretty quickly. Might rent again
Fit like a glove, SO different from anything anyone else had on - I received compliments on it all night!
I felt so sexy in this top. Also was a nice tight fitting material, I didn't need to wear a bra!loved it!

links_reviews_title: Cowboy Chic theme didn't stump RTR
links_reviews_text: When I needed a look for a Cowboy Chic theme party, I went right to RTR because I didn't own a single thing. After I bought boots and a hat, RTR had this option. It fit the look that seemed like I could ride a horse and still look chic. The thick material had a nice stretchiness. I wore black tights and felt put together!
Truly beautiful and unique top! Love the fit. Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Fun and sporty work appropriate piece
links_reviews_text: I received a ton of compliments on this flattering lewk. Glad I wore spandex tights as the short side is cropped too high for office attire. Didn't lay super smoothly on my ample 36Es but that didn't detract from the look too much. I love this piece and intend to wear it many times before this heads back to the runway.
This top fit perfect, quality was amazing, and was a hit at the party! This is the best rental I've had!

This top was so modern and fun to wear. I decided to pair with a navy knit pencil skirt and really enjoyed the contrast of darks with the white boarder. Stretchy top was very comfortable and flattering. Also looks great with jeans or pants!
The medium was unavailable so we went with the large. I would do the medium next time but this worked fine. Fun outfit.

links_reviews_title: Maybe I have a long torso?!ð¤·ââï¸
links_reviews_text: Saw this and thought it would look really cute AND it does! My only issue was that it seemed a bit short in terms of covering my torso. I had to keep pulling it down and not expose my side. Other than that it was really cute and definitely worth renting!!
Got so many compliments! Loved this shirt

One of the most unique tops I've rented. Thick, stretchy material that is extremely well tailored and flattering on the bust. The high side sits right at the waist, so great to pair with high waisted pants.
Sequin shorts for Vegas, black pants for dinner. Nice thick material. Very flattering!
Fit was great and the fabric was thick but did not overheat my body. You will standout in the best ways possible.
Good material that sucks you in. Got many compliments. Felt beautiful!
I loved this shirt. Very cute and unique. Paired with black leggings and pumps. Hugs body. Would rent again.
It was a great color and material, but for some reason unflattering - not slimming at all.

This looked like it was made for me. Thick fabric that is very forgiving and very comfortable. Goes from work to a night out. I love Shoshanna. She really knows how to design for us short "busty" women
Cute, flattering, comfortable. Recommended rental for every day stuff.

What's not to love about this dress. The color is vibrant, the fit is exceptional, this is perfect for a curvy figure as it accentuates your waist while minimizing your hips. The dress has nice movement, it is a little shorter than I thought it would be but looked fine paired with dark tights. I will rent this again.
Cute fit and flair dress. Wouldn't buy it necessarily but nice as an add-in to the work wardrobe for a day.

It's very flattering, clinging just enough without being too tight or revealing. Even though the neckline is high cut, the lines on the dress flattered my chest without putting it on display. It's also incredibly comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Great work dress, stylish and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great, the stripes were flattering and the material was thick and comfortable. I wore it for a work event both with a black jacket and without and it looked good both ways. I did wear with tights, it would have felt a little short to me without. Would definitely rent again.
The lines on this dress are very flattering! Stretchy and comfortable to wear to work all day. Definitely recommend!

It's stretchy but it's sucks you in, I'm very busty so my decisions in picking outfits that would compliment my figure is very strategic. I love hold it help me in but the color was vibrate and perfect for the holiday! Thank you RTR

I usually wear a size 10 but got the medium as a backup. I'm glad I did and ended up wearing the medium. The large was a little big in the arm pits, and was not fitted at all in the waist. The medium was slightly more fitted but flatteringly so. Overall a fun, high quality dress!
Great dress for work. Fits well and the fabric is thick for wearing in cooler weather.
This dress is stunning and yet tasteful and professional. If you want to ooze confidence this is a home run!

I rented this dress for an awards luncheon and received so many compliments. It was comfortable and very flattering. The stripes go in the right direction for the illusion of length. The material is thick and high quality. I would say it runs true to size to small. I would have liked for it to be a tad longer but it worked. Definitely considering purchasing. Great dress for a work function across seasons.

This is a thick knit fabric, but not too heavy to wear even in the summer (at least if you're headed to an AC locale eventually.) I was mixed on this dress originally -- the top part is super-flattering and this is usually a good shape for a curvy gal like me, but because I'm only 5'2 I thought the skirt hit me in a weird place and emphasized my muffin top with sort of a drop-waist. BUT apparently I was being paranoid because I got SO many compliments about this dress. Several people urged me to buy it.

links_reviews_title: Love, though i was nervous it accentuated my hips
links_reviews_text: Extremely comfortable, thick fabric that hides bumps. I'm normally a size 6 and wore the medium, which was perfect. Small would have been too small. I got tons of compliments. My only hesitation was that I thought the fabric was a bit stiff and sticking out on the sides, so I was afraid it made my hips look even bigger. But I think it was fine in the end.

Oh my, how I loved this dress. It is beautiful AND comfortable, modest and sexy. Very quality made piece. I received TONS of compliments from people asking me where I got this dress all day. Felt like a million bucks in it. I'm 5'3 and 130 lbs and wore a medium which was a perfect fit. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: The medium was too large on me
links_reviews_text: This is a very cute dress, perfect length for work without being too short. I'd say it's fairly true to size. I tend to go for size small but since it was unavailable I went for medium. It was not terribly large, but was loose in the waist and in the armpit area. I definitely could've worn it without anyone else noticing, but personally I prefer a certain fit. If you are bustier, sizing up may be a good idea but for the rest of us, stick to your usual size. I will be renting this again in a size small.

links_reviews_title: Runs more true to size than most Shoshanna items
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size small in most brands, but I know that Shoshanna runs small, so I got a Medium. It was actually a little loose on me, but still worked. I would size down if I were to reorder.

Loved the color of the dress - royal blue and navy. Mixed together. The fit of the dress was good and emphasizes the waist. Bc of my pear shape wasn't sure if it looked as great from the backside view which is why I gave it a 3 rating. Would I rent it again? Maybe but when there's so many other dresses to try maybe not.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress was a little large on my hips .
links_reviews_text: Nice a line but was larger than I needed.

links_reviews_title: Love this fit and flare for work!
links_reviews_text: I may keep this one

This is one of the most flattering and comfortable dresses I've ever worn. Stretches just enough but maintains structure, beautiful slimming pattern, and delightfully bright color paired with navy. I walked into work and got 5 compliments within 10 minutes! Definitely the best thing I've ever rented from RTR. LOVE this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a photo shoot and it was so comfortable and all-around a fantastic dress!
links_reviews_text: It's such a nice thick stretchy fabric I highly recommend this dress!
Great thick fabric and fit. Beautiful color and stitching is tight in all the right places. Nice and flirty dress.
Great navy and royal blue dress - fabric is thick and it was one of the most flattering things I've rented

I love this dress as an alternative to the plain black or grey dress for work. The blue is a bit brighter in person than it looks in photos, but not obnoxiously so... still very appropriate for work. The material is a heavy knit and feels very high quality. It is true to size, and does have some stretch for larger areas if needed. I usually wear a small/ 2, unless something runs small in the bust area, in which case i size up to medium. I wore a small comfortably in this dress.
I liked this dress but it was a bit too short for my liking. I'm 5'9 so it may be a better fit for someone on the shorter side.

This dress is so perfectly comfortable. it has give, which makes it easy to put on and Comfortable to wear. The colors are true to picture the picture and the fit very much complements a pair shaped or hourglass figure. Will definitely rent this dress again.

I'm on the fence about this dress. It looked ok on me, but I felt like the waist was just a touch too high for my structure. The skirt also flares quite a bit adding some weight down below. It felt true to size, if not a wee bit small. The knit is quite comfortable and thick enough to make for a fantastic season-transition dress.
I love this dress everything about it I love!!
Loved the bold colors and unique lines of the pattern. For like a dream--reminded me of some Herve Leger's I've rented. Would rent again and consider buying

links_reviews_title: I love this dress, gonna keep an eye on it when it comes down in price some to purchase!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable material, cute as can be!

I liked but didn't love this dress. The color is great and the material is nice and thick, but I didn't think the fit was super flattering. I'd rent it again because it's comfortable and the length is nice for a short girl like me (which meant I could wear flats and not look dowdy), but I wouldn't pick it for a special occasion or important meeting.
The material is great. Very stretchy and forgiving. You can't really see my muffin top and I'm sitting in the picture. Great dress

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a work meeting with clients. Comfortable, great color and pattern was different.
links_reviews_text: Great pattern and flattering on all body types I think. Great length as well. Would rent again.
I loved this dress. Cute for work. It's the perfect balance of eye catching but low key enough to work well for my office

links_reviews_title: Still had the tag on it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is great, comfortable and flattering. And in great condition as still had the tag on it. Looks perfect with a black leather jacket and black booties!
I'm a 38 DDD, so the top fit a little snug. But the dress looked perfect. I received so many compliments.

This is just an extremely flattering cut and clever stripes. The fabric is high quality, a little stretchy, thick and with a lovely drape. The horizontal stripe hit a little high - I wish it was at the natural waist.

links_reviews_title: So cute!!! I felt like a cheerleader hehe
links_reviews_text: The dress was brand new I had to remove the tags myself. Fit like a glove. I'm 5' 10" and the length was just right, about mid thighs for me, butt well covered #tallpeopleproblems
This jacket is so chic and stylish. Fits perfectl. Lightweight. Rent rent rent !!!
Waist line is tailored so it's very flattering on body!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable for travel and work business meetings
links_reviews_text: I word this jacket in an airplane underneath a heavier coat, then to a work happy hour and then off to dinner. Also wore it the next day as a professional blazer. Very versatile highly recommended and stands out with the design

links_reviews_title: This blazer was everything! It fit amazing and made me feel so good!
links_reviews_text: I was worried it would be too tight, but the blazer fit perfectly in every way. I would definitely rent it again.
Loved the gold and rose gold detail. Great cut and light fabric.
How did I not get a photo?!? This fit great and was a compliment magnet. I may rent it again. A four season piece.

This blazer would have received 5 stars if it wasn't for the terrible shoulder pads that ruined the whole thing. I rented an xs and the shoulder pads were huge. I honestly couldn't tell if that was the intended style or if the original shoulder pads ended up getting bunched up/ folded inside of the fabric making them appear worse than the actual design. Either way, I couldn't wear it because the shoulder pads looked ridiculous and were also uncomfortable.
Beautiful fabric, embroidery and style. A little snug, but made it work.
The stitching is amazing. Love! So professional yet chic
Cute dress for warm weather. Almost too short but great fit for a hourglass shape!
Absolutely love this- great fabric, fun sleeve details and perfect length, almost cropped. Im wearing high waisted black pants and it's a perfect pairing
This was just not special at all. Actually not even wearable for a weekend. Very blah on me.
I love this sweater! It was perfect to dress up for Christmas dinner and easy enough to pair with jeans and sneakers for a lunch date. I will definitely be renting again!

Loved this sweater! It was a perfect weight + much softer than I thought it would be. The bell sleeves make you feel a little fancy, but these sleeves aren't so wide that they get in the way. Thought about keeping it! Maybe next time :)
Fits super well! Material is stretchy. Runs true to size
Such a cute comfortable sweater!! The sleeves were a tad longer but I liked it
A bit short but cute. I don't need to have it in my closet but cute for once and while.
The recommendation was to size up - big mistake. Cute sweater that is short but sizing up made the sweater too big. I wore a tank under it.
Super comfy sweater. Rented the M since the S was unavailable. Fits TTS, the S would have been a better fit. Still wore several times!
So comfortable. It is a bit short in the torso but perfect with high waist jeans or leggings. Sleeves are long and I needed to roll them up to eat. Overall a great sweater! Also kept me warm.

The shirt is super short in front, so the XL was the right size to ensure I wasn't wearing a crop top to work. The con to the XL was that the shirt was wider than I normally like and the sleeves were super long. Still a cute enough look to consider wearing again.
Really like this fit, wish it came in a different color. I found the tan a little unflattering for my skin color but really liked the comfort.
cropped! Just need to wear a tank underneath.
Sleeves are definitely long and the top itself is more a crop style. Warm enough without being overly heavy, liked it enough.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater with a modern shape.
links_reviews_text: Modern shape.
Flattering. Medium weight. Versatile.
It is both cute and cozy and I've already worn it twice. Would consider buying.
Realllllly comfortable and cute, got a lot of compliments. The arms are a little long and the body is a little short. Perfect with high-waist jeans and booties. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great quality material. Nice shape and flattering fit
links_reviews_text: The fit is flattering with it being a shorter sweater. Great material. Hangs well. Would definitely rent again!
Got this sweater to wear for a Saints game. The overall fit was great and I loved the fun big sleeves. Would recommend for a casual look!

Overall this sweater was nice, soft, and very cozy - I usually wear a size M and RTR suggested an XL - the garment was large but not too large, although I probably would have been comfortable in a L. Cute, but cut was a little flared for my taste. Would recommend, though!
Oversized fit , and it's a bit short but very cute and comfortable. I got a lot of compliments from people when I wore it. Pairs well with jeans.

Love this beautiful dress. It's a Christmas green color! I wore this to work, church, and brunch. Accessorizing is a must. It's a polished piece but you can change the look of it with your accessories. A leather jacket, chain belt, and black booties can make it edgy, and as you see in my pic: nude skinny belt and a brooch make it sophisticated and polished.

I rented this for work. I wore it on the day of one our holiday parties, and I got compliments that the color was "festive." Overall though, I didn't love the dress. I thought it looked a little plain on its own (hence the scarf) and found the material too stiff for how fitted it is.
Comfortable and warm enough to wear to work in the winter. Appreciated the high neckline for work.

links_reviews_title: Fit well but the zipper can get stuck on the fabric
links_reviews_text: Fit well but the zipper can get stuck on the fabric

links_reviews_title: I have a size 6 top and size 8 hips - too tight in the hips but fit perfectly on top -
links_reviews_text: Tight in the hips, fit perfectly for 36B on top. Hit below the knee for 5'4

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, but my chest did not fit comfortably. Need to size up to breath in this dress!

links_reviews_text: Great fit. Nice color

Color is beautiful and the style is nice, but it was too long on me (5' 3"). It hit well below the knee. Fabric is thinner than I expected (medium weight, no lining) and has good stretch. The size 2 was too tight for me, but I am not trying the size 4 because of the length. Disappointed - would be lovely on a taller person!

links_reviews_title: Power dress stunned at an industry mixer
links_reviews_text: Love. Love. Love. This dress is polished, professional, and cuts a beautiful body line.
