I will order it again one size up...I had to wear multiple spanx to get it to zip and a slip to obscure the shorts/cami lines. I wore it anyway because it was so beautiful. I made some great connections at the event and the power dress helped to underscore that I am an expert in my field. (Paired with grey tights & boots, orange see by chloe coat, and gold / mother of pearl statement necklace.)

Rented this for work and holiday party. Loads of compliments and fit me super well! May run small on some people. Also no slit at the bottom, and not much stretch, so it feels a little tight around the knees. Loved and will absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, brand new, but very tight in the hips. It's more body con for a hippier person.
links_reviews_text: I think this would be great for a less curvy person. The hips are a little tight, so maybe size up? It definitely did not fit like a shift dress.

links_reviews_title: Runs at LEAST one size small! Order up.
links_reviews_text: Nice dress - well made. Wish I could have worn it.

links_reviews_title: cute dress, but not for me
links_reviews_text: loved the style and color - great for a holiday party, but it was too tight in the hips/stomach/thighs for me to be comfortable

links_reviews_title: The best skirt to twirl in
links_reviews_text: I had so much fun with this piece. I paired it with a black turtleneck, leather jacket and black knee high boots. There is a tie that is adjustable if you want the waist looser or tighter.

links_reviews_title: business professional.. but make it fashion
links_reviews_text: This skirt was perfect for a business professional convention! I'm 5'4" 125 lbs and the xs fit perfectly. I got so many compliments all day and felt so confident in it! Will absolutely rent again.
At 5'1" this was almost a maxi on me. I like that it's adjustable and flowy. Nothing special. But it'll do for a day at work.
I wore thin leggings under this because it can open up quite a bit when walking or sitting certain ways. But it was cute and different.
Fits more ankle length on me because I'm petite. Wrap skirt stays in place all day, good for work. I forgot to take a mirror pic but pairs well for a warmer winter day as pictured.
Love this skirt, it's perfect for a professional work day or even a weekend outfit. Super flowy if and comfortable. Got so many compliments on the style/ print.

links_reviews_title: Easy piece to wear for work, the fabric was really nice, and it moved beautifully.
links_reviews_text: Great/easy piece for work. Easily transitioned from work to after-work events. Super comfortable and adjustable.

Love the asymmetry and the pattern is so chic. Light weight and looked better than you can see in this picture. Loved it with my high black cowboy boots. If you're pretty modest like me, don't wear on a windy day! Would rent again for sure though.
True wrap skirt! Easy to wear and very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Fun skirt, semi- difficult to wrap
links_reviews_text: I wasn't really sure how to make this look right. Wore it once for a night out but it wasn't flattering enough to keep

links_reviews_title: Stylish skirt with fun geometric pattern
links_reviews_text: Choose this for a holiday party. Pairs great with black tops, can be worn with heels, flats or boots. Definitely can be worn to work as well. Material is thin & silky feeling, and lined. Will definitely be renting this one again...many uses.

I wore this to work and while I love it and it's the perfect length, I just had to be aware of how I sat and making sure it was falling the way it needed to to not flash people. But that's just his wrap skirts are. It really is a great and flattering skirt. Perfect length for us taller girls.
Love this skirt! Really fun asymmetrical hem and stylish design. Easy to wear and didn't flap wide open to flash the world as I walked. Almost considered buying it...well worth it!
I didn't wear this skirt, I found both the pattern and style of the skirt to be very unflattering when tried on.

links_reviews_title: kind of a pain to tie
links_reviews_text: It's a cute skirt, just difficult to throw on because of the wraparound tie.
had a hard time keeping the wrap looking nice all day because it was a blousey material... it laid really nice, but it made the sash move throughout the day

links_reviews_title: I wore this with a black turtleneck bodysuit
links_reviews_text: The belting was weird, but pretty skirt. I received many compliments on it. It would have been amazing if the tie didn't ride up my back
LOVE LOVE LOVE this skirt!! Such a great piece for work and a night out!! This is a wrap skirt so sizing was not an issue!
I had to refrain from wearing this skirt every day. The draping is gorgeous and it was so easy to style. I felt polished and professional without having to try at all. Definitely renting this again!

links_reviews_title: Great, versatile skirt for work or date night!
links_reviews_text: This skirt is very flattering and fit true to size. The pattern and asymmetrical hemline are fun and make for a great going out skirt with a crop top and heels, but the neutral colors also make it a perfect work skirt with boots and a turtleneck. So many compliments, I ended up buying this item!
A cute-classy skirt and it was the perfect length!
The colors were just fine not wonderful.

I loved this skirt. It is long but is great with tall boots. I wore it to work and received compliments. It is light fabric. The waist is a bit constricting because it has to be tied tight enough to not unravel. But that is how wrap around skirts are. Would rent it again.

Absolutely loved this skirt and am considering buying it! In most brands I usually wear a size S but I went with the RTR recommendation for a M and it fit well. This is a wrap skirt that ties so there's a lot of sizing flexibility as you fit it to your own waist. Do keep in mind because it's a wrap there can be a slit when sitting etc. I loved the asymmetrical hem and overall flowiness of the skirt. I'm 5'4 and it was tea length, below the knee but not long. Such a great item!
A little nervous it would fall off it I didn't tie it correctly but it worked out

I thought that the material of the cloth was itchy but IT WAS NOT!! I loved that it is warm and I do not need to layer that much (just this and a winter coat) in Lapland, Finland (we went on first week of March). Love the colors too! Would definitely rent this again next winter!

links_reviews_title: For cold winter days, this oversized sweater feels amazing

links_reviews_text: I wore to work with leggings and to the knee boots. The sweater had plenty of room for my bump (23 weeks pregnant). Still long enough to go to my thighs. Had room in the stomach if I wanted to rent again in the next couple of weeks. If not pregnant it would be a loose, boxy fit. Runs on the larger side. I found the sweater to be very warm. Also slightly itchy -- I wore a camisole underneath.
A little long and loose in the shoulders, but a cute and cozy winter sweater. Got lots of compliments!
You can definitely wear this as a sweater dress with leggings - it's oversized and looks super cute. Very warm. If you're between two sizes, size down - I could've gone for a medium in this.
I was almost TOO hot in this! Great for being outside but maybe almost overly toasty for being in a warm space inside for long. Loved the look, but just a heads up it was a tiny bit itchy.
Love this sweater! So cozy and comfortable! Perfect for the weekend. It definitely runs large, I'm short so a Small could basically be worn as a sweater dress but it's so comfy I don't mind!

links_reviews_title: This is definitely not a dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear as a dress as seen on the model. However, I am about 5'3 and this was not a dress on me. Way too short to appropriate, I even tried it with thighs and still wasn't feeling it. Could be cute with leggings or skinny jeans if that's the look you're wanting but I'm returning this without wearing it as I was looking for a sweater dress
Too large in size. Please order size down.

links_reviews_title: Was simply too large for it to look good. Felt a bit frumpy but cute design and good quality
links_reviews_text: Was simply too large for it to look good. Felt a bit frumpy but cute design and good quality

links_reviews_title: No event...just everyday as I had marked.
links_reviews_text: Super soft and comfortable. I'm also tall and it wasn't too short on me.

The color and knit was wonderful but it was huge on me. The sleeves were long and because the knit was so thick, I wasn't able to roll them up. In terms of length: it went down to my knees! I was hoping to wear it as a big sweater with leggings and boots, but it was just goofy and gigantic. Was so disappointed.

All other reviews say to size down, but I'm pregnant so I didn't want to and this sweater was huge. Normally I don't mind an oversized sweater but the sleeves were so long for me that I couldn't wear it.

The style is meant to be big, comfy and slouchy but my usual size medium had me drowning in fabric. It is cute and very cozy (not scratchy at all) but the neck was a bit stretched out so the mock neck drooped in a way that was a little slovenly. Size down maybe even 2 sizes! I think an XS would have been the best fit for me.

I saw other reviews that this sweater ran big, I knew I should be renting a medium but only a large was available. Itwasn't just the length and breadth of the sweater. More strange was the fit in the armpits of that makes sense, they hung about 6 inches below my actual armpit. On a positive, the color blocking is very cute, the color that looks red in the photo is more of a very bright fuchsia, so pretty. So rent this maybe two sizes below normal!!
Soft and comfy fit

links_reviews_title: Not long enough to be a dress, cute as an oversized sweater
links_reviews_text: The sweater is very cute but I'm 5'1 and cannot wear it as a dress even with tights. It's roomy and very cute but needed to be worn with pants.
This was a size twelve which I tried on over my sweats. It was comically enormous!

Definitely a fashion-forward/ "I want to look interesting today" kind of dress. Resisted the urge to belt it, because then you lose the whole point of the dress, the seams and asymmetrical hem. Super comfy, good rental that I would never buy.

links_reviews_title: Super cute. My boss actually called it out actively. Great fit!

links_reviews_text: I liked the high/normal waist on these jeans and the length was good. They were a nice dark black. However, they were just too tight all the way down for comfort. I might try and size up the next time and see if that helps.

More of a chino than a denim, good stretch to make them comfortable, but also resulted in the high waist sliding down so they did require frequent readjustments (aka had to hike them back up). That did not stop me from wearing them several times! Overall very flattering

links_reviews_title: These fit great around my low hips and bum, but stretched out/were loose around my waist.
links_reviews_text: Dark color, knees didn't sag, but stretched out around waist.

links_reviews_title: Dark jeans with true high waist fit my thicker legs well
links_reviews_text: I went a size up and I'm glad I did. I always struggle with finding the right jeans for my body since I have short, thicker legs. The high waist was a bit too big but a smaller size would have prevented me from fully putting on the jeans. If you don't have bigger legs/hips then it might be considered true to size? Very black, very tight around the ankles which I liked. Perfect for tucking things in (wore a belt and the larger waist didn't bother me). Considering purchasing these from the comp
Perfect fit at waist, right under belly button. Slightly tight around calves. Overall love them though.

These are a great pair of true black jeans that seem a little dressier because they're not the classic thick denim material. Perfect for work or weekends I've been getting a lot of wear out of them. I do find that they run big, I'm a true 30 and will size down to a 29 the next time I rent them, they're a little big in the waist and hips (I'm an hourglass so pants being big in the hips isn't usually a problem for me). They also stretch out after a wear or two so I would probably recommend sizing down.

I found these to be comfortable and stylish and the perfect length for my size of 5â2. I think they would wear more like crop pants on a taller person. They were nice but after a few hours starting to fall down because they stretched out.

Really liked these. Looked sleek for work, but pretty comfy considering they are right jeans. Waistband had some stretch in it, just wished they were a bit longer to cover my ankle gap. Would rent again!

The waist fit great, length was great, but it didn't seem the designers took into account the circumference of calves and thighs might go up as the waist size goes up. Especially the calves! And I don't have large calves either. Made my legs look like sausages in too tight of casing. Disappointed because they could have been perfect.
Not as high waisted as expected, but the waist fit perfectly and they didn't get baggy in the knees as the day went on (hard to find!)
I love the pants, they are very skinny on the ankles so its perfect to wear with booties. They also fit really well around the glute area, the pockets really enhance it.
Way too small. Couldn't wear
Better for straight body types. Curvy girls avoid. Fit my hips and thighs but major gap at lower back/waist. Nice quality though
high waisted and very comfy! Love the way they fit
I normally wear 26 but the site suggested 27. They fit in the hips but way too big in the waist. I was still able to wear them though. I'll try my normal size next time. Perfect length
Perfectly fine if you are looking for low rise skinny jeans. I do not recall if that is in the description, but if you are like me and prefer a high rise, pass on these jeans.
Runs small
I am usually a size 14 but I was happy these had a little bit of stretch. They were a snug fit but kept everything in and loved that they were high waisted.

links_reviews_title: Wore for work. Was a solid basic piece.
links_reviews_text: Liked the shirt well enough, nothing overly special. Definitely wear a camisole underneath for work.
Cute but nothing special

links_reviews_title: Good everyday or work blouse. Little baggy

links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful printed silk! It's a little low cut worn with the buttons open, and the neck didn't always lie flat. Didn't stop me from wearing it a few times!

Loved this blouse. Wore it to my BF's parents house and it was perfect. the sleeves are pretty big and overall its like a larger blouse but tucks nicely into a pair of high wasted jeans. I didn't button up the front and it was not revealing at all
Lovely fabric. Nice deep navy. Too tight across chest
Looser fitting top; fairly busty when unbuttoned, but can be buttoned up. Beautiful fabric, and I loved the subtle flower details.
It was humongous! I felt like I was wearing a trapeze tent. And it was weird that the back had so much draping material. It made me look overweight.

links_reviews_title: Warm but too big for work
links_reviews_text: This was warm, comfy and cozy. However it was a little too much with the extra fabric and bulk for work etc. I think this really only works for lounging.

The arms were a little snug and the body of the sweater was very flowy. I think a size smaller would have been better in the body, but then the arms would have been very tight. It wasn't very flattering and very heavy.

It was very, very heavy and extremely large, it was so heavy it wouldn't stay up on my shoulders. It is cut in a big circle and was a whole lot of heavy knit. The weight of it made it very uncomfortable. Never wore.
I cannot figure out redone's sizing. Usually I find their items to run small, but these actually ran large.

links_reviews_title: Suggested a size up from my normal size
links_reviews_text: RTR suggested size 25 because my normal 24 was not available and the 25 was slightly too big and were not flattering IMO. Will try to rent when the 24 is available. Otherwise they were great quality.

These jeans are perfect! I'm almost always a 26 and these fit, but I think I could also fit a 25 as they're a little lose in the hips and butt. If you like the more relaxed fit I would go with your normal size.
LOVEEEEEEE these so much. They're so comfortable and flattering!!! Definitely going to be keeping them for a while!
I literally don't know why I haven't just purchased these jeans yet- they're my favorite jeans I've ever put on my body and it's a mistake not to rent them!

These jeans are perfect. I almost always wear super skinny jeans because I have big hips and anything else is just unflattering. Even though these are almost a "girlfriend" fit, they are SO flattering. And so comfortable too!! I will be renting again for sure

links_reviews_title: Great high waist and light wash
links_reviews_text: The buttons instead of zipper was less than ideal but LOVED these jeans! I'm between 27 and 28 and the 27 fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Great quality and color, but, should have known I was too short for a 26R!
links_reviews_text: Cute high waist, nice color, great material and the seams are great (I mean it's re/done- all of their denim is flawless). I was impatient and instead of waiting for my size I went with a 26R! It was a bit big in the waist and a tad too long for me. But great jeans!
I really love these jeans - very comfortable while still looking fitted and cute. I tend to be between a 25-26 in jeans depending on the brand but I found the 25 was perfect
Flattering, and such a perfect fit. The jeans I've been looking for for my entire life. I feel like these are straight out of the 90s but hits me in all the right places!

links_reviews_title: The fit was a tad too large. They were very comfy and I loved the color.

links_reviews_text: I want to wear these pants everyday. They are amazing and super comfortable.
Love the color. Not as high waisted as I expected, but still wore there multiple times over the course of a week! Many compliments.
Fits so well and perfect!
I read some reviews and thought it'd be ok to size up but it was huge around the waist!! Definitely should've gotten a 25. For reference, I'm a 26 in Paige and a 27 was swimming on me,

links_reviews_title: Great fit but stretched out, easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Loved these but had to wash after each wear. I got the size 26 and these are perfect for me. Wore these jeans 3x a week
My size wasn't available so I sized up - they were a bit big but I was able to get away with them. These are sooo cute and I will probably be keeping these for a while !
Wore these everyday for almost 2 weeks straight. Great fit and quality.

links_reviews_title: High quality perfect jeans. Do not want to send back.
links_reviews_text: So comfortable, amazing quality. Thinking about purchasing!

links_reviews_title: Waist was oddly large for the rest of the pant
links_reviews_text: Nice high waisted jeans jut too big in the waist. They fit perfectly everywhere else.

This is the second pair of Re/Done I've rented and I'm obsessed. They are such good quality and feel like your favorite pair of jeans that you've had in your closet forever. They're flattering and comfy. I'm a 29 with a butt and thighs and they fit great. They might be ankle length on someone tall, my legs are short and I thought the length was perfect for winter denim. I'll definitely rent again and maybe even buy.

Absolutely in love with these jeans! I rented them in the 31 but was losing weight (yay!) and swapped them for the 30! They are super flattering, really nice quality and they don't stretch out throughout the day.
perfect fit
Nice quality jean with good stretch. A little heavier weight than average. The fit was fine, but nothing incredible on me. Worth a try though as the quality is great!
Absolutely loved these jeans!!!!! SO comfortable, SO cool. Do not hesitate to rent. For reference, I wear size 27 in Madewell jeans, and these in a size 28 worked perfectly.
I wore these SO. MANY. TIMES! They were super comfortable and feel perfect on my 5'3" frame. I loved how slimming they looked. Can't wait to rent these again.
Loved these jeans. Held everything in place and fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans but way too big
links_reviews_text: The jeans are really comfortable and the cut is nice but they are soo stretchy that they run big. I had to keep pulling them up throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and fashionable for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: They fit me snug even on the bloated days. Not to mention, they make my butt look amazing!
This fit perfect. I couldn't ask for better. I want to own these!

Really comfortable, but they stretch out A LOT!! When I first put them on I thought they were tight but by the time I left my house they got great. Wore them a second time and they were kind of getting baggy. Would have been curious to know if the 27 would have fit. Great jeans though!

I'm very short, and had to cuff these pants. I wore them with wedges and they looked great. These pants seem ideal for every size, and shape. They seem to fit tall, average, and short gals, just in a different yet flattering way. They're also super comfortable.
These jeans were too tight to wear even though I sized up

These jeans are so great - comfortable, flattering, and the wash is beautiful. I read the reviews carefully and sized down so they fit beautifully. They have really good stretch but still hold their structure, great for curvy ladies like myself.

As an apple body shape, itâs hard to find jeans that fit my legs, bottom and waist equally. Most jeans are either too small on my waist but perfect on my legs or bottom. Or vice versa. These jeans are that perfect fit, not too tight on my waist and fit just right on my legs and bottom! highly recommend
These jeans have a lot of stretch. I found on my frame they stretched out a lot through out the day. If you are curvy I think these would work well.
These jeans are everything. They lift your butt, and the waist fits true to size. Button fly helps to flatten the tummy, just a great fitting pair of jeans. Love love love
Runs large. Selected 30R would get a 28R.

links_reviews_title: I love them but they are big.
links_reviews_text: Huge with the stretch, designers should size down when they put that much stretch in to a garment. I should have rented a 25 at least

These are the perfect casual Friday denim! No destressing and just the right amount of snugness to look neat, but still professional. I wear a 28 in all Madewell jeans - I find these to fit a bit looser than those, but I'm glad I didn't size down.
Great addition to any outfit. It's light though so I wore a sweater underneath.

links_reviews_title: Exactly what I was hoping for!
links_reviews_text: This jacket fit perfect and was exactly as expected!
Great jacket to put with anything to complete a great casual look !
Frat casual jacket. Typical of Madewell, the material is great quality. It has a bit of stiffness to it so it doesn't wrinkle with wear. Fit was perfect.

This jacket was very lightweight and perfect to throw on for a fall event. I really enjoyed the fabric. It was a little tight through the sleeves/chest area, though. I probably wouldn't have wanted to size up, but it's just something to be aware of. Overall, loved this jacket!
This jacket is great for everyday wear. I got a size up so it would fit over a sweater but it still felt a little tight in the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: very cute and comfortable coat, got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Love this coat and am thinking about purchasing it. Traveled in it and it was very comfortable, then went out in it and got a lot of compliments. Love

links_reviews_title: This jacket instantly makes a casual outfit more polished.
links_reviews_text: This jacket instantly makes a casual outfit more polished.
Perfect jacket

The perfect fall jacket! After wearing it every day for a week, I finally bought it. Great pockets, great color, great texture. It does run a bit snug though. I'm glad I sized up. If you want to wear a sweater or thicker top, definitely consider doing the same!
Loved the style of this jacket but runs small. Particularly in the shoulders and hips. Wore but was a little uncomfortable . Liked the functionality of all the pockets! Will rent again in a small!
Boxy. Gives no wait or figure. Nothing special about it.
I wore as a base layer for a weekend camping trip with temps from 35 - 65 degrees! Was a perfect layering piece! It did great on a hike and I felt cute :)
Usually a S/M, got the L and it was great
I wear XS almost on eveything, but this top is so tight i should had ordered S or even M. I love its snake print and breathable material its a good quality top. Will rent again in bigger size.
This is better suited for thermal wear. I was thinking it would work for fitness but quite the opposite it's very warning! Cute and flattering but made to keep warm would be good under snowsuit
Cute athleisure top. Nothing special. Runs VERY Small. Size up.

I loved wearing this so much!! It was warm enough for 30 degree weather in NYC. One key feature were the buttons - usually these jackets only have one clasp but this has buttons all the way up. If you're in between sizes you could size down but it is true to size if you're going to layer!
Warm enough for 35-45 degrees, roomy enough for a thick sweater underneath.
This coat fits great and is warm. It is sooo soft. The buttons do not stay buttoned well- they pop as soon as any pressure is on them.
I kept petting myself. It's so warm--I wore this with a sweater in 30 degree weather and was fine!
Rented this for a weekend away. LOVE this coat. It is so soft and chic, I felt like a million dollars in it. The color is beautiful. Highly recommend!!
SO cozy and the blue makes it better than black.
Nice coat for cool weather day to day
Super fun way to make any outfit look instantly more put together, the color is gorgeous and it is SO soft!
Love the pattern of this sweater and it was made with nice material that kept me warm. Would definitely rent again.
Loved this! It's very soft and a perfect slim but not tight fit. Very well made. Recommended!!

As other reviewers suggested I sized up to an M (normally a S for me) and it fit perfectly. It's a nice apres ski look and super high quality not itchy. Wore for work with pants and jeans for hanging out. Very simple.
Super cute sweater. Not bulky.

Winter winner! This sweater is snug and chic and oh so soft. Looks much better in person and can be worn with or without a turtle. Runs a bit snug, especially in the arms, so size up if you're layering.

links_reviews_title: Wintry sweater great for the holidays or apres ski
links_reviews_text: Merino wool -- so nice and warm
Easy to wear and true to size (for designer). Good for everyday but not all that special
Was super cute and comfortable
Not the greatest pic, but you get the sense of the design. It was warm and stylish. I wore it on vacation in Iceland, design felt slightly Icelandic so I thought it worked well.

links_reviews_title: Great for working from home, would be more casual than I'd wear to the office.
links_reviews_text: I sized up and it was a nice relaxed fit, though I felt like the larger size combined with the pattern made me look bigger than I am. Comfortable sweater, warm but not too hot and not itchy.
Would have bought if it wasn't dry clean only. Loved it! Does run a bit small.

links_reviews_title: Quality superb, well cut sweater. Excellent materials. Soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_text: Not a Wow sweater, Just comfortable on a cold day.

The fit on this was oddly clingy for a sweater. Meaning, it showed each little lump and roll, even though the overall fit was not tight. It was comfortable and looked better with a zipped turtleneck (so you get the v-shape of a collar coming out at top). I wore it to work, then wore it skiing. It worked better for skiing than professional wear. :)

Just ok. I wore this with black jeans for a casual day at work. Though the sweater is pretty, nothing special about it. Nice that it is more form fitting though so it doesn't appear as sloppy as other sweaters can look.
SO warm and comfy and was a great fit. Does run small - so go up a size!
This sweater is exceptionally soft. Overall it is thin (not bulky) but is very warm. It was effortless to pair with black jeans and booties for a put together look.
Snug fit sweater. Warm and flattering with bright colored pants.
Good sweater to dress up or down. Didn't strike me as anything special, but I wore it a number of times.
The material is nice and cozy. It's warm but not super thick. Cool pattern. I will wear this a few times before I send it back for sure.
This sweater was beautiful and SO COMFY! I got tons of compliments on it and would definitely rent again
Nice well made, warm, flattering sweater. Does run a little small so size up if between sizes.

I love this sweater, it is nice and thick without being chunky. It does run extremely small - the model in the picture had to have been wearing a large for it to have been that loose on her. The sweater was snug on me, but I thought it went well with jeans for a casual Friday at work.

links_reviews_title: It is a great thick sweater, but it is snug.
links_reviews_text: For a medium it fits like a small or extra small.
Great sweater. Very soft and very warm.
Paired with black jeans and booties.

Really well made shirt - heavy duty knit that didn't stretch and get baggy throughout the day. Nice and warm for my chilly New England vacation. And beautiful to wear - nice for sightseeing but not overly dressy or casual like a sweatshirt would be. Great rental.
Sweater is so cute but runs narrow in the shoulders so be aware of that when determining what size would fit. I'm usually a small but a medium would have fit me better.

Since my fit is "busty" I went up a size and I planned to wear for weekend with jeans and then "double dip" with grey slacks for work to maximize my rentals Worked well for both Neck is a touch loose - Nice quality - soft and not itchy

Awesome sweater! I rented XS which is my usual size. It was fine (I wore it all day) but next time I rent (I'll be getting this one again) I'll go up a size because I prefer a sweater to be a bit less fitted and roomier for layering. I was also skeptical of it given the RTR details say 100% polyester but it isn't.. it was a blend of more natural materials. Fabric felt great.
I got it for work, it's high quality, fits well but I felt like I was on a ski trip. If I was headed to aspen for the winter, I may rent again but not for every day use
Wore this to an Australian themed party, on a date, to a formal dance recital, to work etc. loved this piece

links_reviews_title: Basic black skirt but STATIC CITY

links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this slinky skirt, but it was both too big in the waist and the asymmetric seam hit my body at an awkward spot, looking like an aggressively bad underwear line. Also I should have known better than to try and wear it in a Chicago winter - the static in tights and dry cold weather made it a stage 5 clinger.

links_reviews_title: Wore multiple times, styled various ways
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt to a holiday party with a sweater, to a club with a T-shirt, and to Christmas Eve mass with a body suit & jacket. It's so versatile, and so comfortable. Length & waist both fit perfectly as well. I would absolutely rent this again.
This is the perfect silk skirt!! Beautiful material and the perfect length for me being a short girl. I'm sure it's very versatile height-wise since it has an asymmetrical hem. Very classy.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but needed a lot of steaming
links_reviews_text: I was the lucky first person to wear my skirt! The material and bias cut are stunning but the piece was a bit finicky. Several things to note: I had to wear spanx under it to avoid panty line showing, I spent 10 min steaming the wrinkles out of it in the morning, and the seam was a bit awkward around my hips and didnât totally âlay downâ against my hip. If youâre shorter than 5â3â this is probably not going to work for you... itâs longer than expected and hit about 4â above the ground for me.
Love the shape, but it was a bit big. The elastic waist was stretched, so might just be due to overuse.

So sad to return this skirt. Wore it with a turtleneck and booties. Wore it with a sweater and sandals. Wore it with a vintage tee tied with a leather jacket and Converse. You can literally style this any way. It runs a taaaaad large but I'd stick with your usual size. I have bigger thighs and booty, and a smaller waist and the Medium is great. I've rented this 3 times now!
This skirt is exactly like it's described. It's versatile and adorable. Want to buy.

I tried this on late at night- not a good idea. It's a great basic that matches almost everything in my wardrobe. So, perfect for a vacation. I still don't like the lumpy stitching on the side of the right hip, but it can be worked around. Good solid choice and flattering.
I've got big hips. I typically wear an 8/10 in jeans. Couldn't even get this skirt on

links_reviews_title: Huge and you must be very tall to wear
links_reviews_text: These pants are soooo loooong

links_reviews_title: Levi's are always a solid choice.
links_reviews_text: Loved these jeans - perfect length to pair with mid-calf booties. I'm 5'4" 126lbs and my normal size 26 was perfect.

I'm not use to Levi's being this forgiving! I feel like these pants could be sisterhood of the traveling pants...look good on everyone. I'm usually a 27 and I could probably size down one in these for a going out look, but for everyday this size is comfortable on me. They flare a bit more than I'm used to but it's fun.
Love love love these jeans! They're my favorite from RTR yet. Wore these so many times and got a ton of compliments. The fit is so comfortable and stylish!

links_reviews_title: Loved them so much I bought them!
links_reviews_text: These jeans are absolutely perfect! They hug you in, give you a great booty, and - best of all - are so comfortable! I took my normal size, knowing that they would have little-to-no give. At 5'2", they are a tad long for flats/jeans so I will mostly wear with heels. You need to try these!
Not flattering. Waist is way too big
Very stiff. Tight in waist. Legs wide. Do not recommend at all

links_reviews_title: High rise that tucks you in.
links_reviews_text: Loved these jeans so much I'm buying them. They are a little tight on first wear, but then morph into the most comfortable pair of pants. The high rise holds it's shape and you in with it.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, just ran too small
links_reviews_text: Length is perfect for those on the shorter side with a cute kick flare. I found these to run super small, so unfortunately couldn't wear. It didn't seem like the thighs and waist were proportional size-wise. Thighs fit me, but couldn't get them buttoned up. I'll rent again and size up at least one size.

links_reviews_title: These are so great!! Super comfy and really cute. only note is there is no zipper its buttons.
links_reviews_text: Cropped and perfectly high wasted I LOVE them!!!

links_reviews_title: Not as forgiving as others have said
links_reviews_text: The 25 was all that was available so I decided to take the chance - I do wear a 25 in many brands and while Levi's usually run small others said these didn't. I could get into them, but they were too small to wear, and they are on the softer side but don't have stretch. I might have worn them outto a club or something, but too tight for normal sitting and daytime wear. I also found them to be a bit shorter than I would have liked. Very cool cut, though, so I can't wait to try a size up.

links_reviews_title: Stylish and comfortable. True to size.
links_reviews_text: Stylish. Cute fit that's true to size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect pair of jeans to switch things up a bit from typical style. Loved so much I bought them!
links_reviews_text: Stiff fit, but cut just right for a flattering look.
Ran small - I have some size 26 Levi's that are pretty tight but this was a 27 and could barely breathe. Looked great though- I'd size up and wear again

links_reviews_title: Would definitely buy in the correct size!
links_reviews_text: I sized up due to other's reviews but turns out, I didn't need to and they were too big on me in this size. They are pretty true to size. They are such a great jean though and I got many compliments every time I wore.

I know this might be silly, but to me these pants were totally unwearable because they have a ton of tiny buttons instead of a zipper. And I know a lot of jeans have buttons, but these were especially small and especially numerous. I struggled to button them all, and not because they were too tight on me. I couldn't imagine wearing them and having to redo the buttons every time I went to the bathroom!! If this doesn't bother you - they are very cute and flattering.

TTS in general but for Levi's a little big, much easier to get into than my other 29 Levi's. They have a little bit of give but they're sturdy too. They hold their shape which makes them flattering. I have thick legs and if these didn't hold a shape they wouldn't be flattering at all. They're not super wide leg especially with my thick legs I would almost call them a straight jean with a kick flare, not tight at knees. trendy but look sophisticated. I bought them. Def recommend.

Loved these so much that I will likely purchase! They are so high waisted that I'd hate to fly in them or wear for an extended time while sitting. But, I loved wearing these out for events and errands!
Very cute and the color is amazing. Don't wear on a rainy day bc the water left water marks even when it dries! But it was very cute a little large in the chest for me!

Loved the color and style - the material literally showed every single little sweat droplet lol - I am not a sweaty person, but I had a little sweat under my arms and it would NOT dry. Don't get this if you sweat
I was hesitant to rent because I'm short and things like these tend to make me feel shorter and wider but it was so flattering! Perfect for a day in the office and a happy hour / dinner afterwards!
Loved this shirt! The structure was unique, such a fun color. Top runs large, I would size down

links_reviews_title: Flowy dream but a bit too loose
links_reviews_text: Fit was a bit loose and clasp in the front kept coming undone, but if your going to something where you don't have to move around a lot it's super chic and I got lots of compliments even though it was a bit big for a petite frame.

Loved this shirt! Fits loose for this brand and the size. Sleeves are cumbersome if your doing lots of washing or cooking. Would recommend for work. Keep in mind the material shows EVERYTHING. A simple walk to the train and my sweat showed instantly, and beware of any liquids, they immediately mark the fabric.

Got this to wear on Thanksgiving. Thought the loose and flowy style would hide my food baby after dinner and it did! I was scared it would be staticky but it wasn't at all. The sleeves were a little annoying because they were so flowy but nothing too bad. I will say i sprayed myself with perfume and I guess it was oil based because it left some spots on the shirt, so be careful with that. Overall loved it!

Gorg fall color, nice silky fabric, perfect loose size for eating! Sleeves are sooooo fun but a little annoying when trying to get food have to be careful they dont dip in anything! Loved wearing this for the holiday!
I'm normally a medium in this brand but this runs large. I had to wear black tank under it because of deep V. I would rent again in a small.

This top was super cute but its big. I rented a small but it was still too flowy and the sleeves will definitely go all over the place. I wore this twice to work events and it was cute at first but had a lot of static and then it started sticking to my body.
This top was perfect for being something I have never seen before, just my style. It was so flowy and comfortable for all-day work wear.
This shirt was sooo cute but came with a huge stain in the front. Sad. Would be perfect for work to drinks.
very roomy! I am 5'3" and have a big chest, and it was very flattering on me
Runs a bit large through the chest, but overall a great top! Lots of compliments!
Love the look and feel of this blouse. Got lots of compliments.
Super comfortable! Love the high waisted
Loved these... they're not compression up top but still a nice fit!

links_reviews_title: I want to live in these!
links_reviews_text: I love this designer so much for my chill weekend looks and travel. They are so cute and can be dressed up or down! My only struggle is that I'm tall so they are a little shorter than I usually like.
They do stretch a bit in the waist after wearing. But they are so fun and classy. Wore yo lounge around on Christmas Day too. I actually purchased these.
High waisted fit. Comfortable, modern, and stylish. Loved renting this piece!

links_reviews_title: merry + bright ! dressed these up for the holiday!
links_reviews_text: fit true to size. comfy, shiny and bright !!!
sometimes this style bunches in weird ways, these were great!
Size down if you want to look good. I ordered a large because I wanted to be comfortable but it just showed all my flaws.. ugh
Wore these for casual Christmas wear. Very comfortable, and a nice vibrant red. I could be seen hiking through the woods. Great Legging
I loved these leggings--they are a fun pop of color, and the fit/high waist felt great on my postpartum tummy.

links_reviews_title: Used for an Apres Ski Party outfit. Very cute!
links_reviews_text: MR fit great, LR was way, way to big
Loved these! They looked so nice and I got so many compliments!
Super comfy, cute and breathes well! The fit is as expected. The waist stays nicely secure, even if the rest stretches out a little through the day.
I rented these to wear on Christmas so I could be comfortable and festive. Great choice! Loved the fit although not a full length legging on me because I'm tall.
This fit great!! True to size fit. I wore these to the airport on my return flight home for vacation.
LOVED THESE! They were comfortable & durable. The only problem I had was that, if you workout in them, they definitely show your sweat! I received a ton of compliments on these.

I rented this top for work and it did the job. It was easy to wear and accessorize, but it didn't wow me. I couldn't decide if I liked the material or if it felt cheap. Worth renting, but not something I'd purchase.

This shirt was super cute and fit great. I got tons of compliments at work. It's soft and comfy. Great everyday wear or at work!! I did wear a lace tank underneath because I'm a teacher and it would have been too low cut without.
Thick fabric, bulky fit even though it's a wrap! Looked terrible on me. Didn't wear it.

Cute top, gorgeous mocha color. But the waist cut way too high as I am 5'11". It was not comfortable to wear for that single reason. But I am sure people normal height would not have that problem. I wish RTR would offer tall sizes...

links_reviews_title: I wore this to several types of events, dressed up as well as down.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this top. Very sophisticated even when dressed down.
none

links_reviews_title: I rented this for everyday but I did not end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: This ran large on me, I'd order a size down. It was also not a shiny as expected, more of a matte material.
Great color and soft fabric

This top really stands out and is a great work to evening option, but the crease in the wrap part needs improvement. The inside of the shirt was always showing through and I kept having to refold it. Kind of takes away from the look
Pros: came with the tags on, nice thick material, pretty color Cons: felt a little low cut, was too high waisted for me...better for gals with a short torso, felt like I was adjusting all night.

links_reviews_title: I felt classy wearing this top!
links_reviews_text: No cons! All pros!

links_reviews_title: Great comfortable stretchy fit! Easy to pair with blouse, sweater, or blazer!
links_reviews_text: True to size, great fit, very comfortable, and stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Great pants for work, comfortable fit
links_reviews_text: I find that there is a bit of fabric bunching near my knees, but this is often true for me
Very slimming and goes with anything!
I was super happy with the fit and length. It's high-waisted and flattering. Could be dressed up or down. Good staple!
Super comfy, high waisted, flattering, not too long on petites. Would buy!

links_reviews_title: Size 2 felt more like a double zero!
links_reviews_text: Might have been nice pants, if I could have gotten them over my hips! Size up for these. The pants I received were a much lighter navy than in the photo.
I loved these. This was the first item I've rented that I wore more than once, and considered purchasing.
These pants fit in the waist and butt area, but were baggy in the front.

I am 5'4 and weigh 140 lbs. I wore the size 6. The pants were flatting and I wore them several times. They were tight around the top, which is not stretch material and did cut into me a little bit by the end of the day. They are ankle length. My biggest gripe is that they appear very worn. I would order them again.
Fit is nice material nice
Loved these pants, good fit, they stretched a lot throughout the day and the side zipper dug into my hip so I had to tuck my cami in which was fine, was still really happy with them.
I'm short so I had to cuff these pants. Super comfortable and I love the side zipper.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday pant that looks and feels good!
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants. I'm normally don't like the way pants fit when they side zip but I loved these. The waist is a little higher up so they don't cut your waistline through your stomach like some lower cut pants can. The fabric is nice and decently thick, they kept me warm on winter days and nights. The blue is pretty and matches just about everything. I was really happy with them and would rent again!

These were slightly larger than expected in the legs, and tighter in the waist. The 0R was VERY faded/ worn, even the tag looked like it was turning brownish. They may work for different body types/proportions (i.e. more muscular legs and smaller waist). I have skinny legs, a butt, and my waist is probably slightly wider (straight up and down, slim).

Love these pants! Great fit ...I always have issues with pants fitting through the leg but gaping in the waist and these are tailored nicely for a good fit throughout. I'm 5'6'' and the length was perfect for me

links_reviews_title: Pants worked well for work, easily dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. The length worked with well with both booties and heels, and the legs were slim enough to wear with boots. The waistband was great because I could tuck in a thicker sweater and it didn't look bulky/awkward tucked in. It also worked well with blouses for work and paired well with blazers if the pants needed to be dressed up.
A little long for me, but they tucked easily for a better looking hemline. Great fit
Loved these pants. They fit great and I really liked the quality of the fabric. Also very flattering.
Great fit! Paired nicely with the long white blouse. Was perfect for a holiday party. Received lots of compliments.

Fit like a glove! I wore Spanx just to keep everything looking smooth, but they really do fit great and are perfect for work. Very comfy and easy to wear all day! The material isn't super thick so I probably wouldn't wear these for a chilly outdoor event, but great for the office.
Small, high waist. Liked these pants fine but they didn't hold me in at all and lost their shape after one wear. Just ok.

links_reviews_title: Great pair of work pants. Would buy and wear everyday -- but might as well rent them while I can!
links_reviews_text: Fit is tight but with a stretch
A great work pant -- high waisted, navy, tapered leg. Loose their shape a bit throughout the day but otherwise excellent. Great staple!
Comfortable and pair well. Almost bought
Good choice for work, fabric not too thick for San Diego fall. Very easy to pair with any top.

links_reviews_title: Kinda meh, I should have ordered a smaller size
links_reviews_text: I think these pants would have been much cuter if I had ordered a smaller size than I thought I needed. They fit initially but were pretty stretched out and dumpy looking by the time I got to the office.
Comfortable, stretchy, cool texture.
Fine. Not amazing fabric, but it did have a little give and it worked with many tops.
These pants fit really well and are very comfortable. High-waisted without being too snug, great for work.
These pants were great for a day in the office. Very comfortable and figure flattering.
Loved these for work. More of a high rise waist which I prefer and slim on the legs but not too tight.

These are well made, tailored and comfortable pants that look great for work. I like that they go down to and past your ankles, so I find it hard to find pants that aren't ankle pants these days. I wore them a whole bunch and will continue to rent.

links_reviews_title: I love the material but didn't love the fit in the stomach area
links_reviews_text: Nice pants but the fit in the stomach area didn't look great and made me look bigger than I am. If you rent these make sure you rent a shirt long enough to cover the tummy. Otherwise the fit is perfect

I got so many compliments on this dress. The print is fun and it's super comfortable. I'm usually a 10 and I probably could have ordered the medium, but the large fit just fine. I put a cami underneath since it's a bit low of a neck for work.
Perfect wrap dress! I loved the cut, size, and feel of this dress. It made me feel confident and happy! I would absolutely rent again!
Perfect wrap dress for work. Very comfortable material. Great length for work.

I liked this dress a lot. It was a little on the short side for me (5'9") but I wore opaque black tights and it didn't matter much anymore. It's a true wrap dress so there is room for adjustments as needed. Sleeves were nice and loose. I was comfortable all night!
Defined my waste and was super fun. I'm tall so it was a bit short, but great for a night out!
Such a fun, flattering wrap dress!!! Will be renting again!!!
Perfect in between seasons dress, and easy to go from work to plans afterwards. Very flattering and easy to wear.

This is a pretty wrap dress. It was slightly low cut on me so I needed a camisole underneath. Paired well with a blazer or leather jacket and tights. It is slightly on the shorter side so may be a little short to wear with bare legs to work.

Loved the fit of this dress! It's a true wrap dress, so there's room to make some adjustments if you need it looser or tighter. The V-Neck may be a little revealing for some, but still looks cute with a black cami underneath. A little on the short side - recommend wearing tights or spandex shorts underneath.
Very comfortable and great transitional piece. I did have to pin the top closed - but I'm also not very busty so others may have a different experience.
Paired it with tights and boots for work and it was a cute and comfortable outfit!

links_reviews_title: This dress is very pretty, so comfortable and a great feeling fabric.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. A little short... don't bend over! Wore it to a wedding in San Diego and got lots of compliments. Wore it again to church with a sweater. Very likely to rent it again in the future.
Fit perfectly. Very lightweight fabric. Would be ideal for spring or early fall
Really like this dress a lot even though wrap dresses make me anxious. The pattern and style was flattering and cute.
So flattering and fun. So many compliments. Showed some cleavage but I didn't feel like it was too much for my casual office. I think I'm gonna buy this one.
Cute and comfy for work. Runs true to size
It fit perfectly, was comfortable and was so pretty in person. May buy it.
I loved this dress. So pretty and fit well across the chest. My only concern was that it was just a tad short on me (5'8").

links_reviews_title: Pretty, autumnal floral pattern and sweet details
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear at Thanksgiving dinner, and I really enjoyed it. The print is very pretty - it's a pretty, moody floral. It is a true wrap dress, which I like on my petite pear frame. My boyfriend commented on how flattering the ruffle neckline and slightly puffed, sheer sleeves looked (very specific, so he must have really liked the look!). This is a cute everyday dress, and it worked great for my family's somewhat casual Thanksgiving meal. It wasn't too snug, and my usual XS at Madewell fit just right. This dress hit a nice length on me (5'2"), and I wasn't worried about flashing the family if I needed to bend over to get something out of the oven. This wasn't a 'wow' dress for me, but it was adorable, it was flattering, and I really liked the autumnal floral pattern. Would recommend.
Obsessed with this dress. Perfect for the holiday season. I'm normally a medium or large and went with the large. Could easily tighten the waist as it's a wrap.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy! Perfect for a client meeting.
links_reviews_text: I love Madewell and was excited to see this dress on RTR. It's a cute dress and a little more fun than a normal black work dress. Will rent again!

I was able to wear it to work, a class function and a social function. It pairs well with a black blazer, a leather jacket or a jean jacket. I wore it with tights and black boots each time. Being a wrap dress, it ran a little big but the arms were true to size.
Cute, easy dress! I did have to use double sided tape to close the chest a bit higher. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress and I got several compliments.
links_reviews_text: It's a very pretty, feminine dress with the ruffles. I'm 5'3 and wore the XXL. It fit nice and flowy, camoflaging my hips and hit just above my knee. If you've got some junk in your trunk, be aware that it may be shorter in the back.
I thought these would be cute "diamond" hoops, but they actually sit flat on the earlobe, not around, so looked a little odd. Didn't end up wearing them.
Really cute earrings, not hoops really as the circle is in the front, if that makes sense! They are bigger than I thought too.

I wasnât particularly impressed with these earrings, but they were fine. They were flimsy, and the metal got bent out of shape very easily (it wasnât hard to get them back to their correct shape, though). On the plus side, they were very light and cute enough as an understated earring to match other (maybe more statement-making) gold jewelry.
These have somewhat of an unexpected design and are super cute and versatile. I got many compliments on them and would definitely consider renting them again.

I rented this to take on a work trip to pack light. These earrings go with everything. They're small enough for a business meeting but large enough to wear for a night out. I loved the subtle sparkle also, just enough. Thinking about buying these...
Fit absolutely beautifully. Got so many compliments, perfect for a fiesta themed bridal shower.

This dress was truly amazing. Great for women with larger busts. Was thrilled it wasn't too low cut, showed just enough cleavage. Great length for short ladies. Could have worn it with flats. I'll definitely rent this again
I really loved this dress! The color were beautiful and the fit was good even for my curvy body. I paired with a belt but it has great shape without it.
Loved this dress. Felt very put together. It wasn't to tight around the waist/ribcage either, which is often an issue with structured dresses..
This was a fine dress. Would probably be pretty dressed up with strappy heels, but i wore it in the winter. Warning, it was a slightly low V!
Great piece! Wore it for an important client meeting. Very comfortable and flattering piece
Ir was a bit large but not too much! I found very nice to use it in a party or during the day! However, wear it when it's hot weather!!

links_reviews_title: Very easy to wear in a versatile style
links_reviews_text: This is a generously sized dress. I like it a lot because it's got my colors so it goes with my existing accessories. This could be dressed up. Since I'm only working from home right now I dressed it down with open toe midcalf boots and a belt. One star off because despite the great colors it didn't do much for me, but overall it is very wearable. 4 stars.

Fit true to size. A little big in the chest for me but I'm a 34A so that is nothing unusual. It definitely needs some styling to jazz it up again. I didn't get to wear it but I tried it on with black suede tall boots and a thick black belt and it was cute that way. Would look good in the spring with wedges and a lighter wide belt.

This dress did NOT work on my body -- a bummer because a lot of the other reviews were so great. I found it to be pretty shapeless, the waist was so high I couldn't wear a belt with it, and the v neck was really wide. The pattern is really pretty. Not sure if the fit issues were because it runs large (though I'm typically a 4 in J Crew) or if it was just shapeless.

Received so many compliments on this dress - I was really tempted to buy it! It fits 100% true to size and is flows on the bottom for those with curves. The print is gorgeous and the very slight bubble sleeves make the dress interesting. I never would've guessed this was J.Crew because it feels more luxurious than other things I've bought there.
Wanted this to work! But it was too loose in the waist to wear.

links_reviews_title: pretty and flowy but a bit plain.
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfy and flowy, but a bit plain. May pair with denim jacket to jazz it up a little.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Wore it to the beach and got lots of compliments. Very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I would recommend pairing with a waist belt for a flattering hourglass shape.
I have received so many compliments on it and I don't think I want to return it now. Flattering fit that can be dressed up or down.
Tried it but never wore it because it hung strangely and was large on me.
Love This dress! The fit is great and it's so flattering on my hourglass figure. Shows a bit of cleavage but nothing uncomfortable for me. Will definitely rent again.

Of the pieces I ordered, I thought this would be least favorite, but I was so wrong!! Itâs so cute, comfortable, and really just the perfect dress. I got so many compliments on it (even from strangers in the grocery store!). Highly recommend!
Such a cute dress. If you're small chested be aware it may be a little loose in the bust.
Fits true to size. Super flattering. Loved it.
fits true to size, looks professional. great for work!
I love this dress and get so many compliments on it every time I wear it! The 8 in Black Halo seems to fit me perfectly!

This was a great dress for the office but it was not stretchy and I could barely fit into it. I would size up in this dress. I really liked the slit because it has a zipper so you can control how high you'd like the slit to go. Maybe I'll rent it again in a larger size.

links_reviews_title: This dress is NOT for short people.
links_reviews_text: This is a well-made dress that I would have loved if I were 5'7". But since I'm only 5', I couldn't even wear it. Other than the length, it is true to size.
Nothing flashy. Nothing special. Just another solid option for my daily wear. They were exactly the right length for my rather short legs.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love these but they just weren't quite right
links_reviews_text: I get that these were aiming to be baggy, but the extra material right at the thighs just made them feel dowdy. Maybe I'll try in a smaller size and hope they fit ok in the waist.

These ran large. I normally wear a 33 but the 32s were not tight. Took about 5 lbs off my silhouette while feeling like I was wearing pajama pants. They are button fly but do not get the "fly blight" where you feel like the buttons will pop open. Wore them once so far uncuffed with sneakers and today dressed up a bit with slingbacks and a Kate Spade blouse
Very comfortable and a perfect fit
Soft denim with a chic slouchy look. Honestly this is probably my favorite boyfriend jean I've ever had!
I've been looking for a great pair of boyfriend jeans with little success. These fit the bill and then some. I'm probably going to buy them.
very thick denim, and stiff
I got the recommended size and it was way too big. I didn't even wear them once because they would just fall off me. And my hips are not an easy thing to fall off of!
Fit was big on me, but even if they had fit, I don't think they would have been amazing.

links_reviews_title: These were comfortable and fit well.
links_reviews_text: I liked these jeans for a laid back style and they were true to size.

links_reviews_title: It was an odd cut for my body.
links_reviews_text: I have no curves and these pants made me look terrible.
Nice jeans for running around after my kids. Run a little large, don't be tempted to size up.
Fit perfectly and extremely comfortable. Pretty cropped at the ankle so not ideal for winter, but will definitely be renting again when it's warmer out
Exactly what you'd expect it to be. I rented 27 even though I'm 26 in Madewell. Apparently I'm a 26 in Joe's as well.

I rented these in my normal size 26 and I could get away with them but they were a little baggy. 25 was much better and I ended up buying them. I'm so glad I did - I wear them all the time. They're a high rise, relaxed boyfriend jean. So comfortable and a really nice leg cut that makes any outfit look put together. The wash is very nice too. I roll a cuff at the bottom like in the photo, and I think it looks best like that.
The cut is much baggier than I thought and they look like men's jeans from the knees down. They may look better on a taller person
Nice weight and stretch, very adjustable length. Fits true to size.
Runs very large. Stretched out immeadiately. Will try sizing down. Would have been comfortable and cute if they fit!
Relaxed fit, high waist but not ridiculous and button-fly. Super comfy even though there's no stretch!
These jeans fit perfectly and were good quality. I did not like the fit as much as I had hoped but still wore them, as they were very comfortable and attractive.

links_reviews_title: Not the right fit for pear shape
links_reviews_text: These jeans are super comfy and I wanted to love them, but the "boyfriend" fit doesn't work well for my body shape. I was hoping these would be straight-leg fit, but they hugged my curves which gave them more of a flared fit on my body. They looked a little better when I cuffed them (I had room--they're long), but it just wasn't the look I was going for this time.
These were super soft, but really big. Had to send back.

These jeans are super easy to wear. They are very loose, maybe looser than other "boyfriend" jeans. I'm usually a 28, but sized down because Joe's jeans usually run big on me. The 27 fit me perfectly. I probably could have squeezed into a 26. Good mid-rise.

These jeans are great boyfriend style jeans. They're straight all the way down and sit perfectly at your hips. They're great with an oversized sweater or t-shirt. Will definitely be renting these again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Joes is my favorite brand for jeans
links_reviews_text: very comfy

Love the blue and green plaid pattern and rouched torso. Not super warm since fabric is pretty thin. A bit short but fine for me since I have a short torso. Did have to wear with higher waisted pants. Wore a few times to work and holiday parties. Great for the holidays!
I absolutely adored this top. I wore it with a skirt and blazer for work and really wanted to wear it with jeans on the weekend but it was just too cold. Will definitely rent again in the spring.

This top is sooo short. I knew it was cropped, but as a result I found it hard to style. I wore it with high waisted jeans and a "western" boot for a night out to dinner with friends. It looks cute with this green python Clare V purse I rented too. It rode up a lot and exposed my "love handles" so in all I didn't feel that comfortable. Pros: The pattern is cute and the material is nice. Love smocking in general. Cons: hard to style, very short. Worn: once, to dinner Compliments: 1
Beautiful pattern, fun fit.

links_reviews_title: Nice work shirt that can dress up a pair of jeans
links_reviews_text: Quality made shirt from a designer that makes clothes to flatter curves. The ruching was form-fitting but not obscene.
Loved the stretchiness and shorter length of this top. Cute plaid rouched midsection made my waist look tiny. Fun sleeves with a little pouf at the top.
I'm usually a true xs but this ran a little small, I still wore it but the s would've been better! It's also short so keep that in mind!
I kept this top for two weeks because it's a great fall piece! Could probably fit anyone from a 0-2 maybe even a 4 in the xs because of the stretch. Easy and comfortable!

Oh man. This was SO SHORT. Came to just JUST below my belly button. I loved the blouse itself but once on it was uncomfortable. between constantly adjusting and making sure my stomach wasn't exposed at work (and I had on high waisted pants), the itchiness of the shoulders (weird, right??), and to top it off it is stifling, no ventilation or airflow through the fabric. No thanks.

Wore this a bunch of times and loved it! It's definitely fitted in the bodice with a bit of crop. Perfect with high waisted black skinny jeans! The puff sleeve isn't too over the top. Would've bought it if it was less expensive!
Great summer to fall transition top and very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Good everyday shirt! Nice fall transition top.
links_reviews_text: A lot of stretch, very comfortable, and flattering around the waist.
This is very cute! I should have gotten a small but it runs TTS. I love the colors to transition to fall. Should have kept to wear with jeans but it's too hot currently so I will rerent in the fall.

Such a great top - runs true to size but slightly cropped. I wore high waisted jeans with this but it can easily be dressed up with a skirt or worn with another printed pant to make it fun. I love that the sleeve is slightly puffed, but nothing too obnoxious.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but it is short!!
links_reviews_text: I am a short girl, and still felt it didn't cover my stomach area very well. Love the style!! Just too short for this old gal! :)
Loved this shirt, it was fun, flattering and interesting. It was a bit uncomfortable in the shoulders were the ruching met the sleeve but worth it if you wear a tank under.

links_reviews_title: This should be listed as a CROP TOP
links_reviews_text: I have a short torso, this shirt hit above my belly bottom, if I didn't have the high waisted pants that I felt were almost under my breasts it would have been TOO SHORT. Super cute top, loved the fabric.
This shirt is true to size and looks great with jeans, dress pants or a skirt. It' versatile and comfortable. I wore it 3 times before I returned it because I liked it so much.

links_reviews_title: Fits true to size, cute with jeans and has a bracelet length sleeve.
links_reviews_text: Puff in the shoulder is not too drastic, fits snug through the mid section (which I like). high neckline and light weight fabric

links_reviews_title: Great for casual Friday work wear or weekend wear
links_reviews_text: Love thjs top. Fits great and has great tailored details that make it even better in person.

Wore this plaid top with my jeans. I felt that it was just an inch too short for my liking so I wore it over a skinny t-shirt. I then felt better about the whole ensemble and off I went to enjoy the day!
Super chic. Hits a bit short on the torso . Great quality item!

This shirt is cute, colors are nice with light or dark denim but it's short and the shoulders are cut in small. I am 5'10 so the fact this shirt wasn't crop top on me was impressive but the arms are a bit tight and they're 3/4 length. Button at back with loop hole. I just can't believe this shirt would retail $400 with the lack of attention to the construction and fit.

Love the pattern and colors. The top was true to picture. This fit was figure flattering which I was concerned about the pattern in plus size. The stretchy material allows it to conform to the body. It worked and I received many compliments.

I loved this top and wanted to keep it forever! I actually had the opportunity to meet Tanya Taylor, and was so happy to wear this top to do so. Note that it is quite cropped - and I am saying that as 5"0/105lb lady!
I'm short/petite (5'0) and it was even a bit cropped on me. Very form fitting, with puffy shoulders. Sleeves a perfect/short length. Might run small....but it was so much fun! Love it with jeans.
This is a nice top to wear with jeans and heels. The puffed sleeves are on point. Fit well.

I've been a big fan of Tanya Taylor for quite a while and finally was able to try something! It mostly ran small in the arms for me and I couldn't really put my arms down, but I'm glad I tried it. Next time I'll just size up!
Great top. I am short and wore it with high waisted jeans. Pretty cropped even ok me.
The style and print is adorable, but this shirt was so cropped it looked absolutely ridiculous wearing. I have a very long torso so it would probably look very cute on a more petite person.
Form fitting but comfy and flattering. Very subtly sexy. Loved the little puffy sleeves. They were cute and not over the top. Loved it. No stretch in the arms so it might not be good for thicker arms
A little cropped, but paired it with high-waisted jeans. Got lots of compliments. Comfy, too!

links_reviews_title: Overall small, short and massive shoulders

links_reviews_text: I didn't wear it because it was so small. I ordered a Medium which I thought would be okay because I have been TTS in all of the other Tanya Taylor stuff I have ordered but this was too small around the bust and too short even with high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt, casual, looks good with jeans
links_reviews_text: The fit is a little off at the neckline.

I am always an 18/20 in tops, but something told me to size up in this, and I am glad that I did. it is great for layering with a sweater over it. or on it's own. I paired with black jeans and another printed sweater jacket for a fun fall look.
I tried on and the arm sleeves are too tight. The fabric had no give. The sleeves stopped short just past my wrists. Then I couldn't move my arms because the width of the sleeves was tight.
Short but otherwise easy fit.
Soft fabric, loved the plaid. The ruching was perfect and not tight at all.
The fit was a little odd but I did get compliments at work
The material was thicker and nicer quality then I expected. Fit perfect for me but not be great for tall or longer torso bodies. I love the sleeves!! Super cool chic I highly recommend.

Wore this to run some errands and then a little casual day drinking while watching football. Very comfortable heavier weight material. I paired with Lulu lemon athletic skirt. Fit was true to size. Will probably rent again.
Definitely cropped, thick material. Would rent again and maybe size up for a less aggressive crop.

links_reviews_title: Great for every day wear! Wore it so many times for set tours, birthday parties, etc.
links_reviews_text: Definitely not made for humid weather, but very cute. The material is thick but comes short, so have a cute skirt or jeans that come a little higher to go with it.

links_reviews_title: I will give it 10 stars if I can! Casual and chic ð
links_reviews_text: This has been one of my favorite tops in my entire life. The shape is very flattering for my body type: the crop lands just at the right place to visually shroten my long torso, and with highwaisted leggings/jeans, it makes my legs look longer. The puffy sleeves hide the jiggly arms that I'm self conscious of well without feeling bulky. The sleeves are a little too long for me, but I don't mind it. I have held on to this top for 2+ months now and I wear it at least 2 times a week!

links_reviews_title: Coolest adidas vibe I've ever seen
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were just so cool, the perfect length and unique puffiness that was super subtle but made for a more fashionable look. Also it is slightly cropped/the perfect length to wear with high waisted pants.

I am a 34DDD with 28 waist, and the medium fit snug, but I like it that way. There's still room to move and it's very flattering. The material is thick and great quality. I love the puffed sleeves detail.
The fabric is like a thick polyester. It's hot, so make sure it's a cool day if you're going to wear it.
Great with jeans, shorts, leggings- I love this top!
The material is pretty thick and I personally felt that the areas where the stripes were running down were very comfortable on the skin. Tight fit so I would recommend going a size up.
Love the way this fits, it's funky without being too weird or trendy.
Neck is very small and hard to get over even a small head; arms are very long and akward

I loved this look so much! Wore for a day of meetings at work. Material is so lush and the bow tie actually stayed without double knotting. I felt so fresh and confident in this look. Not something I would actually buy at these prices as the print is too loud to be worn often, but renting yes!!
I love this shirt! It's so feminine and fun!

Beautiful thick silk blouse with neck tie. The field color is lavender (I thought it looked white from the pictures, so just a heads up.) The shoulders have a small poof, which balances nicely off the bowtie -looks feminine and a little old-lady-ish, in a super cool way. I've found most Tory Burch tops to be a little short and wide for my body shape, and this blouse not surprisingly is a little short in the arms and waist and a little boxy around the middle for me - I'm long and skinny so that's just my lot in life ;D It still tucks into my pants!
I enjoyed this blouse and thought it was fun. It has a little puff sleeve detail. Fits slim. I did not experience any gaping between buttons. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Power Blouse with a Pussy Bow!
links_reviews_text: Looked sharp under a navy suit for an MBA interview! I did leave the bow undone in case I got self conscious of it during the interview. Personally, I love the bow!
Perfect fit, interesting pattern, classic style, sophisticated, easy to wear and pairs with everything! I've worn it with multiple skirts and jeans, with and without vests. Rent this!
Nothing to write home about, but cute enough to wear with jeans to work on a Friday. Standard fit with a cute pattern. Wouldn't bother to rent again though - plenty of other tops to try.

Wore this out to dinner with my husband and received so many compliments. I'm 36 DDD and sometimes it's hard to find a blouse that fits well. This was a perfect fit. Would buy if it wasn't such a memorable pattern :)
Love this shirt! Very silky, light fabric shirt that fits well and matched quite a bit! I dressed it down with jeans and up with the blue pants in the photo, also RTR. Great rental.

SO - hereâs my first top at âRent the Runwayâ for work. I was going to pair it with jeans but I didnât think that it gave this gorgeous top any justice, so I pulled out these pants along with my burgundy sandals. I ordered this top in an 8 as I saw the reviews and the top looked a bit snug but I prefer loosely fitted tops. The 8 was perfect for what I was looking for in a top. I love the pattern and the material is super soft against my skin. I would order this top again as itâs a keeper.
Loved the print. I liked it better tied low with the top buttons open than tied around my neck. it was a little large for a size 4.
This is perfect for wearing all day. The print is just exquisite!
Exactly what you expect a good designer shirt to be. Great fit, good material, all around the quality. I don't usually wear such crazy patterns so this was fun

Beautiful print in mesmerizing Fall colors. The blouse is well structured, specially in the shoulder area. The fabrics feels and looks high quality. Did not wrinkle in a 12+ hrs day. No adjustments were necessary.

This blouse was not something I'd typically buy for myself but it was actually the only item in this rental I ended up really using. I wore it with a blue wool dress skirt to a formal work dinner. I tucked it in and tied a poofy now. I really enjoyed the blouse. I will say the 6 fit snug in the busy fit me. It didn't gap due to the quality of the material and the way the buttons are done.
Very flattering blouse. Great print. Tory Burch never disappoints.
Great cut, luxurious fabric, fun print.

links_reviews_title: Awesome blouse. Fun for work and other occasions
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Beautiful fabric and pattern. Very striking.

This is what RTR is about! There is no reason to buy a matching top and skirt sexy secretary outfit in a random print. But to wear it once? Yessssss! I absolutely loved this outfit. It felt stylish and random and perfect. Material is great and both top and skirt are incredibly well made.

Polished and playful! This was perfect for a Friday at work! Paired with dark blue jeans, I love the flattering fit and the bow at the neck! Several compliments and most of all brought me pleasure wearing it. This shirt brightened my Friday! Will for sure rent again!
Loved the patterns and colors! Unique top for work
Very well made and interesting
Near perfection. Flattering. Great cut. Can tuck in or out. Very nice will rent again.
Perfect for work. Lovely fabric, colors, print. Easy and classy. Compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great blouse, gorgeous pattern and color!
links_reviews_text: I loved this blouse! Many compliments. I think it fits TTS. I paired it with the Tory Burch Robinson colorblock tote (also rented) for a match made in heaven!
This is a gorgeous blouse and a great amalgamation of Summer and Fall colors/designs. Very satisfied!
Gorgeous colors, soft, light and airy. Might purchase! I see there is a skirt in this pattern, may have to get that one next- this pattern is everything.

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with this choice.
links_reviews_text: I loved this top and you can never go wrong with Tory Burch!! Next time I rent this, I think I'll pair it with a green skirt. Pics don't do it justice. Wanted to keep but for now I'll have to settle on renting again.

links_reviews_title: The Tory Burch blouses I have rented are great for working from home but still feeling stylish!
links_reviews_text: Pro... You can dress it up with dress pants or a skirt or dress down but still look stylish and professional by paring the blouse with jeans.
Beautiful fabric. Tailored fit very flattering. I will keep this one a while to wear again!
I sized up because 4 wasn't available, and the sleeves were still short, nice blouse though
