This shirt was too much for my small frame...too busy, and the necktie was very long! Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: High quality and memorable pattern garnered a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Wore with navy pants and either a green or nude shoe. The shirt is the star of the outfit! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous top with tons of fun details
links_reviews_text: Top is absolutely gorgeous and has a matching skirt that I didn't rent but would totally consider in the future. This top seems to run a size small (I ordered a 4 but it fit more like a 2). Ultimately I didn't wear the top because it was too tight in the bust area but I would rent this again, just in one size up.
Great fit and quality. Possibly needed a size down but loved it.

I wore this blouse several times during my month's Update. The material is quality and comfortable. I absolutely loved the print; although it's very busy, the more muted colors overall balance out the mixed patterns. I'm not usually one for high necks, but the tie on top made for a super chic work look!
Wore this blouse to Thanksgiving, looked great! There was a safety pin that had been left in the bust area so it didn't gape, and I left it because it needed to be there!
A little small on my bust but super fun pattern!
Really really liked this blouse. Got lots of compliments. Looks good with jeans or a pencil skirt!

I loved this dress. The style is very modest, making it perfect for work. I'm happy I went with a 6 instead of a 4 so it did not pull in the chest. I received numerous compliments and even had a colleague sign up for RTR because of this dress!

Unique print. Wore this for American heart - wear red day! True to size Great fit Buttons did gap on front so used Hollywood fashion tape to secure down and then good to go Will rent again. Would have bought but it's a bit pricy!

Absolutely love this dress and would buy it if it wasn't so expensive and such a huge statement piece because I know I wouldn't wear it too often because of the print. The print is one of the reasons I love it, you think it will be loud and overbearing, but it is completely the opposite. The shape is flattering and best of all, it has specious pockets.
Loved the bright, bold colors in this sassy animal print. Lots of compliments. The chest was a bit tight...the button didn't like staying buttoned.
Rented for a work event that overlapped with Valentine's Day! So fun!

Perfect valentines dress. I am a 12 but usually find Kate spade a little small so I always get a 14. It fit good except in the bust I had the button pop open a handful of times throughout the day. Vibrant color though and nice material.

This dress is sewn so it showed off my curves very nicely - to the point I felt more comfortable wearing a cardigan over it when I went to work. Great color and cut. I recommend wearing a slip with it, or something similar. For bustier women (I'm a 38dd), it can gap depending on the bra you're wearing.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a work event when everyone else was dressed in dark suits. Definitely has the wow factor.
links_reviews_text: I'm 4'11" and the length was perfect for a work outfit. It ran a little small in the bust.
I got many compliments at work in this dress. I love the fun print and colors - and the fit is forgiving/hugs just the right places. I'll be renting this beauty again!
Wore this for my boyfriend's birthday dinner. Great fit and color. Am tempted to buy it.
This dress is so cute and will get you non-stop compliments so be ready!

Absolutely love the color of this dress. It is beautiful. This dress has a comfortable, TTS fit. You could really wear this for any occasion. It is conservative enough for work, but fun enough for after hours.

This is a little more conservative than my usual style but I absolutely loved it! The color is very flattering, the fit is a little on the large side, it is all-around great for work, brunch, or date night!

links_reviews_title: Loud print - not for the faint of heart
links_reviews_text: Super fun dress that makes a statement. It was a lot of print and it was attention grabbing at work but some days you just got to flaunt it.
Got a MILLION compliments. So comfy and easy to wear. Will definitely rent again.
Work this dress to a work party and got rave reviews. The color is bright but extremely flattering and fun to wear. My only caution is the chest is a little small if you've got a lot there.
I got this dress for work- not my typical dress, but I loved it! Comfortable, flattering - wore it several times!!

The overall fit was fine but with the all-over pattern? It sort of swallowed my small frame up! I pulled on a beige denim jacket to ease my eyes and I liked it better. The sleeves were long and the collar/sleeves have a 70s butterfly feel. Not a good look for me but I bet others can plan for the right pieces to go with this dress and make it amazing.
Really liked the cut and style of this dress.
I love the style and got a lot of compliments. The waistline is high though (I tried to hide it with a belt) otherwise the fit is great!

Loved this dress and would work for the office too. Great modest length. Beautiful sleeves and buttons. Liked how high the waist is too which help slim your frame. Highly recommend. Couldn't go smaller as the high waist is fitted.
Fits like a glove. I am usually a 2 or 4 and the 4 fit me perfectly. Such a fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt really sassy in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure if the print was too wild for a regular day in the office but I felt like a million bucks all day and for a lot of compliments. Looking forward to wearing it again!
Fits everywhere except on DD chest. I sized up and it fit great on my curvy hips and butt, but the buttons gape. Very slimming dress. If it wasn't for the button situation, I would buy this dress.

links_reviews_title: Tiny bit big but overall great!
links_reviews_text: This ran just a tiny bit large for me - I could have gone one size down. I got tons of compliments & color is beautiful. My *only* nitpicky complaint is that the lighter part of the pattern fell right over my belly and at times I felt like my stomach/hips were accentuated, made worse by the pockets. Overall though, this was a great rental.
This dress was super conservative but still super fun. The color is beautiful and it's nice and comfy!
Loved this dress. Very comfortable and flattering fit. Received tons of compliments at work about it.
Lovey flowing dress with pockets
Received so many compliments. Colorful and cheerful, it definitely makes a statement! The dress fit great, wasn't too tight and flattered my figure in all the right places.
I mean, it has pockets! Loooooved it!
Turned lots of heads with this dress, comfortable, cute, sophisticated, yet not boring. Classy and airy work dress to still look stylish!
Fun take on a leopard print. Fits perfectly.

Didn't care for the fabric/print/color IRL. High waist under the bust did me no favors. Shorter than I prefer. Unflattering overall on me. Usually like animal print/colors/Kate Spade but returned unworn.

Fit is great. It flows right over problem spots and gives a good silhouette. I wore a slip under to prevent any peek a boos. I'd rent again. Lots of compliments. I'm typically a size 4 in Kate Spade but they didn't have my usual size so I had to get the 2. My normal size would have looked better but sizing down was doable.
Really cute and flattering! I think I may be too old for this length though :(

links_reviews_title: Just another day at the office. I'm known for spicing up the workday wardrobe.
links_reviews_text: This dress was fabulous!! I have a very full bust for my frame and am often embarrassed by the way my cleavage overwhelms an outfit. This dress minimized my full bust and flattered everywhere! LOVE! I'm 5'5" and 135 pounds. I am a runner so love dresses that showcase my legs without being too revealing. Perfect dress!
I loved everything about this rental. The color is amazing! It is not tight at all. Very flattering cut.
Tons of compliments on this dress and lots of questions asking where it was from! Super comfortable. I wore this from work to a birthday party. Great dress !

This was fit and flare style which normally is not the most flattering on me but this worked. It was comfortable for a dinner party. I am between 8 and 10 and only 8 was available. Might be tight across chest for some.

links_reviews_title: Rented as part of unlimited plan and wore to work.
links_reviews_text: Pretty color and fabric and great fit. Loved wearing this to work.
The fit of this top is great in that it is short enough to tuck in or keep out. But the material isn't very comfortable. I like the wooden buttons and that it can go with brown or black accessories.
Beautiful, lightweight, and versatile! I paired with high waist black skinny pants. High waist is needed as shirt is lightly cropped.
Cute top but ran small. I wanted an oversized look and it didn't really give me that. Felt more fitted

So comfy but can still be fancy crinkle top. I paired it wit a leather skirt and leather booties for the Lizzo concert (hence the matching cheetah outfits). I could wear this shirt to work too with black slacks. Very versatile!
Comfortable good w high wasted stuff bc it is in the shorter side for a blouse
Cute, comfortable and can be dressed up or down!
I loved the pattern of this shirt. It's very easy to wear great fit and can be dressed up or down
fit true to size, cute casual top, would recommend
The shirt was a very nice material and lightweight but still comfortable. I am 5ft and the shirt was a little short on me. Would rent again.
This is super comfy. Wore it several times.

I love this blouse, both for work and everyday. The fabric is light and stretchy, very breathable without being see through. The print is such a unique realistic leopard print. I want to keep this one so badly but can't come to terms with the price. Tip: if you want to tuck it in, do it with a very high-waisted garment, otherwise it will be too short on the sides.

Great shape that can be dressed up or down, I wore like this to work but also paired with light wash high rise denim over the weekend. Fabric has a nice crinkle texture. My only complaint is it's a little short, if you want to tuck in (it kept coming untucked from my jeans)

Casual cool but can dress up or down. I felt so amazing in this top. It's crinkly with front buttons and slimming, long, short-sleeves for my very athletic arms. Perfect to tuck into leather pants or leave untucked to low waisted pants. NOT a cheesy leopard print!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear - slightly odd shape
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work. The shoulders felt a little bit, so I wouldn't buy this, but liked how it looked for today. Easy to do a French tuck with this top. The smocking detail throughout adds nice dimension.

I love this top. I disagree with the other reviewers about it being tiny. It was TTS maybe slightly big. It has some stretch. I think you could wear it with distressed blue jeans....black denim, you could dress it up. The buttons hit perfectly on my chest to leave open but still classy. I'm petite. 32DD. I paired with a black denim skirt. My husband thought it was sexy.

Such a fun top! I was nervous about renting the small since I've never rented from this brand before, but I was glad I did even though I usually wear a small or medium. It was a tighter-ish but not crop-top vibe. I was able to tie it and wear it on the weekend, but also was able to button the shirt down for a more wear to work vibe. I received so many compliments and wish I owned this cute cheetah top! Definitely a great desk to drinks top.

links_reviews_title: A fun shirt with a flattering cut
links_reviews_text: This shirt is made of some sort of seersucker or crepe-y material. It's light and airy, and the pattern is so much fun. The cut was supremely flattering on me. I have wider shoulders and a small bust and waist and it skimmed my form in a nice way.
I did not wear this shirt because it had an odor, as if it had been 'cleaned' with over-used dry cleaning chemicals.
I wore this with black jeans with frayed ends and a pair of vans. went to dive bars for my friend's bachelorette, it was perfect
Loved this top. Fit true to size. Would rent again!
Wore this in Vegas, fit great and was super cute!

I loved this shirt. One of the top buttons was broken but not one I needed to use. The fit was very flattering and I received many compliments. The small would have been too small, the medium was perfect for 34DD

The print and fabric are nice, but I chose not to wear this because it is very short. It fit beautifully in the shoulders and waist, but just barely covered my belly button. That would be okay for a younger woman, perhaps, but not for me.
Really nice top. Unique fabric. Flattering fit. I wish it was a TAD longer so I could tuck it in more easily, but no big deal... Would rent again, sure.

I wasn't a fan of this shirt and ultimately decided not to wear it. The material is crinkly and stretchy, which out of the bag seemed great, like it would fall nicely. But on, it clung to me and didn't sit right when tucked into even ultra high-waisted pants.
Cute top and texture however ran super short. So high wasted pant or skirt if you are tucking in. Besides that cute.
Loved this top, wish I could keep!

links_reviews_title: Such a cute top with cool texture
links_reviews_text: Loved this top for work, an animal print that's still appropriate for the office
This shirt is so cute and easily dressed up or dressed down. It is very short so has to be worn with high waisted pants for work

The shirt was really cute. Buttoned it all the way to the top. Kind of shorter than most tops but not cropped. Paired with black jeans and black slides. The only reason I'm giving this 2 stars is because as the day wore on and i wore the shirt, whoever rented the shirt before me must have had bad BO bc it was quite smelly. The eco clean wash did not wash that out.
It would work best for a petite person. I could not keep it tucked into my high waisted jeans.
A little short, but great with high wasted pants
If you're tall, get ready to bear your stomach. This shirt hit well above my belt line.
flattering fit, paired well with an otherwise all black outfit, crepey texture
Love this shirt - usually am a medium but very happy I got the large.
Updated animal print, loved true sleeves and the fabric has a bit of crinkle in it. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it because I didn't like how it fit.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit broad in the shoulders for me and then was tight around the bust. It was also really short and didn't work with most of my pants for tucking in. I generally have low to mid rise pants. The pattern was fine. I didn't love the fabric. I just wasn't comfortable in it.
weird texture
It definitely runs small. Order a size up. Other than that , beautiful print and good quality
This top was so versatile. I wore it with jeans, again with a long black tee underneath on a chillier day and with high waisted wide leg pants to work.
This skirt fit like a glove, and was incredibly flattering for work. The belt provided a nice structure to it, jazzing up a regular pencil skirt. I will 100% rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Form fitting at waste but comfy wear
links_reviews_text: Loved this and would rent again

links_reviews_title: Nice fit and easy for work
links_reviews_text: True to size fit. Hits at kind of unusual part of the leg but would rent again!
Love a good suit set--and this one comes complete with compliments from co-workers. Not too short. Very flattering skirt. Great material, and nice little belt detail. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a more professional schoolgirl
links_reviews_text: This was pretty cute overall and I got a lot of compliments on it. Fit very true to size for me. I did wish it was a tad shorter because I felt it was a little bit matronly in length, but it definitely made it more appropriate for work at the same time.

links_reviews_title: So nice I wore it twice
links_reviews_text: Cute yet still professional for work
Loved the buckle detail on this skirt
Super cute, true to size
Fit well, lined hem line
Great skirt. Very slimming. Conservative for work but fun with the button detail on the side. A staple item for the working woman's closet.
Cute and preppy. I sized up and it made it much more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments in the office on the skirt.
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt so much I'll probably end up buying it soon. It was great for work with tights and boots and can be dressed up or down as well. It was a good length on me, where it wasn't too long, but still very appropriate for the workplace.
Very cute skirt. Wore with tights and it looked great.
Very cute for work!

I normally wear a size 8 and the 10 fit perfect. I really liked the cut and the style, but the fabric is really clingy. With every movement, the fabric moves and gets stuck. I was going to wear to an interview but didn't want to worry about it the whole time.
I love this skirt so much! I honestly definitely will rent it again!

I originally rented a size 0 and it was a little too small, so I got the 2 instead. I wore it a few times and it was perfect for work. It pairs great with tights and boots so it was perfect for the cooler weather. I seriously considered buying it because it's a great staple skirt for business casual attire.

links_reviews_title: My husband offered to buy it he liked it so much
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and TTS. I wore it to work and then out to dinner because I liked it so much.
I loved the pattern of this skirt. I wore it to a work convention, but wish I had sized down to the size 8. The length was a little longer than I anticipated, but it worked out!
It's comfortable, but maybe too traditional for me. I didn't feel all that special in it, but I guess it got the job done.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable stylish skirt with an asymmetric flare
links_reviews_text: A bit much with the oversized blazer so wore it with a short sleeve black turtleneck for a casual look and a black blazer for a more tailored look
So cute for work - can definitely dress it up or down. So many compliments, considering buying! I'm usually a size 4, but the size 6 fit perfectly.
Like this was a little big but probably true to size.
Thick and heavy material. really high waisted. Would recommend normal size and not for hot weather

I have worn this dress for multiple nights. It is great because I rented it for the weekend, but I can also wear it to the office! The purple is a nice pop of color that I normally don't wear. I also got a compliment post shower at soul cycle. #love #rtr #tedbaker #soulcycle #hudsonyards #globalbrandsgroup

This dress was beautifully made, I sized up to be sure it would fit (I don't like the look of stretched ribbed knit). I actually could've sized down and would've been ok. I'm 5'1 not sure if it was my height but the waist fell lower than empire and not a drop waist either. Hit right at my tummy pooch ð though I did receive multiple compliments.

I had a viewer compliment that I looked like a beautiful morning glory! LOL. It is a beautiful, well-structured and flattering dress. Ted Baker doesn't always fit me well but this one did! I am a size 6 and the Ted Baker size 3 fit perfectly.

This is a more mature brand and I find it tends to be high quality but runs a little big, so I ordered my smaller size (I'm a 2 or 4 depending on the dress so I went with a 2). I think it was too long on me but I wore it anyway. Nice quality but the fit didn't do anything for me...

Not a great dress for me. I'm pretty hourglass shaped and this dress hugged my hips and butt, then hung strange on top. I usually love pockets, but on this dress the kangaroo pouch pockets are completely unnecessary. They're made of an extra piece of fabric that goes across your pelvis/ belly on the inside and it scrunches and bulks in a weird way. Maybe it works well on some, but I could think of 20 other black dress from RTR that work much better for my body type.

I will be trying this dress again in a smaller size, but I wasn't impressed with the size I ordered. I am normally a 4/6 depending on fit. I ordered a 6, and it was HUGE. It was so baggy and way too long on me. I would definitely recommend sizing down, especially if you are a shorter lady like myself.
This is a perfect staple black dress. Very flattering fit. Nothing wow about it, but accessories can help. I would definitely rent it again for work.

links_reviews_title: I can't stop wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: It's perfect. And it had pockets.

I love the shoulder pleat details and the way this dress falls. It's almost a crepe-like material, and looser around the stomach, which is perfect for my body type. I wore it to the symphony, and one of my friends asked if I lost weight! :)

Beautiful dress, but didn't end up wearing because it was too snug. There's no stretch, so being a little wider in the hips, meant I could even zip the back. I think if I had sized up it would've worked.
Classic, polished, comfortable LBD.
It was a little big on me , will try a size smaller.
Great black dress that works for all kinds of occasions. Great fit.
This was a beautiful shirt that was great for all of my video calls! The knit is really soft and stretchy and was comfortable to wear all day.
Amazingly soft fabric on this turtleneck. I did not want to take it off. Vibrant colors and excellent condition. I paired it with Armani pants for a nice corporate look.

links_reviews_title: Bright and fun for video meetings.
links_reviews_text: Fitted, but the slim rib is surprisingly flattering. Loved the bright colors and the color-blocking.
I rented this for work and absolutely love it! The fit is spot on and dressy enough for work or casual enough for a night out. The fit is very flattering and true to size.
This is a beautiful top and it fits slightly snug around the waist, but not in a way that makes it unflattering. It pairs best with high waisted jeans or pants.
It's a very flattering top
This shirt is amazing! Fits great and really nice quality.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt, but wasnât cut for me
links_reviews_text: The waist hit an inch or so above my natural waist, so it shifted around and never looked quite right
If you are in between sizes, order the size up!

links_reviews_title: Didn't fit but I'll be renting in a different size!
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit, but they didn't have a medium available. It's definitely true to size so be sure to rent in your size! I was hoping that it would run small; it definitely doesn't! It's a really cute top though so I'll be renting a medium in the future!
I wear a solid size 6. This shirt is very cute, but tight in both the arms and waist. It is also very short in the back. I would recommend sizing up.
Way too tight and uncomfortable. Didn't end up wearing it.
This is so flattering. I wore it to work and I loved that it was cute, comfortable and had some super cute details to it. It fit true to size for me. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: It was cute but not really comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I wish I had gone up to a large. I felt the medium was very short in the torso and the elastic in the sleeves was a bit too tight to be comfortable.
Nice and elegant shirt. Was pleased with the quality. I ordered XS but would be more comfortable with S. The arms bands were hurting at the end of workday.

I really loved this shirt! It added a little something extra with the angled hem and sheer sleeves and is super flattering with the way the waist sits. Only thing I'd say is that the sleeve opening are SO TIGHT and because they're elastic it left these crazy indents in my arms. I have normal sized arms and the shirt fit everywhere other than the sleeve opening.
Great shirt for work!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work and transitioned to a night out. Wore once.
links_reviews_text: Layer under the sheer layer is a bit short, so helps to wear with higher waisted pants, but was okay with higher jeans or dress pants.

links_reviews_title: Fancies up a pair of jeans!
links_reviews_text: Covers the problem areas ;) Fits very nicely.

links_reviews_title: Cute blouse, good if you're short waisted
links_reviews_text: I really like this blouse, but I'm tall and long waisted and it rode a little too high on me.

links_reviews_title: Love the fit, color and fabric of this top. Nipped in at a flattering area and felt great to wear

links_reviews_text: This top was a hit for me in the office and with friends for post-work drinks. It's very flattering, great material, and well designed. This is clearly reflected in the price point as it's a designer piece. If it wasn't quite as pricey I would definitely purchase this one. I think it's a timeless work top that can take you to an event after work and made very well.
arms were VERY tight but overall shirt is cute

Paired this too with navy blue slacks and grey suede heels for work - love the look. Felt comfortable and polished. Planning to wear a second time over the weekend and pair it with jeans. Too was flattering but felt the elastic on the end of the sleeves was a little tight so took of a star.

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt. Very fashionable with interesting details.
links_reviews_text: Hits right at the hips, flares nicely and the asymmetrical detail is lovely.

links_reviews_title: Great work top paired with jeans or pants!
links_reviews_text: I ordered down a size and still fit, was just a little tighter in the bust. I would definitely rent again for work!
Easy to dress up or down, good for!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work or date night
links_reviews_text: Loved this top - stretchy middle section, just note that it's navy, not black

I loved the colors and patterns of this dress and I really wanted to like it however It was like wearing a tent. The from the back it looked promising but from the front I looked like I was wearing a maturity dress. Also the red check part of the arms was snug but that was the only snug part. The V is deep too. All in all not a good look on me at all.
Simply awful. I looked like a pillowcase. With fringe.
I wore this so many times and got a bunch of compliments! You can really dress it up or down, so comfy and relatively warm for those still-chilly spring days.
This coat was light in weight but wool & super warm! I wore it on an afternoon sail in December. Then I wore it everywhere else because I loved it so much. Rent it now.

This was a great color. (Look, I'm twinning!) I got tons of compliments when I wore this coat. I could layer under it if need be, but this coat was already very warm. Warning though, the wool collar is a bit itchy on the back of the neck.

links_reviews_title: Pop of color in NYC sea of all black
links_reviews_text: Love this coat. Will rent again. Wore it multiple times on a date, to work and just hanging out. Recommend you rent ! Kept me pretty warm as well

Both coats (XS and S) came and were awful. They were totally worn, tons of pile, stained. Literally unwearable. Would not have been caught dead with a coat in such disrepair. Style was nice, but I don't believe they should have been sent out. Thankfully, RTR has amazing customer service and sent me a replacement right away, in time for my trip.
Perfect spring coat, I love it. It does lean casual because of the texture. Very fuzzy.
A little big but cozy and warm

links_reviews_title: Great everyday coat to run errands or wear to the office
links_reviews_text: Very warm

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the fit
links_reviews_text: I wore this around town on vacation in England and it looked great over my day clothes and the formal events I went to. My only concern is that it seemed to be pilling like it's been over worn or incorrectly washed but I still felt cute in it
Beautiful, fit perfectly, but better for spring or mild winters.

links_reviews_title: Love this coat, unfortunately I havenât been able to wear it but once since the weather isnât cold
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and style. Will purchase this week

I really like this coat - super cute pale pink color and the material is fun and fuzzy but still looks polished. I got a M and it fits pretty loose, so if you are in between sizes and want a snugger fit definitely size down. The buttons are super low on the front so most of my chest is exposed when it's buttoned up, but I just wear it with a scarf to stay warm.

links_reviews_title: Soft and cozy for fall/early winter.
links_reviews_text: I loves how the material felt and I recurved many compliments on it! The pink stands out, but is still subtle.
I love the color and fabric of this jacket, but it was too large for me. I wish there was an XS in stock, it would have fit better.
So cute and warm but simple, so many compliments. Hard to give it back.
I received a compliment everywhere I went. This coat is so dreamy. I felt like a princess in it every time.

Such a fun color! The M was to big but I wore it anyways because I loved the style. Would recommend sizing down. I got so many compliments, I'm sad to send it back. Will probably reorder but in smaller size.

I probably could have gone down to a size small. The color was more magenta than how it appeared online. In the photo, it looks more blush. Felt kind of obnoxious wearing it to work. The quality wasn't great either - shedding wool and the lining crinkled like paper.
Great jacket and material b runs large if you want to wear it unbuttoned it is boxy/ too big- would size down .
Simple blouse, not sheer, flattering, not too deep of a V either! Definitely runs large like a lot of Joie blouses

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. If I could afford it I would buy it
links_reviews_text: I wore this 3 times in a 5 day period! It's a little low cut but it's a perfect shift for weekend and work

links_reviews_title: I liked the cute covered buttons!
links_reviews_text: I rented it as a layering piece for blazers...I thought the color looke a little tired. Not a white. Not a cream. A little dingy. It was "just okay"
There's a lot of detail you can't see in the photos. Really well constructed. I rented to wear under a black jacket for work. Runs a tad large, I'm usually a medium but wore a small.
Some gaping in the chest but otherwise falls nicely
Great classic shirt for any wardrobe. High quality material.

links_reviews_title: Loose fitting but very cute and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Matches everything and can be dressed up or down

links_reviews_title: Beautiful light pants - can be tight at the waist (especially if you've eaten)
links_reviews_text: I loved them but was afraid when I was sitting down that the button would pop off or I'd rip the butt. I have an athletic build with thighs and a butt, so just be aware. Would rent again
Honestly I need these pants in my life forever!!! They are the most adorable pants I've ever worn and they fit me so perfectly! Definitely buying
So chic for vacation, everyday or an interview. Comfy and fit true to size.

There's a part of me that loved these pants and a part of me that just isn't sure. I order ledger than I would normally because the reviews mention a right waist. I could have easily sized down one size. The style is very 90's (which is in right now) and is kind of boxy. They are comfy, my husband actually likes them (surprising since they're not a style he typically likes), and I think my uncertainty stems from rocking an style I don't usually rock. If you understand what style the pants fit into I would recommend these.

Fit is big all over - length, hips, crotch, and waist. Super comfy though, swimming around in all that room. :-) Had to strategically pair with an oversized shirt and scarf to hide the waist and saggy butt. Even with a belt I had to keep hiking the pants up, as the crotch would slide down to my knees. I loved the casual soft linen look and would have considered buying if the fit was not so oversized.

I'm a big fan of of a statement pant so I love these linen trousers. The linen is great quality and super soft. I agree that the are a bit long for my liking, especially on a short (I I cuffed once so they would hit at the ankle and I'm 5'6") I also found them a little tight in the lower thigh. I definitely recommend if you you are tall or straight in build, might be tricker if you have more hips

links_reviews_title: Super cute with a few problems
links_reviews_text: If you have thicker thighs and a smaller waist these pants might be difficult for you! There is no stretch therefore, at the thighs all I could feel was pulling and tugging as I walked. Besides that the pants were beautiful :)

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Theater show and got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I would say that the pants run a little large. But, not aggressively so. They are super cute and comfortable. I actually cuffed the bottoms of them, but the length hit me right at the bottom of my ankle. So, it was a good length. I should have sized down for a slightly tighter fit in the waist and lower legs. The only other annoying thing is that the linen wrinkles easily. Other than that, they were super cute!

links_reviews_title: RTR Campus Insider Review: Loved these pants! Waist fit perfectly, but SUPER long.
links_reviews_text: These pants stole my heart. I loved how it fit snugly around my waist and glided over my hips, but they were longer than any pants I've ever owned. I had to cuff it twice and hold them up with safety pins, but they ended up working great for my casual 21st birthday.

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED with these pants, but they were too small to wear out.
links_reviews_text: These pants are gorgeous. Colors are so on trend for Spring 19 and I couldn't wait to get them. Was such a let down that they didn't fit right. I was able to get them on and zipped, but they were way too tight to move around in. Especially in the thigh/hip area. If I had an event where I would be standing up the whole time, I'd have worn them, otherwise too tight given how delicate the fabric is. Really disappointing. RTR, Mara Hoffman makes these (and a ton of her other killer styles) up to size 20+, why don't you expand your range?!
Loved the high waist and lightweight linen fabric that wasn't see through. Love these and will definitely rent and maybe even buy them!
I didn't end up wearing these pants, they were a little tight around the hips which stretched the stripes in an unflattering way.

Stepped out of my comfort zone for these and so glad I did. Wound up purchasing. Perfect for a beach vacation. Didn't wrinkle in the way I expected linen would. I'm on the shorter side and these pants fit like full length pants- not cropped.

i had to fold the pants 4 times for it to look a decent length on my legs. the wait is small and a little tight. i wore it anyway because i needed something for work. the linen will stretch throughout the day so the legs will become more roomy. waist stayed the same. they're cute pants, just wish they were more comfortable!
I wanted a slim fitting vacation pant. Loved this but it didn't work on me--full hips big butt.

links_reviews_title: So cute that I bought them!
links_reviews_text: Adorable linen pants that have more room than typical linen. I'm usually between a 6/8 in pants and these fit really well. Very polished look.
I paired this with the matching top, and was obsessed with the overall look! I think they were super comfy and really flattering, though I do wish I'd ordered the size 4 instead of 6.

I waited for a while for these pants to be available and was a little let down by the fit. They are more tapered through the leg than expected from the photos. Work colleagues complimented them but they weren't my favorite

I was expecting these to fit weird but they slipped on perfectly and laid great in all the right places (hips/butt/waist). They are also lined well so the linen fabric wasn't sheer in the backside. I want to purchase these pants!
The pants go with everything but they are very long.

PROS: These are cute and mostly comfy. The length is very casual and they feel very summer. The white is actually beige, though. CONS: There is no stretch to these, as they are linen. I am a 12/14 in pants. I rented the 12 and they were tight on the waist and hips. I ended up not wearing them because they pulled too much and did not look good on me. I would need a larger size.
High-rise linen pant is perfect for NE summers.
Very fitted at waist. Nice pants. Very wrinkled and wrinkle easily

I personally wish that the leg was a little narrower. Found it ran a bit small in the thigh/butt area and the zipper area needed an iron in order to not look like it was unzipped. Very cute though, I received a lot of compliments on them.

links_reviews_title: High waist and pleats don't mix
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love these so much. These looked fine from the front, but the combination of a super high waist and pleats made me look pregnant from the side. I ended up not wearing these.
These are more fitted than I thought from the picture - I thought they'd be a more relaxed fit/feel but they were pretty tight on me. Size up otherwise the lines get squiggly from the pulling.
Just the perfect summer pant. Wore it with a white t and a blue blazer to work, and then a white t and sandals to the farmers market.

I really liked these but need to order the next size up. Great summer linen material. Broad vertical lines and great styling. Will need to cuff to show of sandals, length is past my ankles and I'm 5'6.
Didnât fit.

links_reviews_title: I wore these to work and over the weekend, perfect for both occasions!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, very comfortable
Didn't wear

links_reviews_title: The stripe is cute, a little too high wasted for me.
links_reviews_text: The stripe is cute, a little too high wasted for me, and I would like the pant to be just a little shorter.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE these pants. My husband said I should buy them, but they are pretty pricey.
links_reviews_text: From the vertical stripes and drawstring waist, to the relaxed feel, these pants will definitely spend lots of time in my closet! I could have downsized to a 10 but like the easy feel of a 12.

links_reviews_title: I ordered a size up from what I usually wear, and I couldn't even get them past my thighs.
links_reviews_text: Extremely small Ill fitting The linen was nice - great quality
Linen wrinkles.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pants, too long on me 5'3"
links_reviews_text: Pros- beautiful pants, well made, looks fantastic Cons- way too long! I wish I checked the seam length before I ordered. These would be great on a gal with longer legs or who wanted to wear some cute heels with their outfit!

links_reviews_title: They are high waisted, which is not for me!
links_reviews_text: I did not wear these pant, because they did not fit well. The are high waisted and have pleats. Pleats are not appealing on me so it made these pants unattractive as soon as I put them on. The length was great, which was nice, because I am 5'2" and I do not like to wear heals on a regular basis. Which, I would not have had to do with these pants.
Appropriate length and style for a professional work environment. Comfortable and does not wrinkle easy. Some stretch May be an odd length if you are on the short side.

I wore this dress to the Oscar Luncheon. The dress looks expensive and feels great. The fabric is thinner than I thought it would be so Spanx was required for me. I am 5'6" and 143 pounds and the medium fit perfectly. I normally wear between a 6-8.
I loved this dress. It accentuated my waist, was comfortable, and a great length for work. Will rent again!

I love everything about this dress! It is comfortable, flattering, zips up the back so you don't have to wreck your hair putting it on, the fabric has a little stretch to it, quality is beautiful! Great rental!
Fitted and needed repairs
An XS probably would have fit better, but I liked the extra room in the hips and waist. Only 4 stars because the dress is a bit too long on me. Would have preferred about 2 inches shorter.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a professional day at work
links_reviews_text: The description said it ran small so I went with a large and glad I did. Iâm a 8-10 and the large was a good fit
Fits like a dream. True to size and very work appropriate. I love the gathered fabric at the top. Skirt is not too tight but slightly fitted. Must rent!
I felt like a million bucks in this dress. I probably could have worn a small but I liked the medium just fine. I received compliments all day.
Wished that I had shapewear for under this dress. The skirt wasn't super tight but I couldn't wear underwear bc it showed through. The look was very classic though and very flattering.
I loved how this dress draped up top and was fitted on the bottom. Will definitely be renting again.

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Elegant and conservative. Perfect for a conference.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Elegant and conservative. Perfect for a conference.

links_reviews_title: Loved It! Super comfortable for all day at work
links_reviews_text: No need for spanx even though it is form fitting. All around loved and would wear it in all colors if they were available.
This dress is classy and flattering. Perfect for work. I wear 8's for BM and the large was a nice fit. Probably could have gone medium but for work I don't want to tight.

I loved this dress. It's very flattering. I have a long torso, but I think the blouse part still hit just like the model. The length was flattering, the neckline looked very elegant, and the fabric was stretchy and thick without being constricting. The XS worked perfectly for me. The subtle ribbing adds some subtle dimension to the fabric, and I think it makes the dress look more expensive than it would otherwise. I really enjoyed this. It's a snug fit, but the length of the sleeves and skirt, and the high draped neckline give this an elegant, conservative look that was perfect for my law office. Extremely tempted to buy this one. Highly recommend.
Easy in and out! It was knee length in me which I appreciate

links_reviews_title: Beautiful neck line and sleeve length
links_reviews_text: Good stretch in the material. Beautiful neck line and sleeve length make it very elegant. Classy blue. XS was super fitted. I would rent again in small for extra comfort.

This dress looked beautiful from the front: flattering fabric, rich blue hue, accentuated my hourglass figure. But, from the side, the fit was awful. Because I have a chest, the dress hit as an empire waist rather than at true waist, making the fabric look messy and my torso look freakishly long (moreso than it does already). The portion meant to give room for the hips hit way too high in back, meaning extra fabric above and tight fabric across my booty. May be flattering on shorter torsos.
This dress is both comfortable and incredibly flattering.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a Board meeting at work. Fit perfect.
links_reviews_text: Size 6 rented a medium, love it. Dress looks classy, elegant, fit great. I'm tall, if you're short it may feel a little bit long. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: probably not the best for short people
links_reviews_text: it is a beautiful dress and you can tell it's of good quality, but sadly, i am a bit too short at5'2" for this piece. the waist line was too low and it looked more like a billowy sweater up top for my height. i'm sure this would look great on somebody even a couple inches taller than me. i still wore it to a couple meetings but it is not my favorite.
amazing work dress! fit perfectly and great for women with long torsos.

links_reviews_title: "OMG, you look like a boss! Where did you get that dress?" --A friend
links_reviews_text: I'd say this is a power dress. The hem was slightly below the knee, so I wore it with a higher heel. It was flattering and comfortable. I wore it twice.
This is a fantastic dress. Fits like a glove. Figure flattering. Modest neckline - great for work! Love, love this dress!!!
This dress was feminine, flattering and elegant. I wore this to work twice. Once was for an important board meeting.
Great fit

links_reviews_title: Loved the coat! Looked great, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Feels light when worn, two deep pockets, no buttons or zipper. Perfect length for jeans or formal wear.

links_reviews_title: Unique dress with a classic look
links_reviews_text: Clean sophisticated look. I got several compliments. Not tummy-friendly. Spanx or control top hose required.

This is perfect for work. It's just beautiful, and I might buy it. I rarely get compliments on my work attire ( I really struggle with this), and I got compliments every time I wore. I'm curvy with small waist, bigger hips.
This fits true to size and shows your shape. Great arm and cleavage coverage so it's very comfortable for work while being sexy. I am definitely going to buy this dress.
Runs small, not really a daytime dress. Shorter and tighter fit than shows on the model. Didnt wear.
It was not flattering on me at all and was too long. Wish it worked! Also felt more like a cotton material than nice work-appropriate material.

This dress is very slimming if you fit into it but don't expect much wiggle room. The hot pink color is gorgeous and it has pockets (although they're not that usable). Very flattering for your arms and hips and is a simply stunning work dress. You'll feel like a boss babe in it.

This definitely runs small. I sized up one size and JUST fit my hips and tear into this sassy little number! It does have a bit of stretch, which helped. Below knee length but rose up like crazy though the day. I wore a long blazer over to help. Didn't wrinkle too badly, given I say all day. Would definitely rent this brand again now that I know my size.

The dress has barely any stretch and runs a bit small but it's is absolutely gorgeous. The neckline is a bit tight and there's no slit so walking fast was a bit challenging. Having said that, I've gotten so many compliments! I'm 5'10 and weigh 140 so the 6 was great.
Beautiful color and material. A little big longer than what I prefer which I think made it bunch in the waist. But I still really loved the dress!
While it was ever so loose at the natural waist, and there was a slight gap around the shoulder, with a jacket it fit nicely all around. I received compliments all day and felt like a million bucks.
Dress looks great - great shape and color is rich. Fabric is good

links_reviews_title: Loved it.. I wore it on stage at a sales meeting and felt confident in it!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, but I would go up a size if you were contemplating 2 sizes.
This brand runs a size (or size and a half) small I would have given this dress 5 stars except it wrinkles Would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Great color, but not a great dress
links_reviews_text: Wanted to love this - I love a good sheath dress! It was very loose around the shoulders/armpits (making my bra visible) as well as the waist area, where it should have been more fitted. The hem fell well below my knees and made it impossible to walk in as there is no back-slit, and I literally had to hike it up over my knees to get in and out of the car. Loved the color, it is a bright pinkish-red.
Loved the fit bit very little stretch. Recommend you size up for this one.
Love the color

I loved this dress. The color is not for all skinniness, but I have olive tan skin and this was so flattering. My boyfriend love the dress and so did I!!! Perfect for work with a blazer on top, or with a sweater as shown.
Not a fan. I got a size too big, but the color and shape still looked frumpy. Terrible color too. Look more camel in photos but was actually a grayish beige.

I was not excited about this dress when I first pulled it out of the bag. I thought it looked plain and boring. However, it really grew on me once I put it on. It's just fitted enough through the chest and waist to give it some shape, and then flows out into a nice full skirt on the bottom. The hem hit right at that sweet spot just above the knee. It was very comfortable and flattering, and I will most likely rent again!
Gorgeous cut and color. Very flattering and a good length/cut for work. My only complaint is that it's unlined. Would rent again and would consider buying it if the price came down sufficiently.

links_reviews_title: This dress has a very flattering fit!
links_reviews_text: Although this dress literally is the color of a Girl Scout uniform, I wanted to try it. It fit me perfectly. It was nicely fitted in the waist and torso and had plenty of room in the busy area. I am a 36D, and often if it fits in the waist it is pretty tight in the bust. I could see that it may be a bit loose up top for someone that doesn't have broader shoulders and smaller bust. I feel very pretty in it and it's very lightweight, so perfect for summer At work.

The color definitely reminded me of Troop Beverly Hills when Phyllis turns her uniform into a dress lol I'm usually a 2 or 4 (normally 4 in Theory) but I sized down because the dress looked very generous in the hips. The shoulders fit fine, but the material is super thin, and since the dress was slightly snug in my chest, you could see everything (bones, bra, etc.) so I tried to obscure it with a scarf. It also added something interesting to an otherwise pretty plain dress. Overall, I don't think there was anything special about this dress. Probably won't rent again.
Is a great work dress. Very comfortable and flattering to the figure. Didn't wrinkle after a long day in the office. Looks fresh at the end of the day.

links_reviews_title: The color is less tan and more military khaki
links_reviews_text: Classic fit and flare, terrible color
Absolutely perfect fit. Worn on Valentine's Day with light blazer. Extremely flattering on entire body
This dress was very cute and TTS. It was lightweight and comfortable.
fit nicely and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Either it's too long or I'm too short..?
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress. I like how it fit my body, I'm a 34B and it fit my chest perfectly, it may have been even a little right in the chest but it fit me like a midi dress and I was hoping for something shorter. The seam down the front was a little off too. I was hoping for something different I guess.
Perfect for work.

Thus is a great little basic. Nice fabric and drape. Almost an olive-beige. Needs to be styled with a scarf or statement necklace or something. I did a silk crepe scarf and boots. Cute. Runs a little small in the chest area.
So the color is more of an army green certainly not the light khaki that i thought it was - also it was a very thin dress- it was nice for sure but just wasn't what i expected.
Cute, thin and flattering. It did come a little stained but nothing too noticeable.
This is definately not "khaki". It looks that way in the photos but it is more of an olive green. The color was not flattering on me and the cut was just so-so. Was not impressed overall.

Kudos to the model that made this dress look deceptively sexy. It was a hard no when I pulled it out to put it on. The fit was good but I wear dresses to feel fun and pretty and when I put this one on I just felt meh.
Love the Theory dresses! Great shape! So flattering for a curvy girl.

links_reviews_title: Generic; would be chicer and cuter if more fitted. Perhaps try a size down
links_reviews_text: Runs large; not fitted at all in the waist

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a strategy session at work.
links_reviews_text: I liked it but it truly shows every mark so you have to be really careful while wearing it. Was also a bit long for me, okay for work while wearing heels but just a bit longer than I usually like since I am short already.
It's a wonderfully made dress. Just underwhelming due to color and style. Opted not to wear
I liked the overall style and color. Wore it with a white blazer once, on its own with a statement necklace another time. One drawback: not much breath ability in the fabric.
Comfortable material and flattering cut. The color is a bit underwhelming.

Overall, unimpressed by this dress. It felt cheap. Sizing: I am normally a 6-8 in dresses (I'm hippy, so in a dress this style would normally be a 6...tighter dresses, im an 8), ordered an 8...and it was skin tight in the chest and shoulders. It looked pretty good, but was waaay too tight for work. Ultimately, I'm returning it unworn.

links_reviews_title: Classic neutral dress for work, need to accessorize
links_reviews_text: This is a good dress for work - conservative with some style. However, it is a very neutral and plan dress, so it needs accessories.
True to size Very flattering Great for work Very thin fabric good for summer Zipper is hard to zip alone
Flattering fit, not too short for my height
I'm 5'9, athletic build with a small bust and typically wear between a 4/6. Wish I got this dress in a size 6 as the 4 was a bit tight across the chest. Otherwise fit like a dream, miss it already!

Love this dress! have not worn yet, but plan on wearing it to work. I was surprised the size 8 fit, because my experience with Theory is that their sizes run small. I will be purchasing this one, even though it is expensive.
Great work dress, but color a little bland.
Great fit. Super comfy, yet polished. Nice volume in the skirt. Paired with red patent leather, strappy heels. Felt very put together at the office.

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite dress, was an unsightly color and I never wore it
links_reviews_text: Bad color and loose, sloppy fit. Did not wear
Love this dress even more in person! The fit is great, very slimming! Love that it has sleeves and the length is perfect for work, hits right above the knee! Fits true to size, would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Pretty shirt but sizing is off
links_reviews_text: It's a nice shirt but it was tight around my shoulders and way too large around my waist. Kind of made me look pregnant.
Or anytime Frock! Very comfortable. Light weight. Flattering fit.

Picked this out in store when I needed something in a hurry for work. Bright color and smart. It fits a little small in the shoulders and arms. I like the way the bottom is cut...it flounces out in a flattering way over jeans.
I loved this top. Color is feminine and the style is fashionable and comfortable. I will keep this for a little while.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color & hem; tight in the chest
links_reviews_text: I love the color, pattern, v neck and the playful flowy hemline. It was tight around the bust. I am a 36D...so pretty average and it was snug on me.
Nice fit and pretty detailing at bottom.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful. Little small on the shoulders

links_reviews_text: Fun detail at bottom and thin summer fabric. Great for jeans and trousers.
Very pretty blouse but I have a wide rib cage so it was a little too fitted through the torso to work for me.
Fabric was pretty bus not comfy at all. Dress looks flowy but it fit so tight on the shoulders and arms that I was afraid I would rip it when I took it off. Didn't wear.
Fit was a little tight in the back and chest area. The color was great for my skin complexion and fit was flattering. I got a lot of compliments and considered purchasing.

links_reviews_title: So pretty but a very odd fit
links_reviews_text: This is really pretty and the flared bottom would be beautiful if it fit. The bust is really small, a full five inches smaller than two other Derek Lam blouses I have. If you are a. Pear shape this will look great on you. The hips are much larger than the bust. Unfortunately Derek Lam sizing varies A LOT from piece to piece. I have some items in the same size than fit perfect but itâs always a 50/50 shot as to how it will fit. I really wanted to love this and if it had not been so tight in the bust I would buy it and have it altered.

links_reviews_title: I don't normally wear necklines like this but...
links_reviews_text: I got a compliment on the neckline. I likes the flowing feeling of this top. I felt stylish and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It was a bust in the bust!
links_reviews_text: The top was lovely, it's got a great print and the fabric was really nice. However, if you have a larger chest this style is a tough fit. It was super tight across my bust area but everywhere else fit fine. Was a bummer as I really liked the style otherwise!
Cute top - nice and flowing

links_reviews_title: The flow of material due to the way it is shaped is just outstanding . So pretty !!
links_reviews_text: Really classy . I can dress it up or down ! Gorgeous color!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous! I felt feminine, stylish and pretty. Incredibly pretty. May rent again

links_reviews_text: The shirt fit well everywhere but my breast. The cut was very strange and a size too small across the breast line
Wore it five times while I had it. The shape is so great. Love, love, love it

This is a lovely shirt with a flattering fit and lovely drape. My only criticism is that it runs a bit long on my 5'3" frame. If I rent it again I will try it with higher heels to offset its length a bit- but if you are a taller person it will probably be perfect.

links_reviews_title: Lovely deep coral color. Very fun design.
links_reviews_text: Fits great. Love the details and cut. Beautiful.
Beautiful print, loved this blouse ! I normally wear an 18 . I'm a 38DDD and there was no way this was gonna go across the chest, lol ! Loved it though, needed just a little bigger size !
Should have grabbed for warmer weather (it's winter now), but the blouse is beautiful. Was a little tight on the shoulders, but I have very broad shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Loved this - flowy and nice cut
links_reviews_text: Fits well

links_reviews_title: Great blouse! Appropriate for work as well
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the chest area, and somewhat difficult to remove, but other than that a lovely top! Would definitely recommend
This shirt didn't make it over my bust. Super cute but couldn't wear it
Cute too but WAY too tight across the chest. Not something I run into too often with clothes so I was surprised!

This top was super cute. It was longer than expected and loose on the bottom, and if you like a fitted look, this isn't for you. It's a casual top, and I loved the sleeves, although they did pull when I reached. I had a hard time choosing shoes; I couldn't tell if it was in the red or pink family.
I wore this to work and received a lot of compliments. Fits true to size and very comfortable.
Very pretty and flattering. Hem detail adds just enough without going too bohemian.
The way it was cut just didn't work on me.
Beautiful and unique
I am 5'9" And this was long enough in the sleeves and covered my belt and front of my jeans. It wasn't too big or sloppy and I got compliments. It's a great top for work

I'm a 34DDD that usually wears a 10, rented the 44 before and it was snug at the chest with a minimizing bra on, now I tried the 48 and it was a bit loose, so I think 46 would've been just right. I'll rent the 46 soon, I love this top so much that I'd like to own it once I'm sure on the right size for me!
This top was so cute, comfortable and flattering. I got so many compliments. It's loose fitting but yet makes you look svelte. Will definitely rent again.

This shirt was fun to wear to a work event I had. I tried wearing it before hand which didn't work. I have a 2 year old. To lift him and do the things I needed to do the back was way too tight to do anything but walk and sit. #beautifulfabric
A lot of fabric in stomach area, would be great for maternity.

This shirt is SO cute! I loved it! However I wear a size 14, usually an extra large (38-40D). I got this shirt in what was listed as an XL (48). It was WAY too small. As in, I thought I was going to rip it taking it off. I was so sad I couldn't wear it!

links_reviews_title: One of the most flattering shirts of similar styles
links_reviews_text: Super cute and really flattering! It made my waist look really small
Super pretty and flowy. Only gripe is that it had a small stain on the right shoulder. Absolutely in love with the cuffs. They are so beautiful and fun.
I loved this coat, wore it so many times and everywhere.

links_reviews_title: Loud statement jacket! Love it so much! Beware it doesn't close though.
links_reviews_text: Warm and comfortable everyday jacket or can be dressed up. No way to close it though. Only reason I gave it 4 vs 5 stars
Yes there aren't any buttons or zippers to close but it kept me warm in 40 degree weather. Beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I would have bought this in a second
links_reviews_text: I kept this for the entire season because I could not stand to part with it (but also couldn't justify buying it) It doesn't have a closure so I had to hold it closed BUT I did that for months and it was still exceptionally warm. If it's still available next winter or gets caught up in a sale I'll probably buy it It was a power jacket for sure
Don't want to give this jacket back!!!!! So in love with it

Cannot explain how many compliments this got. It's boujee and fabulous. Only thing is the sleeves and a bit constricting and tight around the elbow? Otherwise was a bit bigger than I was expecting but probably should've got a L
This coat was fun and stylish! Oversized, slouchy fit and great with tight jeans or black skinnies. The fur is so soft and overall this coat is warm! I loved it!!!! Lots of compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: Compliments galore with this statement coat!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this coat! And I received countless compliments on it...from coworkers to strangers! It feels luxurious and I also feel pretty baller in it. The only downside is that it doesn't close because there are no buttons, snaps or even a belt. I think it can be worn casual or dressed up and is just fun!

I love big coats because I am a lawyer and need a coat that fits a suit underneath well. I got a lot of compliments on this coat and it was very warm and cozy for a winter work coat. I am small so I was lost in it but i still loved it.

Oversized but meant to be. Love the quality and the faux fur collar is gorgeous. Could overwhelm smaller frames. Warm but has no closures or buttons so as other reviewers mentioned the wind blows it open.

Such a stand out coat! Looks super luxe and was actually very warm. My sister and I both showed up for Christmas wearing the same jacket lol so guess it was a popular choice. Definitely size down I needed the small but was in a time crunch so stuck with the medium
Tons of compliments every time I wore it. Which was often. Arms were a little different to put on but a fabulous coat.
This is everything: I'm not sending it back. I live for an oversize look, and this accomplishes it without looking dowdy. Wonderful quality.
The coat ran a little big but I ended up liking the over sized look!
over sized, very long, can't even reach the pocket... but it deluxe, great faux fur, nicely tweeted fabrics, awesome construction----highly recommended if u are 5'5 or above

One of my favorite rentals! Runs a little big- I could have sized down but I liked the oversized look. The fur combined with the plaid make it easy to dress this coat up or down. Surprisingly versatile. I want to keep it! This is a must rent!

Amazing oversized jacket. Wore it for a wedding with a formal dress and it was perfect then took it to freezing weather and dressed it down- kept me warm the entire time and leaves room for layers. Only qualm is there is no hook or bottom at front, so if it's windy, you have to hold it closed.

Absolutely loved. Every day I wore this for the two weeks I rented it, people would stop me to compliment the coat. It doesn't button, so it made for some dramatic city walks on windy days. Overall it kept me warm, but just something to keep in mind that you have to hold it closed on a cold day. The only reason I'm giving it back is because the weather is getting a little too brisk for a coat that doesn't button. But highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: A little heavy, but a nice statement piece for fall
links_reviews_text: Wasn't expecting this to be so heavy based on the product photos, but it was a great fall coat to wear over all black. The fur will definitely get all over you, though! Recommend wearing with a taller boot or heel if you're petite.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it. Way to large.
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful and quality coat. However I didn't wear it because it was way to big and it didn't have buttons or anything to close the front of the coat. Perhaps it's the style. But it's not for me.

I absolutely loved this coat. I wore it many, many times. It went well with a formal dress under it as well as jeans and heels. It doesn't fasten closed, but I was fine with that. The fur elevates it but the plaid pattern makes it less fancy. It was actually quite warm. I will definitely be renting again!
This coat is fabulous! Very warm and thick. It is purposefully oversized, which I like about it.

This coat overwhelmed my figure. I'm 5'3" and 125 lbs. I ordered a S and it was very loose, so I rolled the sleeves. It's great if you're looking for a baggy/long style. There's no button or closure on the front, so it drapes open.
Wore several times, wrist strap detail hits weird on me
The fit is a little over sized but it's great for layering. Looks expensive in person.
Love love loveeee. I received so many compliments on this jacket. You can dress it up or down. Will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments. Unique coat unlike any other I have worn.
links_reviews_text: It's meant to be loose fitting so it has an oversized feel but super trendy and love the fur accent. There are no buttons or anything to bring it together so not optimal on super cold days when you need to bundle up. Wore this everywhere and really wanted to buy it.

This coat was a staple for my everyday look - I received so many compliments. It truly dresses up any outfit. The only reason I returned was because it was getting a little too chilly on the East Coast, otherwise I totally would have kept for as long as possible. Absolutely recommend for the fall/winter.
Pretty heavyweight, very oversized. Such a phenomenal add to any look

I loved this - but was looking for an actual winter coat for me to get through Midwestern winters. It doesn't have a button or anyway to fasten the front together, it was surprisingly not warm (wind cut right through it), and my biggest coat frustration: the sleeves weren't oversized enough to wear chunky sweaters under.
I'm typically a 4-6 and I got a small. It's adorable just huge. Definitely needed the XS. It's also VERY heavy and thick.

links_reviews_title: Wore in Paris and London beautiful and Elegant coat!!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful coat room to wear with winter clothes ,advise wearing bulky sweater or thin jacket under as it does not close !

It'll be hard to return this coat. So many compliments from a variety of people. It's oversized so very comfy, but the plaid and faux fur make it super glam. It's a little on the thin side for an NYC winter and doesn't close as other reviewers have said, but if I'm wearing a sweater underneath and scarf+hat+gloves, I'm fine. Or if I'm not wearing a sweater, I'll slip my thin uniqlo vest under the coat for added warmth, which I take off with the coat. No ones the wiser ;)
I rented the medium. It is huge still. I am 5'6 and usually wear a large. I sized down and it was too big.

The coat is beautiful but is very oversized, by design, but also sized very generously too. I usually wear a size 6, sometimes a medium, sometimes a small, and this medium looked at least two sizes too big, even if the fit is supposed to be very very loose. I think to get a fit resembling the model's, I'd have needed an XS, which I never wear.
This coat was sumptuous! I rented a M because that's all that was available, definitely roomy! I'd rent a S next time. Also VERY WARM!

links_reviews_title: I loved this jacket!!!! I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Pro: warm and beautiful Con: None

I instantly loved the look of this coat, but since everything this season seems so oversized I went down to a size M even though I'm 8 months pregnant. I'm so glad I did! I could have even gone down to a S. The fabric is really interesting in person and the collar is a knock out. It's a lot of look, especially since it's oversized, but it looked great over black or denim. I wish the sleeves had been just a little more fitted, then it would have been more flattering. The collar also sheds a little.

links_reviews_title: Nice faux fur collar. Fit is large and there is not a clasp. Not a practical coat.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are a bit large. There is not a clasp to keep coat closed. Not practical for winter. Looks nice hanging open but has a large, oversized fit.
It matches with any shoe type (heels vs sneakers vs boots)

links_reviews_title: The large was the only size available, but I still liked it.
links_reviews_text: Con. It's super delicate.

links_reviews_title: Weird fit it in the bust
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress and fit great everywhere except the bust was super tight. Going to size up and see if it fits.
Perfect work from home shirt during these weird times. Cozy but easy to glam up with some red lips!
Such a fun sweater! It's very warm so it's perfect for cold winters. I felt very chic

links_reviews_title: This sweater brought me so much joy
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater! It was very soft and comfortable, while still having a flattering fit. And the bear was just adorable. Wish I owned this!

I love this sweater. It was a little more fitted since its women's but I loved it. You can dress it up or down in your wardrobe. the polo bear also add a sense of vintage flair from the 90s. Will rent again!

Absolutely in love with this sweater! Wore it to Thanksgiving dinner and got so many compliments. It is thick, comfortable, and has room without being boxy. Such a cute and festive sweater for holidays! Highly recommend!
Adorable !! Smaller & more fitted than i expected but fit nice ... not boxy at all.
Best thing I've rented. So soft and comfy. Absolutely adorable, I would buy this.
Cozy, soft and comfy. Preppy perfection. Hits right at hip with split hem. For more pics& reviews @myRTRcloset
Looks like your grandmas in the best was possible! Love it. Kind of itchy, but otherwise, no complaints!

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - a great every day sweater and how cute is this lil bear!!!!
links_reviews_text: I've been LOVING everything Polo RL has been putting out this season & this is no exception. I love this little bear! The sweater is so cozy and runs TTS. The detailing is adorable and I even got this one NEW WITH TAGS!!!! More I loved on @thanksitsrtr or thanksitsrtr.com :)

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Very cute and very soft! Doesn't pill, looks really polished.
links_reviews_text: Really great, no comments in particular :)
Everyone loves the bear! He's so dapper and I received so many compliments on the sweater. Fits perfectly and is flattering!

links_reviews_title: Cute & surprisingly cozy, runs a tad large
links_reviews_text: This Polo sweater has a hipster bear on it... the cute factor speaks for itself. However, I was surprised by how comfy it is and how much I immediately wanted to live in it. It does run a bit large, so if you're looking for a perfectly fitted sweater, this will give you more space than you need
So cute. I liked the way it styles with wide legged jeans for a preppy-with-a-twist aesthetic
Small fits well. It's soft and cute. It's actually 100% wool according to the tag.
Super cute, definitely a thick warm sweater!
This is a high end sweater that doesn't scream that you're showing off. It was warm and adorable. I was a size 14 when I rented this and it fit perfectly.
Super adorable. Sizing is a little small and also short in torso/sleeves. I used a M but would have probably opted for L if I had the option to try on in person.

Classic ralph lauren sweater, the material was a bit scratchy at first but i got used to it. The sides have a small opening so i was able to wear it in pregnancy as well. It will fit well if you are very curvy or have a large stomach.

I am not a person who wears appliquÃ© sweaters, but everyone's wearing the RL bear, so I thought, why not. I was expecting a boxy, itchy sweater but was impressed with the soft sweater material, and the flattering feminine cut. Wore with denim jeans and velvet jeans. Might rent again and wear with a plaid skirt.
Really cute and can be dressed up or down
Wore this so often! Wish I could buy!!!
Very comfortable for everyday wear.
The polo bear is so cute and glad they brought it back. Very nice wool sweater. Just wear something underneath if you are sensitive to wool.
Lightweight, flattering and pretty pattern. There was a tie around the waist that didn't wrap all the way around, but I just tired it in a knot and it worked fine.

Pattern is a little different than I was expecting - I thought the dress would be light blue based but it's actually white, with the dark blue pattern on top. Still loved the fit and the little belt. Paired with grey stockings, black boots and a chunky grey scarf and it was perfect.
fit was great. material soft. super stylist and trendy. wish i owned it.
Rented this for a baby shower and received lots of compliments. I'm 5'8" and it hit mid thigh, but I'd recommend sizing down because there was a lot of extra fabric in the neck, waist and arms.
Loved this piece - perfect for fall or spring
Great for work or an event. The uneven hem is very cool!

Perfect if you want to wear a modern day sound of music curtain outfit. This dress didn't do anything for me and if you move too quickly the dress flys up in the back and your coworkers will get to see a sight you never intended on them seeing. Maybe would have been cute w a different belt and sneakers for brunch?

links_reviews_title: Such a happy and comfortable dress
links_reviews_text: Was so easy and comfortable. Beautiful colors and the fabric quality is excellent.
Lovvvveed this dress. Wore for parent teacher conferences at my school. Lots of compliments. Would've bought if not so $$

It's a cute print and the fabric drapes really nicely. However it fit me quite short, and I sit at a pretty medium 5"5. It looked fine paired with some stockings, but the material definitely makes it risky for a windy day
The pattern and shape of this dress were amazing. I'd definitely wear this dress again.
Dress fit well but nothing special. The material is light so better to wear in the spring than cold winter months.

links_reviews_title: I wore this out on for a Sunday afternoon date at a local biergarten. The fit was not ideal.
links_reviews_text: This dress was too large for my frame, but with some careful trying and draping I made it work!
I feel so good in this it is super flattering covers all my insecurities. Tons of compliments. Perhaps my favorite dress ever

links_reviews_title: Cute sleeves, appropriate length skirt for work and for a dinner out.
links_reviews_text: The high neck and long sleeves of this dress led me to believe that it'd be fit for late fall/winter wear. The fabric felt thin and better suited for summer. Therefore, it was difficult to style with tights and boots. Fit well and would consider renting again for a season that tights aren't necessary.
The sleeves are a bit billowy, but I liked that. Great material.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my child's baptism. Great dress!
links_reviews_text: Great dress, very comfortable.
This dress is gorgeous! It is a perfect length and very flowy! I love it!

links_reviews_title: Pretty spring dress but runs very large
links_reviews_text: Did not wear in part due to teleworking but also because it's gigantic! I wear a 10 sometimes a 12, and was swimming in the large. Pretty pattern and gorgeous color. although polyester, still felt nice and not staticky. Would rent again in a smaller size.

I love this dress and wish I didn't have to send it back! Great colors for spring, fun and comfortable fit, and received lots of compliments! Runs big - I'm a size 8 and wore a Small in this dress. Flattering silhouette and length, even though I'm short (5' 3") for a traditional midi dress. The sleeves are draped, so it's great for anyone who normally struggles with narrow sleeves. Sash belt helps with fit if you're between sizes.
Loved the vibrant color, length and weight of this dress. Could layer underneath or wear with boots to warm up, otherwise its too light for cold winters. Will rent again in the spring!

Was nervous to rent since there weren't any reviews and I always have trouble with dresses not fitting well over my bust, but this dress was perfect. Size was accurate and there was even a little extra room for nice flow. Great length, beautiful print. I wore it 2x on my vacation!

Rachel Roy is always a go-to for me. I found this dress to run a bit larger than her usual, I am a size 16 and could have easily sized down to the XL. Overall, it was a really flattering cut and beautiful print. My dress did not come with the belt pictured and I think that would have really taken this dress up a notch.

links_reviews_title: Dress itself, was gorgeous. I wouldn't rent again.
links_reviews_text: I started by trying on the XLR and it fit, but wasn't laying across my back very smoothly. So I went to the XXLR and it overall fit better, but the seem at the waist, dipped down weirdly. No matter how I tied the belt, that seem would show. The fabric was beautiful and it felt nice against the skin. It was also great to have a full coverage bra! I did forget to take a picture.

Definitely ran large, but it was comfortable and the tie/sash made it easy to make it fit your waist how you want and the top blouse-y. I probably could have gone down a size, but it was a back up dress. The fabric was nice and flowy. Great option for spring.

Loved this dress! Wore it to work (I'm a teacher) and it was a little dressy for my school but I felt really pretty in it. I could easily see wearing this to a shower or even a daytime wedding. Very comfortable. A little on the large side-- I'm usually between a small and medium and the small was even a little roomy (though the style is very loose and flowy).
I wanted to love this dress but it was large!! Definitely not very figure flattering but the color and pattern was wonderful. Wish it would have been more fitted!
Was fairly big, definitely needed a size or 2 down. There is a sash which can easily hide how big the dress may be.

While this is a great color you definitely need to size down, it is huge. Specifically found it huge in the bust. Wore it to work events in the second trimester and I looked a bit like I was playing dress up in my moms clothes. I sized up but honestly could have ordered my size and fit with my growing belly.

Threw this lovely in on my Unlimited subscription for a great everyday wear option. The color does not disappoint and I gladly wore this number from 8AM to date night with my beau at 8PM.
