Fantastic sweater for winter - really heavy and warm. A fave for sure. Volume in the body and shoulders but not too oversized - I went with a S instead of my usual XS for that cozy comfy feeling.
Heavier weight than I expected. Really fun color patterns. Loved it and wore it twice.

links_reviews_title: Such an easy sweater for everyday
links_reviews_text: Super easy sweater to go with jeans or skirts. The fit is great. I usually wear a small in tops but got this in a medium for a little extra room. It's comfortable and not super heavy. The colors are awesome, would definitely rent again!

I should've done more research on the material of the sweater before renting it. It's 78% wool, so pretty scratchy! If you are sensitive to that at all I would skip. However, with a camisole I found it bearable and it's so cute that I had to wear it out. I probably won't be keeping this one for long because I have to psych myself up to wear it, but it's a lovely color and fit, plus I got to cut the tags off. ;)

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! So fun and funky!

links_reviews_text: This sweater was TTS. I wore to work and out and about. Lots of compliments, love the mock neck and color combo. Would rent again
Loved the color, it hit at just the right spot on my waist, but it was too warm and cozy to wear all day at work.
This sweater is boxy, but still cute. Good colors and comfortable fabric.
Fun funky sweater weather that's a nice mix up to usual style. Cropped but not too severe. Sleeves could be a bit longer for us tall girls.
Cutest sweater for work or weekend, I got so many compliments! It is a bit itchy around the neck, but not all day!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much, I wish I could buy it!
links_reviews_text: Ended up wearing this to work on a casual Friday and received so many compliments. This sweater is so warm and cozy (and not itchy at all), the colors are fun and vibrant, and it fit perfectly. Probably my favorite item ever rented and I'm considering buying!

links_reviews_title: Itchy and oversized look didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: The colors are lovely but the fit and thickness of the sweater was just too bulky. And the inside was itchy.
A little itchy, but I wore a long sleeve under and it was great. Got a lot of compliments!

Very cute! When I first tried it on I thought it made me look like a line backer (puffy one the shoulders). But after pairing it with high waist jeans and black Chelsea boots I loved it!! Wore it a handful of times and got compliments!

This is like an on the go blanket! It's just slightly oversized so it perfectly envelopes you without feeling like you're swimming in clothing/constantly adjusting things. It's one of those sweaters I think you wanna wash several times to loosen the fibers so the inside doesn't feel itchy. I mostly didn't feel that but there was certainly a little bit of that sensation. I love the colors they are so vibrant and a unique color combo. It's a really fun retro look that I was totally obsessed with.

links_reviews_title: Great colors, not as great texture
links_reviews_text: This sweater has beautiful colors, but it's a tad boxy for me, and the sweater is not as soft as I would like it to be. However, I'm that person that has to touch everything in a store, and I know I'm a texture snob.
Love the colors, but boxy and a tad stiff
Fits true to size. The sweater is wool so I had to wear a layer underneath for the itchiness. Loved the mod neck and folded under look to make it more cropped and boxy. Would rent again, very warm!

links_reviews_title: Comes with belt. Felt a little broad, but overall cute!
Bright, fun pattern, over size fit
links_reviews_text: Loved the colors and pattern on this dress and received numerous compliments! I wish this was a more tailored/fitted dress, though. Without the belt, this dress definitely hangs loose and boxy, but the belt helps a lot. I found it a bit too squared off around my shoulders for me, even when it was cinched at the waist.

I was feeling bloated and like I didn't want anything touching my skin and this dress was perfect for that! Mostly because it ran a bit large. The fabric is thin and it does come with a belt that I didn't use because it made the ruffles look odd. Great dress for a pop of color during the winter!
I love this print, but the fabric was very thin and not the quality i expected. Didn't wear in the end bc I'm a size 12 and this was too large.
It's a great quality dress but does run large
The dress looked a bit different than I expected, but it was still beautiful. I'm petite so I belted it to make it more flattering. It's super comfortable and best of all...pockets!

Absolutely love this dress. I was planning on wearing it once and sending back but think I'll keep it for another week because it's so stylish and comfortable. I wore it out to a nice dinner in NYC and paired it with boots, but it was also appropriate in the office. The belt (which comes with it in a separate bag) is a must.
Odd fit. Did not fit bc I had nowhere to go, but I would have added a belt to cinch in waist a bit.
ad

Love the pattern and the cut of the dress! Got compliments from the second I walked into the office. The only thing I take issue with is that the dress has a matching belt in the photos, but one did not come with my shipment. Otherwise, I love it and will definitely rent again!
The dress is cute but it runs large so I would go a size up for the best fit!

Mid-weight material was nice for winter work day and evening holiday party with black tights and heeled boots. Floral print is really cute and pockets are always a bonus. Generous boxy cut that will hide all lumps and bumps, but needs belt for definition at waist. Overall runs quite large, so would definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, great pockets, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Will definitely rent again or buy. Perfect for work.
I got a lot of compliments on this dress but I thought it ran big and boxy, even with the belt
Loved the print and the fit. It's work appreciate and I would order it again.
Nice dress for work. I have wide shoulders and this was right between 'edgy' and 'unflattering' because of the side trim, but the belt helps make a nice shape. Nice color for winter.
Great dress. I wore it with tights for work. Didn't come with the belt so I paired it with a skinny belt I had and it worked great. Would rent again.
The dress is beautiful. I received so many compliments. It does run large. I definitely could have worn a size smaller but with the belt it ended up being okay.

links_reviews_title: I wish I liked this more...
links_reviews_text: I really liked the soft fabric and loved the print, but it was just to big at the shoulders for my petite frame.
Loved it! Belt made the dress and loved that it has pockets. Adorbs.
I really wanted to like this one. I looked like a giant pillow case. It also run a little large.

links_reviews_title: Great work to HH dress! Got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Runs large. Should have got the M. Cute fit, love the sleeve detail.
Very fun to wear, can look a bit frumpy at times through
Loved the look of this dress, but don't follow the guideline to size up in this dress. I was able to still wear it because of the belt but I wish I had sized down.
This dress runs very large - and they also forgot to include the belt it was pictured with. It looks great on the model - but being 5'3 / 120lbs it was way too large
The XL recommended size was way too big, the material is stiff and even tough is was huge on the body it fit on the sleeves

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing the dress runs very large and was extremely unflattering on
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing the dress runs very large and was extremely unflattering on. The pattern was overwhelming
I usually wear a size 6 or M but could have gone down to a size S

This is an amazingly unflattering dress. I looked like a giant sack of flour covered in flowers. The fabric, while cute in the pictures, is a touch more 1970s couch in person. There's paneling on the sides to make you look 2 inches wider ... because we all want that (???). It stayed on my body for a total of 4 seconds and was immediately sent back.

Wore this to a rehearsal dinner and loved wearing it! The large was a little big, but it was no problem with the included belt. There is a cool button detail on the neck and sleeves and the print is perfect for transitioning to fall.
This shirt is really pretty, the colors are beautiful and shiny , the fabric is a good quality. I love it and I might buy it.

links_reviews_title: Very bold shirt....not necessarily in a good way
links_reviews_text: This shirt was a lot. I loved the bright pattern, and the bow was cute, but the sleeves were SO poofy, and all of it together felt kind of overwhelming. It reminded me of Jerry Seinfield's "puffy shirt."
Gorgeous print, fabric and fit. I didn't realize how voluminous the sleeves would be and wore cardigan over them, they were a bit much for me

links_reviews_title: Great work top, pop of color in winter
links_reviews_text: My boyfriend said the print reminds him of bubblegum, but in a good way. Gorgeous silk shirt and neck tie, but will say sleeves were poofier than I anticipated!
Cute top, I think I should have ordered the medium but it just was overwhelming period.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work and felt a little like I had a clown shirt on.
links_reviews_text: It was very blousy and fine but would not wear again. A little too much with the print.

I really love this top! It's a stunning pattern that can be more casual with jeans or dressier with black slacks/jeans. I've kept it longer than usual and am debating buying. I would say it runs a little small, I'm usually a Medium in blouses but do have a larger bust so sometimes button ups are challenging. The app recommended I go with a large and it was right, fits my chest but isn't too oversized everywhere else.
This top has a lot going on so I paired it with a simple black leather skirt. There's a lot of volume in the sleeves but it looks great. I got some power-80s vibes from it, I felt like a boss lady.
I was on the fence with this top because of the bow, but glad I rented it. I've gotten so many compliments on it all day. It is a great silk material that does not wrinkle easily. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Cute print and great fashionable top
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments. I wore this near Christmas for work since the pattern looked a bit like Christmas balls. Beautiful construction and details. Would rent ANYTHING from Hunter Bell!
This top is adorable! Fun print, nice quality fabric. Going to wear a few more times before I send it back.

links_reviews_title: Really fun top to wear on jazz up a casual Friday.
links_reviews_text: I was working an award show later that day and felt cool to not wear sneakers and sweats as is the typical on-set attire. I love the flowy arms. I left the pussy-bow untied for a more rocker vibe but looks good done up as well. I paired the top with bell-bottom jeans and snake print boots.

links_reviews_title: Interesting style, tricky to figure out and fit is a bit fig in the shoulders
Ended up loving but hard to figure out
links_reviews_text: Took way too long to figure out the buttons but it is different and striking and drapes well. It was a little oversized & v long especially in back.

links_reviews_title: Hard to figure out, but amazing once it's on!
links_reviews_text: There's a how to infographic on the designers website that helps a lot. This is amazing once you have it on, but it was confusing for sure.

links_reviews_title: It took awhile to figure it out
links_reviews_text: The jacket is quite unique, however it took me awhile to figure out how to put it together: there is a vest part on top of the jacket. The designer's website has instructions on how to wear it in 3 different ways. Also, it's oversized, which gives kind of a retro vibe.

After consulting the online instructions I figured out how to wear the garment in the different ways, but found that even done correctly it was too many straps, buttons, and wraps to wear for even a few hours at work, I had to keep fussing with it all day. Cute idea and it looked nice, but impractical even for my largely desk job.

oh em gee! it may be the my heightened anxiety, but this piece nearly brought me to tears. so much respect for those that were able to figure this out. i think it would have been possible if the jacket arrived correctly buttoned which was not the case. as soon as possible i am returning this jacket! it's just mocking me right now. so disappointing.
It was too complicated and I couldn't figure out how to get it on so I didn't wear it.

I should have paid closer attention to the reviews. This jacket was so complicated to put on. I finally figured it out and it was incredibly sloppy looking. I hate when I let a RTR item go unworn, but this was way to much to figure out!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't figure out how to get it on
links_reviews_text: I couldn't even figure out how to put this on. Also, runs large. Didn't wear it.

I had my sights set on this blazer since it was first posted on the site! Once I finally got my hands on it, I was sadly disappointed. It took me 20 minutes to figure out how to get this thing on, and once I got it, it looked painfully baggy. Totally swallowed me. Unless you're 5'10 and a size 0, this blazer is just not it, next!
Could not figure out how to button this baffling jacket. Many extra buttons and pieces. Much confusion. Couldn't wear it out, returned it!
This is a beautiful motorcycle jacket with great details! The lightning bolts just make it that much cooler!

This was REALLY warm and cozy, it's hard to tell unless you zoom but there are lightening bolts on it too (making it more "casual" imo). I wore this in 47 degree weather and was totally warm. BUT be warned -- it runs large. I am normally a solid medium but could've gone for an XS (I think). The medium would've been good if I'd wanted to layer this. There isn't any shape to it either, so it can be a bit boxy feeling/looking. Overall I did like it just wished I'd have gotten a size smaller.
This was a super cute leather jacket and loved the detail on it bit it had such a weird smell (chemicals from cleaning) I couldn't wear it. Such a shame but too over processed.
I loved it. Runs a little on the bigger side, I'm usually a medium/small and definitely should have ordered a small
Wanted to buy. High end, looked good alone or under topcoat w fur collar

links_reviews_title: Adorable jacket but unfortunately was too big!
links_reviews_text: Would have loved to wear it, but it was too big and too boxy on me. Ran bigger than I was expecting even with sweaters underneath.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous jacket- love the edgy dark look!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is amazing. Flexible, soft leather and fits like a glove. I am 5'4, 115 lbs and the XS size fits literally PERFECT. I love it so much I'll probably buy it! Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: More than your average black leather jacket
links_reviews_text: This jacket is awesome! I wish I had a photo but I can confirm it is high quality and very soft, comfortable leather. There are black lighting bolts stitched all over the jacket which create a very subtle textural contrast with the black leather. My husband even commented that he loved that detail. I normally wear medium but it wasn't available so I wore the large. It fit fine and I would say TTS since it wasn't as fitted as I prefer. I will definitely rent again in my normal M.
Love the feel but beware there are lightening bolts all over the leather. Makes jacket more casual than I anticipated. Collar is thick and warm.

links_reviews_title: The quality and details were amazing, but it was too small across the bust.
links_reviews_text: I loved the lightning bolt pattern on the jacket. It reminded me of David Bowie. The leather was soft and luxurious. VERY sad that I couldn't zip it over my bust. I will try again in a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: Edgey black leather jacket perfect for everyday use
links_reviews_text: Super cute and comfy. The fur around the neck really keeps you warm! You can dress it up or keep it a more casual look.
But.... it's way too$$! I wear almost daily. I love the lightening bolts. I have worn for work with a sweater and dress pants or casual with jeans. I get compliments everyday! Best ever!

I kept this jacket much longer than I intended because I loved it so much. The lightning bolts are a subtle touch and a great conversation starter. I wore this to dinner/drinks with friends, on my way to the office, and even to a christening. I will definitely rent again!
Fits great
it oddly looks cheap. shrug. sending back for something more exciting.

Enjoying this leather number! I ordered to have a leather jacket for dates and was quite surprised by the woven lightning bolts on the jacket. I would not typically pick this to purchase but have been enjoying wearing it. It goes with everything date ready. The fur is super soft and cozy in a good cool vibe way. I will likely keep it for a few months to enjoy!
Loved this jacket. It's perfectly chic, with its detailing, and warm too. Would recommend and rent again. I sized up and could have taken my true size but I liked having room underneath

links_reviews_title: super chic and playful leather jacket!
links_reviews_text: Love the faux fur lining, kept me so warm! I was a little taken aback by the lightning prints but it was so subtle until you looked closely. Such a chic jacket and I'm obsessed with the soft leather. Would totally rent again!!
It fit fine and it is a good quality item. But I was disappointed in how it looked in person. It didn't wow me.
I only wore it once. The dress itself is heavy. So it wants to pull down in a way. I found the perfect bra and was fine.
I paired this with the black Michael Stars leather accented cardigan and it looked great. Agree the straps are too long so could have sAfety pinned them. Beautifully made dress and love the colors.
I liked it a lot, but would not rent again because the straps are too long.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable but not super forgiving
links_reviews_text: Love the look and feel of this dress and it is a perfect work to dinner transition dress, but it is a bit clingy in the stomach/hips. I felt a bit self conscious of that all day and kept a little jacket on as a result
The fit was good with one exception, the straps had a lot of stretch so I had to keep pulling them up. Otherwise very cute and comfortable. I would probably size down if I rent again.
This dress was FANTASTIC for our engagement photo shoot. Light weight and well fitting! It can be office worthy as well!
The material makes the dress- stretchy but heavy enough to create very nice lines without being too hot for August. Wore it 19 weeks pregnant, really loved the fit and look.
This dress is beautiful but my bra keeps peeking out the square neckline, as you can see on the photo. Not really appropriate for a conservative workplace.

I wore this for work. The upper body was cut pretty small, so my bra straps showed. I ended up wearing a little white cardigan over it because I felt slightly naked in the work place. Would have been ok with this dress at an outdoor wedding or event.

links_reviews_title: Made me wish I were wearing it while shopping in Paris!!
links_reviews_text: This is form fitting on top, but very flattering. The dress is very chic and garnered tons of compliments. The material is a bit heavy but not in a way that bothered me.

links_reviews_title: Very vibrant and rest for summer
links_reviews_text: The colors are beautiful on this dress. I normally wear a 16 and the XL fit very well. I think it was generally flattering and fun. I only wish it was cut more to emphasize my curves. I wanted to wear some shape wear under it to feel a little more confident.

I rented this for work and paired it with a white jacket. My boss loved it and asked me to show it to her on the app so she could rent it herself. I am usually between a 2 or a 4 (closer to a 4) so I got a small but I wish I had gotten an XS. The straps were a little long and the top kept sliding down so my bra was showing, but it was okay because of the jacket

links_reviews_title: Great fabric... a little clingy to the curvy parts
links_reviews_text: It's very comfortable! The fabric gives a hourglass shape by clinging to the curves. I had to wear Spanx to keep it from clinging to the lumpy parts :) The straps are a little loose on me. I wore a strapless bra. The fit is nice though.

Wore with a blazer for work and with a jean jacket on the weekend: heavy high quality skirt. The straps were a bit long on the medium- small May have fit better with how stretchy the material was. Would rent again! Flattering and Fun.

links_reviews_title: This dress is everything and then some!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work, vacation, date night, shopping, showers - you name it. Such a classy style, I might have to buy it.
Just fabulous. Different work wear. Lots of compliments.
Beautiful DVF dress. Perfect for work paired w a black blazer. Not sure which I loved more - the pattern or the pleating. Will definitely rent again.
Since straps are not adjustable, this is not for petite
Nice dress but I had to wear spanx under and a GREAT bra as it shows every imperfection.

Loved this dress! It's knit so it definitely hugs and shows off all your curves. If you like Ted Baker's knit skater dresses you will like this. This hit me right under my knee - a great length. The cut is perfect for a pear shape. I'd definitely rent it again. I got asked out by a total stranger in the morning while wearing this dress. Just saying.
Love it
Wore this out to dinner in the Caribbean. Loved this dress. Felt dressed up - but not too dressed up - and very comfortable. Very stretchy. It's snug/tight in the bust and torso but wears nicely.
The straps accentuated my un tone back and I did not wear it because of that.
Loved this dress! Knit material, but not heavy. Very flattering. Colorway is really pretty! I usually wear medium but sized down for a slightly more form fitting fit
Flattering and a different piece. Cute

I got this dress as a back-up for my baby shower. It fit true to my original size, even 6 months pregnant. I didn't think it was the most flattering on a pregnant shape, however I do think it would be incredibly flattering post-pregnancy. Planning to rent again for future events!
As mentioned by others, the shoulder straps were very long. Also the dress smelled like smoke.

links_reviews_title: So cute for work and vacation!
links_reviews_text: It is a heavy dress and was weighed down throughout the day. I would say it is true to size but would have sizes down since it stretched out.
The dress fit pretty good. The straps would randomly fall down however

The material is heavy and has a lot of stretch to it but the waist line is not maternity-friendly; it cuts across the middle of the baby bump, not above it. Iâm a size 8/10 pre-pregnancy and the medium fit while 36 weeks pregnant, so I would suggest the dress runs slightly big. Cute dress, but also appears very casual and more appropriate for daytime events/activities. Not a good choice while pregnant.
Rented this for a baby shower and got so many compliments! So comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but so much white made me nervous to wear.
I LOVE THIS DRESS. This is so comfy, very slimming and super chic. I paired with Tory sandals.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a tiny bit heavy, so if you're walking a lot, it will weigh itself down and pull down. Otherwise, it's absolutely perfect. Perfect length for work, straps are wide enough so the workplace as well.
So many compliments! Amazing fit and pattern!

links_reviews_title: Nice fit, perfect length. Wore it out to dinner.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a nice length, fitted top with a looser skirt. Make sure to consider adding a necklace.
Great fit, color. I loved this for summer. Will rent again!

I loved the colors and the fit of the dress but the straps were too long. TTS otherwise but because the straps were too long the dress slid down to reveal the top of my bra or would slide off my shoulders.
This dress fit great but the straps were too long but I just pinned them and it looked great. Got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments on it. Wore a navy blue blazer for work and heels for happy hour!
links_reviews_text: Great fit great dress! Would buy but not for $400...
Straps were too big and the bottom skirt is very unforgiving. Couldn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Totally underwhelming and too much purple
links_reviews_text: It looks very matronly on. And the purple is a lot to take on. I was planning to wear to work but am not going to. Felt blah in it.

SUPER fun dress, that I imagine fits true to size. I ordered a 10 and was sent a 14, but I imagine this is how a 14 would fit. I was able to do some creative tuck and pinning and make it work. It's seriously cool, well constructed and one heck of a statement! Shirt girls, beware that it is definitely long. I wore 3" wedges and left the bottom button unbuttoned at 5'0.
I was tempted to purchase this piece. The draping is so flattering & the material is lovely. It's perfect for work or play.

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress to dress up or make casual
links_reviews_text: This dress gives you shape and is really pretty. But the slit was a bit high and it didn't feel entirely comfortable. Also the buttons didn't lay flat and exposed the under.

links_reviews_title: This dress is very flattering if you are short waisted
links_reviews_text: I work in a bookstore so this relaxed, cool vibe was perfect for me. My only complaint- I have a belly so I had to pin a little between the buttons around my belly button. I blame my apple shape. Overall love it and might rent again! Love Kate Spade!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, many compliments, button coverage needed more at the chest area.

links_reviews_text: Comfortable dress for everyday.

Great dress! I loved the color and it wasn't too warm. I would flag the bottoms that fall around your belly. There are clips to tighten up but they were sorta falling off and would stay in place. I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and stylish and loved the length.
links_reviews_text: This was a fun dress, a little different than my standard work fare but reliable Kate Spade quality. Great color/ pattern and an easy, comfortable, true-to-size fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful day to night work dress
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, silky fabric and shape. Elastic belt gave waist some definition while being comfortable enough to go from full work day to nighttime event.

Yes there is this bunching at the waist but I love this silhouette. It's super comfortable but also surprisingly flattering. Lots of compliments and people at work are noticing all the fun dresses I wear. I refer to RTR as my dress library. Still debating whether I should just buy this. I'm also tall so ladies who are shorter may find this dress a bit less flattering.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for Jewish holidays and loved it. Looked good and comfortable. Will rent again!

links_reviews_text: I've been regularly wearing a 12 lately but I think I could get away with this in a 10 next time. (And there WILL be a next time). Great pattern. Flattering fit. Fabric is nice and it has little hooks-and-eyes between the buttons so you don't have to worry about gaping. You can adjust the cinch in the back for a better fit around the waist.
Wore this to a work event. Loved the print, makes an otherwise conservative dress unique and fun.

Beautiful dress, great colors and amazing fit! Great little details like extra hooks to keep it from gaping open and a belt in the back to fit your waist. Very classic style that can be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Fun print but lots of fabric
links_reviews_text: Fun lightweight print for summer. Only downside is the top had a lot of extra fabric, I had to knock a star for that. Overall good rental.
Very comfortable dress, perfect for work.

I'm not entirely sure if I just don't know my size or if it runs large, but while the 4 fit, a 2 would have been better. I have large booty and thighs, and small waist. Dresses can sometimes be hard to fit: too big on top but too tight on the bottom. That wasn't a problem here. There's a belt in the back that can be tightened. I'm 5'4" and didn't mind the midi length. I've worn to work twice: once with heels and once with flats. It's a lightweight dress that's nice for the hot summer temperatures. Pretty pattern and I received a number of compliments. Comfortable for work and with all the pattern, no need for other accessorizing - just simple jewelry.

Loved this dress for work! A brighter pattern than I normally wear but the colors are beautiful. Very comfortable and easy to wear! The 2R fit great with a little room to spare, could have possibly gone down in size if available but the 2 fit great!

links_reviews_title: Cute, but definitely for tall people
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing the dress. I think I could have gone a size down, but it was borderline. You can tighten the waistline using the belt buckle tassel in the back, but when I tightened it all the way the extra fabric from the buckle hung weirdly, so I safety pinned it in place. I'm 5'7" and I generally find I have a longer torso and this dress was almost too long in the torso for me. This dress would be great on a taller lady or long waisted folks like me that are slightly tall. I would not recommend for average or petite height ladies both because of the waist and overall length which was mid-calf on me. I wore this both with a navy blazer buttoned to the top for work and more casual for dinner with the top few buttons undone down to the bustline. I thought it was cute both ways.

links_reviews_title: My sister said it made me look like a school-marm.
links_reviews_text: Maybe this dress would look better on a taller woman, but it just didn't work for me (I'm 5'4"), and I didn't wear it. My first thought on looking in the mirror was "Little House on the Prairie." My sister's comment was it made me look like a school-marm. The fabric is nice and light (definitely a summer dress). I did like that it had small hooks in between the buttons to keep it from gaping open; that's a nice design feature. There was too much fabric in the top of the dress, which bagged down unattractively above the waist.

links_reviews_title: Kate Spade really knows how to make women's clothing!
links_reviews_text: Kate Spade makes clothes that fit fantastic & make me feel great! Everything fits just as it should and the quality is wonderful. Would recommend 1000 times.
did not like the belt in the back

This dress has great detailing to highlight the waist. If it were just a couple of inches shorter, it would have been a serious contender for purchase. The hem hit just at the widest part of my calf instead of a more flattering "just below the knee" length.

links_reviews_title: looked very professional and yet fun
links_reviews_text: comfortable

links_reviews_title: Great Dress - Made me feel sexy in my post partum bod
links_reviews_text: Feeling really awk and in between sizes post baby - this dress gave me the boost I needed. Great for big boobs !
Cute and comfortable dress for day. Fit well, colors are very pretty. The length was hitting me just about mid calf.

links_reviews_title: Perfect balance of style and coverage.
links_reviews_text: Great dress for work. It was long enough, wasn't too tight and gave the option of being loose or tight.
I absolutely loved this dress. It was very flattering even on a full figure. Wore it twice and will rent again.
Fit well all over. Nice snaps keep buttons from pulling
Wore the dress to work. While the print was lovely and the waist cut flattering, the buttons were spaced a bit weirdly down the front which led to weird gaps at the bottom and through the chest.
This is a great dress; not super flattering on me but easy to wear.
Loved wearing this dress to work even in the winter. Very easy to wear!

links_reviews_title: Runs long, I'm 5'4" and it fell a few inches below my knee
links_reviews_text: Cute
I loved this dress to much. If it was less costly I def would've purchased. The pattern and fit is amazing!
This is a great spring dress. It's actually lavender flowers on a purple background. I love the cinched waist, and the length wasn't an issue for me, especially worn with heels.
Great, flattering, comfortable, dress, wore with silver jewelry and white mules. Perfect for work or evening out.

I rented this for work but didn't wear it. I am in my late 20s and I felt this dress was too buttoned up. I am 5'4" and the dress fell awkwardly mid calf. Combined with the buttoned up chest it felt too modest for my age and made me feel frumpy. Furthermore, the material was a bit thin and did no favors to my thighs (I'm pear shaped). I returned without wearing it. I would recommend this dress for someone thin and tall so it would look more elegant.
didn't like the fit at all - not flattering on my figure; would have looked great on a slimmer woman
A soft spring jacket with flattering lines. The material is really special -- kind of nubby -- and the jacket is lined. Very nice.

I don't usually wear blazers because they're not super flattering on me but this one was so chic I decided to try it. Glad I did, was a great fit and really soft/comfortable. Definitely work appropriate but would also be fine for a weekend because it's kind of cardigan-ish.
I like my arms covered even on a Zoom call. Attractive styling on this jacket. It was a bit big on me.
Super small did not even wear this..
This is a very nice blazer and great for the office but it definitely runs large, especially in the arms, it wasn't exactly flattering but I would rent again in a smaller size
This is a very classy, sleek piece and it is so amazingly comfortable. Looks and feels expensive, one of my favorite rentals so far
I wore this to work and it was a great basic piece.
This blazer is so cute and a nice medium weight without being restrictive. It's not super fitted, but enough to still give you shape.
Loved this blazer! Good, thicker fabric, looked crisp and clean. Hit right at the hip. Wore it to a few work meetings and almost kept it!
True to size, not too cropped even if long torso

links_reviews_title: Not quite right for my frame
links_reviews_text: The fit on this was not good for me. I'm tall so it was too cropped and boxy on my frame. Was not flattering.
Runs big, and the arms are long. I'm normally between a 6 and 8. I wore the 8, but it was huge. But I really liked it, so I'll probably try again with a 6.
Fall is almost here! Wore this to work on a day that the temp was in the high 60s/low 70s and it was perfect
Loved this coat! Warm, chic and classy. Only wish it wasn't such a magnet for fuzz and hair.
Super flattering jacket
Rich color, nice weight and and comfy.

links_reviews_title: It was not as polished but very warm.
links_reviews_text: it's great for everyday and cold weather.
Perfect coat. Heavy, heavy wool so you stay warm. So well constructed and the finishes are very detailed, beautiful dark olive color.
My husband thought it looked like a bathrobe but I enjoyed it. Not overly warm but fine in 40-50s

links_reviews_title: Great fit and a very neutral color.
links_reviews_text: I was size 14 when I rented this and it was a perfect fit. Also, at 5' 3", I did not find the sleeves or coat length too long. My only complaint is that if it's very cold out and you want to keep your neck/chest warm, you'll need a scarf. I loved this coat.

links_reviews_title: Nice classic coat, but nothing special.
links_reviews_text: This was a quality, classic coat, but a little plain for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Warm classy and great for petites
links_reviews_text: This jacket made me feel like a million bucks. It's SO well made, and fit great for petites. I usually have an issue with jackets being too big in the shoulders or long in the arms and this was spot on. I never thought I'd need a dark brown coat but I was wrong.
I ordered a size up and was way too big. Liked the color and styy, just need the right size

links_reviews_title: It looks like a robe. I thought it was black originally but it's brown
links_reviews_text: Very basic and drab. I sent it right back, unfortunately. I thought it would satisfy a classic coat but it just looked like a bathrobe and the color is not very attractive in my opinion

Rented this coat for the hood and lined interior. The interior did have signs of wear as in the fluff looked a bit warn. It was still toasty and good for a night out or walking around during a rainy day. The pockets snap shut, though, which is worth noting
Warm and stylish bomber jacket!

links_reviews_title: BEST JACKET EVER. My hardest goodbye.
links_reviews_text: Best jacket I've ever worn. Super warm. Nylon exterior. Wasn't waterproof but whatever. Perfect for every day wear -- I literally wore it everyday of February. I would have purchased but it was $$$. Literally shed a tear when I had to return this. Thank you RTR <3

Loved the cropped look and fit. Fit well if you're going for that look (which I was). Great with high waisted jeans and a T-shirt. Made a basic outfit a little more fun. Also super comfy. Would rent again
This jacket was warm enough to travel to the airport in 30 degree weather and keep me warm on a 50 degree day. Not the most flattering but a size down might have been cuter.
cute + comfy cropped bomber
Warm and cozy jacket. Fun bomber fit. Loved it!

I can see how this jacket would not fit someone on the taller side but at 5'2 fit me perfectly. Wore in 30/40 degree weather and was pretty warm. My only complaint is I wish there were more pockets. There was two side pockets but with a snap button; wish it was a zipper.

I loveeee this jacket. It felt edgy and hip and it was super warm. It is very cropped though which made it difficult to layer with long or thick sweaters (which is a necessity for a jacket to wear in winter in my opinion). Still absolutely loved wearing it though and my husband told me it made me look "like a badass" haha. Fun rental!
loved this causal bomber. Its lined with fleece so super warm. I could have definitely worn a medium, but rented the large because that was all that was in stock!
Won't stay put when raising arms while zipped up
This jacket is comfortable, cute and warm. I have a long torso so the fit was a bit higher on me than the model in the photo, but still really great
Really nice bomber but it's very cropped. I found it to be a little small.
Perfect jacket to add on top of your fitness gear. Stylish, fun, and minimal. Keeps you warms too! :)
Warm and durable on rainy days. Wore hiking and other outdoor activities and held up! Do note that it is cropped
This is my second winter renting this bomber. It is very cozy, easy to wear with most anything and warm.
Great jacket. Comfy, cute, sporty and warm (but not too warm!)
Love this. Great for Fall transition. Love the style matched with comfort.

links_reviews_title: Warm fashionable jacket when I needed it
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a vacation to a colder climate. Fits well but is a little short in the mid section
Comfortable slightly baggy fit. Love the cozy boucle lining. Side pockets are a bit small but the interior pocket is a good size.
This is a great quality puffer jacket. The inside is totally lined in pile, which I didn't expect. It was too warm for me to wear much in the summer, but I'd consider re-renting it in the winter!
Definitely heavier than I thought it was going to be, as it was lined with fleece, but it was perfect for traveling. so comfortable!
Very comfortable everyday jacket.

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket! It's thicker than it looks. Great for LA winter nights
links_reviews_text: I got an Extra Small which is on the smaller side for me and it fit really well.

links_reviews_title: Warmer then it looks but not too bulky.
links_reviews_text: Hits right at the waist. Not a light jacket. Perfect for fall football game.
The jacket was a little tighter than I had hoped, but still kept me nice and warm.
Big enough to wear over winter sweaters.
Very flattering, word with layers and it's actually quite warm. So unfortunatey I had to take it off. ð
Thicker than I thought it would be- warm and versatile.
Was bulky - but in a trendy way, not just oversized. Was much warmer than I anticipated - had a warm fleece lining. Was very casual.
I loved the fit, I was warm all day wearing it but still felt like it gave me a small waist! Didnt feel bulky
Warm and cozy and looks cool
This jacket was fine but a little underwhelming. It was a nice black bomber but nothing extra. The fit was medium in the body but the sleeves ran a little short for me. Wore it once.
Super comfortable. Fuzzy interior is great for added warmth.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy jacket and soft, warm inside.
links_reviews_text: Very cropped jacket. Really comfortable inside, but you need to wear with something high waisted or the proportions are off.

This seems like a nice quality and well-made jacket, but the fit and proportions just didn't work for me. The material was heavy and thicker than I was looking for, more wintry than spring. Although I rented an XS there seemed to be a lot of extra material that bunched up in the middle, which made my petite frame look bulky. The shoulders were too big as well.
I didn't love this. It didn't have any shape on me... might look better on someone petite. The coat was nice and warm and in good condition. It's definitely a cropped silhouette.
Loved this jacket. Went well with casual and dressed up look. I ordered XL because I wanted to not be tight, I think a L would've fit better in the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Really wearable to any type of occasion- weekend or night out
links_reviews_text: Very cropped, so I wouldn't size down, despite it's looser fit. A super cute bomber. Wish I could buy!!

I've been wearing this constantly the last few weeks in an uncharacteristically chilly Feb and early March in Southern California. This is a very very easy wear, furs great, roomy enough for layers without looking super boxy. Everything Vince is made well with great cuts.

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater but had a small stain
links_reviews_text: Great sweater! Thick but not too warm. Nice fit and great color. The only issue I had was that this one ad a small stain. I was out of town for work so I wore it anyway but I was a little bummed. Still a great sweater though!

links_reviews_title: Comfy funky sweater for casual Friday
links_reviews_text: Wore this for causal Friday at a work conference. Received lots of compliments and it kept me warm in the winter of northern Michigan. Arms and waist are a bit short.
I love this sweater. The colors make it a little fun but it's also very classic. It fit well (hit right at the hip on me) and looked great with jeans. Can't go wrong!
I like this sweater. Very comfortable and can be styled different ways to wear in different situations. Pretty and unique color combo. High quality and nicely made. This will be hard to return.

Rented on update so have for a month -holds it's shape well- - I like the fit as this is definitely only made for petite people sleeves are cropped even on me. I would just say the style isn't so flattering but it is well made and very comfortable.

This is a fun, non-standard sweater! It fits true to size and I appreciated that the sleeves aren't overly long. It's textured, so not a feathery soft material but still totally comfortable and non-itchy. Definitely recommend!
This is a great slim fit. The sleeves are made to be shorter - so on someone with long limbs like me, they were a little too short - but overall a cute comfy sweater!
Great quality. Wore to work and out and about. Debated buying it because I liked it so much.
Comfortable and warm. Looked great with my burgundy denim.
Loved this--not a boring sweater, but not too crazy for the office or anywhere else. Looks and feels expensive, and warm even for January in New England. Fit is TTS.
Wore this sweater but it was a little itchy. Didn't get me excited.

Great sweater for a shorter torso. Small runs slightly loose (perfect for me because I have wider shoulder and a larger chest) and was the perfect fit for me at 5'2". Material is not scratchy. Super cute. Will definitely rent again
You can tell this sweater is expensive. Beautifully made, nice thick but not bulky or too warm knit

links_reviews_title: Thick and soft two-tone maroon and orange sweater felt very fall
links_reviews_text: I rented this for everyday dressing on cool weekend in LA. I felt cozy and stylish wearing some brighter fall colours.
Great quality bag. The inside of the bag had a lot more space than I thought it would from the picture.
Dressed up winter whites and black tops. Could've bought it!
Absolutely loved this duster. Got so many compliments. Fits TTS. Very flattering. Matches everything. Want to buy.
There's no way you'll wear this and won't get a million compliments. It's such a unique piece. Make sure to wear on a chilly-ish day because it is a bit heavy/keeps you warm

links_reviews_title: This duster was EVERYTHING - such a standout piece, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This is such a fun pattern and even though it's a floral it is dark enough to wear in the winter and not be an eyesore. I took this duster from everyday in Boston to an awards ceremony in LA to a work trip in AZ and it worked for every occasion
This duster makes any outfit look amazing!
Amazing, but really big. Try 1 size down and then enjoy the compliments!

This duster jacket was my favorite part of my first RTR delivery. I layered it over a Jennifer Lopez sleeveless jumper to wear to the Oscar's Red Carpet Event, and got so many compliments!! Brad Pitt even looked at me! This fit me perfectly and the arms were wide enough so I could still layer long sleeves under it comfortably. This duster is a showstopper and I highly recommend!
Amazing coat. Great statement piece. Looks great and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It was a great jacket! I got alot of compliments
links_reviews_text: I should have got a size 6, but the 8 was the only one available. It was a bit big but worked for the look.

i waited to rent this for so long! ended up throwing it over a black turtleneck with black skinny jeans and boots so it was the main attraction. fits true to size, but my shoulders are a bit broader. the colors aren't as bright in person in my opinion, perhaps because there's a lot of the rust/pale pink color with the purples and teal thrown about. would love to pair this with a brighter outfit in the spring!
This was a statement maker jacket for sure. Very light weight and fits loosely but perfect. Love that it has pockets! Head turning and effortlessly cool.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful duster with an Asian-inspired flair!
links_reviews_text: This duster was gorgeous! My Taiwanese aunt who lives in Shanghai has brought me home oriental jackets before and this definitely had a tiny bit of that influence which I loved. The fabric is of a very high quality and it fits true to size. Paired with jeans, a black cami, and black pumps for a NYE party. My only recommendation is if you are on the short side like myself perhaps pair with at a minimum a small heel. It looks best that way. Enjoy!
I've rented this jacket twice now. It's perfect to throw over jeans and a basic top. Very nice material and a great fit. It's super easy to wear but still makes a statement.
Loved this coat! It was not very warm which is ideal for Houston Fall. Length was perfect on my petite frame.
I loved this coat! I wore it a few times with leggings and jeans and got lots of compliments. If it wasn't getting so cold outside I would have probably kept it longer!

It's light enough to wear as part of your outfit but has room for a heavier layer underneath if you use it as a coat. The number of women AND men who came up to compliment me on it was astounding. The colors are gorgeous, the print is beautiful, I love everything about this jacket. I paired it with a blue/green faux fur and it was perfect.

Loved wearing this jacket! I wore a heavier turtle neck underneath so I could be warm without wearing another jacket! So many compliments like "i love your jacket" "so chic". The floral pattern is perfect and beautiful! I love the big pockets and length.
This is a beautiful duster. Flattering and ran a little big. Highly recommend.

It's crazy how a single piece of clothing can make you feel way more powerful and bold. This jacket did it for me. Not only is it perfect for taller gals (I'm 5'9"), it's also beautiful and fits & flows wonderfully. Sleeves are slightly tapered, but via the lining inside, so it still maintains that loose flowy appearance. Colours pop and would be great for a lot of different skin tones (warm, cool, neutral). Also have I mentioned how comfy it was? The perfect weight. In love.
Wore this to work and will wear again with a black dress and tights. Lots of compliments, it's feminine but still edgy. Definitely recommend!

This jacket was everything! Light enough for a California fall (hot days cool nights). And went with everything! Paired as shown with a jumpsuit for work meetings. I also wore with a sequin skirt and cashmere top and pumps for another work event. Also styled with jeans and a T-shirt for an elevated casual look. Fabulous every time.
Beautiful print and movement! Runs true to size, light weight material. I wore all day with an all black outfit, endless compliments.

I love, love, love this duster. The cut, the pattern, the quality-- the pockets!! Love it so much. I wore it to Paris Fashion week and then a week or so after. Light weight, perfect for Fall. Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors and print in a light jacket
links_reviews_text: I wore this at the end of summer/beginning of fall when it was a new arrival for RTR for fall. The colors are beautiful and vibrant. I wound up wearing this twice, and it matched with both a muted greyish dress and heels, and also with peach-colored skinnies in a different, more casual outfit. I would definitely rent this again, and am glad I was able to rent it since it's a little too pricey for me to buy. If you're shorter, this might be quite long, but was great for my 5. 7.5" height (with heels!). The jacket is pretty light -- good for sweater weather, but I wouldn't expect it to do much in the fall. I don't recall with certainty, but don't believe it was lined.
Loved this for a work trip as summer is fading into fall. It was a bit long on my short frame but still lovely.
love this! received so many compliments, wore it to work and then out with friends for drinks.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful light jacket for shoulder seasons.
links_reviews_text: You will receive lots of compliments on this duster. No buttons or fasteners, this is not to be considered a practical jacket for the elements. It is flair and fabulously so.

links_reviews_title: Love this coat. I have a feeling it will be back in my rotation v v soon!
links_reviews_text: Dress it up! Dress it down! It's perfect for Spring or Fall. I absolutely love this duster!
Wore this to work to dress up my outfit, next time I would size down because it felt a little overwhelming on me.

Very easy to wear and the variety of colors makes it appropriate to cover a lot of different items in most people closets. No closure, nice sleek fit. Unlined. I consider this a slightly difficult topper, something that could almost be worn indoors but not quite and kind of not that warm for outdoors. It's for a pretty specific climate. It's still fabulous. My 3 star rating is about the color scheme - not for me. It is too warm for my cool toned hair and skin so this isn't something I'd buy or rent again. If it becomes available in a cooler toned color I would definitely rent that.
This jacket is amazing!! Definitely recommend it and adds a pop of color to any black dress / black outfit!
Great topper over dress pants or jeans! Add high heels and you are ready to hit the night club!

One of my favorite rentals. The only thing it is missing is a belt. Would buy it but it's too rich for my blood, but I've rented it several times and it adds just the right amount of flair to any outfit !
It's a cute and unique addition, especially for jeans. I did not like the military style shoulder boards. And it was a bit boxier than I thought it would be.

I like the floral print which was fun but it lacked character when worn. There isn't any form and the material is polyester-ish. Not sure if that was listed but... that's how thin it is. I wouldn't reach for it for a second wear if it was in my personal closet.
Amazing coat!!! Can't say enough !
I love everything about this coat! The print and fit were perfect, and the coat drapes nicely.

I rented this for a weekend away in the early fall, but have kept it for months, wearing it over dresses, with jeans and T-shirt, and basically with everything else possible...it makes a statement and I've gotten innumerable compliments on it.

This is a showstopper. I wear it every day - getting groceries, meeting friends for lunch, or going out. It goes with everything in my basic black wardrobe and jazzes it up so much. There are enough colors that you can't go wrong. Although it's not thick, bulky, or oversized, it is actually surprisingly warm. LOVE THIS!!!

links_reviews_title: Fun duster that can be professional and go out at night
links_reviews_text: I know other reviewers said runs way large-but I have broad shoulders and it fit me in the shoulders so I'd say TTS. It's a jacket-duster so I wore over a black business casual outfit and it was super fun. VIBRANT colors you feel like a painting. Something fun and different for work and easily transitions to night.
Wore this over a black jumpsuit for a cocktail event, and over black jeans for work. Treated it like a blazer versus a coat, rolled the sleeves, and wore as top layer all day.

Really love this sweater - heavy knit in a quality fabric that wasn't itchy at all. Perfect for these shelter in place / work from home times where you want to be comfy and warm but still presentable.
Loved the colors on this sweater! There's a dark green in the pattern that's really quite regal. It's also VERY warm - no jacket needed when I went for a walk in 45 degree weather.

links_reviews_title: So soft & comfortable but very large
links_reviews_text: This is so soft & heavy. Perfect for cold weather. But you can probably go two full sizes down

links_reviews_title: Very warm for extremely cold temperatures
links_reviews_text: This was the second time I wore this sweater. I would recommend only renting it if you're going to be somewhere that is really really cold. I wore it in Nebraska this time for work on a day that didn't go above 12 degrees. It was great for that and was super cute.
I love the quality and colors of this sweater! I normally wear a size small but I'm happy I read the reviews and chose and XS. It fits perfect!
There was nothing super special about this dress. It was very chunky. Have to have a big coat to go over. The color is a very light blue. It's definitely a winter sweater.
Fits okay, not a long sweater, but has big knits and has an extra chunky feel to it.
I rented but didn't wear it as it is a warmer knit and the weather got warm here so there was no need. I would rent this again in the winter.
Cute sweater. Warm. This particular one was clearly overworn, but it was fine to throw on with leggings and sneakers for a casual Friday situation
Loved this sweater. It was incredibly warm and cozy!! I have broad shoulders so I did size up which I'm glad I did as I could see it being snug if I went smaller. I would definitely rent this again!!
Normally an XS and this was a bit oversized, but I wore it for skiing and it all worked out. This sweater is HEAVY but very warm, good for outdoor activities where you want to look cute
This is a very soft sweater. Heavy as well. Great for a cold day.

links_reviews_title: My husband loved this sweater on me.
links_reviews_text: So warm and cozy. The colors are beautiful.

I wore this when I needed to be extra warm on a winter weekend get away. This did the trick and isn't itchy at all, very comfortable. It does run a bit big but I liked that look with skinny jeans and boots and felt warmer with it that size. Size down for a more fitted look.

I wanted to try out this performance fabric for a sweater. It is very thick and if your jacket is roomy, it is perfect for a cold day or skiing. You could wear with just a vest for spring skiing. I like the pale blue color and the simple design. It isn't extremely flattering but I could have probably sized down to a small and then it would look better. However, I'm wearing it with dark jeans and it looks fine. It looks like it goes your hips on the model but it is shorter on me, more of low waist length. One star off because I think the dry cleaning distorted the shape of the sweater.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater, very warm/heavy, but comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Very heavy, which was nice...didn't even wear a jacket when it was about 50 degrees. I really liked this sweater. The arms were a good length too for a person who is 5'9.5". Cute! Perfect for everyday winter.
Love this sweater. It's really warm but not itchy at all. As I feel some heavy sweaters can be.
Luv, luv, luv this sweater. Very thick and warm. It pairs great with jeans or slacks. A must have in your cold climate closets!
I sized up for oversized look and want to wear this every day! Today was in the 40s and I didn't need a coat, because this sweater is so heavy (in the best way possible). Tempted to buy!
Great holiday-ish pattern, super thick heavy knit, very warm. This is a sweater that lives up to its price tag. Would definitely rent again
This sweater is super soft and cozy. It's incredibly thick and best suited for extremely cold weather. Runs quite large so either order your usual size or size down.
Love this coat and am considering purchasing! It's so versatile. The one downside is the lining peaks through the sleeve openings frequently.

I didn't get a better pic than this but ended up loving and almost buying this coat. It looks boxy in the pic but didn't appear so for me as I wore it and the pockets and high neck were perfect. I wore in 20ish degrees and was okay- though needed a hat!
Loved this coat. Considers keeping it

I've been wearing this jacket for a few weeks now and have received a bunch of compliments. It's a little boxy as most Madewell things are but a good weight for 50s temperatures and perfect for everyday casual wear.

Was hoping it would be a bit heavier, warmer but it was on the light side. Great deep pockets, overall style was cute. The lining in the sleeves would stick out at bottom of sleeves regardless what top I wore. Wouldn't rent again.
This goes well with casual and work outfits, the gray color is very modern and as pictured. The pockets have no flaps making for easy access.
great bag, quality and style are very nice.

This jacket will make you look like the marshmallow man, but it is beyond warm. I wore it in 1 degree weather in Montreal. It's better if you unzip it for pictures, but zipped up, you are one big poof.
Really big but comfy. With tight pants or tights it's a nice contrast.
I rented this puffer coat for a trip to Yosemite and it was perfect for the snowy weather. Although it is quite puffy, it was really warm and actually ended up being pretty cute!
Was way too puffy. Felt like a marshmallow.
This is huge. It "fits" but looks MASSIVE on...too much puff.
It was cumbersome and just too much stuffing for me.
Cute jacket but very puffy - made me look like a marshmallow. Never wore it out
Extremely puffy jacket. I'm really short and it was a lot of fabric.

links_reviews_title: Too big, looks funny. Weird filling
Could not wear this. it was very cute but VERY large.
links_reviews_text: HUGE

links_reviews_title: Very puffy in a great, fun way. Very warm. Can cinch at the waist.
links_reviews_text: It is true to size, but it's big, so I would size down just in case.

links_reviews_title: Giant jacket but warm and different
links_reviews_text: This jacket was gigantic. I'm curious to know how a small would look. I usually wear a large and got the medium. It felt like I was wearing a sleeping bag out of the house. Which was actually nice since it was 10 degrees and windy outside. In the words of most moms: "it doesn't matter what it looks like as long as its warm."
Order at least 2 sizes down. I took a risk with a Large, however, it was big enough to fit my husband who is 6'4" 250lbs... If you wear M/L, order XS/S.
Love that coat!! Very warm!! Runs a bit large, you should go one size down, M really felt like an L for me, but I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Well constructed but very very large coat- size down!
links_reviews_text: This coat was missing a drawstring on one side, so it was unwearable I looked to see if it got lost inside, and I could kind of fish it out, but I think it is just gone from the coat completely. Without the drawstrings I sadly couldn't wear it

This is oversized in a bad way. You know the giant sideline coats they give football players to cover their pads and bodies? This was a similar look. And I knew it would be large but I thought I would be the exception and it would look great on me. I was wrong.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is huge, way puffier than the photo and i got a M and it was so large i couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Very big

links_reviews_title: This jacket is huge - it made me look like a tent! Though warm, it looked too ridiculous to wear.
links_reviews_text: Warm jacket, but not very flattering!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, felt like a marshmallow
links_reviews_text: This jacket is gorgeous - high quality and so cozy. However, it.is.gigantic. Size down unless you are with child, and even then... I'm sending mine back for a smaller size - I might go two down.
This jacket is absolutely huge - it drowned me (and I'm 28 weeks pregnant) - had no form to it.
Good quality coat. Seems very warm. But looks way too puffy on me. I wasn't able to pull it off. I am 5"2 and 118lb. Might work better on someone taller
If Steven Tyler is your fashion icon too, this is a good started level jacket. Super lux and I got a lot of compliments.
Great statement piece to jazz up any outfit. Rich colors and soft material.
Loved the fit and style of this blazer. Wear a tank under for a more work appropriate look or just a bra for a night out. Would rent again!
This jacket is pretty cute, but it does photograph better than it looks in person. The material is kind of thin and drapes, but I still got tons of compliments on it and was super fun to wear!
So comfortable and velvety. It's a blazer with a shirt feel, you could wear it with a bra like cami under.... but I would recommend to size up. It's gorgeous! Rent it

links_reviews_title: Rich colors, but surprisingly slouchy and unstructured.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is much thinner than expected, which leaves this blazer unstructured and slouchy. But fun to wear. Runs TTS (to slightly small.) Size Large fit perfectly. I usually wear size 8-10.
Wore to birthday party - similar to model I just ended up buttoning it and wearing bralette under. Was the perfect mix of risquÃ© and classy!
This blazer is not structured at all. But it is soft and sexy on! It is made of a very soft fabric, kind of a super soft flowy velvet? It is a really pretty jacket. Will rent again
Definitely not a structured blazer but it's absolutely beautiful and received a ton of compliments. Perfect for work and with jeans. Recommend. True to size.
Wore to work and for a night out. Comfortable and stylish. Can be dressed up or down.
Loved the fit! It runs a bit large so I sized down.
I'm between a 4-6. Got the medium. Fit fine, but could've gotten the small. Has pockets! Soft velour. Wore about four times.

Rented this just because I love a good blazer. The fit was very relaxed not structured or stiff, which I loved. I wore for Thanksgiving lunch but could be dressed up for work or something more formal.

I love this blazer! It falls really beautifully and is neither fitted nor loose fitting. It is extremely soft and comfortable. It makes a great work to night out transition piece. Its not particularly thick so its better for spring and fall. Would rent again!
Super cute. Loved the velvet! It's long enough to cover your butt if you want to wear with leggings

I've been wanting a pinafore for a long time. Decided to rent one. Loved it. I'm a size 10 and could have done a large, but wanted to make sure this wasn't too short. The XL gave me the length I wanted. Great rental. Might buy.
I paired this dress with another RTR shirt. I got a large but totally could have gotten a medium, but it was still comfy and cute!
Cute casual dress. Hits mid-thigh even on my small frame. Nice color and corduroy fabric for colder weather.
Got this for a trip to Austin! Worked well with my western motif. It runs large but i made it work as a vest. Loved this look!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for regs or pregs!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! 25 weeks pregnant so sizes up. Cute fringe at the bottom of the dress, comfortable and perfect for work then play. Would definitely rent again.
The fit of the dress wasn't great as it ran a bit big and looked frumpy. Probably wouldn't rent again but it was okay for wearing a couple of times!
Wore this to work & paired it with long sleeve shirt underneath and knee high booties. Felt cute & comfy all day and received a ton of compliments!
Loved this dress and it would be perfect for any holiday parties! I paired it with tights, booties and a black long sleeve, it'd also be cute with OTK boots.
The small was very big on me in the torso, although I'm afraid the XS would have been too short. Loved the fabric and the style, but definitely would recommend sizing down if you're on the fence.
Super cute and came with tags. Would rent again in a smaller size!
Cute! Fit is loose, but flattering. Great fall cranberry color. Wore casually and enjoyed it. Nothing super special but interesting everyday piece

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear because it was MASSIVE. I normally wear size small but I should have gotten xsmall.
links_reviews_text: Very boxy and not flattering. The front is cute but the back is massive looking from behind.
This was the perfect dress to wear over a gray turtleneck with tights and boots. Wasn't too tight in the back or the front.

I wore this over a fleece turtleneck and leggings for going to yoga, errands, and out to the movies on the weekends. It was fun to wear and I got compliments. It is a sort of a 90s style. I think it runs a bit short and also baggy. The color is beautiful.
Really enjoyed wearing this dress! It does run large / doesn't really have a shape, but that was part of its charm. Ended up wearing it twice and would definitely rent again.
Super cute with a turtleneck underneath. Paired with tights & booties for work very cute look
fit great for me

links_reviews_title: Wore with a gray turtle neck, tights and black boots - very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. not necessarily flattering, it has a boxy shape - but that is the style of the dress. I got so many compliments when paired with turtleneck, tights and boots. Will definitely order again!

links_reviews_title: Super wide around the hips. Definitely size down.
links_reviews_text: Really cute. Wish I had it smaller to see if it didn't make my hips as wide.
East to dress up or down. Easily replaced wearing jeans every day for a slightly more stylish look.

This dress manages to run both small and big at the same time. Air holes were way to big (XS), but the dress was soooo short (5'4). I planned to wear with tights and there was no way that was happening. I wore it for my boyfriend and he asked if it was a shirt.
Dress was too short and did not wear.

I loved this top! I wore it on a hot day in Mexico (no bra) and it kept me nice and cool. The straps are super cute. It buckles a little on the side by the zipper so maybe size up if you're between sizes.

I love the idea of this top but because it puffs out a lot and isn't low, it doesn't too much to flatter your body. If you have a long torso and a flat stomach, it could show that off but otherwise it's just a cute top, not sexy or particularly flattering.
Wore this tank a ton - loved it with high waisted jeans (it's pretty cropped). Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Squeezed me in all the wrong places.
links_reviews_text: I thought it would love this top but ended up not wearing it. Fit: As you can see in the picture the top squeezed me in all the wrong places. My side arm fat was sticking out, my boobs felt pushed down, the back felt too stiff. It's a crop top perfect for high waisted pants and even then there was a little bit of stomach showing Material: It was nice heavy material, perfect for a cozy summer night or out and about during the day time. There's little to no stretch. Straps are thin but not flimsy. You probably don't need to wear a bra since it's pretty thick. Overall: Sent it back without wearing it. Would not rent again. Cute design.

I wore this top out to dinner with jeans and thought it was a great look. The top has a built in bra so I didn't even have to wear a real bra or stickies with it. The layering fabric is flattering and the straps are adjustable, making it a really easy top for most to wear. Wish I could have worn this top more!
this shirt is tiny! make sure you want a tight little crop top if you're going to rent this!
This was an easy tank to throw on and make an outfit look cute. It was a little large on me but still looked good, I just felt the size difference in the interior bra.

links_reviews_title: It was very cute on, but much more cropped than it appeared in photos
links_reviews_text: Fit very well, I have a larger bust but had no problem fitting and zipping it up. Very stretchy and comfortable.
Loved this as a flouncy crop top! I have a fairly long torso and it hit about 3" above my belly button but was very flattering at that length

links_reviews_title: Cure with jeans and a cardigan or jacket
links_reviews_text: Very cute, a little tight on the chest but I wore it a few times with various jackets as it was still chilly.
Wore it to a girls brunch and it was the perfect late summer compliment.
Perfect top for a night out! Didn't need to wear a bra which is always a plus
Neckline in front did not lie flat- instead it kept bunching. Besides that, it was a cute top but nothing special. Yes, it's cropped.

links_reviews_title: Fun top, but a little shorter than expected.
links_reviews_text: I rented this top to wear on a casual date night and also a girls' wine tasting evening. I was glad I went with a size 2 instead of a size 0. Even with a small chest, the size 2 fit just right and I think a size 0 would've been too small. I paired it with high waisted jeans as shown on the model, but even then a little more skin was showing than I really wanted, so that was disappointing.

Loved the style and fit of this top. The size zipper was a bit strange. You zipped the internal fabric but not the external so there is a gap in the outside fabric to give access to zip the inside. This caused the top to look a little funny.

links_reviews_title: Easy to dress, much lighter than it seems.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering on top, very forgiving
Super cute and comfortable, no bra needed.
This crop top is extra short. Even with my highest high-rise jeans, you could see my belly. It was also tight in the chest and uncomfortable. Sent it back without wearing.

Loved this top!! Didn't have to wear a bra which made it soooo comfy and I ended up wearing it with jean shorts and sandals one day along with white jeans and heels for a party! Super flattering and fun!! Fit true to size! Highly recommend for bigger chested ladies!
Super cute top for high wasted pants , could see myself renting again!
Beautiful top, love the detail. Feels fun and flirty. However, I'm tall and this is cropped and I only wear mid-rise jeans. This just hit the top, had to be careful about stomach showing at work

links_reviews_title: Will be super sad to send this one back.
links_reviews_text: I've been wearing this jacket on repeat since I received it several weeks ago. It's edgy without being too edgy. Moto without feeling like I am wearing a costume. Looks great with denim, skirts, dresses, leggings...pretty much anything you pair it with. I'm typically an XS but got a S so I could wear it over sweaters, etc. It's a perfect fit! I'm typically not a fan of faux/vegan leather but this one is so well done, it's hard to tell it's not the real thing. Rent this jacket, if I send it back.
It's a little short on me because I have a long torso, but so cute with high wasted skirts or a party dress!
I felt great in this jacket except for the animal cruelty guilt. Then I realized it was 100% VE-GAN! (fake) so then I felt great and have worn it all over the place. May purchase. Obsessed.

links_reviews_title: Runs tight in the upper arm area
links_reviews_text: Very soft and lightweight which I loved. I normally wear a small so I am reordering in a medium

This leather is so soft, and the jacket was so comfy and warm. I didn't want to take this jacket off all day! Most leather jackets for me take a while to wear in, and feel stiff until they're worn. Pros of renting, I guess! Super cute with a little bit of edgy - loved!
Would have purchased it if it wasn't so expensive. Will rent again. Soft, roomy in the perfect way, but still flattering.

This jacket is amazing! Wore it 3 times in the 2 weeks that I had it: once to brunch with a v-neck tee and jeans, once over a dress and tall boots on a night out, and once over a sweater and jeans on a dinner date. I have a hard time with jackets fitting my proportions 100%, but this one was almost a perfect fit. The only issue was that the sleeves were a bit too long. That being said, I would definitely recommended this jacket.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket but not vegan or faux leather
links_reviews_text: .This jacket is mis-characterized as vegan or faux leather. Madewell sells it in their stores now at the $498 price and it's 100% real leather.

I recently had to retire one of my favorite leather jackets after it got too cracked but I haven't yet had time to get a new one; this rental might be my next purchase! The leather was super comfortable but I didn't feel overheated in it. The fit was great and it added the right level of casual-cool to my outfit for a birthday bar crawl.

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket. Sleeves were not too long and the fit was great. I will buy this one.
links_reviews_text: Great fit.
Nice jacket for transition season
This was a great jacket - perfect for the leather look that you want. Not too long or short either and fits great
Amazing moto styled, vegan leather jacket. Feels great and looks better.
The fit was perfect and flattering. It kept me pretty warm on a cool fall day. Great rental. I would totally buy if I could afford it.
Wore for a Saturday in the City - fun chic and comfy
Perfect moto jacket for the Fall. Great to add to skirts or dresses. Fantastic quality.

links_reviews_title: Great looking and high quality, but runs a size small
links_reviews_text: See the headline. Very cropped and feels at least 1 size small, especially in the shoulders and arms.

I wanted this dress and opted for the larger size, but I should have known better with DJ. It was just too big all over. Still wore it. ;-) Cute sweater dress for days you just want to be comfy and cozy with a little bit of style.
I wore to Christmas Day with my family and it was comfortable and elegant. I had a baby 6 months before and this dress made me feel awesome!

I wore this to work with black flats then changed into sparkly gold heels for a work holiday party. I received so many compliments all day. The elbows started to feel a bit loose at the end of the day, so not sure I could have worn this more than once. Also, the material hugged everything and shapewear was a must!
It hugs in the right places. Loved it!!!

Great quality dress and was so cute online but just disinterested work for my body type. I have an hourglass figure which wasn't flattered with the material and linear stitch. I didn't even wear this before returning:(.
Considering purchasing!
Cooler weather so the thickness was nice. Very neutral with a pop of texture. Good length as I have long legs and usually most dresses are too short.

links_reviews_title: Considering purchasing... i love it that much
links_reviews_text: I've worn it twice already in two weeks and I really want to buy it! Perfect for work or a dinner out with the girls.
Nice sweater dress, super comfy and warm! The only thing I didn't like was the detail on the front isn't that flattering on my bigger chest.
Dress is cute with subtle details. Fit a little large, it was super comfortable to wear to work.

links_reviews_title: Cute but I am too chesty
links_reviews_text: I am newly pregnant and my boobs have just doubled and so I though this would work but it wasn't flattering across my chest. If i rented this a few months earlier, it probably would have been perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great & comfortable dress with so many possibilities
links_reviews_text: Flattering dress that can be styled a million different ways. Wore to a business formal lunch and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a Christmas party. It was very soft and warm enough for winter.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. Because it is a sweater dress, it hugs the body slightly so I wore shapewear to smooth things out. The details on the front and neckline were enough that simple earrings were the only jewelry needed.

The fabric of this dress is super soft and cozy making it great for the office in the winter. My dress did seem well loved (little faded). Draper James fits true to size for me s/4 - 136lb 5'2- however I can't help but to think their fit is for large busted women. It was as though the waistline was always too low for me (34A) or there was excess fabric in the torso/ chest area. I rented this and another Draper James dress and felt the same way.
Very professional dress for work. However it runs big. Would suggest this for a medium sized female.

This dress was super soft and flattering. Got tons of compliments on this casual yet stunning dress. It is sleeveless but it was a little too big. I ordered bigger just in case but sleeves were droopy at bottom so wore a cardigan. I would order normal size.

My coworkers all grabbed at the dress, thrilled it was so flowy and delicate. The moment the saw horses they lost their minds. One friend signed up for RTR as soon as she heard that's where I got this dress. I felt beautiful and comfortable all day. Highly recommend this dress.
