It was such a beautiful and nice fitting dress. I got soooo many compliments!
This dress is so fabulous. Really nice fabric, comfortable, makes you want to twirl around. It's a tad see through, so may be smart to wear with a slip.
Very comfortable, flowy, fashionable dress!
Loved this dress! Flowy in the wind, lovely on. Added a moto jacket to get to the office.
Perfect for a baby shower! Loved the bow but the colors made it less cutesy - had many compliments on this one. Only fitted in the waist and even that had some give.
What a beautiful dress! Runs TTS and is great from day to night. I paired it with a belt to make it a little more fitting for an evening party but definitely doesn't need it! It's fun and flowy
This dress is literally perfection. It fits like a dream and moves beautifully. I love, love, love this dress!

links_reviews_title: I fell in love with the horses
links_reviews_text: Really comfy, cute and easy to dress up or down. I got several compliments from strangers. I really wanted to buy it!
Crazy cute dress. The silk feels lovely. Very forgiving shape for bloated days. Or if you just want to feel chic but relaxed. I wore this to work and brunch while I had it.
Statement dress that does not sacrifice comfort - I would love to keep this one!

The fit is true to size. If you're tall, like me, the elastic waste sort of fell in a weird place, but it worked out okay. Great piece for summer and would be a good spring/fall transition piece with the right blazer.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely LOVE this dress. This is the perfect relaxed and fabulous day look.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for a stylish baby shower. Loved the relaxed fit. Lots of compliments. I feel a bit more thick right now (Size 12) but the large was a perfect fit. Wear with or without a belt and simple shoes.

Obsessed! The print and fit are so great. It is pretty sheer so I just wore a slip underneath. Not sure if I could get away with just nude underwear with this. Felt a tiny bit loose and was long even though I'm usually a large. So many compliments, totally recommend

This dress is beautiful. When I initially put it on I thought it wasn't my style, but as I went through the day I was convinced that it should be! This dress makes an entrance!! The fabric is substantial with a playful horse pattern. Get a long slip to manage all of the fabric on the skirt from moving between your legs as you walk and you are good to go!

links_reviews_title: A standout piece of you want to get noticed!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a lot of fabric, but is extremely comfortable and versatile. It's a little see through but I had no problems wearing it to work. I paired with black studded boots (and pink hair) and loved the compliments and looks of surprise when they realized there were preppy horses on it!

I loved this dress! In terms of a maxi it a little shorter than I'm used to, but I wore it with boots and it was the perfect length. It was super comfortable and felt really luxe. I got SO MANY compliments on it, I wish I could keep it

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and literally received multiple compliments as soon as I walked out of the door.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6 and the medium was good. Super cute and comfortable.

Loved the print, and the style of the dress, I didn't realize how low the keyhole is on neckline and needed a cami to be modest at work. The skirt is gorgeous, but a lot of fabric and it got twisted around my legs awkwardly a few times while walking.

Loved the necktie and pattern. Very Fallon from Dynasty. It's super lightweight, but not see through. I have rented twice because it's super flattering. I am a 12 / 14 and probably could have sized down to a L, but the XL was fine. The elastic waist makes it flexible. If you want to wear to work, be ready to pin up the slit at the chest. Otherwise, it's perfect.
Very cute, got lots of compliments. Pretty and flowy!
I feel like a million bucks in this dress! By far one of my favorites ever!
Tying the neck in the back and adding a belt totally changed the look of this dress. It can easily be preppy or edgy. Really beautiful fabric and flow. I loved it.

I wore this to a Christmas Eve dinner on a trip to New Orleans. It was fun to wear â lightweight with the great bow and just the right length (I'm 5'10) to wear with a small heel. The horse print is subtle and the color and fit were good. Just the right roominess to stuff oneself at a great meal.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. The fabric was amazing.
links_reviews_text: Fit a little large, I would go down to a L next time.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday dress, can make edgy with a leather jacket or go full on preppy with boots & a blazer
links_reviews_text: Runs slightly large, I probably could have gone with the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but runs way big
links_reviews_text: The fabric, cut, and print are beautiful. The dress is really giant and kind of overwhelmed my short frame. I'm normally a small-medium pear shape. I think I could have worn an XS in this. Loved the flowy hemline- just needed heels so it didn't brush the floor!
Slightly large, but forgiving and comfortable.Loved
This is by far my favorite rented item and was perfect for our engagement pictures!!! It was SO GORGEOUS and I received several compliments. I wish I could own it for ever!

This is such a beautiful garment, wore for a day out in the city. Super comfortable and great fit. The only minor downside is even if you button it there is a pretty low neckline but it's mostly covered by the bow. I wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress. Very long- I'm 5'11 and this is more of a maxi than a midi.
links_reviews_text: Over all cute, little house on the prairie vibes

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a ranch theme summer party, the horse print on the fabric made it perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress in very comfortable and lightweight. I wore it with a belt and cowgirl boots as it was a summer ranch party. I tied the neck tie lose, so it looked more like a lariat. It felt and looked odd to me to tie it in a bow at my neck.
The dress is not lined. I did not feel comfortable wearing it to work and I didn't want to wear a slip dress under it because it always has so much fabric. Also the neck is tight when buttoned.
Cute dress though
I don't think I would have worn this unless it was my birthday - so felt like dressing up a bit! Long, soft, unique - but not a truly practical, classic piece. That's what RTR is for I guess!
Absolutely loved this dress, the pony print is so cute. The fit is flowy and I paired it with a brown/gold cinched belt with a olive green wrap. The length was perfect for my 5'4 frame with heels.

links_reviews_title: A little sheer, but so much fun.
links_reviews_text: I'm going to have a hard time returning this one! The voluminous skirt is so much fun to wear, but the understated pattern and the bow tie keep the look sophisticated. An excellent choice for sipping Palomas in the garden. It gets four stars instead of five because the fabric is a bit sheer--be mindful of the color of your undies.
Really pretty - runs large - very comfortable

Rented this beauty in the middle of July but can imagine it would've been better suited for late fall. Had beautiful movement when you walked but the size small felt a little long on my 5'5'' frame. The hem kept getting caught in my rolling desk chair lol. Loved the detail of the pattern, but overall, felt a little out of place for a daytime moment. Flattering but suited for a more semi-formal occasion like a wedding.
The coat was so warm and soft. Loved this piece!
So cute. Got compliments nonstop!! Really recommend
Loved this for Christmas and NYE parties! Such a cute coat and nice fit! Looks great with jeans or dressed up...sheds a bit so you have to be careful if you're wearing black underneath.

links_reviews_title: True to size, but not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: I love renting coats from RTR during the winter, but keeping in mind they are not always the most flattering, especially faux fur which always looks big even though it runs true to size. As long as you're ok with that, this is a great rental! Super soft and definitely a statement with a simple outfit on.
Very comfortable jacket, but was a little too much for me. I got the XL as I would be wearing something under it, but it was still too big for me.

links_reviews_title: Went one size up for extra room. Then used as a blanket while traveling it is so soft.
links_reviews_text: Loved this coat for winter formal dance. To stay warm.

I love this coat and keeps me warm at 20-30 degree NYC weather. But once it gets to the 30s, I started sweating in it. I like an oversized coat Cos I have a small torso but I can imagine many hating this coat as it does make your body look a lot bigger . It's VERY thick and it almost feels like I'm in a stuffed muppet costume... I got a lot of looks everyday, not sure they're good ones or bad ones but I love it anyway!

I loved this jacket but I realized it still wasn't quite cold enough to wear it. When though i felt like I was swimming in it but it was still the softest thing ever and so warm! I'd rent again in the winter.

links_reviews_title: So cozy and plush!! Great teddy bear coat
links_reviews_text: This coat is ridiculously plush and so warm. It's pretty heavy so it was great in the cold snowy weather. Runs true to size/probably slightly larger that other outerwear - I didn't have to size up in order to layer it over a sweater.
Fits true to size. Super warm and cuddly. Well made and luxe. Would definitely buy if I had room in my tiny closet. Lots of compliments.
Iâm sure itâs super chic in a smaller size but Iâm short and curvy and it made me look like a female teddy bear...not the coatâs fault though.
This was a great coat. Nice and warm, comfortably cozy, soft soft soft!

links_reviews_title: I rented this coat for everyday wear in NYC.
links_reviews_text: The faux fur is extremely soft and feels high quality, and is extremely warm. The closures aren't very secure and come open but other than that it is a very nice coat. Not exactly my style, as it is a little too much like a cozy teddy bear and I tend to prefer things a little sleeker but it's a great coat for that look and the color is appealing. I was wearing it through Dec. in NYC and it kept me snug.
This fur is the softest, snuggliest fur ever. I love it!
This is certainly a statement piece -- I looked like Macklemore from the Thrift Shop music video. It looks better in pictures, but it's seriously an enormous and warm coat. Super trendy and soft!

links_reviews_title: This jacket is fabulous, and looks like a teddy bear, but you may want to size down.
links_reviews_text: Fun, cozy, warm coat. Size down because the arms look huge with all of the material.
Super comfy and versatile. Wore this with a high waisted skirt and it worked well. I have a long torso so pairing with a high waist is a must.

links_reviews_title: The sweater was great for winter. Very forgettable in my closet
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size.
Warm and cozy but still feminine! Rent this!!!
Fits perfect with the length.

I received lots of compliments on this sweater - I wore a size small and it was fitted around the waist and a bit loose up top. Great for a night out and for work with high-waisted pants. I can normally fit in an XS/S depending on the brand.

Liked the sweater, high quality and warm, but it runs a little small if you have longer arms or a long torso. even with high waisted jeans it showed a tiny bit of midriff, but not enough to bother me. Still wore it several times and liked it a lot!
Looks great and so incredibly comfortable.
Good color, comfortable and not itchy. Could be longer but XS fit for me overall. I am a size 2 dress but an XS in jackets.
It is cozy and the fabric is very nice.
Might be better for someone taller, although it is already extremely short on my 5'1" frame. Maybe someone with disproportionately long arms??

links_reviews_title: I got compliments on this sweater.
links_reviews_text: I wore it with black pants and it looked nice. It was much warmer and heavier than I realized but it's very cold this winter so it worked out. I got pretty hot while inside though. I also didn't realize the lines are orange and not red. I wore it to Thanksgiving dinner so the color worked out just fine. I would have given it 5 stars but it made me look kind of thick around the waist. This might be because I am a little heavier these days :/
Very flattering fit with a. Ice embossed polka dot pattern. Debuted for myself during self-isolation BECAUSE I CAN!

Casual dress made of sweater-like material, so it is warm in winter. Fits very well and very comfortable. Unique color with nice texture. It is fully lined, but the lining is just knit (not a silky material) so doesn't really function well as a lining. But I still really liked the dress and would rent again.

Such a fun and comfortable dress! I wasn't blown away by it, but I got a ton of compliments and the quality was excellent. I would say it runs a bit snug on the chest/arms. Definitely size up if you have a larger chest. Tons of ways to style this dress.
Big pockets and sweater material. Decent for fall.

This wasn't my favorite dress but I definitely loved the pockets and the color. It ended up being a little shorter than I expected in the back. But I paired with a nice pair of black tights that aren't to see-through and it worked out just fine for work. The material is really thick so it keeps you nice and warm on a cold day

I rented this item because a few girls I work with had rented and it seemed cute. I am long bodied and short legged, so it felt a little short for my proportions. I paired with spanx faux leather leggings and leather combat boots. It was warm and comfy for a day at the office, and the soft stretchy fabric of the dress allowed for great range of motion despite the structured appearance of the dress. The color/pattern has a very sweet 70s vibe. I loved it!
A little on the short side but nice for work.

I think this was just a bit short for my comfort. I wore this with a navy blazer for family photos and it looked great! I also wore to work and to a holiday party and it felt uncomfortable because of the length, but I got a ton of compliments.

Crap pic Great sweater dress ! Love the burnt orange color for compliments from strangers Fits true to size- a little short in arms but I have long arms. No itch woohoo!! Zip up back Wore with leggings for warmth Subtle polka dots are cuteeeee
Very comfy. Was a bit baggie like this dress had been over worn. Otherwise, runs true to size and got several compliments. Love the front pockets.

links_reviews_title: So glad I ordered the small as my backup size!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the XS and the S for a family event in VA this weekend. It was in the 50s and this was the perfect dress for the weather. I typically am an XS, but surprisingly it was too small! The color was perfect and I loved the polka dots. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and flattering for new working mama
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! I had a baby 2 months ago and this hid my lingering baby weight nicely!
Omg this was SHORT. I really loved it on the hanger, but it did nothing for my figure. Great fall/winter weight.

links_reviews_title: LOVED IT for my engagement photos
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfy and warm for a 50 degree drizzly day for our engagement photos. The xl fit great and was true to size.
Wore as an outfit for my engagement photos! It is pretty short but not too bad

I love this dress. It's warm and cute. There are pockets!! It is slightly tight in the bust and shoulders. I have a small bust and it was still tight. If you have a leather bust you may want to size up.
Got lots of compliments. It is thick though, so better for colder weather!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable, however it was a little shorter than I hoped. This is a great dress for a cooler night as the fabric feels like a sweater and has a nice lining!
This dress fit perfectly. It looks warm but I was comfortable in it on a summer evening. It's very forgiving. I didn't even have to wear spanx with it!
comfortable, great length and fit
very cute! Not super sexy so it is appropriate for work with tights.

links_reviews_title: The dress was wonderful! Had to wear tights though because it was definitely short!
links_reviews_text: The material was not too warm, and it was soft! Overall really great! VERY short but most dresses are for me and my bottom half! But I wore tights and it was great!
I wore this dress to work with brown boots. Got tons of compliments on an outfit that came together in under 5 min!

links_reviews_title: Really loved this as a simple work dress. I got a ton of compliments on it without having to do much
links_reviews_text: Great dress would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but just missed on my figure
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous but just missed on my figure

links_reviews_title: Cute everyday dress, but be careful sitting down!
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress a lot and *loved* the material. It was super soft and cozy for a winter time look! My only qualm with it was it ran a little short for me. I was wearing the dress with tights, but still felt a little too exposed when sitting down or bending over. Probably more appropriate for an informal party than to work where I wore it, but very cute and one I'd rent again for a different occasion.
I wore this dress to multiple holiday events and even to work - got compliments in all settings. And it's soft and comfortable! Would rent again for sure.
Nice for daily outing or casual dinner.

I was unsure when I first tried this on, as it didn't seem too flattering (I'm an apple shape). Once I paired it with a skinny belt, it actually looked really cute. This dress works for work or the weekend. Pair it with boots, leggings, and a blazer or leather jacket.
I ended up not wearing this but did really like it. Very cute and comfortable, makes your waist look small. Unfortunately it is short and the event I needed it for would of not liked the length.

The fit was nice except that it is so short that if I lifted my arm so if you could actually see my butt cheeks and the arms didn't go all the way to my wrist either. It's almost like juniors sizing which is unusual for a designer piece. Comfy and warm though. Way too short for work. For me.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress that's good for cold days. Paired with brown booties to complete the look.

links_reviews_text: Wanted to wear it for work but was way too short!
I loved this dress so much! I wore it to work a handful of times and it is extremely comfortable and the perfect fall color. Great shape and structure.

Pros: Loved the warm brown color. The dress is short so be sure you are ready to show off your legs. Fit my size 14-16 bod well. Fabric had cute pattern. Great look for "just another Monday" on the runway. Cons: Dress pockets were pulled out from previous wearers.

Absolutely love this dress. I am an hourglass with a postpartum tummy and this dress made me feel like a million bucks. It's perfectly fitted to accentuate my bust in a flattering way and nips in at my waist. The pockets are a bonus but the material of the dress really sold me! It's so comfortable but looks very put together. My measurements are 44-34-44. I am a 12/14 and the XL fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Warm but too short for work
links_reviews_text: Really loved the fit and would order true to size in this brand. My biggest issue is that it is way too short for work. I'd rent again but only for a night on the town. I'm only 5'5" and it was too short to wear to work.
This is a great fall/winter dress. Super warm and soft. I felt it runs a bit large and will likely try to size down next time
This dress is soft, comfortable and great for short folks.
I love the color! It's so versatile...I wore it one day at work on a casual day, but it was also great paired with a dress. It's also a great deal. I might have to buy it!
This piece was great for work and the weekend. The color really popped, and could be easily dressed up or down. It has pockets, too!
Long cute cardigan. Wore this with jeans out with friends as well with black pants to work. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: pop of color spices up any outfit
links_reviews_text: I really love this sweater. Super cozy and has pockets! Wore it with an H&M tank and jeans, but could also be dressed up for work.
Chic and comfortable. Sleeves might be a little short of you have long arms. Love the pockets.

links_reviews_title: Cute comfortable and warm! Can dress up Or down!
links_reviews_text: Nice cute & comfortable
Beautiful color, lightweight.

This was warm and loved the color. The pockets were a great touch as well. There was a good amount of lint as it arrived new with tags, but that should subside with RTR dry cleaning. Recommend as a great basic cardigan.
It runs larger, more billowy than expected. The pockets are nice. The fabric is not luxurious, but it's fine.

links_reviews_title: so comfortable and flattering as I'm 25 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: super stretchy and comfortable sweater, the sleeves were somewhat short, but I also have really long arms. Love this sweater for every day wear to work! I'm very tall and it fits proportionally, so highly recommend for ladies over 5'9" who may have trouble finding long tops
I've never had more fun in a sweatshirt! This runs massively large. I probably could have gone down to an XXXS if they made that size.

links_reviews_title: I want to wear this everyday!
links_reviews_text: Casual diva perfection! It's big which makes it perfect for leggings. I love it!
I received so many compliments on this sweater. It is sparkly, camo goodness and super comfortable. Will definitely rent again!

I mean just wow. If you're looking to stand out while still looking sporty/casual, this is the hoodie for you. It's very heavy and warm. However, it runs HUGE. I'm normally a 4/6 and I was drowning in the small. Honestly I could've easily worn it as a hoodie dress. BUT I absolutely loved the hoodie and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and eye catching sequin hoodie!
links_reviews_text: Perfect mix between leisure and fashion. Wore to work with wide leg jeans and combat boots for an edgy yet comfy look. I wear a size small and this fit true to size.
This is probably my FAVE RTR rental ever. I love it so much. I have rarely worn rentals more than once but plan on keeping this one for weeks. It's THAT perfect. I wish I could buy it!!

This sweatshirt is so cute! It's meant to be oversized, but I found it to run large even considering that, so you may want to order a size down. The sequins around the hood can feel scratchy, but if you wear a crew neck underneath it's not a problem. Definitely worth trying though, I may rent it again!

It's funny, I actually didn't think this piece was that amazing. But, it was the most complimented item I've ever worn! Random people kept approaching to say how much they liked the shine with the camo. That being said, I didn't think it was that comfortable. The hood kept sliding back and the neckline would feel like it was choking me. And my daughters said it was "too scratchy" when they hugged me. But, for an everyday statement piece you really can't go wrong!
Was really excited when this finally became available but was a little disappointed. It was cute but not great. Was larger than I expected. Just meh...
Made me feel like a cool-kid. Sequined camo distressed baggy hoodie...what's not to love. Small fit fine. My usual medium would have probably worked too.
Very sparkly and fun. Compliments. Runs very large and looks great with a simple pair of black leggings.
Very fun to throw over yoga pants or to wear with jeans

links_reviews_title: Love the modern twist on this hoodie
links_reviews_text: I loved this hoodie but it was huge! I wore it a couple of times but looked like I was wearing something of my husband's. The sequins were a modern twist that i loved paired with the camp fabric. It is a heavy piece though. I'd rent again but a size or 2 smaller.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rents! Received loads of compliments! Love, love, love!
links_reviews_text: Wore an XL, probably could have worn a L. I liked the "bigger" look, it was comfy and just so different!

links_reviews_title: A woman jogging in NYC stopped to tell me how much she loved it and got compliments from many more.
links_reviews_text: A little big and would order next size down if I rented again. It was a bit frayed on bottom but I think it was supposed to be like that.

I put this on as soon as I got it and I love it! I can get several looks out of this shirt because I ordered a size larger. Size down one or two sizes if you want a more fitted look. I chose to wear this loose, as intended. It's new, warm, girlie and fabulous!
This sweater is cute and warm - not to thick or too thin- still really cozy! Pretty soft!
Very warm but fits right around the neck. If you're not used to wearing turtlenecks size up
Loved the boxy cute fit and super-soft yarns. The color gradient is amazing. Love that this sweater is vegan (no wool!)
Cute sweater, nothing wow, but still fun to brighten up winter a bit.

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors-- to big for me
links_reviews_text: I loved the colors in the sweater, but I did not end up wearing as i felt it was too big. It was not flattering on me. I usually wear a small or medium in sweaters, and went with the medium on this one because of other reviews. I felt like it had too much material/too baggy. But the colors are great and it is comfortable! Loved that about it. It's also not an itchy sweater at all, which is always a plus.
Received a lot of compliments. Not scratchy at all!

I rented this on a whim and ended up loving it and wearing it twice. I wore it on a cold day and it was perfect. I loved how the colors looked with light-wash jeans. I am usually a medium or small in sweaters and the small was perfect (just tight when pulling it over my head- keep this in mind for your makeup!). I wore a long sleeve tee underneath but the material was very soft/ not too itchy. Will likely rent again.
The sweater was weirdly bulky in the upper torso and was too oversized to my liking. The quality of the sweater was kind of matted and looked like it was very worn.

The colors of this sweater are so beautiful. Perfect combo for red heads like me! Great fit and length! Looks awesome with my high waisted jeans. Not super heavy weight so I didn't feel like I was going to get too hot in it.
this sweater is perfect for winter, but brightens things up with a great color pallette
This sweater is slightly oversized, I probably could have sized down to a medium and still been ok. Itâs very soft and warm. The colors are so nice too.
Medium weight sweater. Pretty color. More mock turtleneck than a tight one. Wore multiple times.
Fit well. Super cozy
Thick fabric, which is comfy and warm, but made me look a bit bulky.

Rented this because thought the pattern was cute. Couldn't wear without being so hot even in NYC. Neck was super hot and a lot of fabric making me just uncomfortable each time I tried to wore it. Ended up changing outfits every time.
These earrings were perfect with the understated amazing black dress. They are large but NOT heavy and stayed put all night perfectly.
I love lele sadoughi, but these were slightly tacky to me. I wore them and they looked cute; just a little cheap looking.

I LOVE these earrings. Total show stoppers without being TOO loud. They are just pearls after all. They are a chic and edgy way to wear pearl earrings that don't make them look stuffy. The perfect compliment to my hot pink pantsuit I wore to a dinner for my law firm.
I never wanted to return these. They add a statement to any outfit. I love that they are feminine and trendy at the same time.
Loved these gorgeous hoops - perfect classy statement piece without being gaudy. Wore them to a football game and got compliments the entire time - will rent again!

A fun twist on the classic pearl earring â I loved these so much that I wore them to both the cocktail and black tie events of the same wedding! These are well-made and very light â no worrying that they'll fall off during a boogie (they're not clip-ons). They are also a great size â large enough to make a statement but not obnoxiously so. Perfect to dress up a simple everyday outfit, or to take a formal look to a whole new level of fun.
These are to die for, kind of wish I just kept them
Bought these for work/everyday use but didn't wind up wearing them. They were cute but too large for a casual outfit. I would definitely rent again for a wedding or dressier occasion!
Slightly different twist on classic pearls
Love Lele stuff. These would be great to own bc they go with so much and are so fun. These are big hoops too.
From the picture I thought these were smaller. They are pretty but large hoops! I wasn't able to wear them.

links_reviews_title: From work to play -- these are great all day!
links_reviews_text: So cute! They immediately jazz up any outfit without the stodgy look of pearls. Super fun and playful, yet professional enough to wear to a corporate meeting. Loved them!
So cute and received so many compliments.
Cute hoops and not too heavy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful statement for dressing up or down
links_reviews_text: These were lovely! I received tons of compliments and I dressed them up for work and down with jeans for a date night. They were a little bigger than I thought but accurate when looking back at the picture online. I wore all day and thought they were comfortable and not heavy at all.

links_reviews_title: So cute, but a little heavy!
links_reviews_text: SO cute, but I had them on for an event that was 6+ hours and they got very heavy!
I normally have trouble with pants but these were amazing!! Great length for long legged/taller ladies!
Never found a pair of pants that have fit me so well length and cut and everything! In love.
My usual size is 6, i rented 8 based on other review. It fits perfect waist, hip, and length as well! My height is 5'11. Definitely for tall girls.
A little long fine with low top wedge boots.
Fit tight in the legs.
Fit loose thru the hips. But fitted thru the leg. These were so cute. So many ways to wear them. Loved
Great fit, super soft, perfect length for this tall girl!

links_reviews_title: So soft, keeps you warm but also perfect for work!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and comfortable for all day! Which normally isn't the case of dress pants. I loved these and they were perfect with a pair of heels

links_reviews_title: IN LOVE! Tailored pants don't typically fit me but this style was perfect for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: The subtle flare at the bottom of the pants and the classic design make this item a perfect staple piece for work or causal wear. I can't wait to style these several different ways!

links_reviews_title: For the long legged and small waist
links_reviews_text: Material does not give much. Soft to touch but definitely higher waisted and long. I am 5'5" and 140. I have a long torso and short legs so was not flattering to my figure.

Sadly, I couldn't wear these pants at all. They were far too small and would have been way too long. I'm 5'5", weigh 132 lbs and am slightly curvier in the hips. I almost always wear a true 4 and I couldn't even get these on. A 6 probably still wouldn't have been big enough and even longer (like trailing on the ground). Would work best for someone very tall and thin.

they were a bit long on me, but I fixed that by wearing them with boots that had a little more sole & heel. Very comfortable, and perfect for workplace business-casual. Great fit, not slouchy nor too tight. I'd rent them again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work, trendy and comfortable
links_reviews_text: These fit true to size, stylish and very versatile. Easy to pair with a blazer, sweater, etc. I loved these pants and received so many compliments when I wore them!

links_reviews_title: Great pants that go with a lot of different colored tops/jackets!
links_reviews_text: Great quality and fit. Thighs a bit slim but not too slim for my athletic build. Loved wearing these.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, comfortable pants for work.
links_reviews_text: I love these pants! I wish I could buy them but they are a little too pricey. But the price makes sense since they are so high quality. The pattern is cute, fabric is soft but sturdy, and they are an awesome length for a tall girl like me! I read the other reviews and sized up to a 10, and I'm normally either a 6 or 8. Definitely size up because if I hadn't, they would not have fit!
Perfect fit for me and these were comfortable enough to wear all day at work.

links_reviews_title: Good work pants for winter outfits
links_reviews_text: RTR recommended a 10 but an 8 probably would have been a better fit, overall liked these and the slight flare at bottom.
These pants were the perfect length.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to close these pants. They're beautiful though.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an 8 or 10, so opted for the 10. Should've tried 12. Honestly I don't even know if that would have worked for me because it would have probably been too long. It's a shame because the pants looks lovely and material is great.
I'm obsessed. They're so soft and flattering. I have wide hips, usually a 4/6 so got a 6. Fit perfectly. I needed to wear heels because they were longgg.
Great fit

links_reviews_title: These pants are super cute and flattering! Wore them with a red sweater.
links_reviews_text: The fit was overall true to size except I felt they were a little tight in the thighs. If I were to rent again, I could stick to the same size but if I knew I'd be moving around a lot a bigger size might be necessary.

links_reviews_title: Pants fit great and add style to my work outfit.
links_reviews_text: The pants were long so I pinned them up

links_reviews_title: Love the pants. They were just way too small
links_reviews_text: I love the pants. The fabric. Perfect for winter. Very soft and cozy. I love the stitched pleat down the front. Unfortunately the were super small. I'm usually a 4 all day long. I barely got them over my hips. No way they could zip. I'm going to see if they have them in a bigger size. I really want to wear them!
I'm between a 6 and an 8. I wore an 8 and they were snug. They're high waisted and tight in the butt. However, I thought the fit was flattering. Would definitely go up a size and I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice looking, but I couldn't wear them.
links_reviews_text: These are way too long, and too small. I am 125, 5'5", and usually wear a 2/4. These are tiny in the waist and I would have needed to be at least 5'10" to wear them without hemming. I couldn't wear them. :(
Loved how these fit. Received a few compliments on them. Wore them with a black top but could wear with other colors too.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful quality fabric, comfortable and LONG!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3" with a fairly short torso and longer legs, so I usually wear regular-length trousers but can sometimes take petites. These were verrrrry long. I had to pin them up more than one hemfold in order to wear them to work with 3.5" heels. Other than that, I thought the fit was great, a bit large on the waist but nice elsewhere. I typically wear an 8 in this brand. I have a smaller waist and larger bottom, and usually wear a 2-4 regular length in trousers for Banana Republic and Ann Taylor, a 4 pants in Rebecca Taylor suiting, if that helps.

links_reviews_title: These pants are super long which is great for tall ladies!
links_reviews_text: These pants fit wonderfully and maintained shape all day. They were pretty warm also
I'm a standard 6, and I could not button these. way too small, never worn.

I've only been wearing these pants for about an hour but oh my gosh I love them!! As a 5'10" woman, it's next to impossible to find full length pants that are actually long enough without having to shop in the "tall" section. These have a 33" inseam and have a flattering slim shape. They do run on the tighter side so if you're between sizes, I'd recommend sizing up (I have a 26" waist and usually wear a 2 or a 4 depending on the brand, and I got a 4 and they're perfectly snug).

I loved the pattern of these pants but unfortunately could not wear them as they were way too tight in the thighs. If I were to size up they would have been too big in the waist. These just didn't work for my body type.
